original: sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcita-Samādhirājasūtram /
1 Nidānaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: nidāna parivartaḥ

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena bhikṣuniyutaśatasahasreṇa aśītyā  #
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham paripūrṇena bhikṣu niyuta śata sahasreṇa aśītyā

original: ca bodhisattvaniyutaiḥ sārdham /
analyzed: ca bodhisattva niyutaiḥ sārdham

original: sarvairakajātipratibaddhairabhijñābhijñātairdaśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitairdhāraṇīsūtrāntagatiṃ
analyzed: sarvaiḥ aka jāti pratibaddhaiḥ abhijñā abhijñātaiḥ daśa diś lokadhātu saṃnipatitaiḥ dhāraṇī sūtrānta gatim

original: gataiḥ sarvasattvadharmadānasaṃtoṣakairmahābhijñājñānodāhārakuśalaiḥ sarvapāramitāparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ
analyzed: gataiḥ sarva sattva dharma dāna saṃtoṣakaiḥ mahā abhijñā jñāna udāhāra kuśalaiḥ sarva pāramitā parama pāramitā prāptaiḥ

original: sarvabodhisattvasamādhisamāpattivyavasthānajñānakuśalaiḥ sarvabuddhastutastobhitapraśastaiḥ
analyzed: sarva bodhisattva samādhi samāpatti vyavasthāna jñāna kuśalaiḥ sarva buddha stuta stobhita praśastaiḥ

original: sarvabuddhakṣetravyākramaṇakuśalaiḥ sarvamārasaṃtrāsanajñānakuśalaiḥ sarvadharmayathāvajjñānakuśalaiḥ
analyzed: sarva buddhakṣetra vyākramaṇa kuśalaiḥ sarva māra saṃtrāsana jñāna kuśalaiḥ sarva dharma yathāvat jñāna kuśalaiḥ

original: sarvasattvendriyaparāparajñānakuśalaiḥ buddhasarvakarmapūjāsamādānaprajñānakuśalaiḥ
analyzed: sarva sattva indriya para apara jñāna kuśalaiḥ buddha sarva karma pūjā samādāna prajñāna kuśalaiḥ

original: sarvalokadharmānupaliptaiḥ kāyavākcittasamalaṃkṛtaiḥ mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaiḥ
analyzed: sarva loka dharma an upaliptaiḥ kāya vāc citta samalaṃkṛtaiḥ mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā saṃnāha saṃnaddhaiḥ

original: mahāvīryāsaṃkhyeyakalpāparikṣīṇamānasaiḥ mahāsiṃhanādanādibhiḥ sarvaparapravādānabhibhūtaiḥ
analyzed: mahā vīrya asaṃkhyeya kalpa a parikṣīṇa mānasaiḥ mahā siṃhanāda nādibhiḥ sarva para pravāda anabhibhūtaiḥ

original: avaivartikamudrāmudritaiḥ sarvabuddhadharmābhiṣekaprāptaiḥ /
analyzed: a vaivartika mudrā mudritaiḥ sarva buddha dharma abhiṣeka prāptaiḥ

analyzed: ajita bodhisattva pūrvaṃgamaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ bhadra kalpikaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ

original: mañjuśrīpūrvaṃgamaiśca ṣaṣṭibhiranupamacittaiḥ /

original: peyālam /
analyzed: peyālam

original: yāvad brahmapūrvaṃgamaiśca brahmakāyikairdevaputraistadanyaiśca
analyzed: yāvat brahma pūrvaṃgamaiḥ ca brahmakāyikaiḥ devaputraiḥ tad anyaiḥ ca

original: maheśākhyamaheśākhyairudārodārairdevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyairbhagavān (Vaidya 2)
analyzed: maheśākhya maheśākhyaiḥ udāra udāraiḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣyaiḥ bhagavān vaidya

original: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito 'pacāyitaścatasṛṇāmapi parṣadāṃ sadevalokasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyo namaskaraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: satkṛtaḥ gurukṛtaḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ arcitaḥ apacāyitaḥ catasṛṇām api parṣadām sa deva lokasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ namaskaraṇīyaḥ

original: tatra khalu bhagavānanekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān aneka śata sahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ dharmam deśayati smaḥ ādau kalyāṇam madhye kalyāṇam paryavasāne kalyāṇam

original: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma //
analyzed: su artham su vyañjanam kevalam paripūrṇam pariśuddham paryavadātam brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte candraprabho nāma kumārabhūtaḥ
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena tasmin eva parṣad saṃnipāte candraprabhaḥ nāma kumāra bhūtaḥ

original: saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlo jātismaro
analyzed: saṃnipatitaḥ abhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ pūrva jina kṛta adhikāraḥ avaropita kuśala mūlaḥ jātismaraḥ

original: labdhapratibhāno mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahākaruṇābhiyuktaḥ /
analyzed: labdha pratibhānaḥ mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ mahā karuṇā abhiyuktaḥ

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam prāvṛtya dakṣiṇam

original: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
analyzed: jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśam,
analyzed: pṛccheyam aham bhagavantam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham kaṃcid eva pradeśam

original: sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
analyzed: saced me bhagavān avakāśam kuryāt pṛṣṭa praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: evamukte bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - pṛccha tvaṃ kumārabhūta tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadeva kāṅkṣasi
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma pṛccha tvam kumāra bhūta tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham yat yat eva kāṅkṣasi

original: ahaṃ tasya tasyaiva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: aham tasya tasya eva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣyāmi

original: sarvajño 'smi samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kumāra sarvadarśī sarvadharmabalavaiśāradyavṛṣabhatāmanuprāpto 'nāvaraṇavimokṣajñānasamanvāgataḥ /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ asmi samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kumāra sarva darśī sarva dharma bala vaiśāradya vṛṣabha tām anuprāptaḥ anāvaraṇa vimokṣa jñāna samanvāgataḥ

original: nāsti kumāra tathāgatasya sarvadharmeṣvajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā anantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu
analyzed: na asti kumāra tathāgatasya sarva dharmeṣu ajñātam vā adṛṣṭam vā aśrutam vā aviditam vā a sākṣātkṛtam vā an abhisaṃbuddham vā ananta aparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: nityakṛtaste kumāra avakāśo bhavatu tathāgataṃ praśnaparipṛcchanāya /
analyzed: nitya kṛtaḥ te kumāra avakāśaḥ bhavatu tathāgatam praśna paripṛcchanāya

original: ahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi //
analyzed: aham te tasya tasya eva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣyāmi

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ tasyām velāyām bhagavantam gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata

original: kathaṃ carantaḥ saṃbuddha lokanātha prabhaṃkara /
analyzed: katham carantaḥ saṃbuddha lokanātha prabhaṃkara

original: labhate 'cintiyaṃ jñānaṃ vyākuruṣva hitaṃkara // SRS_1.1 //
analyzed: labhate acintiyam jñānam vyākuruṣva hitaṃkara

original: kathaṃ carantu narendra satyavādi naravṛṣabha naradevapūjanīya /
analyzed: katham carantu narendra satya vādi nara vṛṣabha nara deva pūjanīya

original: atuliyu varu labdhamagrayāṇaṃ giravara pṛṣṭa viyākuruṣva nātha // SRS_1.2 //
analyzed: labdham agrayāṇam giravara viyākuruṣva nātha

original: adhyāśayena pṛcchāmi śāṭhyaṃ mama na vidyate /
analyzed: adhyāśayena pṛcchāmi śāṭhyam mama na vidyate

original: sākṣī na kaścidanyo me anyatra puruṣottamāt // SRS_1.3 //
analyzed: sākṣī na kaścid anyaḥ me anyatra puruṣottamāt

original: vipula praṇidhi mahyamasti chandaścariya prajānasi mahya śākyasiṃha /
analyzed: vipula praṇidhi mahyam asti śākyasiṃha

original: na ca ahaṃ vacanavittako bhaviṣye laghu pratipatti bhaṇāhi me narendra // SRS_1.4 //
analyzed: na ca aham vacana vittakaḥ bhaviṣye laghu pratipatti bhaṇāhi me narendra

original: (Vaidya 3)
analyzed: vaidya

original: katarāhārakā dharmā buddhayāne bahuṃkarāḥ /
analyzed: katara āhārakāḥ dharmāḥ buddha yāne bahuṃkarāḥ

original: vyākuruṣva mahāvīra sarvadharmāṇa pāraga // SRS_1.5 //
analyzed: vyākuruṣva mahā vīra sarva dharmāṇa pāraga

original: upakare dharma mama brūhi nātha yatha naru niṣevatu bhoti tīkṣṇaprajñaḥ /
analyzed: upakare dharma mama brūhi nātha yatha naru niṣevatu tīkṣṇa prajñaḥ

original: apagatabhayabhairavo atrasto na ca parityāgu karoti śīlaskandhāt /
analyzed: apagata bhaya bhairavaḥ atrastaḥ na ca parityāgu karoti śīla skandhāt

original: vyapagatamadarāgadoṣamohaścarati ca cārika sarvaśāntadoṣaḥ // SRS_1.6 //
analyzed: vyapagata mada rāga doṣa mohaḥ carati ca cārika sarva śānta doṣaḥ

original: kathaṃ na tyajate śīlaṃ kathaṃ dhyānaṃ na riñcati /
analyzed: katham na tyajate śīlam katham dhyānam na riñcati

original: kathaṃ niṣevate 'raṇyaṃ kathaṃ prajñā pravartate // SRS_1.7 //
analyzed: katham niṣevate araṇyam katham prajñā pravartate

original: kathaṃ daśabalaśāsane udāre abhirati vindati śīla rakṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: katham daśa bala śāsane udāre abhirati vindati rakṣamāṇaḥ

original: kathaṃ bhavati acchidru śīlaskandhaḥ kathaṃ ca tuleti svabhāvu saṃskṛtasya // SRS_1.8 //
analyzed: katham bhavati śīla skandhaḥ katham ca svabhāvu saṃskṛtasya

original: kathaṃ kāyena vācā pariśuddho bhoti paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: katham kāyena vācā pariśuddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ

original: asaṃkliṣṭena cittena buddhajñānaṃ niṣevate // SRS_1.9 //
analyzed: asaṃkliṣṭena cittena buddha jñānam niṣevate

original: kathaṃ bhavati viśuddhakāyakarmā kathaṃ ca vivarjita bhonti vācadoṣāḥ /
analyzed: katham bhavati viśuddha kāya karmā katham ca bhonti vāca doṣāḥ

original: kathaṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ puruṣavara mama pṛṣṭa vyākuruṣva // SRS_1.10 //
analyzed: katham bhavati asaṃkliṣṭa cittaḥ puruṣa vara mama pṛṣṭa vyākuruṣva

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - ekadharmeṇa kumāra samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān guṇān pratilabhate,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam etat avocat eka dharmeṇa kumāra samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ etān guṇān pratilabhate

original: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
analyzed: kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: katamenaikadharmeṇa?
analyzed: katamena eka dharmeṇa

original: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto bhavati hitacitto 'pratihatacitto 'viṣamacittaḥ /
analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva sattveṣu sama cittaḥ bhavati hita cittaḥ a pratihata cittaḥ a viṣama cittaḥ

original: anena kumāra ekadharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān guṇān pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
analyzed: anena kumāraḥ eka dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ etān guṇān pratilabhate kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata - (Vaidya 4)
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām candraprabham kumāra bhūtam gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata vaidya

original: ekadharmaṃ samādāya bodhisattvo ya vartate /
analyzed: eka dharmam samādāya bodhisattvaḥ vartate

original: etān guṇān sa labhate kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca budhyate // SRS_1.11 //
analyzed: etān guṇān sa labhate kṣipram bodhim ca budhyate

original: na ca kaści pratihanyate 'sya cittam apratihatacittu yo bhoti bodhisattvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca kaści pratihanyate asya cittam yaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: na ca khilu janayati na pradoṣaṃ labhati yathā parikīrtitān viśeṣān // SRS_1.12 //
analyzed: na ca khilu janayati na pradoṣam labhati yathā parikīrtitān viśeṣān

original: samaṃ cittaṃ niṣevitvā vipāko darśitaḥ samaḥ /
analyzed: samam cittam niṣevitvā vipākaḥ darśitaḥ samaḥ

original: samāḥ pādatalā bhonti samaścācāragocaraḥ // SRS_1.13 //
analyzed: samāḥ pāda talāḥ bhonti samaḥ ca ācāra gocaraḥ

original: samamaviṣamacittu bhāvayitvā apagatadoṣakhilaḥ prahīṇakāṅkṣaḥ /
analyzed: samam aviṣama cit tu bhāvayitvā apagata doṣa khilaḥ prahīṇa kāṅkṣaḥ

original: caraṇavaratalāḥ samāsya bhonti paramaprabhāsvara śuddhadarśanīyaḥ // SRS_1.14 //
analyzed: caraṇa vara talāḥ bhonti parama prabhāsvara śuddha darśanīyaḥ

original: daśadiśita viroci bodhisattvaḥ sphurati śirīya prabhāya buddhakṣetram /
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ sphurati prabhāya buddhakṣetram

original: yada bhavati sa labdhu śāntabhūmi tada bahusattva sthapeti buddhajñāne // SRS_1.15 //
analyzed: bhavati buddha jñāne

original: tatra kumāra sarvasattveṣu samacitto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo hitacitto 'pratihatacitto 'viṣamacittaṃ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ  #

analyzed: sa caṃkrama sthaḥ na niṣadyam āśritaḥ ākāṅkṣate puruṣavarasya jñānam

original: (Vaidya 22)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sa buddha saṃjānati buddha paśyate buddhāna co dharmata pratyavekṣate /
analyzed: sa buddha saṃjānati buddha paśyate buddhāna ca u dharmata pratyavekṣate

original: iha samādhismi pratiṣṭhihitvā namasyate buddha mahānubhāvān // SRS_4.19 //
analyzed: iha namasyate buddha mahā anubhāvān

analyzed: kāyena vācā ca varṇam bhaṇatī abhīkṣṇam

analyzed: na buddham ārabhya smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na vedanābhiḥ anusaṃharīyati

analyzed: tathā hi tena vicinitva jñātā anāgatā āgata dharma śūnyatā

original: so tādṛśe dharmanaye pratiṣṭhito na khidyate citta carantu cārikām // SRS_4.22 //
analyzed: saḥ tādṛśe dharma naye pratiṣṭhitaḥ na khidyate citta carantu cārikām

analyzed: aham ca bhāṣeya praṇīta dharmam yūyam ca samācarethāḥ

original: (Vaidya 23)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: adhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule aprameye acintye aparimāṇe yat āsīt

analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavataḥ ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aśītiḥ śrāvaka koṭyaḥ prathama sannipātaḥ abhūt

analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena tasya bhagavataḥ ghoṣadattasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catvāriṃśat varṣa sahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇam abhūt

analyzed: ayam ca jambudvīpaḥ ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ ca kṣemaḥ ca subhikṣaḥ ca ramaṇīyaḥ ca bahu jana ākīrṇa manuṣyaḥ ca abhūt

original: dṛḍhabalaśca nāma mahābalaśca nāma /

analyzed: dvitīyaḥ api ardham paribhuṅkte ṛddham ca sphītam ca kṣemam ca subhikṣam ca ramaṇīyam ca bahu jana ākīrṇa manuṣyam ca

analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavataḥ ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattva saṃghasya sa śrāvaka saṃghasya

analyzed: te ca śrāddhāḥ brāhmaṇa gṛhapatayaḥ bhagavataḥ ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya

analyzed: kumāra tasya bhagavataḥ ghoṣadattasya etat abhūt parihīyante bata ime sattvāḥ śīla poṣadha samādānataḥ tathāgatānām upasaṃkramaṇataḥ tathāgata paryupāsanataḥ

original: brahmacaryāvāsataḥ pravrajyopasaṃpannabhikṣubhāvataśca /
analyzed: brahmacarya āvāsataḥ pravrajyā upasaṃpanna bhikṣu bhāvataḥ ca

analyzed: te ete sattvāḥ tad anantaram sukha gurukāḥ

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yaduta pañcakāmaguṇābhiprāyatā /
analyzed: yat uta pañca kāma guṇa abhiprāya tā

analyzed: vaidya tatra kumāra katamā sāṃparāyika guruka tā

original: katamā cātyantaniṣṭhakuśalamūlagurukatā?
analyzed: katamā ca atyanta niṣṭha kuśala mūla guruka tā

original: yadutātyantaviśuddhiḥ /
analyzed: yat uta atyanta viśuddhiḥ

original: atyantavimuktiḥ /
analyzed: atyanta vimuktiḥ

original: atyantayogakṣematā /
analyzed: atyanta yogakṣema tā

original: atyantabrahmacaryāvāsaḥ /
analyzed: atyanta brahmacarya āvāsaḥ

original: atyantaparyavasānam /
atyantakuśalamūlaniṣṭhā /
analyzed: atyanta kuśala mūla niṣṭhā

original: atyantaparinirvāṇam /
analyzed: atyanta parinirvāṇam

original: yannavahameteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yadamī sattvā yathānuttarayā dharmapūjayā dharmapratipattyā ca tathāgataṃ pūjayeyuḥ
analyzed: yat navaham eteṣām sattvānām tathā tathā dharmam deśayeyam yat amī sattvāḥ yathā anuttarayā dharma pūjayā dharma pratipattyā ca tathāgatam pūjayeyuḥ

original: atha khalu kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ rājño mahābalasya teṣāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ saṃvejanābhiprāya  #
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra ghoṣadattaḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tasyām velāyām rājñaḥ mahābalasya teṣām ca brāhmaṇa gṛhapatīnām saṃvejana abhiprāya

original: imā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

analyzed: dāna pradānena sevatām na gauravam

analyzed: tādṛśīm varṇayanti buddhāḥ

analyzed: teṣām anyam anya asmi abhedya prema yat māra koṭībhiḥ aśakyu bhinditum

analyzed: loka āmiṣeṇa nara sevatām nṛṇām sarveṣam arthaḥ

analyzed: nirāmiṣam dharma niṣevatām hi mahāntaḥ arthaḥ bhavatī narāṇām

analyzed: nirāmiṣam cittu upasthapitvā nirāmiṣam dharma prakāśayitvā

analyzed: nirāmiṣam bhaveta prema te tādṛśāḥ kṣipra bhavanti buddhāḥ

analyzed: na jātu kāmān pratisevamānaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇām

analyzed: gṛham ca sevantu jugupsanīyam anuttarām prāpsyati saḥ agra bodhim

analyzed: ye kāma varjā inti yathā agni karṣūm putreṣu dāreṣu jahitvā tṛṣṇām

original: (Vaidya 25)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: uttraḥ tu gehāt abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣu iyam agra bodhiḥ

analyzed: na kaścid buddhaḥ anāgate vā avatiṣṭhate

original: yehi sthitairevamagāramadhye prāptā iyamuttama agrabodhiḥ // SRS_5.7 //
analyzed: ye hi sthitaiḥ evam agāra madhye prāptā iyam uttama agra bodhiḥ

original: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vaseta raṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
analyzed: prahāya rājyam kheṭa piṇḍam vaseta raṇyeṣu viveka kāmaḥ

analyzed: kleśān prahāya pratihatya māram buddhī anti bodhim virajām asaṃskṛtām

original: yo buddhavīrān yatha gaṅgavālukā upasthiheyyā bahukalpakoṭiyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ buddha vīrān gaṅga vālukāḥ bahu kalpa koṭiyaḥ

original: yaśco gṛhātaḥ parikhinnamānaso 'bhiniṣkrameyyā ayu tatra uttamaḥ // SRS_5.9 //
analyzed: parikhinna mānasaḥ tatra uttamaḥ

original: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
analyzed: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi

analyzed: na upasthitāḥ bhonti nara uttamāḥ jināḥ pravrajitvā dharmam

analyzed: yaḥ ca eva bodhim pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sattva artha kusaṃskṛtātaḥ

analyzed: raṇyāmukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrame ayam tatas

original: aśrauṣīt khalu punaḥ kumāra rājā mahābalo bhagavatā ghoṣadattena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ pravartitāṃ naiṣkramyapratisaṃyuktāṃ  #
analyzed: aśrauṣīt khalu punar kumāra rājā mahābalaḥ bhagavatā ghoṣadattena tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imām evaṃrūpām pravartitām naiṣkramya pratisaṃyuktām

original: kathām /
analyzed: kathām

original: śrutvā ca vimṛśati - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
analyzed: śrutvā ca vimṛśati yathā aham bhagavataḥ bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi

analyzed: na bhagavān dāna pāramitām varṇayati

original: na śīlapāramitāṃ varṇayati /
analyzed: na śīla pāramitām varṇayati

original: atyantaniṣṭhāṃ saṃvarṇayati /
analyzed: atyanta niṣṭhām saṃvarṇayati

original: atyantaviśuddhim /
analyzed: atyanta viśuddhim

original: atyantabrahmacaryāvāsam /
analyzed: atyanta brahmacarya āvāsam

original: atyantanirvāṇaṃ saṃvarṇayati /
analyzed: atyanta nirvāṇam saṃvarṇayati

original: tasyaitadabhūt - nedaṃ sukaramagāramadhyāvasatā anuttaradharmapratipattiṃ saṃpādayitum,

original: arthaṃ vā anuprāptum /
analyzed: artham vai anuprāptum

analyzed: yat nu aham keśa śmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām pravrajeyam

original: iti hi (Vaidya 26)
analyzed: iti hi vaidya

original: kumāra rājā mahābalaḥ sārdhamaśītyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrāmat
analyzed: kumāra rājā mahā balaḥ sārdham aśītyā brāhmaṇa gṛhapati śata sahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ yena bhagavān ghoṣadattaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt /
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte asthāt

original: atha khalu kumāra bhagavān ghoṣadatto rājño mahābalasya adhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ deśayate /
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra bhagavān ghoṣadattaḥ rājñaḥ mahā balasya adhyāśayam viditvā imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitam samādhim deśayate

original: atha khalu kumāra rājā mahābala imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ keśaśmaśraṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā  #
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra rājā mahā balaḥ imam samādhim śrutvā tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ keśa śmaśraṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyak eva śraddhayā

original: agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /
analyzed: agārāt anagārikām pravrajitaḥ abhūt

analyzed: sa tathā pravrajitaḥ san imam samādhim udgṛhītavān

original: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayiotvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
analyzed: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā bhāvanā yogam anuyuktaḥ vyahārṣīt

original: sa tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśakalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat,
analyzed: sa tena eva kuśala mūlena daśa kalpa koṭyaḥ na jātu durgati vinipātam agamat

original: viṃśatiṃ ca buddhakoṭīrārāgayāmāsa /
analyzed: viṃśatim ca buddha koṭīḥ ārāgayāmāsa

original: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmantikādimaṃ samādhimaśrauṣīt /
analyzed: teṣām ca tathāgatānām antikāt imam samādhim aśrauṣīt

original: śrutvā tebhyo buddhebhyastenodgṛhītaḥ paryavāpto dhārito vācito bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
analyzed: śrutvā tebhyaḥ buddhebhyaḥ tena udgṛhītaḥ paryavāptaḥ dhāritaḥ vācitaḥ bhāvanā yogam anuyuktaḥ vyahārṣīt

original: sa tataḥ paścāt tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśānāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena paripūrṇena kalpaśatasahasreṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt
analyzed: sa tatas paścāt tena eva kuśala mūlena daśānām kalpa koṭīnām atyayena paripūrṇena kalpa śata sahasreṇa anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ abhūt

original: so 'prameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā paścād buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
analyzed: saḥ aprameyāṇām sattvānām artham kṛtvā paścāt buddha parinirvāṇena parinirvṛtaḥ abhūt

original: tatra kumāra yānyaśītiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ghoṣadattaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntāni,
analyzed: tatra kumāra yāni aśīti prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdham bhagavantam ghoṣadattam tathāgatam upasaṃkrāntāni

original: te 'pi sarve imaṃ samādhiṃ
analyzed: te api sarve imam samādhim

analyzed: śrutvā tuṣṭāḥ udagrāḥ ātta manasaḥ pramuditāḥ

original: prītisaumanasyajātāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitā abhūvan /
analyzed: prīti saumanasya jātāḥ keśa śmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām pravrajitāḥ abhūvan

original: te 'pi tathā pravrajitā imaṃ samādhimudgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo  #
analyzed: te api tathā pravrajitāḥ imam samādhim udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanā yogam anuyuktāḥ vihṛtya tena eva kuśala mūlena viṃśati kalpa koṭyaḥ

original: na jātu durgativinipātamagaman /
analyzed: na jātu durgati vinipātam agaman

analyzed: sarvatra ca kalpe kalpe buddha koṭīḥ buddha koṭīḥ ārāgayāmāsa

analyzed: sarveṣām ca teṣām tathāgatānām antike imam samādhim śrutvā udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā

analyzed: vācayitvā bhāvanā yogam anuyuktāḥ vihṛtya tena eva pūrvakreṇa kuśala mūlena viṃśatīnām

original: kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena tataḥ paścāt paripūrṇadaśabhiḥ kalpasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
analyzed: kalpa koṭīnām atyayena tatas paścāt paripūrṇa daśabhiḥ kalpa sahasraiḥ anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā

original: dṛḍhaśūranāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpannā abhuvan /
analyzed: dṛḍhaśūra nāmānaḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke utpannāḥ abhuvan

original: te 'pyaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā buddhaparinirvṛtā abhūvan /
analyzed: te api aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣām ca artham kṛtvā buddha parinirvṛtāḥ abhūvan

original: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya sarvajñajñānasyāharaṇāya saṃvartata  #
analyzed: tat anena api te kumāra paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam yathā ayam samādhiḥ bahu karaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām anuttarasya sarvajña jñānasya āharaṇāya saṃvartata

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadeva pūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati  #
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya tasyām velāyām etat eva pūrva yoga parivartam bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthā abhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati  /

original: sma -
analyzed: sma

analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imam samādhim ākāṅkṣatā kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhu kāmena

analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahā karuṇā saṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatām vā tathāgatānām parinirvṛtānām vā pūjā karmaṇe udyuktaḥ bhavati

original: yaduta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhistūryatālāvacarairvaijayantībhiḥ
analyzed: yat uta cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ tūrya tālāvacaraiḥ vaijayantībhiḥ

analyzed: anayā kumāra tri maṇḍala pariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgatam pūjayitvā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam samādhim pratilabhate kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

analyzed: tasya etam kṣāntim adhimātra sevataḥ saced naraḥ chidyate

analyzed: koṭyaḥ gaṅgavālikā na tasya cittam bhavati

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ vucyati kṣānti nāma kathaṃ puno vucyati ānulomikī /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam vucyati kṣānti nāma katham punar vucyati ānulomikī

original: avivartiko vucyati kena hetunā kathaṃ puno vucyati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.5 //
analyzed: avivartikaḥ vucyati kena hetunā katham punar vucyati bodhisattvaḥ

original: kṣāntyasmi dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmyasaṃjñasya kileśu nāsti /
analyzed: dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmya saṃjñasya na asti

original: khaṃ yādṛśaṃ jānati sarvadharmāstasmādiha syā kva tu kṣānti nāma // SRS_6.6 //
analyzed: kham yādṛśam jānati sarva dharmāḥ tasmāt iha syā kva tu

analyzed: sarveṣa śikṣataḥ na ca asti dharmaḥ carate vicakṣaṇaḥ

analyzed: na buddha dharmeṣu jana iti saṃśayān iyam sa kṣāntiḥ bhavata ānulomikī

analyzed: evam carantasya mārāḥ te buddha rūpeṇa vācā

original: sudurlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakā na gṛhṇotī vākyu na co vivartate // SRS_6.8 //
analyzed: su durlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakāḥ na na caḥ vivartate

original: bodheti sattvān viṣamātu dṛṣṭito na eṣa mārgo amṛtasya prāptaye /
analyzed: bodha iti sattvān dṛṣṭitaḥ naḥ eṣa mārgaḥ amṛtasya prāptaye

original: kumārga varṇitva pathe sthapeti taṃ kāraṇamucyati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.9 //
analyzed: pathe tam kāraṇam ucyati bodhisattvaḥ

original: kṣamiṣyanūlomapathe sthitasya nairātmyasaṅgāya vibodhitasya /
analyzed: sthitasya nairātmya saṅgāya vibodhitasya

original: svapnāntare 'pyasya na jātu bhoti asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ // SRS_6.10 //
analyzed: svapna antare api asya na jātu asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ

original: (Vaidya 32)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sace mārakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāste buddharūpeṇa upāgamitvā /
analyzed: sace māra koṭyaḥ gaṅga vālukāḥ te buddha rūpeṇa upāgamitvā

original: bhaṇeyurabhyantarakāyu jīvo te maṃ vade nāsti na yūya buddhā // SRS_6.11 //
analyzed: te mam vade na asti na yūya

analyzed: jñānena jānāmi ahu skandha śūnyakam jñātvā ca na saṃvasāmi

analyzed: vyāhāra mātreṇa ca vyoharāmi parinirvṛtaḥ lokam imam carāmi

analyzed: yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu nāmā ayam eva nāma

original: nāmaṃ na tasyo diśatā sulabhyate tathāsya nāmaṃ na kutaścidāgatam // SRS_6.13 //
analyzed: nāmam na tasya u diśatā su labhyate tathā asya nāmam na kutaścid āgatam

original: tathaiva nāmaṃ kṛtu bodhisattvo na cāsya nāmaṃ diśatā sulabhyate /
analyzed: tathā eva nāmam bodhisattvaḥ na ca asya nāmam diśatā su labhyate

original: paryeṣamāṇo ayu bodhisattvo jānāti yo eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.14 //
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ jānāti yaḥ eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ

original: samudramadhye 'pi jvaleta agni rna bodhisattvasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: samudra madhye api jvaleta agniḥ na bodhisattvasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ

original: yato 'sya bodhāya utpannu cittamatrāntare tasya na jīvadṛṣṭiḥ // SRS_6.15 //
analyzed: yatas asya bodhāya cittam atra antare tasya na jīva dṛṣṭiḥ

original: na hyatra jāto na mṛto ca kaścidutpanna sattvo manujo naro vā /
analyzed: na hi atra jātaḥ na ca kaścid utpanna sattvaḥ manujaḥ naraḥ vā

original: māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyā na śakyate jānitu tīrthikehi // SRS_6.16 //
analyzed: māyā upamā dharma svabhāva śūnyā na śakyate jānitu

original: na cāpi āhāravimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātracīvare /
analyzed: na ca api āhāra vimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātra cīvare

original: na coddhatehi napi connatehi śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabodhiḥ // SRS_6.17 //
analyzed: na ca uddhatehi na pi ca unnatehi śakyā iyam jānitu buddha bodhiḥ

original: (Vaidya 33)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: na styāna middha abhihataiḥ kusīdaiḥ

original: yeṣāṃ na buddhasmi prasādu asti na śakyate hī varabodhi jānitum // SRS_6.18 //
analyzed: yeṣām na asti na śakyate hi vara bodhi jānitum

original: na bhinnavṛttehi pṛthagjanehi yeṣāṃ na dharmasmi prasādu asti /
analyzed: na bhinna vṛttehi pṛthagjanehi yeṣām na asti

original: sabrahmacārīṣu ca nāsti gauravaṃ na śakyate hī varabodhi buddhitum // SRS_6.19 //
analyzed: sabrahmacārīṣu ca nā asti gauravam na śakyate hi vara bodhi buddhitum

analyzed: lajjinaḥ yeṣām sti buddhe api dharme prema

original: sabrahmacārīṣu ca tīvragauravaṃ te prāpuṇantī varabodhimuttamām // SRS_6.20 //
analyzed: sabrahmacārīṣu ca tīvra gauravam te prāpuṇantī vara bodhim uttamām

analyzed: smṛteḥ upasthāne iha gocaraḥ

original: dhyānāni cāhāru samādhi pāniyaṃ budhyanti te 'pi varabodhimuttamām // SRS_6.21 //
analyzed: budhyanti te api vara bodhim uttamām

analyzed: nairātmya saṃjñā ca divāvihāraḥ anusmṛtiḥ caṃkrama śūnya bhāvaḥ

original: bodhyaṅgapuṣpā surabhī manoramā te yujyamānā varabodhi prāpayī // SRS_6.22 //
analyzed: bodhi aṅga puṣpā surabhī manoramā te yujyamānā

analyzed: yā carī vidūnām abhūmiḥ anyasya janasya tatra

analyzed: pratyekabuddhāna ca śrāvakāṇa ca kaḥ vā atra vijñaḥ na janeya chandam

original: sacenmamā āyu bhaveta ettakaṃ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /
analyzed: bhaveta

analyzed: ekasya romasya bhaṇeya varṇam bauddhena jñānena na asti

original: (Vaidya 34)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje samādhiparivartaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ

original: (Vaidya 35)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 7 Trikṣāntyavatāraparivartaḥ /
analyzed: trikṣāntyavatāraparivartaḥ

analyzed: tatra bhagavān punar api candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi kumāra

analyzed: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imam samādhim ākāṅkṣatā kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhu kāmena

analyzed: tri kṣānti jñāna kuśalena bhavitavyam

analyzed: tena prathamā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā

analyzed: dvitīyā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā

analyzed: tṛtīyā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā

analyzed: tri kṣānti viśeṣa kuśalena bhavitavyam tri kṣānti jñāna viśeṣa kuśalena ca

analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi kumāra yadā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tri kṣānti viśeṣa kuśalaḥ bhavati tri kṣānti jñāna viśeṣa kuśalaḥ ca bhavati

analyzed: tadā ayam kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram samādhim pratilabhate

analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhu kāmena ayam tri kṣānti avatāraḥ dharmaparyāyaḥ udgrahītavyaḥ

analyzed: tat bhaviṣyati bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāyai mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ trikṣāntyavatāraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya imam tri kṣānti avatāram dharmaparyāyam gāthā abhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma

analyzed: arthe ca dharme ca sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ prathamāya nirdiśīyati

analyzed: ye asmi loke pṛthu anya tīrthāḥ na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ

analyzed: kāruṇyam eteṣu prathamāya kṣāntīye ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: ābhāsam āgacchati tasya dhāraṇī tasmin ca ābhāsi na jātu kāṅkṣati

analyzed: satya anuparivartini vāca bhāṣate prathamāya kṣāntīye ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: caturṇa

analyzed: na ca u vivarteta sa buddha bodheḥ prathamāya kṣāntīyaḥ ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: ye śilpasthānā pṛthu asti loke sarveṣu saḥ śikṣitu bodhisattvaḥ

analyzed: akampiyaḥ samatha balena bhoti śelopamaḥ bhoti vipaśyanāya

original: na kṣobhituṃ śakyu sa sarvasattvairdvitīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati // SRS_7.10 //
analyzed: na kṣobhitum sa sarva sattvaiḥ dvitīyāya sa

original: samāhitastiṣṭhati bhāṣate ca samāhitaścaṃkramate niṣīdati /
analyzed: samāhitaḥ tiṣṭhati bhāṣate ca samāhitaḥ caṃkramate niṣīdati

original: (Vaidya 37)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: samāhitaḥ labhati abhijña pañca kṣetra śatam gacchati dharma deśakaḥ

original: no cāpi so ṛddhibalāttu hīyate dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.12 //
analyzed: na u ca api saḥ ṛddhi balāt tu hīyate dvitīyāya ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: sa tādṛśam śānta samādhim eṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ tasya cittasya pramāṇu gṛhṇīyāḥ dvitīyāya ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: ye lokadhātuṣu iha sattvāḥ te buddha jñānena bhaṇeyuḥ dharmān

analyzed: udgṛhṇataḥ hi ime viśeṣāḥ

analyzed: suvarṇa varṇena samucchrayeṇa nirmita nirmiṇitvā

analyzed: deśeti dharmam bahu prāṇi koṭinām tṛtīyāya kṣāntīye ime viśeṣāḥ

original: ya jambudvīpa iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra so dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ /
analyzed: ya jambudvīpe iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra saḥ dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ

original: jñātaśca bhotī sasurāsure jage tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.17 //
analyzed: jñātaḥ ca sa sura asure jage ime viśeṣāḥ

original: buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /
analyzed: tathā eva gocarāḥ īryāpathaḥ nāyakānām

original: sarvatra so śikṣitu bhoti paṇḍitastṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.18 //
analyzed: sarvatra saḥ bhoti paṇḍitaḥ tṛtīyāya ime viśeṣāḥ

original: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
analyzed: ye lokadhātuṣu iha sattvāḥ te bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyuḥ varṇam

original: (Vaidya 38)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sace 'sya tasmin nānunīyate mano na śikṣito ucyati buddhajñāne // SRS_7.19 //
analyzed: saced asya tasmin na anunīyate manaḥ na ucyati buddha jñāne

original: ye lokadhātuiṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ te bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyuḥ varṇam

original: sace 'sya teṣu pratihanyate mano na śikṣito 'dyāpi sa buddhajñāne // SRS_7.20 //
analyzed: saced asya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ na śikṣitaḥ adyā api sa buddha jñāne

original: arthena labdhena na bhoti sūmano na cāpyanarthena sa bhoti durmanāḥ /
analyzed: arthena labdhena na bhoti sūmanaḥ na ca api anarthena sa bhoti durmanāḥ

original: śailopame citti sadā pratiṣṭhito ayaṃ viśeṣastṛtīyāya kṣāntiyāḥ // SRS_7.21 //
analyzed: śailopame citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ tṛtīyāya

original: ghoṣānugāmī iya kṣāntiruktā cintāmayī bhāvanānulomikī /
analyzed: kṣāntiḥ uktā cintā mayī bhāvanā ānulomikī

original: śrutaṃmayā sā anutpattikā yā śikṣā ca atrāpyayu bodhimārgaḥ // SRS_7.22 //
analyzed: śrutaṃmayā sā anutpattikā yā śikṣā ca bodhi mārgaḥ

original: tisro 'pi kṣāntīya sadā niruttarāḥ sa bodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ api sadā niruttarāḥ sa bodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā tatastaṃ sugatā narottamā viyākaronti virajāya bodhaye // SRS_7.23 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tatas tam sugatāḥ nara uttamāḥ viyākaronti virajāya bodhaye

original: tato 'sya taṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śruṇitvā prakampitā medinī ṣaḍvikāram /
analyzed: tatas asya tam vyākaraṇam śruṇitvā prakampitā medinī ṣaṣ vikāram

original: ābhāya kṣetraṃ bhavate prabhāsvaraṃ puṣpāṇi ca varṣiṣu devakoṭyaḥ // SRS_7.24 //
analyzed: ābhāya kṣetram bhavate prabhāsvaram puṣpāṇi ca varṣiṣu deva koṭyaḥ

original: tasyo ca taṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śruṇitvā sattvāna koṭī niyutā acintiyā /
analyzed: tasya u ca tam vyākaraṇam śruṇitvā sattvāna koṭī niyutā acintiyā

original: utpādayī citta varāgrabodhaye vayaṃ pi bheṣyāma jina āryacetikāḥ // SRS_7.25 //
analyzed: vayam jina ārya cetikāḥ

original: kṣāntyā imāstisra niruttarā yadā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
analyzed: kṣāntyāḥ imāḥ tisraḥ niruttarāḥ yadā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ

original: na cāpi so jāyati nāpi mrīyate na cāpi sa cyavati nopapadyate // SRS_7.26 //
analyzed: na ca api saḥ jāyati na api mrīyate na ca api sa cyavati na upapadyate

original: (Vaidya 39)
analyzed: vaidya

original: yadā imā kṣānti trayo niruttarā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
analyzed: yadā imā kṣānti trayaḥ niruttarā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ

original: na paśyateḥ jāyati yaśca mrīyate sthitadharmatāṃ paśyati sarvadharmān // SRS_7.27 //
analyzed: na paśyateḥ jāyati yaḥ ca mrīyate sthita dharmatām paśyati sarva dharmān

original: tathāhi teno vitatheti jñātā māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi tena u vitathā iti jñātāḥ māyā upamāḥ svabhāva śūnyāḥ

original: na śūnyatā jāyati no ca mrīyate svabhāvaśūnyā imi sarvadharmāḥ // SRS_7.28 //
analyzed: na śūnyatā jāyati no ca mrīyate svabhāva śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ

original: yadāttyasau satkṛtu bhoti kenacid upasthito mānitu pūjito 'rcitaḥ /
analyzed: upasthitaḥ mānitu pūjitaḥ arcitaḥ

original: na tasya tasminnanunīyate mano jānāti so dharmasvabhāvaśūnyatām // SRS_7.29 //
analyzed: na tasya tasmin anunīyate manaḥ jānāti saḥ dharma svabhāva śūnyatām

original: ākruṣṭa sattvehi prahāratarjito na teṣu krodhaṃ kurute na mānam /
analyzed: ākruṣṭa sattva ihi prahāra tarjitaḥ na teṣu krodham kurute na mānam

original: maitrīṃ ca teṣu dṛḍha saṃjaneti tathaiva sattvāna pramocanāya // SRS_7.30 //
analyzed: maitrīm ca teṣu tathā eva sattvāna pramocanāya

original: loṣṭehi daṇḍehi ca tāḍyamānaḥ pratighātu teṣu na karoti paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: loṣṭehi daṇḍehi ca tāḍyamānaḥ pratighātu teṣu na karoti paṇḍitaḥ

original: nairātmyakṣāntīya pratiṣṭhitasya na vidyate krodhakhilaṃ na mānaḥ // SRS_7.31 //
analyzed: nairātmya kṣāntīya pratiṣṭhitasya na vidyate krodha khilam na mānaḥ

original: tathāhi teno vitatheti jñātā māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi tena u vitathā iti jñātāḥ māyā upamāḥ svabhāva śūnyāḥ

original: sa tādṛśe dharmanaye pratiṣṭhitaḥ susatkṛto bhoti sadevaloke // SRS_7.32 //
analyzed: sa tādṛśe dharma naye pratiṣṭhitaḥ su satkṛtaḥ sa deva loke

original: yadāpi sattvāḥ pragṛhītaśastrāśchindeyu tasyo pṛthu aṅgamaṅgam /
analyzed: yadā api sattvāḥ pragṛhīta śastrāḥ chindeyuḥ tasya u pṛthu aṅgam aṅgam

original: na tasya teṣu pratihanyate mano na cāpi maitrī karuṇā tu hīyate // SRS_7.33 //
analyzed: na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ na ca api maitrī karuṇā tu hīyate

original: evaṃ ca so tatra janeti cittaṃ chindanti te hi pṛthu aṅgamaṅgam /
analyzed: evam ca saḥ tatra cittam chindanti te hi pṛthu aṅgam aṅgam

original: (Vaidya 40)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tathā na mahyaṃ śiva śānti nirvṛtī yāvanna sthāpye imi agrabodhaye // SRS_7.34 //
analyzed: tathā na mahyam yāvat na sthāpye imi agra bodhaye

original: etādṛśe kṣāntibale niruttare nairātmyakṣāntīsamatāvihāriṇām /
analyzed: etādṛśe kṣānti bale niruttare nairātmya kṣāntī samatā vihāriṇām

original: saṃbodhisattvāna mahāyaśānāṃ kalpāna koṭyaḥ satataṃ subhāvitāḥ // SRS_7.35 //
analyzed: mahā yaśānām koṭyaḥ satatam su bhāvitāḥ

original: tatottare yāttika gaṅgavālikā na tāva bodhī bhavatīha sparśitā /
analyzed: tatas uttare gaṅgavālikā na bhavati iha sparśitā

original: ye buddhajñānena na karoti kāryaṃ kiṃ vā punarjñāna tathāgatānām // SRS_7.36 //
analyzed: ye buddha jñānena na karoti kāryam kim vā punarjñāna tathāgatānām

original: kṣapetu varṇaṃ sukaraṃ na teṣāṃ prabhāṣatā kalpaśatānyacintiyā /
analyzed: kṣapetu varṇam sukaram na teṣām prabhāṣatā kalpa śatāni acintiyā

original: anantakīrtena mahāyaśānāṃ nairātmyakṣāntīya pratiṣṭhitānām // SRS_7.37 //
analyzed: ananta kīrtena mahā yaśānām nairātmya kṣāntīya pratiṣṭhitānām

original: tasmāddhi yo icchati bodhi buddhituṃ taṃ jñānaskandhaṃ pravaraṃ niruttaram /
analyzed: tasmāt hi yaḥ icchati tam jñāna skandham pravaram niruttaram

original: sa kṣānti bhāvetu jinena varṇitāṃ na durlabhā bodhi varā bhaviṣyati // SRS_7.38 //
analyzed: sa kṣānti bhāvetu jinena varṇitām na durlabhā bodhi varā bhaviṣyati

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje trikṣāntyavatāraparivarto nāma saptamaḥ // 7 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje trikṣāntyavatāraparivartaḥ nāma saptamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 41)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 8 Abhāvasamudgataparivartaḥ /
analyzed: abhāva samudgata parivartaḥ

original: tatra punarapi bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra
analyzed: tatra punar api bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma bhūta pūrvam kumāra

original: atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipularaiprameyairacintyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt /
analyzed: atīte adhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ asaṃkhyeyataraiḥ vipula raiprameyaiḥ acintyaiḥ aparimāṇaiḥ yat āsīt

original: tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke
analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgataḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke

original: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ
analyzed: udapādi vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām

original: ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: tat kiṃ manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'bhāvasamudgata ityucyate?
analyzed: tat kim manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgataḥ abhāva samudgataḥ iti ucyate

original: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra tathāgato jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya
analyzed: sa khalu punar kumāra tathāgataḥ jāta mātraḥ eva upari antarīkṣe sapta tāla mātram vaihāyasam abhyudgamya

original: sapta padāni prakramitvā imāmevaṃrūpāṃ vācamabhāṣata - abhāvasamudgatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
analyzed: sapta padāni prakramitvā imām evaṃrūpām vācam abhāṣata abhāva samudgatāḥ sarva dharmāḥ

original: abhāvasamudgatāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
analyzed: abhāva samudgatāḥ sarva dharmāḥ iti

original: tena ca kumāra śabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñapto 'bhūt /
analyzed: tena ca kumāra śabdena tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ svareṇa abhivijñaptaḥ abhūt

original: tatra bhaumān devānupādāya yāvad brahmalokaṃ paraṃparayā śabdamudīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣamanuśrāvayāmāsuḥ - abhāvasamudgato batāyaṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: tatra bhaumān devān upādāya yāvat brahmalokam paraṃparayā śabdam udīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣam anuśrāvayāmāsuḥ abhāva samudgataḥ bata ayam tathāgataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yo jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātramabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāvaśabdamudīrayati /
analyzed: yaḥ jāta mātraḥ eva upari antarīkṣe sapta tāla mātram abhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāva śabdam udīrayati

original: iti hyabhāvasamudgato 'bhāvasamudgata iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamudapādi /
analyzed: iti hi abhāva samudgataḥ abhāva samudgataḥ iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam udapādi

original: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati
analyzed: tasya ca bhagavataḥ bodhi prāptasya sarva vṛkṣa patrebhyaḥ sarva tṛṇa gulma oṣadhi vanaspatibhyaḥ sarva śaila śikharebhyaḥ ca abhāva samudgata śabdaḥ niścarati

original: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabdaprajñaptiḥ sarvato 'bhāvasamudgatavijñaptiśabdo niścarati /
analyzed: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabda prajñaptiḥ sarvatas abhāva samudgata vijñapti śabdaḥ niścarati

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato 'bhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavataḥ abhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rāja kumāraḥ abhūt abhirūpaḥ prāsādikaḥ

original: darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ /
analyzed: darśanīyaḥ parama śubha varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgataḥ

original: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro yena bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenosaṃkrāmat /
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī nāma rāja kumāraḥ yena bhagavān abhāvasamudgataḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena usaṃkrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt //
analyzed: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte asthāt

original: atha khalu kumāra sa bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākaruṇācintino rājakumārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ samādhiṃ  #
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra sa bhagavān abhāvasamudgataḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ mahā karuṇā cintinaḥ rāja kumārasya adhyāśayam viditvā imam samādhim

original: deśayāmāsa /
analyzed: deśayāmāsa

original: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī rājakumāraḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prasīdati sma
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra sa mahā karuṇā cintī rāja kumāraḥ imam samādhim śrutvā tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ prasīdati sma

original: prasannacittaśca keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /
analyzed: prasanna cittaḥ ca keśa śmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām pravrajitaḥ abhūt

original: sa pravrajitaḥ sannimaṃ samādhimudgṛhītavān /
analyzed: sa pravrajitaḥ san imam samādhim udgṛhītavān

original: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
analyzed: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanā yogam anuyuktaḥ vyahārṣīt

original: sa tainaiva kuśalamūlena (Vaidya 42)
analyzed: sa tainā eva kuśala mūlena vaidya

original: viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat /
analyzed: viṃśati kalpa koṭyaḥ na jātu durgati vinipātam agamat

original: viṃśatīnāṃ kalpānāmatyayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt /
analyzed: viṃśatīnām kalpānām atyayena anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ abhūt

original: suvicintitārtho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /
analyzed: suvicintitārthaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi

original: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalpeṣu viśatiṃ ca buddhakoṭīrārāgayāmāsa /
analyzed: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalpeṣu viśatim ca buddha koṭīḥ ārāgayāmāsa

original: paśya kumāra yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya buddhajñānasya paripūraṇāya saṃvartate //
analyzed: paśya kumāra yathā ayam samādhiḥ bahu karaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām anuttarasya buddha jñānasya paripūraṇāya saṃvartate

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
analyzed: smarāmi aham pūrvam atītam adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇam uttamaḥ

original: utpannu lokārthakaro maharṣirnāmnā hi so 'bhāvasamudgato 'bhūt // SRS_8.1 //
analyzed: utpannu loka artha karaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ nāmnā hi saḥ abhāva samudgataḥ abhūt

original: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarveṣa dharmāṇa abhāvu deśayī /
analyzed: sa jāta mātraḥ gagane

original: tadānurūpaṃ kṛtu nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñapī // SRS_8.2 //
analyzed: tadā anurūpam nāmadheyam śabdena sarvam

original: devāpi sarve pramumoca śabdaṃ abhāvu nāmneti jino bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: devāḥ api sarve pramumoca śabdam nāmnā iti jinaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakramannabhāvu dharmāṇa bravīti nāyakaḥ // SRS_8.3 //
analyzed: yaḥ jāta mātraḥ sapta bravīti nāyakaḥ

original: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarveṣa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /
analyzed: buddhaḥ yadā dharma rājaḥ sarveṣa muniḥ

original: tṛṇavṛkṣagulmauṣadhiśailaparvate abhāvu dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati // SRS_8.4 //
analyzed: tṛṇa vṛkṣa gulma oṣadhi śaila parvate ravaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yāvanti lokadhātau sarve hi abhāvāḥ na hi bhāvaḥ

original: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya svaru niścarī lokavināyakasya // SRS_8.5 //
analyzed: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya loka vināyakasya

original: tasmiṃśca kāle abhu rājaputraḥ karuṇāvicintī sada nāmadheyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin ca kāle abhu rāja putraḥ karuṇā vicintī sada nāmadheyaḥ

original: abhirūpa prāsādika darśanīya upāgamī tasya jinasya antikam // SRS_8.6 //
analyzed: abhirūpa prāsādika darśanīya upāgamī tasya jinasya antikam

original: (Vaidya 43)
analyzed: vaidya

original: vanditva pādau munipuṃgavasya pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtya ca gauraveṇa /
analyzed: vanditva pādau muni puṃgavasya pradakṣiṇam kṛtya ca gauraveṇa

original: prasannacitto niṣasāda tatra śravaṇāya dharmaṃ virajamanuttaram // SRS_8.7 //
analyzed: prasanna cittaḥ niṣasāda tatra śravaṇāya dharmam virajam anuttaram

original: sa co jino āśayu jñātva dhīraḥ prakāśayāmāsa samādhimetam /
analyzed: sa ca jinaḥ dhīraḥ prakāśayāmāsa samādhim etam

original: śrutvā ca so imu virajaṃ samādhiṃ laghu pravrajī jinavaraśāsane 'smin // SRS_8.8 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca saḥ imu virajam samādhim laghu pravrajī jinavara śāsane asmin

original: sa pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitvā /
analyzed: sa imam samādhim

original: kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatiṃ na jātu gacche vinipātabhūmim // SRS_8.9 //
analyzed: koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatim na jātu gacche vinipāta bhūmim

original: sa tena caivaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā ārāgayī viṃśati buddhakoṭyaḥ /
analyzed: sa tena ca evam kuśalena karmaṇā ārāgayī viṃśati buddha koṭyaḥ

analyzed: mukhasya yadā na vidyate bimbe mukham na eva kadācid labhyate

analyzed: yathā sa mūḍhāḥ janayeta rāgam tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva gandharvapuram marīcikā yathā eva māyā supinam yathā eva

analyzed: svabhāva śūnyā tu nimitta bhāvanā tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva candrasya nabhe viśuddhe hrade prasanne dṛśyate

analyzed: na vidyate tad lakṣaṇān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā naraḥ śaila vana antare sthitaḥ bhaṇeyya gāyeyya haseyya rodaye

analyzed: pratiśrutkā śrūyati no ca dṛśyate tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: gīte ca vādye ca tathā eva rodite pratiśrutkā jāyati tam pratītya

original: girāya ghoṣo na kadāci vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.14 //
analyzed: girāya ghoṣaḥ na kadācid vidyate tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva kāmān pratibuddha sattvaḥ puruṣaḥ na paśyati

analyzed: sa bāla kāmeṣu ati kāma lobhī tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: rūpān yathā nirmiṇi māyakāraḥ hastīrathān aśva rathān vicitrān

original: (Vaidya 47)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na cātra kaścid ratha tatra dṛśate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.16 //
analyzed: na ca atra kaścid tatra dṛśate tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā kumārī supina antarasmin sā putra jātam ca mṛtam ca paśyati

analyzed: jāte ati tuṣṭā mṛte daurmanaḥ sthitā tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā mṛtām mātaram ātmajam vā svapne tu vai roditi ucca śabdam

analyzed: na tasya mātā mriyate na putraḥ tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva rātrau jala candra dṛśyate

original: agrāhya tuccho jala candraśūnya tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.19 //
analyzed: agrāhya tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva madhyāhna kāle tṛṣā abhitaptaḥ puruṣaḥ vrajeta

analyzed: marīcikām paśyati toyarāśim tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: marīcikāyām udakam na vidyate sa mūḍha sattvaḥ pibitum tat icchati

original: abhūtavāriṃ pibituṃ na śakyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.21 //
analyzed: abhūta vārim pibitum na śakyate tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

analyzed: yathā eva ārdram kadalīya skandham sāra arthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayeta

original: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.22 //
analyzed: bahis vai adhyātma na sāram asti tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

original: (Vaidya 48)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: yasmāt ime indriya apramāṇāḥ jaḍāḥ svabhāvena

analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ nirvāṇa pathā eva arthikaḥ saḥ ārya mārgeṇa karotu kāryam

analyzed: na yatra kāyaḥ kāya saṃjñā asaṃskṛtam gotram idam pravucyati

original: nivṛtti dharmāṇa na asti dharmā yeneti nāsti na te jātu asti /
analyzed: nivṛtti dharmāṇa na asti dharmā yena iti na asti na te jātu asti

original: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati // SRS_9.26 //
analyzed: asti iti na asti iti ca kalpanāvatām evam na śāmyati

original: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
analyzed: asti iti na asti iti ubhe api antā śuddhī aśuddhī iti ime api antā

original: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_9.27 //
analyzed: tasmāt ubhe vivarjayitvā madhye api sthānam na karoti paṇḍitaḥ

original: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣa śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
analyzed: asti iti na asti iti vivādaḥ eṣa śuddhī aśuddhī iti ayam vivādaḥ

original: vivādaprāptāna na duḥkha śāmyati avivādaprāptāna duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // SRS_9.28 //
analyzed: śāmyati a vivāda prāptāna duḥkham nirudhyate

original: smṛterupasthānakathāṃ kathitvā manyanti bālā vaya kāyasākṣī /
analyzed: smṛteḥ upasthāna kathām kathitvā manyanti bālāḥ kāya sākṣī

original: na kāyasākṣisya ca asti manyanā prahīṇa tasyo pṛthu sarva manyanā // SRS_9.29 //
analyzed: na kāyasākṣisya ca asti manyanā prahīṇa tasyo pṛthu sarva manyanā

original: caturṣu dhyāneṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vayaṃ dhyānagocarāḥ /
analyzed: caturṣu dhyāneṣu kathām kathitvā vadanti bālāḥ vayam dhyāna gocarāḥ

original: na kleśadhyāyi na ca asti manyanā viditva jñānena madaḥ prahīyate // SRS_9.30 //
analyzed: na kleśa dhyāyi na ca asti manyanā viditva jñānena madaḥ prahīyate

original: caturṣu sattveṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vaya satyadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: caturṣu sattveṣu kathām kathitvā vadanti bālāḥ satya darśinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 49)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na satyadarśisya ca kāci manyanā amanyanā satya jinena deśitā // SRS_9.31 //
analyzed: na satyadarśisya ca kāci manyanā amanyanā satya jinena deśitā

original: rakṣeta śīlaṃ na ca tena manye śruṇeyya dharmaṃ na ca tena manye /
analyzed: rakṣeta śīlam na ca tena manye śruṇeyya dharmam na ca tena manye

original: yanaiva so manyati alpaprajño tanmūlakaṃ duḥkha vivardhate 'sya // SRS_9.32 //
analyzed: saḥ manyati tad mūlakam vivardhate asya

original: duḥkhasya mūlaṃ madu saṃnidarśitaṃ sarvajñinā lokavināyakena /
analyzed: duḥkhasya mūlam madu saṃnidarśitam sarvajñinā loka vināyakena

original: madena mattāna duḥkhaṃ pravardhate amanyamānāna dukhaṃ nirudhyate // SRS_9.33 //
analyzed: madena duḥkham pravardhate a manyamānāna dukham nirudhyate

original: kiyadbahūn dharma paryāpuṇeyyā śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrutena mattaḥ /
analyzed: kiyat bahūn śīlam na rakṣeta śrutena mattaḥ

original: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu tāyituṃ duḥśīla yena vrajamāna durgatim // SRS_9.34 //
analyzed: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu tāyitum duḥśīla yena vrajamāna durgatim

original: sacet punaḥ śīlamadena matto na bāhuśrutyasmi karoti yogam /
analyzed: saced punar śīla madena mattaḥ na bāhuśrutī asmi karoti yogam

original: kṣayetva so śīlaphalamaśeṣaṃ puno 'pi sa pratyanubhoti duḥkham // SRS_9.35 //
analyzed: śīla phalam aśeṣam punar api sa pratyanubhoti duḥkham

original: kiṃcāpi bhāveyya samādhi loke na co vibhāveyya sa ātmasaṃjñām /
analyzed: kiṃca api loke

original: punaḥ prakupyanti kileśu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // SRS_9.36 //
analyzed: punar prakupyanti kila īśu tasya yathā udrakasya iha samādhi bhāvanā

original: nairātmyadharmān yadi pratyavekṣate tān pratyavekṣya yadi bhāvayeta /
analyzed: nairātmya dharmān yadi pratyavekṣate tān pratyavekṣya yadi bhāvayeta

original: sa hetu nirvāṇaphalasya prāptaye yo anyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye // SRS_9.37 //
analyzed: nirvāṇa phalasya prāptaye yaḥ anya hetuḥ na sa śāntaye

original: yathā naraścauragaṇairupadrutaḥ palāyitumicchati jīvitārthikaḥ /
analyzed: yathā naraḥ caura gaṇaiḥ upadrutaḥ palāyitum icchati jīvita arthikaḥ

original: na tasya pādāḥ prabhavanti gacchituṃ gṛhītva caurehi sa tatra hanyate // SRS_9.38 //
analyzed: na tasya pādāḥ prabhavanti gacchitum gṛhītvā caura ihi sa tatra hanyate

original: (Vaidya 50)
analyzed: vaidya

original: evaṃ naraḥ śīlavihīna mūḍhaḥ palāyitumicchati saṃskṛtātaḥ /
analyzed: evam naraḥ śīla vihīna mūḍhaḥ palāyitum icchati saṃskṛtātaḥ

analyzed: sa śīla hīnaḥ na gacchitum jarāya vyādhyā maraṇena hanyate

original: yathaiva caurāṇa bahū sahasro nānāmukhehi prakaroti pāpam /
analyzed: yathā eva prakaroti pāpam

original: evaṃ kileśā vividhairmukhebhiryathaiva cauro hani śuklapākṣam // SRS_9.40 //
analyzed: evam kila īśāḥ vividhaiḥ mukhebhiḥ yathā eva cauraḥ hani śuklapākṣam

original: yena sunidhyāptu nirātmaskandhā ākruṣṭhu paribhāṣṭu na śaṅku bhoti /
analyzed: yena

original: sa kleśamārasya vaśaṃ na gacchate yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so na kupyate // SRS_9.41 //
analyzed: sa kleśa mārasya vaśam na gacchate yaḥ śūnyatām jānati saḥ na kupyate

analyzed: janaḥ bhāṣati skandha śūnyatām na ca prajānāti yathā nirātmakāḥ

original: te aprajānanta parehi coditāḥ krodhābhibhūtāḥ paruṣaṃ vadanti // SRS_9.42 //
analyzed: te aprajānanta parehi coditāḥ krodha abhibhūtāḥ paruṣam vadanti

original: yathā naro āturu kāyaduḥkhito bahūhi varṣehi na jātu mucyate /
analyzed: yathā naraḥ kāya duḥkhitaḥ bahūhi varṣehi na jātu mucyate

original: sa dīrghagailānyadukhena pīḍitaḥ paryeṣate vaidyu cikitsanārthikaḥ // SRS_9.43 //
analyzed: sa pīḍitaḥ paryeṣate cikitsana arthikaḥ

original: punaḥ punastena gaveṣatā ca āsādito vaidya vidū vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: punar punar tena gaveṣatā ca āsāditaḥ vaidya vidū vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: kāruṇyatāṃ tena upasthapetvā prayuktu bhaiṣajyamidaṃ niṣevyatām // SRS_9.44 //
analyzed: kāruṇya tām tena bhaiṣajyam idam niṣevyatām

original: gṛhītva bhaiṣajya pṛthuṃ varāṃ varāṃ na sevate āturu yena mucyate /
analyzed: gṛhītvā bhaiṣajya pṛthum varām varām na sevate yena mucyate

original: na vaidyadoṣo na ca bhaiṣajānāṃ tasyaiva doṣo bhavi āturasya // SRS_9.45 //
analyzed: na vaidya doṣaḥ na ca bhaiṣajānām tasya eva doṣaḥ āturasya

original: evamiha śāsani pravrajitvā paryāpuṇitvā bala dhyāna indriyān /
analyzed: evam iha śāsani pravrajitvā paryāpuṇitvā bala dhyāna indriyān

original: na bhāvanāyāmabhiyukta bhonti ayuktayogīna kuto 'sti nirvṛtiḥ // SRS_9.46 //
analyzed: na kutas asti nirvṛtiḥ

original: (Vaidya 51)
analyzed: vaidya

original: svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sada sarvadharmā vastuṃ vibhāventi jināna putrāḥ /
analyzed: svabhāva śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ vastum putrāḥ

original: sarveṇa sarvaṃ bhava sarvaśūnyaṃ prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām // SRS_9.47 //
analyzed: sarveṇa sarvam bhava sarva śūnyam prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām

analyzed: na vijña karonti vigraham satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti

original: mamāntike enti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karoti saṃstavam // SRS_9.48 //
analyzed: mama antike enti praduṣṭa cittāḥ na bāla dharmehi karoti saṃstavam

original: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
analyzed: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanām viditva bālāna svabhāva saṃtatim

original: kiyacciraṃ bālu susevito 'pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasaṃnibhāḥ // SRS_9.49 //
analyzed: kiyat ciram bālu su sevitaḥ api punar api te bhonti amitra saṃnibhāḥ

original: na vijña bāleṣviha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvadharmatām /
analyzed: na bāleṣu iha viśvasanti vijñāya svabhāva dharma tām

original: svabhāvabhinna prakṛtīya bālā na cāsti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānām // SRS_9.50 //
analyzed: na ca asti mitram hi pṛthagjanānām

original: sahadharmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /
analyzed: sahadharmikena u vacanena uktāḥ krodham ca doṣam ca apratyayam ca

original: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmān imamarthu vijñāya na viśvasanti // SRS_9.51 //
analyzed: prāviṣkaronti bāla dharmān imam arthu vijñāya na viśvasanti

original: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhyu sārdham /
analyzed: bālāḥ hi bālehi samam samenti yathā amedhyena sārdham

original: vijñāḥ punarvijñajanena sārdhaṃ samenti sarpiryatha sarpimaṇḍaiḥ // SRS_9.52 //
analyzed: vijñāḥ punar vijña janena sārdham samenti sarpiḥ yathā sarpimaṇḍaiḥ

analyzed: saṃsāra doṣāṇa a pratyavekṣaṇāt karmāṇa

original: buddhāna co vākyamaśraddadhānāste cchedyabhedyasmi caranti bālāḥ // SRS_9.53 //
analyzed: vākyam aśraddadhānāḥ te caranti bālāḥ

original: sudurlabhaṃ labhya manuṣyalābhaṃ na śilpasthāneṣu bhavanti kovidāḥ /
analyzed: su durlabham manuṣya lābham na śilpasthāneṣu bhavanti kovidāḥ

original: (Vaidya 52)
analyzed: vaidya

original: daridrabhūtāna dhanaṃ na vidyate ajīvamānāstada pravrajanti // SRS_9.54 //
analyzed: dhanam na vidyate a jīvamānāḥ tada pravrajanti

original: te pravrajitvā iha buddhaśāsane adhyuṣitā bhontiha pātracīvare /
analyzed: te pravrajitvā iha buddha śāsane adhyuṣitāḥ bhonti iha pātra cīvare

original: te pāpamitrehi parigṛhītāstāṃ nācarante sugatāna śikṣām // SRS_9.55 //
analyzed: te pāpa mitrehi parigṛhītāḥ tām na ācarante śikṣām

analyzed: te ātmanaḥ śīlam apaśyamānāḥ citta vyavasthām na labhanti bālāḥ

analyzed: rātriṃdivam bhonti ayukta yogāḥ na te jugupsanti ca pāpa karmataḥ

analyzed: kāyena cittena asaṃyatānām na kiṃci vācāya sa jalpitavyam

original: sadā gaveṣanti parasya doṣān aparāddhu kiṃ kena vā codayiṣye // SRS_9.57 //
analyzed: sadā parasya doṣān aparāddhu kim kena vā codayiṣye

original: āhāri adhyuṣita bhonti bālā na cāsti mātrajñatu bhojanasmin /
analyzed: bhonti bālāḥ

original: buddhasya puṇyehi labhitva bhojanaṃ tasyaiva bālā akṛtajña bhonti // SRS_9.58 //
analyzed: buddhasya puṇyehi bhojanam tasya eva bālāḥ akṛtajña bhonti

analyzed: te bhojanam svādu rasam praṇītam labdhvā ca bhuñjanti ayukta yogāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sa āhāru vadhāya bhoti yatha hastipotāna bisā adhautakāḥ // SRS_9.59 //
analyzed: teṣām vadhāya vadhāya

original: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo bhuñjīta āhāru śuci praṇītam /
analyzed: kim ca api vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇaḥ bhuñjīta āhāru śuci praṇītam

original: na caiva adhyuṣita tatra bhoti agṛghnu so bhuñjati yuktayogī // SRS_9.60 //
analyzed: na ca eva tatra saḥ bhuñjati yukta yogī

original: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo ābhāṣate bālu kuto hi svāgatam /
analyzed: kim ca api vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇaḥ ābhāṣate bālu kutas hi svāgatam

original: (Vaidya 53)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: saṃgṛhītvā priyavadya tāya kāruṇya tām tatra upasthapeti

analyzed: yaḥ hita anukampī tasya eva bālāḥ vyasanena tuṣṭāḥ

original: etena doṣeṇa jahitva bālān mṛgovadeko viharedaraṇye // SRS_9.62 //
analyzed: etena doṣeṇa jahitvā bālān mṛgaḥ vat ekaḥ viharet araṇye

original: ima īdṛśān doṣa viditva paṇḍito na jātu bālehi karoti saṃgatim /
analyzed: ime īdṛśān doṣa viditva paṇḍitaḥ na jātu karoti saṃgatim

original: vihīnaprajñānupasevato me svargāttu hāniḥ kuta bodhi lapsye // SRS_9.63 //
analyzed: vihīna prajñā an upasevataḥ me svargāt tu hāniḥ kuta bodhi lapsye

original: maitrīvihārī ca bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī /
analyzed: maitrī vihārī ca bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ karuṇā vihārī muditā vihārī

original: upekṣakāḥ sarvabhaveṣu nityaṃ samādhi bhāvetva spṛśanti bodhim // SRS_9.64 //
analyzed: upekṣakāḥ sarva bhaveṣu nityam samādhi spṛśanti bodhim

original: te bodhi buddhitva śivāmaśokāṃ viditva sattvān janavyādhipīḍitān /
analyzed: te śivām aśokām sattvān jana vyādhi pīḍitān

original: kāruṇyatāṃ tatra upasthapetvā kathāṃ kathenti paramārthayuktām // SRS_9.65 //
analyzed: kāruṇya tām tatra upasthapetvā kathām kathenti parama artha yuktām
