analyzed: ye tām vijānanti jināna dharmatām an abhilapyam sugatāna satyam

original: te dharma śrutvā ima evarūpāṃ lapsyanti kṣānti ariyāṃ nirāmiṣām // SRS_9.66 //
analyzed: te dharma śrutvā ime evarūpām lapsyanti kṣānti ariyām nirāmiṣām

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje gambhīradharmakṣāntiparivarto nāma navamaḥ // 9 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje gambhīradharmakṣāntiparivartaḥ nāma navamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 54)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 10 Purapraveśaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: pura praveśa parivartaḥ

original: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra pratipattisāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam
analyzed: tatra bhagavān punar api candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi kumāra pratipatti sāraḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pratipattisārasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
analyzed: pratipatti sārasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavati anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ

original: kiṃ punarayaṃ samādhiḥ /
analyzed: kim punar ayam samādhiḥ

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam

original: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
analyzed: jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat subhāṣitā ceyaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmavavādānuśāsanī
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan yāvat su bhāṣitā ca iyam bhagavatā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām avavāda anuśāsanī

original: sarvabodhisattvaśikṣā deśitā svākhyātā suprajñaptā /
analyzed: sarva bodhisattva śikṣā deśitā su ākhyātā su prajñaptā

original: sarvatathāgatagocaro 'yaṃ bhagavan yatra abhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kaḥ punarvādo 'nyatīrthikānām?
analyzed: sarva tathāgata gocaraḥ ayam bhagavan yatra abhūmiḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām kaḥ punar vādaḥ anya tīrthikānām

original: pratipattisārāśca vayaṃ bhagavan bhaviṣyāmaḥ anapekṣāḥ kāyajīvite ca bhūtvā tathāgatasyānu śikṣiṣyāmahe /
analyzed: pratipatti sārāḥ ca vayam bhagavan bhaviṣyāmaḥ anapekṣāḥ kāya jīvite ca bhūtvā tathāgatasya anu śikṣiṣyāmahe

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: śikḥitukāmāśca vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya,
analyzed: śikḥitu kāmāḥ ca vayam bhagavan tathāgatasya

original: abhisaṃboddhukāmā vayaṃ bhagavannanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim /
analyzed: abhisaṃboddhu kāmāḥ vayam bhagavan anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: arthikā vayaṃ bhagavan anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
analyzed: arthikāḥ vayam bhagavan anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

original: vidhvaṃsayitukāmāśca vayaṃ bhagavan māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /
analyzed: vidhvaṃsayitu kāmāḥ ca vayam bhagavat mā āram pāpīyāṃsam

original: mocayitukāmā vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: mocayitu kāmāḥ vayam bhagavan sarva sattvān sarva bhayebhyaḥ sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ

original: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvastane mama gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena sārdhaṃ bhikḥusaṃghena cānukampāmupādāya /
analyzed: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvastane mama gṛhe bhaktam bhoktum sārdham bodhisattva gaṇena sārdham bhikḥu saṃghena ca anukampām upādāya

original: adhivāsayati sma bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tūḥṇīṃbhāvena śvastane gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena bhikḥusaṃghena  #
analyzed: adhivāsayati sma bhagavān candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya tūḥṇīṃbhāvena śvastane gṛhe bhaktam bhoktum sārdham bodhisattva gaṇena bhikḥu saṃghena

original: cānukampāmupādāya /
analyzed: ca anukampām upādāya

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavatastūḥṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanaṃ viditvā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavataḥ tūḥṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanam viditvā utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam

original: kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakḥiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
analyzed: kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ

original: 'ntikāt prākrāmat //
analyzed: antikāt prākrāmat

original: atha khalu candaprabhaḥ kumārabhūto yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasamakrāmat /
analyzed: atha khalu candaprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ yena rājagṛham mahā nagaram yena ca svakam niveśanam tena upasamakrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya candraprabhaḥ svagṛhaṃ prāviśat /
analyzed: upasaṃkramya candraprabhaḥ sva gṛham prāviśat

original: praviśya ca tāmeva rātriṃ prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyamabhisaṃskārayati sma /
analyzed: praviśya ca tām eva rātrim prabhūtam praṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam svādanīyam abhisaṃskārayati sma

original: śatarasaṃ ca bhojanaṃ saṃpādya tasyā eva rātryā atyayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ susiktaṃ
analyzed: śata rasam ca bhojanam saṃpādya tasyāḥ eva rātryāḥ atyayena rājagṛham mahā nagaram su siktam

original: susaṃmṛṣṭaṃ muktakusumābhikīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikānirghūpitamucchritacchatradhvajapatākaṃ (Vaidya 55)
analyzed: su saṃmṛṣṭam mukta kusuma abhikīrṇam gandha ghaṭikā nirghūpitam ucchrita chatra dhvaja patākam vaidya

original: dhūpanadhūpitaṃ vitānavitatamavasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ sarathyāntarāpaṇamapagatapāṣāṇaḥarkarakaṭhallaṃ
analyzed: dhūpana dhūpitam vitāna vitatam avasakta paṭṭa dāma kalāpam sa rathyā antarāpaṇam apagata pāṣāṇaḥ arkara kaṭhallam

original: vicitrapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ candanacūrṇābhikīrṇaṃ gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhapañjarajālārdhacandrasamalaṃkṛtaṃ
analyzed: vicitra puṣpa abhikīrṇam candana cūrṇa abhikīrṇam gavākṣa toraṇa niryūha pañjara jāla ardhacandra samalaṃkṛtam

original: candanānuliptamakārṣīt /
analyzed: candana anuliptam akārṣīt

original: sarvāvantaṃ nagaramutpalakumudapadmapuṇḍarīkābhyavakīrṇamakārṣīt /
analyzed: sarvāvantam nagaram utpala kumuda padma puṇḍarīka abhyavakīrṇam akārṣīt

original: svaṃ ca gṛhaṃ sarvālaṃkāravyūhitamakārṣīt /
analyzed: svam ca gṛham sarva alaṃkāra vyūhitam akārṣīt

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta imānevaṃrupān nagaravyūhān gṛhavyūhān bhojanavyūhān
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ imān evaṃrupān nagara vyūhān gṛha vyūhān bhojana vyūhān

original: samalaṃkṛtya rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
analyzed: samalaṃkṛtya rājagṛhāt mahā nagarāt niṣkramya yena gṛdhrakūṭa parvataḥ yena bhagavān tena upasamakrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt /
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte asthāt

original: ekānte sthitaḥ candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataḥ kālamārocayāmāsa - kālo bhagavan,
analyzed: ekānte sthitaḥ candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavataḥ kālam ārocayāmāsa kālaḥ bhagavan

original: kālaḥ sugata,
analyzed: kālaḥ sugata

original: siddhaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
analyzed: siddham bhaktam yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha khalu bhagavān utthāyāsanāt kalyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān utthāya āsanāt kalyam eva nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena

original: sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena bhikṣuśatasahasreṇa saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ
analyzed: sārdham paripūrṇena bhikṣu śata sahasreṇa saṃbahulaiḥ ca bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ

original: puraskṛto 'nekaiśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaśatasahasraiḥ
analyzed: puraskṛtaḥ anekaiḥ ca deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣya śata sahasraiḥ

original: pūjyamāno 'bhiṣṭūyamāno mahatā buddhānubhāvena mahatā buddhaprātihāryeṇa mahatā buddheryāpathena
analyzed: pūjyamānaḥ abhiṣṭūyamānaḥ mahatā buddha anubhāvena mahatā buddha prātihāryeṇa mahatā buddha īryāpathena

original: raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairniścaradbhirnānātūryaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaraiḥ
analyzed: raśmi koṭi niyuta śata sahasraiḥ niścaradbhiḥ nānā tūrya śata sahasraiḥ puṣpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvaraiḥ

original: pravarṣadbhiryena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
analyzed: pravarṣadbhiḥ yena rājagṛham mahā nagaram tena upasaṃkrāmati sma

original: candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya niveśane prakṣiptaśca bhagavatā dakṣiṇaścakraratnasamalaṃkṛtaḥ aparimitakuśalasaṃcitapādaratna indrakīle,
analyzed: candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya niveśane prakṣiptaḥ ca bhagavatā dakṣiṇaḥ cakra ratna samalaṃkṛtaḥ aparimita kuśala saṃcita pāda ratnaḥ indrakīle

original: atha tāvadeva tasmin mahānagare anekāni āścaryādbhutāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
analyzed: atha tāvat eva tasmin mahā nagare anekāni āścarya adbhutāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma

original: iyamatra dharmatā
analyzed: iyam atra dharmatā

original: / tatredamucyate -
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: puravara praviśanti nāyakasmin caraṇavaru sthapitaśca indrakīle /
analyzed: praviśanti indrakīle

original: calati vasumatī śirīya tasya pramudita bhonti purottamasmi sattvāḥ // SRS_10.1 //
analyzed: calati vasumatī tasya bhonti sattvāḥ

original: ye naraḥ kṣudhitāḥ pipāsitā vā na bhavati teṣa jighatsa tasmi kāle /
analyzed: ye naraḥ kṣudhitāḥ pipāsitāḥ vā na bhavati teṣa jighatsa tasmin kāle

original: apagata bhavatī kṣughā pipāsā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.2 //
analyzed: apagata bhavatī kṣughā pipāsā yada jinu nikṣipati indrakīli pādam

original: tatha puna nara ye bhavanti andhāḥ śrotravihīna anātha alpapuṇyāḥ /
analyzed: tatha puna nara ye bhavanti andhāḥ śrotra vihīna anātha alpa puṇyāḥ

original: sarvi pratilabhanti cakṣu śrotraṃ yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.3 //
analyzed: sarvi pratilabhanti cakṣu śrotram jinu nikṣipati indrakīli pādam

original: yamaviṣaye ye keci bhonti pretāḥ suduḥkhita kheṭasiṃghāṇakabhojanāśāḥ /
analyzed: yama viṣaye ye keci bhonti pretāḥ kheṭa siṃghāṇaka bhoja nāśāḥ

original: sarvi sukhita bhonti ābhaspṛṣṭā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.4 //
analyzed: sarvi sukhita bhonti nikṣipati indrakīli pādam

original: (Vaidya 56)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śailaśikharaśṛṅgaparvatāśca tatha varapādapaśālakarṇikārāḥ /
analyzed: śaila śikhara śṛṅga parvatāḥ ca vara pādapa śāla karṇikārāḥ

original: sarvi abhinamanti yena buddho yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.5 //
analyzed: abhinamanti yena buddhaḥ pādam

original: sanagaranigamā sasāgarāntā pracali vasuṃdhari ṣaḍvikāra sarvā /
analyzed: sa nagara nigamā sa sāgara antā vasuṃdhari ṣaṣ vikāra sarvā

original: na bhavati viheṭha kasyapi ceha yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.6 //
analyzed: na bhavati kasi api ca iha nikṣipati indrakīli pādam

original: marumanujakumbhāṇḍarākṣasāśca nabhaḥsthita tuṣṭa udagracittāḥ /
analyzed: maru manuja kumbhāṇḍa rākṣasāḥ ca nabhaḥ sthita tuṣṭa udagra cittāḥ

original: chatra dhariya ca lokanāyakasya paramaprīṇita janetva bodhichandam // SRS_10.7 //
analyzed: ca lokanāyakasya bodhi chandam

original: śrūyati ca manojña vādyaśabdastūryasahasra aghaṭṭitā raṇanti /
analyzed: śrūyati ca manojña vādya śabdaḥ tūrya sahasra a ghaṭṭitāḥ

original: pramuditāstada bhonti sarvasattvā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.8 //
analyzed: pramuditāḥ tada bhonti sarva sattvāḥ pādam

original: vṛkṣaśatasahasra onamanti sarvi prapuṣpita bhonti tasmi kāle /
analyzed: vṛkṣa śata sahasre sarvi bhonti tasmin kāle

original: devaśatasahasra antarīkṣe pūja karonti amānuṣī jinasya // SRS_10.9 //
analyzed: antarīkṣe pūja karonti amānuṣī jinasya

original: ṛṣabhagaṇa tadā nadanti hṛṣṭā hayadviradādhipatī pravṛddhakāyāḥ /
analyzed: tadā nadanti hṛṣṭāḥ haya dvirada adhipatī pravṛddha kāyāḥ

original: mṛgapatayo nadanti siṃhanādaṃ yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam // SRS_10.10 //
analyzed: mṛgapatayaḥ nadanti siṃhanādam nikṣipati indrakīli pādam

original: mahīpataya ye keci bhūmipālā diśividiśāsu ca āgatā bhavanti /
analyzed: mahīpataya ye bhūmipālāḥ diśi vidiśāsu ca āgatāḥ bhavanti

original: dharaṇitali patanti hṛṣṭacittā dṛṣṭu jinasya śirīmimamevarūpām // SRS_10.11 //
analyzed: patanti hṛṣṭa cittāḥ dṛṣṭu jinasya śirīm imam evarūpām

original: anye abhiṣṭuvanti lokanātham apari kṣipanti jinasya puṣpavṛṣṭim /
analyzed: anye abhiṣṭuvanti lokanātham apari kṣipanti jinasya puṣpa vṛṣṭim

original: (Vaidya 57)
analyzed: vaidya

original: apari daśanakhāñjaliṃ karitvā aho jinu kāruṇiko bhaṇanti vācam // SRS_10.12 //
analyzed: apari daśa nakha añjalim karitvā aho jinu kāruṇikaḥ bhaṇanti vācam

original: keci vara kṣipanti muktahārān bahuvidha ābharaṇān janetva prītim /
analyzed: keci vara kṣipanti muktahārān bahuvidha ābharaṇān janetva prītim

original: cīvara ratanān kṣipanti anye atuliyu agru jinatva bodhicittam // SRS_10.13 //
analyzed: cīvara ratanān kṣipanti anye atuliyu agru jina tva bodhi cittam

original: keci vara kṣipanti hemajālaṃ apari punarmukhaphullakaṃ kṣipanti /
analyzed: keci kṣipanti hema jālam apari punar mukha phullakam kṣipanti

original: keci vara kṣipanti hemaniṣkāṃstatha apare parihārakān kṣipanti // SRS_10.14 //
analyzed: kṣipanti apare parihārakān kṣipanti

original: kaṭakavara kṣipanti keci tatra apari keyūra kṣipanti ratnacitrān /
analyzed: kaṭaka vara kṣipanti keci tatra apari keyūra kṣipanti ratna citrān

original: ambara kusumān kṣipanti anye citta janetva 'siyāṃ vayaṃ pi buddhāḥ' // SRS_10.15 //
analyzed: ambara kusumān kṣipanti anye vayam buddhāḥ

original: apari naraḥ kṣipanti hemacitrāṃstatha maṇisūtravarān prasannacittāḥ /
analyzed: apari naraḥ kṣipanti hema citrān maṇi sūtra varān prasanna cittāḥ

original: keci ca ratanajālakaṃ kṣipanti dvāri yadā sthitu bhoti lokanāthaḥ // SRS_10.16 //
analyzed: ca ratana jālakam kṣipanti dvāri yadā lokanāthaḥ

original: paramaduḥkhita ye bhavanti sattvā bahuvidhupadruvu śokaśalya prāptāḥ /
analyzed: ye bhavanti sattvāḥ śoka śalya prāptāḥ

original: sarvi sukhasamarpitā bhavanti puruṣavarasya śirīya nāyakasya // SRS_10.17 //
analyzed: sarvi sukha samarpitāḥ bhavanti puruṣa varasya nāyakasya

original: parabhṛtaśukasārikāmayūrāstathapi ca sārasacāṣahaṃsakrauñcāḥ /
analyzed: parabhṛta śuka sārikā mayūrāḥ ca sārasa cāṣa haṃsa krauñcāḥ

original: sarvi dvijagaṇā nabhe sthihitvā paramamanojñarutāni vyāharanti // SRS_10.18 //
analyzed: dvija gaṇāḥ nabhe sthihitvā parama manojña rutāni vyāharanti

original: pramudita tada bhonti pakṣisaṃghā madhuramanojñarutaṃ pramuñcamānāḥ /
analyzed: bhonti pakṣi saṃghāḥ madhura manojña rutam pramuñcamānāḥ

original: rāgu tatha samenti doṣamohaṃ ye ca śṛṇanti manojña pakṣiśabdān // SRS_10.19 //
analyzed: doṣa moham ye ca śṛṇanti manojña pakṣi śabdān

original: (Vaidya 58)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śruṇiya rañjanīya sattvakoṭyaḥ sarvi ca labhanti kṣāntimānulomām /
analyzed: sattva koṭyaḥ ca labhanti kṣāntim ānulomām

original: tāṃśca sugata vyākaroti sarvān bhaviṣyatha yūya jinā anāgatāśca // SRS_10.20 //
analyzed: tān ca sugata vyākaroti sarvān bhaviṣyatha yūya jināḥ anāgatāḥ ca

original: na bhavati kileśu tasmi kāle sarvi sagaurava bhonti dharmarāje /
analyzed: na tasmi kāle

original: apagatabhayadoṣamohajālāḥ praṇipatitāḥ sugatamabhiṣṭuvantaḥ // SRS_10.21 //
analyzed: apagata bhaya doṣa moha jālāḥ praṇipatitāḥ sugatam abhiṣṭuvantaḥ

original: paśyiya tada rūpa nāyakasya spṛha janayanti varasmi buddhajñāne /
analyzed: nāyakasya spṛha janayanti buddha jñāne

original: kada vaya labhe jñānamevarūpam āśayu jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti // SRS_10.22 //
analyzed: jñānam eva rūpam jinaḥ asya vyākaroti

original: raśmi śatasahasra niścaranti ekaikataḥ sugatasya romakūpāt /
analyzed: raśmi śatasahasra niścaranti ekaikataḥ sugatasya romakūpāt

original: taduttari yatha gaṅgavālikā vā na pi ca nimittu gṛhītu śakyu tāsām // SRS_10.23 //
analyzed: tad uttari vā na ca nimittu gṛhītu śakyu tāsām

original: sūryaprabha na bhāntiṃ tasmi kāle na pi maṇi nāgni na sarvadevatānām /
analyzed: na tasmi kāle na sarva devatānām

original: sarvi prabha na bhānti tasmi kāle yada praviśanta puraṃ vibhāti buddhaḥ // SRS_10.24 //
analyzed: sarvi prabha na bhānti tasmi kāle praviśanta puram vibhāti buddhaḥ

original: padmaśatasahasra prādurbhūtā dharaṇitu koṭisahasrapatra śuddhāḥ /
analyzed: padma śata sahasra prādurbhūtāḥ koṭi sahasra patra śuddhāḥ

original: yatra daśabalaḥ sthapeti pādaṃ mārga gataḥ sugato mahāgaṇena // SRS_10.25 //
analyzed: yatra daśa balaḥ pādam mārga gataḥ sugataḥ mahā gaṇena

original: aśuci kalimalā na bhonti tasmi kāle nagaravaraṃ praviśanti nāyakasmin /
analyzed: kali malāḥ na bhonti tasmin kāle nagara varam praviśanti

original: nagaru surabhi sarvi dhūpanena gandha manojña pravāyate samantāt // SRS_10.26 //
analyzed: nagaru surabhi sarvi dhūpanena gandha manojña pravāyate samantāt

original: vīthi nagari tada bhoti sarvā apagataloṣṭakaṭhalla sikta gandhaiḥ /
analyzed: sarvāḥ gandhaiḥ

original: (Vaidya 59)
analyzed: vaidya

original: puṇya daśalabasya evarūpā vividha vikīrṇa bhavanti muktapuṣpāḥ // SRS_10.27 //
analyzed: puṇya daśalabasya evarūpāḥ vividha vikīrṇa bhavanti muktapuṣpāḥ

original: yakṣa śatasahasra raudracittāḥ kanakanibhaṃ dvipadendru dṛṣṭva buddham /
analyzed: raudra cittāḥ kanaka nibham dṛṣṭvā buddham

original: janayi vipulu nāyakasmi premaṃ śaraṇamupeti ca buddhadharmasaṃghān // SRS_10.28 //
analyzed: pra imam śaraṇam upeti ca buddha dharma saṃghān

original: ye ca devaśatasahasra koṭiyo vā upagata sarvi narendradarśanāya /
analyzed: ye ca deva śata sahasra sarvi narendra darśanāya

original: varṣati sugatasya puṣpavarṣaṃ gaganatale ca sthihanti muktapuṣpāḥ // SRS_10.29 //
analyzed: varṣati sugatasya puṣpa varṣam gagana tale ca sthihanti mukta puṣpāḥ

original: ye manuja kṣipī jinasya puṣpaṃ gaganatale bhavatīti puṣpachatram /
analyzed: ye jinasya puṣpam gagana tale bhavati iti puṣpa chatram

original: ye puna kusumān kṣipanti devā dharaṇitale stṛta bhonti divyapuṣpāḥ // SRS_10.30 //
analyzed: ye puna kusumān kṣipanti devāḥ dharaṇi tale bhonti divya puṣpāḥ

original: na bhavati kadāci dṛṣṭva tṛptī devamanuṣyakubhāṇḍarākṣasānām /
analyzed: na bhavati kadācid dṛṣṭvā tṛptī deva manuṣya kubhāṇḍa rākṣasānām

original: yada daśabalu dṛṣṭva lokanāthaṃ pramudita bhonti udagrakalyacittāḥ // SRS_10.31 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lokanātham bhonti udagra kalya cittāḥ

original: na manasi tada bhonti divyapuṣpā na ca puna vismayu jāyate ca tatra /
analyzed: na manasi tada bhonti divya puṣpāḥ na ca puna ca tatra

original: yada puruṣavarasya kāyu dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa bhavanti udagra sarvasattvāḥ // SRS_10.32 //

analyzed: bhagavān āha pratibhātu te kumāra yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhaṃ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt -
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavatā kṛta avakāśaḥ bhagavantam saṃmukham sārūpyābhiḥ gāthābhiḥ abhyaṣṭāvīt

original: dṛṣṭvāna sattvān dukhitānupadrutān rāgeṇa doṣeṇa sadābhibhūtān /

analyzed: cittam tvayā utpāditu bodhi kāraṇāt buddhaḥ bhaveyam prajāna mocakāḥ

analyzed: cīrṇaḥ asi vīrye bahu kalpa koṭiyaḥ dāne dame saṃyami śikṣitaḥ

analyzed: na tava mānasu jātu khinnam hastān ca pādān tyajamānu jīvitam

analyzed: śīlam tava accham vimalam viśuddham ātmā ca tyaktaḥ na ca śīla khaṇḍitam

analyzed: kāyena vācā manasā su saṃvṛtā su dānta cittā sugatā namaḥ astu te

original: (Vaidya 84)

analyzed: balaiḥ upetāḥ daśabhiḥ balaiḥ sthitāḥ asaṅgu jñānī vidi sarva dharmān

analyzed: karuṇāni loka hita kara dharma svāmin anukampase prajāḥ ima artha kāmaḥ

analyzed: śūnyam ti jñānam na ca punihā asti sattvaḥ lokam ca dṛṣṭvā tathā ti pranaṣṭa mārgam

analyzed: vibodhitāḥ te prakṛti nirātma dharme vimukti jātāḥ na ca kvacid sā vimuktiḥ

analyzed: pratyādiśam sadā pramattam jitvā ca māram sa balam ananta sainyam

original: buddhitva bodhi vipulāmanantajñānaṃ diśehi dharmaṃ parama viśuddhaśāntam // SRS_14.8 //
analyzed: vipulām ananta jñānam diśehi dharmam parama viśuddha śāntam

analyzed: gaganam pateyyā saha śaśi tārakehi pṛthivī vinaśyet sa nagara śaila saṃsthā

original: ākāśadhāturapi ca siyānyathātvaṃ no caiva tubhyaṃ vitatha bhaṇeyya vācā // SRS_14.9 //

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvam duḥkhitān sattva anupalambha ratāḥ prajāḥ

original: anopalambhaṃ deśesi gambhīrāṃ śāntaśūnyatām // SRS_14.10 //
analyzed: an upalambham deśesi gambhīrām śānta śūnyatām

analyzed: śikṣitaḥ asi mahāvīra kalpa koṭīḥ acintiyā

analyzed: anopalambha śikṣāyām skhalitam te na vidyate

analyzed: abhūmiḥ atra bālānām yāvantaḥ anya tīrthikāḥ

analyzed: ye sthitāḥ ātma saṃjñāyām te skhalanti

original: jñātvā dharmāṇa nairātmyaṃ skhalitaṃ te na vidyate // SRS_14.13 //
analyzed: jñātvā nairātmyam skhalitam te na vidyate

original: bhūtavādī mahāvīra bhūtadharmapratiṣṭhitaḥ /

analyzed: bhūte satye sthitaḥ nātha bhūtām vācam prabhāṣase

analyzed: tasya bhūtasya nisyandā bhūtām vācam prabhāṣase

analyzed: bhūta caryāsu saṃpannaḥ bhūta koṭī su śikṣitā

analyzed: bhūta āśayā bhūta carī bhūta prajña namaḥ astu te

original: (Vaidya 85)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: samaste prajñayā na asti jñāna vādi prabhākara

analyzed: jñāne viśeṣa tām prāpta jñāna vādi namaḥ astu te

analyzed: aprakampyaḥ yathā meruḥ acalaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: gaṇe suvipule śāsturgaṇān saṃparikarṣasi /
analyzed: gaṇe su vipule śāstuḥ gaṇān saṃparikarṣasi

analyzed: gabhīra prajñā sugatā nadase pariṣad gatā

analyzed: a dānta damakaḥ vīra a dāntāḥ damitāḥ tvayā

analyzed: te ca mitrāḥ dṛḍhāḥ bhonti abhedyāḥ bhonti susthitāḥ

analyzed: nairātmya dharmam deśemi yatra na asti priya apriyam

analyzed: śaṅkha paṭaha bheri vīṇa śabdāḥ kalam api na buddha śabde

analyzed: buddham atuliyam aprameyam buddhaḥ bhaveya yathā iva śākyasiṃhaḥ

original: (Vaidya 88)
analyzed: vaidya

original: pṛcchami daśabalaṃ vināyakaṃ śākyasiṃha dvipadānamuttamam /
analyzed: pṛcchami daśabalam vināyakam śākyasiṃha dvipa dānam uttamam

analyzed: jñāna pāramim gatam prabhākaram rāga dveṣa khila moha sādakam

analyzed: vara jñānam uttamam kaḥ nu hetu smita darśane mune

original: naiva dravyaratanaṃ ca labhyate yanna tyaktu caratā ti cārikām // SRS_14.47 //
analyzed: na eva dravya ratanam ca labhyate yat na cārikām

original: jñānu śreṣṭhu tribhave 'tivartate sarvasattvacariyāṃ prajānase /

original: dhātucittu adhimuktikovidā kasya arthi smitu etu darśitam // SRS_14.48 //

original: ko ca asya cariyāya grāhakaḥ kasya arthi smitu darśitaṃ mune // SRS_14.49 //
analyzed: kaḥ ca asya cariyāya grāhakaḥ kasya arthi smitu darśitam mune

analyzed: ṣaḍvikāra pṛthivī prakampitā

original: koṭipatraparamā prabhāsvarā hemavarṇarucirā manoramā // SRS_14.50 //
analyzed: koṭi patra paramā prabhāsvarā hema varṇa rucirā manoramā

original: yatrime sthita jinasya aurasā bodhisattva paramā maharddhikāḥ /

original: sa pūja kṛtvā dvipadāna uttamān samudācari jñānamimaṃ niruttaram /
analyzed: kṛtvā dvipadānaḥ uttamān samudācari jñānam imam niruttaram

original: sa paścime cocchrayi lokanātho vimalaprabho nāma jino bhaviṣyati // SRS_15.9 //
analyzed: sa paścime ca ucchrayi lokanāthaḥ vimalaprabhaḥ nāma jinaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: idaṃ svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutitvā prītisphuṭo āsi kumārabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: idam svakam vyākaraṇam prīti sphuṭaḥ āsi kumāra bhūtaḥ

original: candraprabho udgata sapta tāla udānudāneti nabhe sthihitvā // SRS_15.10 //
analyzed: candraprabho nabhe sthihitvā

original: aho jinā uttamadharmadeśakā vimuktijñānādhipatībale sthitā /
analyzed: aho jināḥ uttama dharma deśakāḥ vimukti jñāna adhipatī bale sthitā

original: suniścite uttamajñāni tiṣṭhasi anābhibhūto 'si parapravādibhiḥ // SRS_15.11 //
analyzed: su niścite uttama jñāni tiṣṭhasi an ābhibhūtaḥ asi parapravādibhiḥ

original: vivarjitā saṅga vimukti sparśitā vibhāvitaṃ vastu bhave na sajjasi /
analyzed: vivarjitā saṅga vimukti sparśitā vibhāvitam vastu bhave na sajjasi

original: prapañca sarve sakalā na bhonti te asaṅgajñānaṃ tribhave 'bhivartate // SRS_15.12 //
analyzed: sarve sakalāḥ na bhonti te asaṅga jñānam tri bhave abhivartate

original: sarvaprapañcebhiranopaliptā dṛṣṭiḥ prapañcāḥ sakalāḥ prahīṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarva prapañcebhiḥ an upaliptā dṛṣṭiḥ prapañcāḥ sakalāḥ prahīṇāḥ

original: subhāviate mārga niketu nāsti anābhibhūtā aviruddha kenacita // SRS_15.13 //
analyzed: mārga niketu na asti anābhibhūtā aviruddha kenacid

original: niketu traidhātuki nāsti tubhyaṃ oghāśca granthāśca prahīṇa sarve /
analyzed: niketu traidhātuki na asti tubhyam oghāḥ ca granthāḥ ca sarve

original: tṛṣṇālatābandhana sarvi chinnā bhava prahīṇo bhavasaṃghi nāsti // SRS_15.14 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā latā bandhana chinnā bhava prahīṇaḥ

original: (Vaidya 97)
analyzed: vaidya

original: svabhāvu dharmāṇamabhāvu jānase anābhilapyā gira saṃprabhāṣase /
analyzed: svabhāvu dharmāṇam abhāvu jānase an abhilapyāḥ giraḥ saṃprabhāṣase

original: siṃhena vā kroṣṭuka tīrtha nāśitā ye te viparyāsasthitā avidvasu // SRS_15.15 //
analyzed: siṃhena vā kroṣṭuka tīrtha nāśitāḥ ye te viparyāsa sthitāḥ

original: nidhāna śreṣṭhaṃ mayi labdhamadya dharmaṃ nidhānaṃ sugatena deśitam /
analyzed: nidhāna śreṣṭham mayi labdham adya dharmam nidhānam sugatena deśitam

original: prahīṇa sarvā vinipātu durgati kāṅkṣā na mehāsti bhaviṣya nāyakaḥ // SRS_15.16 //
analyzed: durgati kāṅkṣā na mā iha asti bhaviṣya nāyakaḥ

original: mūrdhasmi pāṇiṃ pratisthāpayitvā suvarṇavarṇaṃ ruciraṃ prabhāsvaram /
analyzed: pāṇim pratisthāpayitvā suvarṇa varṇam ruciram prabhāsvaram

original: abhiṣiñca bodhāya nararṣabhastaṃ sadevakaṃ loka sthapetva sākṣiṇam // SRS_15.17 //
analyzed: abhiṣiñca bodhāya nara ṛṣabhaḥ tam sa devakam loke sākṣiṇam

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje smitavyākaraṇaparivarto nāma pañcadaśaḥ // 15 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje smitavyākaraṇaparivartaḥ nāma pañcadaśaḥ  /

original: (Vaidya 98)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 16 Pūrvayogaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva yoga parivartaḥ

original: smarāmi pūrvaṃ caramāṇu cārikāṃ siṃhadhvajasya sugatasya śāsane /
analyzed: smarāmi pūrvam caramāṇu cārikām siṃhadhvajasya sugatasya śāsane

original: abhūṣi bhikṣu vidu dharmabhāṇako nāmena so ucyati brahmadattaḥ // SRS_16.1 //
analyzed: nāmena saḥ ucyati brahmadattaḥ

original: ahaṃ tadāsīnmati rājaputro ābādhiko bāḍha gilāna duḥkhitaḥ /
analyzed: aham ābādhikaḥ bāḍha gilāna duḥkhitaḥ

original: mahyaṃ ca si ācariyo abhūṣi yo brahmadattastada dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_16.2 //
analyzed: mahyam ca yaḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: pañcottarā vaidyaśatā anūnakā vyādhiṃ cikitsanti udyuktamānasāḥ /
analyzed: pañca uttarāḥ vaidya śatāḥ anūnakāḥ vyādhim cikitsanti udyukta mānasāḥ

original: vyādhiṃ na śaknanti mama cikitsituṃ sarve mama jñātaya āsi duḥkhitāḥ // SRS_16.3 //
analyzed: vyādhim na śaknanti mama cikitsitum sarve mama jñātayaḥ āsi duḥkhitāḥ

original: śrutvā ca gailānyu sa mahya bhikṣu gilānapṛccho mama antikāgataḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā ca bhikṣu gilānapṛcchaḥ mama antika āgataḥ

original: kṛpāṃ janetvā mama brahmadatto imaṃ samādhiṃ varu tatra deśayī // SRS_16.4 //
analyzed: kṛpām janetvā mama brahmadattaḥ imam samādhim tatra

original: tasya mamā etu samādhi śrutvā utpanna prīti ariyā nirāmiṣā /
analyzed: tasya mamā etu samādhi śrutvā utpanna prīti ariyā nirāmiṣā

original: svabhāvu dharmāṇa prajānamāno ucchvāsi vyādhī tuhu tasmi kāle // SRS_16.5 //
analyzed: svabhāvu dharmāṇa prajānamānaḥ ucchvāsi vyādhī tuhu tasmin kāle

original: dīpaṃkaraḥ so caramāṇu cārikāmabhūṣi bhikṣurvidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
analyzed: dīpaṃkaraḥ bhikṣuḥ vidu dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: ahaṃ ca āsīnmatirājaputraḥ samādhijñānena hu vyādhi mocitaḥ // SRS_16.6 //
analyzed: aham ca āsīt mati rāja putraḥ samādhi jñānena mocitaḥ

original: tasmāt kumārā bahu paścakāle anusmaranto imu pārihāṇim /
analyzed: tasmāt kumārāḥ bahu paśca kāle anusmarantaḥ imu pārihāṇim

original: sahesi bālāna durukta vākyaṃ dhārentu vācentu imaṃ samādhim // SRS_16.7 //
analyzed: saha isi vākyam vācentu imam samādhim

original: (Vaidya 99)
analyzed: vaidya

original: bheṣyanti bhikṣu bahu paścakāle lubdhāśca duṣṭāśca asaṃyatāśca /
analyzed: bhikṣu bahu paśca kāle lubdhāḥ ca duṣṭāḥ ca asaṃyatāḥ ca

original: pāpeccha adhyoṣita pātracīvare pratikṣipiṣyanti imaṃ samādhim // SRS_16.8 //
analyzed: pāpa iccha adhyoṣita pātra cīvare pratikṣipiṣyanti imam samādhim

original: īrṣyālukā uddhata prākaṭendriyāḥ kuleṣu cādhyoṣita lābhakāmāḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyālukāḥ uddhata prākaṭa indriyāḥ kuleṣu ca adhyoṣita lābha kāmāḥ

original: prāyogike saṃstavi nitya saṃśritāḥ pratikṣipiṣyanti imaṃ samādhim // SRS_16.9 //
analyzed: prāyogike saṃstavi nitya saṃśritāḥ pratikṣipiṣyanti imam samādhim

original: hastāṃśca pādāṃśca tatha vidyamānā hāsye ca lāsye ca sadā prayuktāḥ /
analyzed: hastān ca pādān ca vidyamānāḥ hāsye ca lāsye ca sadā prayuktāḥ

original: parasparaṃ kaṇṭhita śliṣyamāṇā grāmeṣu caryāpathi anyu bheṣyati // SRS_16.10 //
analyzed: parasparam grāmeṣu caryā pathi

original: ayuktayogānimi bhonti lakṣaṇāḥ parakumārīṣu ca nitya dhyoṣitāḥ /
analyzed: bhonti lakṣaṇāḥ para kumārīṣu

original: rūpeṇa raktā grathitā bhavanti hiṇḍanti grāmānnigamāṃśca rāṣṭrān // SRS_16.11 //
analyzed: rūpeṇa raktāḥ grathitāḥ bhavanti hiṇḍanti grāmān nigamān ca rāṣṭrān

original: te khādyapeyasmi sadā prayuktā nāṭye ya gīte ca tathaiva vādite /
analyzed: sadā prayuktāḥ nāṭye gīte ca tathā eva vādite

original: krayavikraye co sada bhonti utsukāḥ pāne 'pi cādhyoṣita naṣṭalajjāḥ // SRS_16.12 //
analyzed: kraya vikraye ca u bhonti utsukāḥ pāne api naṣṭa lajjāḥ

original: lekhāna piṣyanti ayuktayogāḥ śīlaṃ tatheryāpathu chorayitvā /
analyzed: piṣyanti ayukta yogāḥ śīlam tathā īryāpathu chorayitvā

original: maryāda bhinditva gṛhībhi sārdhaṃ te bhinnavṛttā vitathapratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_16.13 //
analyzed: maryāda sārdham te bhinna vṛttāḥ vitatha pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: ye karma buddhehi sadā vivarjitāstulamānakūṭe ca sadā prayuktāḥ /
analyzed: ye karma sadā vivarjitāḥ tulamānakūṭe ca sadā prayuktāḥ

original: tatkarma kṛtvāna kiliṣṭapāpakān apāyu yāsyanti nihīnakarmāḥ // SRS_16.14 //
analyzed: tat karma kiliṣṭa pāpakān apāyu yāsyanti nihīna karmāḥ

original: prabhūtavittaṃ maṇihemaśaṃkhaṃ gṛhāṃśca jñātīṃśca vihāya pravraji /
analyzed: prabhūta vittam maṇi hema śaṃkham gṛhān ca jñātīn ca vihāya pravraji

original: (Vaidya 100)
analyzed: vaidya

original: te pravrajitvāniha buddhaśāsane pāpāni karmāṇi sadācaranti // SRS_16.15 //
analyzed: te pravrajitvā an iha buddha śāsane pāpāni karmāṇi sadā ācaranti

original: dhane ca dhānye ca te sārasaṃjñino dhenūśca gāvaḥ śakaṭāni sajjayī /
analyzed: dhane ca dhānye ca te sāra saṃjñinaḥ dhenūḥ ca gāvaḥ śakaṭāni

original: kimartha tehi ima keśa choritā śikṣāya yeṣāṃ pratipatti nāsti // SRS_16.16 //
analyzed: kimartha yeṣām na asti

original: mayā ca pūrve cariyāṃ caritvā suduṣkaraṃ kalpasahasra cīrṇam /
analyzed: mayā ca pūrve cariyām caritvā su duṣkaram kalpa sahasra cīrṇam

original: ayaṃ ca me śānta samādhireṣito yatteṣa śrutvā tada hāsyu bheṣyati // SRS_16.17 //
analyzed: ayam ca me śānta samādhiḥ eṣitaḥ yat śrutvā

original: ciraṃ mṛṣāvādi abrahmacāriṇo apāyanimnāḥ sada kāmalābhāḥ /
analyzed: ciram mṛṣāvādi abrahmacāriṇaḥ apāya nimnāḥ kāma lābhāḥ

original: te brahmacārīṇa dhvajaṃ gṛhītvā duḥśīla vakṣyanti na eṣa dharmaḥ // SRS_16.18 //
analyzed: te brahmacārīṇa dhvajam gṛhītvā duḥśīla vakṣyanti naḥ eṣa dharmaḥ

original: bhedāya sthāsyanti ca te parasparaṃ ayuktibhirlābha gaveṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: bhedāya sthāsyanti ca te parasparam ayuktibhiḥ lābha gaveṣamāṇāḥ

original: avarṇa bhāṣitva ta anyamanyaṃ cyutā gamipyanti apāyabhūmim // SRS_16.19 //
analyzed: avarṇa te anyam anyam cyutāḥ gamipyanti apāya bhūmim

original: śataḥsahasreṣu sudurlabhāste kṣāntībalaṃ yeṣu tadā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: śatas sahasreṣu su durlabhāḥ te kṣāntī balam yeṣu tadā bhaviṣyati

original: ato bahū ye kalahasmi utsukāḥ prapañca kāhinti jahitva kṣāntim // SRS_16.20 //
analyzed: atas bahū ye kalahasmi utsukāḥ jahitva kṣāntim

original: vakṣyanti vācā vaya bodhisattvāḥ śabdo 'pi teṣāṃ vraji deśadeśe /
analyzed: vakṣyanti bodhisattvāḥ śabdaḥ api teṣām deśa deśe

original: abhūtaśabdena madena mattā vipannaśīlāna kuto 'sti bodhiḥ // SRS_16.21 //
analyzed: abhūta śabdena madena mattā kutas asti bodhiḥ

original: na me śrutaṃ nāpi kadāci dṛṣṭamadhyāśayo yasya viśuddha nāsti /
analyzed: na me śrutam na api kadācid dṛṣṭam adhyāśayaḥ yasya viśuddha nā asti

original: imeṣu dharmeṣu ca nāsti kṣāntiḥ sa lapsyate bodhi kṣipitva dharmān // SRS_16.22 //
analyzed: imeṣu dharmeṣu ca nā asti kṣāntiḥ sa lapsyate bodhi dharmān

original: (Vaidya 101)
analyzed: vaidya

original: bhītāśca trastāśca gṛhaṃ tyajanti te pravraji dṛḍhatarā bhavanti /
analyzed: bhītāḥ ca trastāḥ ca gṛham tyajanti te pravraji dṛḍhatarāḥ bhavanti

original: viśeṣakāmā vilayaṃ prayānti kṣipitva yānaṃ puruṣottamānām // SRS_16.23 //
analyzed: viśeṣa kāmāḥ vilayam prayānti kṣipitva yānam puruṣa uttamānām

original: nihīnaprajñā guṇaviprahīnā vakṣyanti doṣaṃ sada agrayāne /
analyzed: nihīna prajñāḥ guṇa viprahīnāḥ vakṣyanti doṣam sadaḥ agra yāne

original: yasmai ca te taccharaṇaṃ prapannāstatraiva ye doṣaśatān vadanti // SRS_16.24 //
analyzed: yasmai ca te tat śaraṇam prapannāḥ tatra eva ye doṣa śatān vadanti

original: ājīvakā ye bahu pravrajitvā anarthikāḥ sarvasubuddhabodhaye /
analyzed: ājīvakāḥ ye bahu pravrajitvā anarthikāḥ sarva su buddha bodhaye

original: te ātmadṛṣṭīya sthihitva bālā uttrasta bheṣyanti śruṇitva śūnyatām // SRS_16.25 //
analyzed: te ātmadṛṣṭīya sthihitva bālāḥ uttrasta śruṇitva śūnyatām

original: vihāru kṛtvāna ta anyamanyaṃ vyāpādadoṣāṃśca khilaṃ janetvā /
analyzed: te anyam anyam vyāpāda doṣān ca khilam janetvā

original: abhyākhya datvā ca paraspareṇa lapsyanti prāmodya karitva pāpakam // SRS_16.26 //
analyzed: abhyākhya da tvā ca paraspareṇa lapsyanti prāmodya karitva pāpakam

original: yaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantu bheṣyati maitrīvihārī sada kṣāntikovidaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ maitrī vihārī kṣānti kovidaḥ

original: susaṃvṛto mārdavasūrataśca paribhūta so bheṣyati tasmi kāle // SRS_16.27 //
analyzed: su saṃvṛtaḥ mārdava sūrataḥ ca saḥ tasmin kāle

original: yo kho punarbheṣyati duṣṭacittaḥ sudāruṇo raudrātihīnakarmā /
analyzed: yaḥ khalu punar bheṣyati duṣṭa cittaḥ su dāruṇaḥ raudra ati hīna karmā

original: adharmacārī kalahe rataśca sa pūjito bheṣyati tasmi kāle // SRS_16.28 //
analyzed: adharma cārī kalahe rataḥ ca sa pūjitaḥ tasmin kāle

original: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi sacet kumārā mama śraddha gacchasi /
analyzed: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi saced kumārāḥ mama śraddha gacchasi

original: imāṃ smaritvā sugatānuśāsanīṃ mā jātu viśvastu bhavesi teṣām // SRS_16.29 //
analyzed: imām smaritvā sugata anuśāsanīm mā jātu viśvastu bhavesi teṣām

original: te tīvrarāgāstatha tīvradoṣāste tīvramohāḥ sada mānamattāḥ /
analyzed: te tīvra rāgāḥ tathā tīvra doṣāḥ te tīvra mohāḥ māna mattāḥ

original: (Vaidya 102)
analyzed: vaidya

original: adāntakāyāśca adāntavācaḥ adāntacittāśca apāyanimnāḥ // SRS_16.30 //
analyzed: adānta kāyāḥ ca adānta vācaḥ adānta cittāḥ ca apāya nimnāḥ

original: ahaṃ ca bhāṣeyya guṇāna varṇān na co guṇān bhikṣu samācareyyā /
analyzed: aham ca bhāṣeyya guṇān varṇān na ca u guṇān bhikṣu samācareyyā

original: na ghoṣamātreṇa ca bodhi labhyate pratipattisārāṇa na bodhi durlabhā // SRS_16.31 //
analyzed: na ghoṣa mātreṇa ca bodhi labhyate na bodhi durlabhā

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje pūrvayogaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ // 16 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje pūrvayogaparivartaḥ nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ

original: (Vaidya 103)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 17 Bahubuddhanirhārasamādhimukhaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: bahu buddha nirhāra samādhi mukha parivartaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstāṃ mahatīṃ sāgaropamāṃ parṣadaṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya samādāpya utthāyāsanāt prākrāmat /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tām mahatīm sāgara upamām parṣadam dharma kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya samādāpya utthāya āsanāt prākrāmat

original: yena ca gṛdhrakūṭaparvatarājastenaiva upasamakrāmat /
analyzed: yena ca gṛdhrakūṭa parvata rājaḥ tena eva upasamakrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya ca prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
analyzed: upasaṃkramya ca prajñapte eva āsane nyaṣīdat

original: bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyanamaskṛtaḥ sāgaropamāyāṃ parṣadi dhama saṃdeśayati sma /
analyzed: bhikṣu saṃgha parivṛtaḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣya namaskṛtaḥ sāgara upamāyām parṣadi dhama saṃdeśayati sma

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantaṃ nirgataṃ viditvā aśītyā prāṇikoṭīśataiḥ
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam nirgatam viditvā aśītyā prāṇi koṭī śataiḥ

original: sārdhaṃ sarvairdevabhūtairanyalokadhātvāgataiśca saṃbahulairbodhisattvamahāsattvaniyutaiḥ
analyzed: sārdham sarvaiḥ deva bhūtaiḥ anya lokadhātu āgataiḥ ca saṃbahulaiḥ bodhisattva mahāsattva niyutaiḥ

original: sārdhaṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaṃ gṛhītvā tūryaśatairvādyamānaiśchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiratyucchritābhiḥ
analyzed: sārdham puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepanam gṛhītvā tūrya śataiḥ vādyamānaiḥ chatra dhvaja ghaṇṭā patākābhiḥ ati ucchritābhiḥ

original: mahāmālyābhinirhāramādāya bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagāma /
analyzed: mahā mālya abhinirhāram ādāya bhagavataḥ pūjā karmaṇe yena gṛdhrakūṭa parvataḥ yena ca bhagavān tena upajagāma

original: upetya ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ
analyzed: upetya ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ

original: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaistūryatālāvacaraiḥ pravādyamānairmahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepanaiḥ tūrya tālāvacaraiḥ pravādyamānaiḥ mahatīm pūjām kṛtvā

original: ekānte nyaṣīdat sagauravaḥ sapratīśo dharmaparipṛcchāyai //
analyzed: ekānte nyaṣīdat sa gauravaḥ sa pratīśaḥ dharma paripṛcchāyai

original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat pṛccheyam aham bhagavantam

original: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt
analyzed: tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham kaṃcid eva pradeśam saced me bhagavān avakāśam kuryāt

original: pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
analyzed: pṛṣṭa praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ kumāra tathāgatamarhataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi /
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam etat avocat pṛccha tvam kumāra tathāgatam arhatam samyaksaṃbuddham yat yat eva ākāṅkṣasi

original: nityakṛtaste kumāra tathāgatenāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: nitya kṛtaḥ te kumāra tathāgatena avakāśaḥ

original: evamukte candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - katibhirbhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ  #
analyzed: evam ukte candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat katibhiḥ bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitam

original: samādhiṃ pratilabhate?
analyzed: samādhim pratilabhate

original: evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kumāra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ  #
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam etat avocat caturbhiḥ kumāra dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitam

original: samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: samādhim pratilabhate

original: katamaiścaturbhiḥ?
analyzed: katamaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sūrato bhavati suvisaṃvāso dānto dāntabhūmimanuprāptaḥ /
analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sūrataḥ bhavati su visaṃvāsaḥ dāntaḥ dānta bhūmim anuprāptaḥ

original: sa parairākruṣṭo vā paribhāṣito vā duruktānāṃ durbhāṣitānāṃ vacanapathānāṃ kṣamo bhavatyadhivāsanajātīyaḥ karmadarśī nihatamāno dharmakāmaḥ
analyzed: sa paraiḥ ākruṣṭaḥ vā paribhāṣitaḥ vā duruktānām durbhāṣitānām vacana pathānām kṣamaḥ bhavati adhivāsana jātīyaḥ karma darśī nihata mānaḥ dharma kāmaḥ

original: anena kumāra prathamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaḥ samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: anena kumāra prathamena dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imaḥ samādhim pratilabhate

original: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlavān bhavati /
analyzed: punar aparam kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ śīlavān bhavati

original: pariśuddhaśīlaḥ (Vaidya 104)
analyzed: pariśuddha śīlaḥ vaidya

original: akhaṇḍaśīlaḥ acchidraśīlaḥ aśabalaśīlaḥ akalmaṣaśīlaḥ acyutaśīlaḥ anāvilaśīlaḥ agarhitaśīlaḥ
analyzed: akhaṇḍa śīlaḥ acchidra śīlaḥ aśabala śīlaḥ akalmaṣa śīlaḥ acyuta śīlaḥ anāvila śīlaḥ agarhita śīlaḥ

original: abhyudgataśīlaḥ aniśritaśīlaḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlaḥ anupalambhaśīlaḥ āryapraśastaśīlo vijñapraśastaśīlaḥ /
analyzed: abhyudgata śīlaḥ a niśrita śīlaḥ a parāmṛṣṭa śīlaḥ anupalambha śīlaḥ ārya praśasta śīlaḥ vijña praśasta śīlaḥ

original: anena kumāra dvitīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ima samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: anena kumāra dvitīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ samādhim pratilabhate

original: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvastraidhātuke uttrastacitto bhavati saṃtrastacitto nirviṇṇacitto niḥsaraṇacittaḥ /
analyzed: punar aparam kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ traidhātuke uttrasta cittaḥ bhavati saṃtrasta cittaḥ nirviṇṇa cittaḥ niḥsaraṇa cittaḥ

original: anarthikaḥ anabhirataḥ anadhyavasitaḥ anabhiṣaktaḥ /
analyzed: anarthikaḥ an abhirataḥ an adhyavasitaḥ an abhiṣaktaḥ

original: sarvatraidhātuke udvignamānasaḥ /
analyzed: sarva traidhātuke udvigna mānasaḥ

original: anyatra traidhātukāt sattvāni mocayiṣyāmīti vyāyamate /
analyzed: anyatra traidhātukāt sattvāni mocayiṣyāmi iti vyāya mate

original: samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: samudāgacchati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: anena kumāra tṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: anena kumāra tṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam samādhim pratilabhate

original: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāddho bhavati /
analyzed: punar aparam kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ śrāddhaḥ bhavati

original: atṛpto bhavati dharmaparyeṣṭyām /
analyzed: atṛptaḥ bhavati dharma paryeṣṭyām

original: bahuśruto bhavati /
analyzed: bahu śrutaḥ bhavati

original: viśārado bhavati /
analyzed: viśāradaḥ bhavati

original: dharmakāmaśca dharmagurukaḥ /
analyzed: dharma kāmaḥ ca dharma gurukaḥ

original: na lābhasatkāraślokaguruko
analyzed: na lābha satkāra śloka gurukaḥ

original: na jñānagurukaḥ /
analyzed: na jñāna gurukaḥ

original: yathāśrutāṃśca dharmān yathāparyavāptān parebhyaśca vistareṇa deśayati saṃprakāśayati hitavastupūrvagamena cittena na jñātralābhakāmanayā /
analyzed: yathā śrutān ca dharmān yathā paryavāptān parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa deśayati saṃprakāśayati hita vastu pūrva gamena cittena na jñātra lābha kāmanayā

original: api tu khalu punaḥ kimitīme sattvā imān dharmān śrutvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
analyzed: api tu khalu punar kim iti ime sattvāḥ imān dharmān śrutvā a vinivartanīyāḥ bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ iti

original: anena kumāra caturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate //
analyzed: anena kumāra caturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam samādhim pratilabhate

original: ebhiḥ kumāra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ
analyzed: ebhiḥ kumāra caturbhiḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitam

original: samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhibhabhisaṃbudhyate /
analyzed: samādhim pratilabhate kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhibhiḥ abhisaṃbudhyate

original: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahubuddhadeśito bahubuddhavarṇito bahubuddhasaṃprakāśito bahubuddhapravicitaḥ
analyzed: tat anena api te kumāra paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam yathā ayam samādhiḥ bahu buddha deśitaḥ bahu buddha varṇitaḥ bahu buddha saṃprakāśitaḥ bahu buddha pravicitaḥ

original: bahūnāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikānmayā pravrajitvā ayaṃ kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ
analyzed: bahūnām ca buddhānām bhagavatām antikāt mayā pravrajitvā ayam kumāra sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitaḥ

original: samādhirvistareṇa śruta udgṛhītaḥ pṛṣṭo dhārito vācitaḥ pravartito 'raṇabhāvanayā
analyzed: samādhiḥ vistareṇa śrutaḥ udgṛhītaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ dhāritaḥ vācitaḥ pravartitaḥ araṇa bhāvanayā

original: bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvitaḥ bahulīkṛtaḥ parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavānimameva bahubuddhanirhārasamādhimukhaṃ pūrvayogakathānirdeśaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān imam eva bahu buddha nirhāra samādhi mukham pūrva yoga kathā nirdeśam

original: bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya vistareṇa gāthābhigītena
analyzed: bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyām velāyām candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya vistareṇa gāthā abhigītena

original: saṃprakāśayati sma -
analyzed: saṃprakāśayati sma

original: smarāmi kalpe 'tuliyāprameye yadā jino āsi svarāṅgaghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: smarāmi kalpe atuliya aprameye yadā āsi svara aṅga ghoṣaḥ

original: svarāṅgaghoṣasya tathāgatasya varṣaṃ śatā ṣaṣṭi abhūṣi āyuḥ // SRS_17.1 //
analyzed: svarāṅgaghoṣasya tathāgatasya varṣam āyuḥ

original: tasyānu buddho parimeṇa āsīt jñāneśvaro nāma narāṇamuttamaḥ /
analyzed: tasya anu buddhaḥ parimeṇaḥ āsīt jñāneśvaraḥ nāma narāṇam uttamaḥ

original: jñāneśvarasya dvipadottamasya varṣaṃ sahasrā daśa dvau ca āyuḥ // SRS_17.2 //
analyzed: jñāneśvarasya dvipada uttamasya varṣam sahasrāḥ daśa dvau ca āyuḥ

original: jñāneśvarasyāpi pareṇa buddho tejeśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: jñāneśvarasya api pareṇa buddho tejeśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 105)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tejeśvarasya dvipadottamasya ṣaṭsaptatī varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.3 //
analyzed: tejeśvarasya dvipada uttamasya ṣaṭsaptatī varṣa sahasre āyuḥ

original: tejeśvarasyoparatena buddho matīśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: teja īśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ matīśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: matīśvarasya dvipadottamasya varṣāṇa koṭī paripūrṇa āyuḥ // SRS_17.4 //
analyzed: matīśvarasya dvipada uttamasya varṣāṇa koṭī paripūrṇa āyuḥ

original: matīśvarasyoparatena buddho brahmeśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: matīśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ brahmeśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: brahmeśvarasya dvipadottamasya caturdaśo varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.5 //
analyzed: brahmeśvarasya dvipada uttamasya caturdaśaḥ varṣa sahasraḥ āyuḥ

original: brahmeśvarasyoparatena buddho agnīśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: brahma īśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ agnīśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: agnīśvarasya dvipadottamasya ṣaṣṭistadā varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.6 //
analyzed: agnīśvarasya dvipada uttamasya ṣaṣṭiḥ tadā varṣa sahasre āyuḥ

original: agnīśvarasyoparatena buddho brahmānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: agni īśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ brahmānanaḥ nāma jinaḥ

original: brahmānanasya dvipadottamasya rātriṃdivā sapta abhūṣi āyuḥ // SRS_17.7 //
analyzed: brahma ānanasya dvipada uttamasya rātriṃdivā sapta abhūṣi āyuḥ

original: brahmānanasyoparatena buddho gaṇeśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: brahma ānanasya uparatena buddhaḥ gaṇeśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: gaṇeśvarasya dvipadottamasya ṣaḍvarṣakoṭyaḥ paripūrṇa āyuḥ // SRS_17.8 //
analyzed: gaṇeśvarasya dvipada uttamasya ṣaṣ varṣa koṭyaḥ paripūrṇaḥ āyuḥ

original: gaṇeśvarasyoparatena buddho ghoṣeśvaro nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: gaṇeśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ ghoṣeśvaraḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: ghoṣeśvarasya dvipadottamasya navavarṣakoṭyaḥ paripūrṇa āyuḥ // SRS_17.9 //
analyzed: ghoṣeśvarasya dvipada uttamasya nava varṣa koṭyaḥ paripūrṇaḥ āyuḥ

original: ghoṣeśvarasyoparatena buddho ghoṣānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: ghoṣeśvarasya uparatena buddhaḥ ghoṣānanaḥ nāma jinaḥ

original: ghoṣānanasya dvipadottamasya daśavarṣakoṭyaḥ paripūrṇa āyuḥ // SRS_17.10 //
analyzed: ghoṣa ānanasya dvipada uttamasya daśa varṣa koṭyaḥ paripūrṇaḥ āyuḥ

original: (Vaidya 106)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ghoṣānanasyoparatena buddhaścandrānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: ghoṣa ānanasya uparatena buddhaḥ candrānanaḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: candrānanasya dvipadottamasya rātriṃdivā eka abhūṣi āyuḥ // SRS_17.11 //
analyzed: candrānanasya dvipada uttamasya rātriṃdivā eka abhūṣi āyuḥ

original: candrānanasyoparatena buddhaḥ sūryānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: candrānanasya uparatena buddhaḥ sūryānanaḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: sūryānanasya dvipadottamasya aṣṭādaśo varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.12 //
analyzed: sūryānanasya dvipada uttamasya aṣṭādaśaḥ varṣa sahasraḥ āyuḥ

original: sūryānanasyoparatena buddho brahmānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: sūrya ānanasya uparatena buddhaḥ brahmānanaḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: brahmānanasya dvipadottamasya triviṃśati varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.13 //
analyzed: brahmānanasya dvipada uttamasya triviṃśati varṣa sahasra āyuḥ

original: brahmānanasyoparatena buddho brahmaśravo nāma jino abhūṣi /
analyzed: brahma ānanasya uparatena buddhaḥ brahmaśravaḥ nāma jinaḥ abhūṣi

original: brahmaśravasya dvipadottamasya aṣṭādaśo varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.14 //
analyzed: brahmaśravasya dvipada uttamasya aṣṭādaśaḥ varṣa sahasra āyuḥ

original: ekasmi kalpasmi ime upannā duve śate lokavināyakānām /
analyzed: ekasmi kalpasmi ime upannā duve śate loka vināyakānām

original: śruṇohi nāmāniha kīrtayiṣye anābhibhūtān tathāgatānām // SRS_17.15 //
analyzed: śruṇohi nāmān iha kīrtayiṣye an ābhibhūtān tathāgatānām

original: anantaghoṣaśca vighuṣṭaghoṣo vighuṣṭatejaśca vighuḥṭaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: ananta ghoṣaḥ ca vighuṣṭa ghoṣaḥ vighuṣṭa tejaḥ ca vighuḥṭa śabdaḥ

original: svarāvighuṣṭaśca svarārcitaśca svarāṅgaśūraśca svarāṅgaśabdaḥ // SRS_17.16 //
analyzed: svarāvighuṣṭaḥ ca svarārcitaḥ ca svarāṅgaśūraḥ ca svarāṅgaśabdaḥ

original: jñānābalo jñānaviśeṣagaśca jñānābhibhūrjñānasamudgataśca /
analyzed: jñānābalaḥ jñāna viśeṣagaḥ ca jñānābhibhūḥ jñānasamudgataḥ ca

original: jñānārcimān jñānaabhyudgataśca vighuṣṭajñānastatha jñānaśūraḥ // SRS_17.17 //
analyzed: jñāna arcimān jñāna abhyudgataḥ ca vighuṣṭa jñānaḥ tathā jñāna śūraḥ

original: brahmābalo brahmavasuḥ subrahma brahmā ca devastatha brahmaghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: brahmā abalaḥ brahmavasuḥ subrahma brahmā ca devaḥ tathā brahmaghoṣaḥ

original: (Vaidya 107)
analyzed: vaidya

original: brahmeśvaro brahmanarendranetre brahmasvarāṅgaḥ svarabrahmadattaḥ // SRS_17.18 //
tejobalastejavatiḥ sutejāḥ tejeśvarastejasamudrataśca /
analyzed: tejobalaḥ tejavatiḥ sutejāḥ tejeśvaraḥ tejasamudrataḥ ca

original: tejovibhustejaviniścitaśca /
analyzed: tejaḥ vibhuḥ teja viniścitaḥ ca

original: tejasvarendraḥ suvighuṣṭatejāḥ // SRS_17.19 //
analyzed: tejasvara indraḥ su vighuṣṭa tejāḥ

original: bhīṣmo balo bhīṣmamatiḥ subhīṣmo bhīṣmānano bhīṣmasamudrataśca /
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ balaḥ bhīṣma matiḥ su bhīṣmaḥ bhīṣma ānanaḥ bhīṣma samudrataḥ ca

original: bhīṣmārci rbhīṣmottaru rbhīṣmaghoṣā ete jinā lokavināyakā 'bhūt // SRS_17.20 //
analyzed: bhīṣma arciḥ bhīṣma uttaruḥ bhīṣma ghoṣāḥ ete jināḥ loka vināyakāḥ abhūt

original: gambhīraghoṣaḥ śiridhāraṇaśca viśuddhaghoṣeśvaru śuddhaghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: gambhīra ghoṣaḥ śiri dhāraṇaḥ ca śuddha ghoṣaḥ

original: anantaghoṣaḥ suvimuktaghoṣo māro balo māravitrāsanaśca // SRS_17.21 //
analyzed: ananta ghoṣaḥ su vimukta ghoṣaḥ māraḥ balaḥ māra vitrāsanaḥ ca

original: sunetra śuddhānanu netraśuddho viśuddhanetraśca anantanetraḥ /
analyzed: sunetra netraśuddhaḥ viśuddhanetraḥ ca ananta netraḥ

original: samantanetraśca vighuṣṭanetro netrābhibhūrnetra aninditaśca // SRS_17.22 //
analyzed: samantanetraḥ ca vighuṣṭanetraḥ netrābhibhūḥ netra aninditaḥ ca

original: dāntottaro dānta sudāntacittaḥ sudānta śāntedriya śāntamānasaḥ /
analyzed: dānta uttaraḥ dānta su dānta cittaḥ su dānta śānta idriya śānta mānasaḥ

original: śāntottaraḥ śāntaśirī praśāntaḥ śāntīya pāraṃgatu śāntiśūraḥ // SRS_17.23 //
analyzed: praśāntaḥ śāntīya śāntiśūraḥ

original: sthitottaraḥ śānta sudāntacittaḥ sudāntaśāntendriyu śāntamānasaḥ /
analyzed: sthita uttaraḥ su dānta cittaḥ śānta mānasaḥ

original: śāntottaraḥ śāntaśriyā jvalantaḥ śāntapraśānteśvaru śāntiśūraḥ // SRS_17.24 //

analyzed: katame catvāraḥ

analyzed: yaḥ hi kaścid kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam samādhim udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati

original: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pravartayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pravartayiṣyati uddekṣyati su ādhyāsyati parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati

original: tasyeme catvāro guṇānuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ //
analyzed: tasya ime catvāraḥ guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ

analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyāmi gāthāḥ abhāṣata

analyzed: caran sa paramām śuddhām viśiṣṭām bodhi cārikām

original: (Vaidya 128)

original: (Vaidya 129)
analyzed: vaidya

yāvacceme narendreṇa anuśaṃsāḥ prakāśitāḥ // SRS_18.17 //
analyzed: yāvat ca ime narendreṇa anuśaṃsāḥ prakāśitāḥ

analyzed: parindāmi imām bodhim yā me kṛchreṇa sparśitā

original: (Vaidya 132)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 19 Acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma nirdeśa parivartaḥ

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imam samādhim ākāṅkṣatā acintya buddha dharma nirdeśa kuśalena bhavitavyam

original: acintyabuddhadharmaparipṛcchakajātikena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma paripṛcchaka jātikena bhavitavyam

original: acintyabuddhadharmādhimuktikena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma adhimuktikena bhavitavyam

original: acintyabuddhadharmaparyeṣaṇākuśalena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma paryeṣaṇā kuśalena bhavitavyam

original: acintyāṃśca buddhadharmān śrutvā nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
analyzed: acintyān ca buddha dharmān śrutvā na uttrasitavyam na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam

original: evamukte candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - yathā kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśakuśalo bhavati,
analyzed: evam ukte candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat yathā katham bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ acintya buddha dharma nirdeśa kuśalaḥ bhavati

original: acintyabuddhadharmaparipṛcchākuśalaśca,
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma paripṛcchā kuśalaḥ ca

original: acintyabuddhadharmādhimuktaśca?
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma adhimuktaḥ ca

original: acintyabuddhadharmaparyeṣaṇākuśalaśca bhavati,
analyzed: a cintya buddha dharma paryeṣaṇā kuśalaḥ ca bhavati

original: acintyāṃśca buddhadharmān śratvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate?
analyzed: acintyān ca buddha dharmān śratvā na uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśikho nāma gandharvaputraḥ pañcabhistūryaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ gaganatalādavatīrya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthito 'bhūdupasthānaparicaryāyai
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena pañcaśikhaḥ nāma gandharva putraḥ pañcabhiḥ tūrya śataiḥ sārdham gagana talāt avatīrya bhagavataḥ puratas sthitaḥ abhūt upasthāna paricaryāyai

original: atha khalu pañcaśikhasya gandharvaputrasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ yathaivaḥ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ śakrasya ca devānāmindrasya sudharmāyāṃ  #
analyzed: atha khalu pañcaśikhasya gandharva putrasya etat abhavat yat nu aham devānām trāyastriṃśānām śakrasya ca devānām indrasya sudharmāyām

original: devasabhāyāmupasthānaparicaryāṃ karomi,
analyzed: deva sabhāyām upasthāna paricaryām karomi

original: saṃgītiṃ saṃprayojayāmi,
analyzed: saṃgītim saṃprayojayāmi

original: tathaivādya devātidevasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjāyai saṃgītiṃ saṃprayojayeyam //
analyzed: tathā eva adya devātidevasya api tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjāyai saṃgītim saṃprayojayeyam

original: atha khalu pañcaśikho gandharvaputrastaiḥ pañcabhistūryaśataistaiśca pañcamātrairgandharvaputraśataiḥ
analyzed: atha khalu pañcaśikhaḥ gandharva putraḥ taiḥ pañcabhiḥ tūrya śataiḥ taiḥ ca pañca mātraiḥ gandharva putra śataiḥ

original: sārdhamekasvarasaṃgītisaṃprayuktābhistūryasaṃgītibhirvaidūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇāmādāya bhagavataḥ purato vādayāmāsa /
analyzed: sārdham eka svara saṃgīti saṃprayuktābhiḥ tūrya saṃgītibhiḥ vaidūrya daṇḍām vīṇām ādāya bhagavataḥ puratas vādayāmāsa

original: atha khalu bhagavata etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskuryāṃ
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ etat abhūt yat nu aham tathārūpam ṛddhi abhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskuryām

original: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto 'cintyabuddhadharmanidhyaptikauśalyamadhigacchet,
analyzed: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhi abhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ acintya buddha dharma nidhi apti kauśalyam adhigacchet

original: sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitācca samādherna calet /
analyzed: sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitāt ca samādheḥ na calet

original: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharvaputrasya tantrīsvaragītisvarakauśalyamupadiśeyam //
analyzed: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharva putrasya tantrī svara gīti svara kauśalyam upadiśeyam

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskaroti sma,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tathārūpam ṛddhi abhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma

original: yattebhyaḥ pañcabhyastūryaśatebhyaḥ saṃprayuktebhyaḥ pravāditebhyo yathānakumpopasaṃhṛtaḥ śabdo niścarati dharmapratisaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yattebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ tūrya śatebhyaḥ saṃprayuktebhyaḥ pravāditebhyaḥ yathā nakumpa upasaṃhṛtaḥ śabdaḥ niścarati dharma pratisaṃyuktaḥ

original: imāśca buddhadharmanidhyaptigāthā niścaranti buddhānubhāvena -
analyzed: imāḥ ca buddha dharma nidhi apti gāthāḥ niścaranti buddha anubhāvena

original: ekahi vālapathe bahubuddhā yāttika vālika gaṅganadīye /
analyzed: ekahi vālapathe bahu buddhāḥ yāttika vālika gaṅganadīye

original: (Vaidya 133)
analyzed: vaidya

original: kṣetraṃ tāttika teṣa jinānāṃ te ca vilakṣaṇa te visabhāgāḥ // SRS_19.1 //
analyzed: kṣetram jinānām te ca

original: pañcagatīgata bālapathasmin nairayikā pi ca tiryagatāśca /
analyzed: bāla pathasmin ca

original: te yamalaukika devamanuṣyā nāpi ca saṃkaru no ca upīḍo // SRS_19.2 //
analyzed: te deva manuṣyāḥ

original: tatra pade sasarāḥ sasamudrāḥ sarva nadī tatha utsa taḍāgāḥ /
analyzed: tatra pade sasarāḥ sasamudrāḥ sarva nadī tatha utsa taḍāgāḥ

original: no pi ca saṃkaru no ca upīḍo evamacintiyu dharma jinānām // SRS_19.3 //
analyzed: ca ca

original: tatra pade 'pi ca parvata neke cakravāla api meru sumeru /
analyzed: tatra pade api ca parvata neke cakravāla api meru sumeru

original: ye mucilinda mahāmucilinda vindhyatha gṛdhrakūṭo himavāṃśca // SRS_19.4 //
analyzed: ye mucilinda mahāmucilinda vindhī atha gṛdhrakūṭaḥ himavān ca

original: tatra pade nirayāśca sughorāstapana pratāpana ānabhiramyāḥ /
analyzed: tatra pade nirayāḥ ca su ghorāḥ tapana

original: tatra ca ye niraye upapannā vedana te pi dukhāṃ anubhonti // SRS_19.5 //
analyzed: tatra ca ye niraye upapannāḥ te pi dukhām anubhonti

original: tatra pade 'pi ca devavimānā dvādaśayojana te ramaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: tatra pade api ca deva vimānāḥ dvādaśa yojana te ramaṇīyāḥ

original: teṣu bahū marutān sahasrā divyaratīṣu sukhānyanubhonti // SRS_19.6 //
analyzed: teṣu bahū sahasrā divya ratīṣu sukhāni anubhonti

original: tatra pade ca buddhāna utpādo śāsanu lokavidūna jvaleti /
analyzed: tatra pade ca

original: taṃ ca na paśyati jñānavihīno yena na śodhita carya viśuddhā // SRS_19.7 //
analyzed: tam ca na paśyati jñāna vihīnaḥ yena na viśuddhā

original: tatra pade 'pi ca dharma niruddho nirvṛtu nāyaku śrūyati śabdaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pade api ca śrūyati śabdaḥ

original: tatra pade 'pi ca keci śṛṇonti tiṣṭhati nāyaku bhāṣati dharmam // SRS_19.8 //
analyzed: tatra pade api ca bhāṣati dharmam

original: tatra pade 'pi ca keṣacidāyurvarṣa acintiya vartati saṃjñā /
analyzed: tatra pade api ca vartati saṃjñā

original: (Vaidya 134)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tatra pade 'pi vā kālu karonti no ciru jīvati śrūyati śabdaḥ // SRS_19.9 //
analyzed: tatra pade api vā kālu karonti no ciru jīvati śrūyati śabdaḥ

original: tatra pade 'pi ca keṣaci saṃjñā dṛṣṭu tathāgatu pūjitu buddho /
analyzed: tatra pade api ca saṃjñā

original: toṣitu mānasu saṃjñagraheṇa no pi ca pūjitu no ca upanno // SRS_19.10 //
analyzed: saṃjña graheṇa no pi ca pūjitu no ca

original: svasmi gṛhe supineva manuṣyo kāmaguṇeṣu ratīranubhūya /
analyzed: gṛhe su pinā iva kāma guṇeṣu ratīḥ anubhūya

original: sa pratibuddhu na paśyati kāmāṃstacca prajānati so supino ti // SRS_19.11 //
analyzed: sa pratibuddhu na paśyati kāmān tat ca prajānati saḥ supinaḥ ti

original: yat tatha dṛṣṭu śruta mata jñātaṃ sarvamidaṃ vitathaṃ supino vā /
analyzed: yat tatha dṛṣṭu śruta mata jñātam sarvam idam vitatham vā

original: yastu bhaveta samādhiya lābhī so imu jānati dharmasvabhāvān // SRS_19.12 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu bhaveta lābhī

original: sūsukhitāḥ sada te nara loke yeṣa priyāpriyu nāsti kahiṃcit /
analyzed: sūsukhitāḥ te nara loke na asti kahiṃcid

original: ye vanakandarake 'bhiramanti śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti // SRS_19.13 //
analyzed: ye vana kandarake abhiramanti śrāmaṇakam su sukham anubhonti

original: yeṣa mamāpi tu nāsti kahiṃcid yeṣa parigrahu sarvaśu nāsti /
analyzed: mama api tu na asti kahiṃcid na asti

analyzed: loke te gagane pavanā iva vrajanti

original: bhāvitu mārga pravartitu jñānaṃ śūnyaka dharma nirātmanu sarve /
analyzed: mārga pravartitu jñānam sarve

original: yena vibhāvita bhontimi dharmāstasya bhavet pratibhānamanantam // SRS_19.15 //
analyzed: dharmāḥ tasya bhavet pratibhānam anantam

original: sūsukhitā bata te nara kole yeṣa na sajjati mānasu loke /
analyzed: sūsukhitāḥ bata te nara kole na sajjati

original: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣviha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriyu vidyati saṅgo // SRS_19.16 //
analyzed: vāyu samam teṣu iha cittam na u ca saṅgo

original: (Vaidya 135)
analyzed: vaidya

original: apriyu ye dukhitehi nivāso ye hi priyā dukhi tehi viyogo /
analyzed: nivāsaḥ ye hi priyāḥ tehi viyogaḥ

original: anta ubhe api eti jahitvā te sukhitā nara ye rata dharme // SRS_19.17 //
analyzed: anta ubhe api eti jahitvā te sukhitā nara ye rata dharme

original: ye anunīyati śrutvimi dharmān sa pratihanyati śrutva adharmam /
analyzed: dharmān sa pratihanyati śrutvā adharmam

original: so madamānahato viparīto mānavaśena dukhi anubhoti // SRS_19.18 //
analyzed: saḥ mada māna hataḥ viparītaḥ māna vaśena anubhoti

original: ye samatāya pratiṣṭhita bhonti nityamanunnata nāvanatāśca /
analyzed: ye samatāya bhonti nityam an unnata na avanatāḥ ca

analyzed: ye priyataḥ apriyataḥ ca su muktāḥ te mukta manāḥ viharanti

analyzed: śīle su upari śuddhe dhyāne pratiṣṭhitu nityam acintye

original: ye vanakandari śānti ramante teṣa na vidyati vīmati jātu // SRS_19.20 //
analyzed: ye vana kandari śānti ramante na vidyati jātu

original: asmin khalu punargāthābhinirhāre bhāṣyamāṇe candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ acintyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu gambhīranidhyaptinirdeśakauśalyamanuprāptaḥ,
analyzed: asmin khalu punar gāthā abhinirhāre bhāṣyamāṇe candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ acintyeṣu buddha dharmeṣu gambhīra nidhi apti nirdeśa kauśalyam anuprāptaḥ

original: sūtrāntanirhārāvabhāsaṃ ca pratilabdhavān /

original: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharvaputrasya ghoṣānugāyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
analyzed: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharva putrasya ghoṣānugāyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ abhūt

original: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni /
analyzed: aprameyāṇām ca sattvānām deva mānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpannāni

original: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto 'bhūta //
analyzed: aprameyāṇām ca sattvānām arthaḥ kṛtaḥ abhūta

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśaparivarto nāmonaviṃśatitamaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśaparivartaḥ nāma ūnaviṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 136)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 20 Indraketudhvajarājaparivartaḥ //
analyzed: indraketu dhvaja rāja parivartaḥ

original: tatra khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvakuśalamūlaśikṣāguṇadharmaniśritena  #
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva kuśala mūla śikṣā guṇa dharma niśritena  /

original: bhavitavyam /
analyzed: bhavitavyam

original: asaṃsargabahulena ca bhavitavyam,
analyzed: a saṃsarga bahulena ca bhavitavyam

original: pāpamitraparivarjakena kalyāṇamitrasaṃniśritena paripṛcchakajātīyena dharmaparyeṣṭyāmatṛptena
analyzed: pāpa mitra parivarjakena kalyāṇa mitra saṃniśritena paripṛcchaka jātīyena dharma paryeṣṭyām atṛptena

original: prāmodyabahulena dharmārthikena dharmakāmena dharmaratena dharmaparigrāhakeṇa dharmānudharmapratipannena /
analyzed: prāmodya bahulena dharma arthikena dharma kāmena dharma ratena dharma parigrāhakeṇa dharma anudharma pratipannena

original: śāstṛsaṃjñā anena sarvabodhisattveṣūtpādayitavyā /
analyzed: śāstṛ saṃjñā anena sarva bodhisattveṣu utpādayitavyā

original: yasya cāntikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇoti,
analyzed: yasya ca antikāt imam dharmaparyāyam śṛṇoti

original: tena tasyāntike prītigauravaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñā cotpāditavyā/
analyzed: tena tasya antike prīti gauravam śāstṛ saṃjñā ca utpāditavyā

original: yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān dharmān samādāya vartate,
analyzed: yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān samādāya vartate

original: sa kṣipramanācchedyapratibhāvaniryāto bhavati /
analyzed: sa kṣipram an ācchedya pratibhāva niryātaḥ bhavati

original: acintyabuddhadharmādhimuktaśca bhavati /
analyzed: acintya buddha dharma adhimuktaḥ ca bhavati

original: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchati /
analyzed: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu nidhi aptim gacchati

original: ālokabhūtaśca bhavati sadevakasya lokasya kāṅkṣāvimativicikitsāndhakāravidhamanatayā //
analyzed: āloka bhūtaḥ ca bhavati sa devakasya lokasya kāṅkṣā vimati vicikitsā andhakāra vidhamana tayā

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: abhyatīta bahukalpakoṭiyo aprameya atulā acintiyāḥ /
analyzed: aprameya atulāḥ acintiyāḥ

original: yad abhūṣi dvipadānamuttamo indraketudhvajarāja nāyakaḥ // SRS_20.1 //
analyzed: yat indra ketu dhvaja rāja nāyakaḥ

original: so samādhimimu śāntu deśayi yatra nāsti naru jīva pudgalaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ samādhim imu śāntu deśayi yatra na asti jīva pudgalaḥ

original: māya budbuda marīci vidyutā sarva dharma dakacandrasaṃnibhāḥ // SRS_20.2 //
analyzed: budbuda marīci vidyutā sarva daka candra saṃnibhāḥ

original: nāsti sattva manujo ca labhyate kālu kṛtva paraloki gacchi yo /
analyzed: na asti sattva manujaḥ ca labhyate

original: no ca karma kṛtu vipraṇaśyate kṛṣṇa śukla phala deti tādṛśam // SRS_20.3 //
analyzed: no ca karma kṛtu vipraṇaśyate kṛṣṇa śukla phala dā iti tādṛśam

original: eṣa yukti nayadvāra bhadrakaṃ sūkṣma durdṛśu jināna gocarā /
analyzed: sūkṣma gocarā

original: yatra akṣarapadaṃ na labhyate buddhabodhi bhagavān prajānati // SRS_20.4 //
analyzed: yatra akṣara padam na labhyate buddha bodhi bhagavān prajānati

original: (Vaidya 137)
analyzed: vaidya

original: dhāraṇī vipulajñānasaṃcayā sūtrakoṭiniyutāna āgatā /
analyzed: dhāraṇī vipula jñāna saṃcayā āgatā

original: buddhakoṭiniyutāna gocarastaṃ samādhi bhagavān prabhāṣate // SRS_20.5 //
analyzed: gocaraḥ tam samādhi bhagavān prabhāṣate

original: āturāṇamaya vyādhimocako bodhisattvasamudānitaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: vyādhi mocakaḥ bodhisattva samudānitam dhanam

original: sarvabuddhastuta saṃprakāśito devakoṭiniyutehi pūjitaḥ // SRS_20.6 //
analyzed: sarva buddha stuta saṃprakāśitaḥ deva koṭi niyutehi pūjitaḥ

original: sarva bālajana bhūtacodanā tīrthikehi parivarjitaḥ sadā /
analyzed: sarva bāla jana bhūta codanā tīrthikehi parivarjitaḥ sadā

original: śreṣṭha śīladhanu buddhavarṇitaṃ vidyuteva gagane na lipyate // SRS_20.7 //
analyzed: śreṣṭha śīla dhanu buddha varṇitam vidyutā iva gagane na lipyate

original: yehi pūjita jināna koṭiyo dānaśīlacaritā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: koṭiyaḥ dāna śīla caritāḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: pāpamitra puri yehi varjitā teṣa paitṛkadhanaṃ niruttaram // SRS_20.8 //
analyzed: puri paitṛka dhanam niruttaram

original: tatra bhikṣu sthitu dharmabhāṇako brahmacāri sugatasya aurasaḥ /
analyzed: tatra bhikṣu dharma bhāṇakaḥ brahmacāri sugatasya aurasaḥ

original: (Vaidya 145)

analyzed: kāyaḥ nirabhilāpyaḥ me durvijñeyaḥ nidarśitaḥ

original: (Vaidya 147)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: tathāgata acintya nirdeśa parivartaḥ

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra yaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kim iti aham catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryām iti

original: katamāścatasraḥ?

original: imāścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti,
analyzed: imāḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryām iti

original: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ partavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo
analyzed: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayam samādhiḥ udgrahītavyaḥ dhārayitavyaḥ vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ su ādhyātavyaḥ

original: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /

analyzed: imāḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ dharma pratisaṃvidaḥ evam pratisaṃśikṣate yāvantaḥ vā rūpa vyāhārāḥ tāvantaḥ tathāgatasya varṇa vyāhārāḥ

original: iti hi kumāra aparyantā anantā rūpavyāhārāḥ /
analyzed: iti hi kumāra aparyantāḥ anantāḥ rūpa vyāhārāḥ

analyzed: iti hi anantāḥ aparyantāḥ acintyāḥ vijñāna vyāhārāḥ

analyzed: evam acintyāḥ tathāgatasya varṇa vyāhārāḥ

analyzed: iti hi kumāra aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃskṛte doṣāḥ

analyzed: aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ nirvāṇe anuśaṃsāḥ
