original: durlabhā śāsane śraddhā pravrajyā upasaṃpadā // SRS_24.61 //
analyzed: durlabhā śāsane śraddhā pravrajyā upasaṃpadā

original: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittaṃ bodhāya nāmitam /
analyzed: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittam bodhāya nāmitam

original: mā cala tvaṃ pratijñāyāstiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu // SRS_24.62 //
analyzed: mā cala tvam pratijñāyāḥ tiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu

original: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāle upasthite /
analyzed: yaḥ idam dhārayet sūtram kṣaya kāle upasthite

original: pratibhānaṃ labhet kṣipraṃ pravṛttaṃ yadi dhārayet // SRS_24.63 //
analyzed: pratibhānam labhet kṣipram pravṛttam yadi dhārayet

original: ekagāthāṃ pi dhāritvā puṇyaskandho acintiyaḥ /
analyzed: eka gāthām pi dhāritvā puṇya skandhaḥ acintiyaḥ

original: kiṃ vā punaḥ sarvasūtraṃ dhārayed yaḥ śrutārthikaḥ // SRS_24.64 //
analyzed: kim vā punar sarva sūtram dhārayet yaḥ śruta arthikaḥ

original: sarvasattvān bodhiprāptān pūjayed yo hyatandritaḥ /
analyzed: sarva sattvān bodhi prāptān pūjayet yaḥ hi atandritaḥ

original: yaḥ kuryād gauraveṇāsau kalpasattvopamān sadā // SRS_24.65 //
analyzed: yaḥ kuryāt gauraveṇa asau kalpa sattva upamān sadā

original: itaḥ samādhito yaśca gāthāmekāṃ pi dhārayet /
analyzed: itas samādhitaḥ yaḥ ca gāthām ekām dhārayet

original: sarvaṃ purimakaṃ puṇyaṃ kalāṃ nopaiti ṣoḍaśīm // SRS_24.66 //
analyzed: sarvam purimakam puṇyam kalām na upaiti ṣoḍaśīm

original: acintiyānānuśaṃsān buddhajñānena jānami /
analyzed: acinti yāna anuśaṃsān buddha jñānena

original: imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutveha yaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ na kariṣyati // SRS_24.67 //
analyzed: imam samādhim śrutvā iha yaḥ kāṅkṣām na kariṣyati

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje pratisaṃvidavatāraparivarto nāma caturviṃśatitamaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje pratisaṃvidavatāraparivartaḥ nāma caturviṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 155)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 25 Anumodanāparivartaḥ /
analyzed: anumodanā parivartaḥ

original: tatra bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakuśalena bhavitavyam
analyzed: tatra bhagavān punar eva candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhim kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upāya kuśalena bhavitavyam

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakuśalo bhavati?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ upāya kuśalaḥ bhavati

original: iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike jñātisaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva sattvānām antike jñāti saṃjñā utpādayitavyā

original: sarvasattvānāmantike jñāticittamupasthāpya yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhastat sarvamanumodayitavyam /
analyzed: sarva sattvānām antike jñāti cittam upasthāpya yaḥ sarva sattvānām kuśala mūla puṇya skandhaḥ tat sarvam anumodayitavyam

original: trirātryāstridivasasya sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhamanumodya sarvajñatārambaṇena cittotpādena teṣāmeva sarvasattvānāṃ niryātayitavyam
analyzed: tri rātryāḥ tri divasasya sarva sattvānām kuśala mūla puṇya skandham anumodya sarvajña tā ārambaṇena citta utpādena teṣām eva sarva sattvānām niryātayitavyam

original: anena kuśalamūlena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramimaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
analyzed: anena kuśala mūlena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram imam samādhim pratilabhate

original: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
analyzed: kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: sarve mama jñātaya eti sattvāḥ yasteṣamastī pṛthu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
analyzed: sarve mama jñātayaḥ eti sattvāḥ yaḥ teṣa mastī pṛthu puṇya skandhaḥ

original: rātrestrirevaṃ divasasya ca trīranumodamī emu janitva cittam // SRS_25.1 //
analyzed: rātreḥ tris evam divasasya ca trīḥ anumoda amī cittam

original: anumodamī ye suviśuddhaśīlā ye jīvitārthe na karonti pāpam /
analyzed: ye su viśuddha śīlāḥ ye jīvita arthe na karonti pāpam

original: adhimuktisaṃpanna ya bodhisattvā anumodamī teṣa ya kiṃci puṇyam // SRS_25.2 //
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ

original: anumodamī yeṣa prasādu buddhe dharme prasādo 'sti tathaiva saṃghe /
analyzed: buddhe dharme prasādaḥ asti tathā eva saṃghe

original: anumodamī ye sugatasya pūjāṃ kurvanti bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇāḥ // SRS_25.3 //
analyzed: ye sugatasya pūjām kurvanti bodhim pratikāṅkṣamāṇāḥ

original: anumodamī yeṣa na ātmadṛṣṭirna bhāvadṛṣṭirna ca jīvadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: naḥ ātma dṛṣṭiḥ na bhāva dṛṣṭiḥ na ca jīva dṛṣṭiḥ

original: (Vaidya 156)
analyzed: vaidya

original: anumodamī yeṣa na pāpadṛṣṭirye śūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭva janenti tuṣṭim // SRS_25.4 //
analyzed: na pāpa dṛṣṭiḥ ye śūnya tām dṛṣṭvā janenti tuṣṭim

original: anumodamī ye sugatasya śāsane labhanti pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ ca /
analyzed: ye sugatasya śāsane labhanti pravrajyā upasaṃpadam ca

original: alpeccha saṃtuṣṭa vane vasanti praśāntacāritra ye dhyānagocarāḥ // SRS_25.5 //
analyzed: vane vasanti praśānta cāritra ye dhyāna gocarāḥ

original: anumodamī ekaka ye 'dvitīyā vane vasantī sada khaḍgabhūtāḥ /
analyzed: ye advitīyāḥ vane khaḍga bhūtāḥ

original: ājīvaśuddhāḥ sada alpakṛtyā ye jñātrahetorna na karenti kūhanām // SRS_25.6 //
analyzed: ājīva śuddhāḥ alpa kṛtyāḥ ye jñātra hetoḥ na na kūhanām

original: anumodamī yeṣa na saṃstavo 'sti na cāpi īrṣyā na kuleṣu tṛṣṇā /
analyzed: na saṃstavaḥ asti na ca api īrṣyā na kuleṣu tṛṣṇā

original: uttrasti traidhātuki nityakālam anopaliptā vicaranti loke // SRS_25.7 //
analyzed: uttrasti traidhātuki nityakālam an upaliptāḥ vicaranti loke

original: anumodamī yeṣa prapañcu nāsti nirviṇṇa sarvāsu bhavopapattiṣu /
analyzed: na asti sarvāsu bhava upapattiṣu

original: avigṛhītā upaśāntacittā na durlabhasteṣa samādhireṣaḥ // SRS_25.8 //
analyzed: a vigṛhītāḥ upaśānta cittāḥ na durlabhaḥ samādhiḥ eṣaḥ

original: anumodamī ye gaṇadoṣa dṛṣṭvā sarvān vivādān parivarjayitvā /
analyzed: ye gaṇa doṣa dṛṣṭvā sarvān vivādān parivarjayitvā

original: sevantyaraṇyaṃ vanamūlamāśritā vimuktisārāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ // SRS_25.9 //
analyzed: sevanti araṇyam vana mūlam āśritāḥ vimukti sārāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ

original: anumodamī ye viharantyaraṇye nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsaye /
analyzed: anumodamī ye viharanti araṇye na ātmānam utkarṣi parān na paṃsaye

original: anumodamī yeṣa pramādu nāsti ye apramattā ima buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.10 //
analyzed: na asti ye a pramattāḥ buddha śāsane

original: yāvanta dharmāḥ pṛthu bodhipākṣikāḥ sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādaḥ /
analyzed: dharmāḥ pṛthu bodhi pākṣikāḥ sarveṣa mūlam hi ayam apramādaḥ

original: ye buddhaputrāḥ sada apramattā na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhiḥ // SRS_25.11 //
analyzed: ye buddha putrāḥ apramattāḥ na ayam samādhiḥ

original: nidhānalābhaḥ sugatāna śāsanaṃ pravrajyalābho dvitīyaṃ nidhānam /
analyzed: nidhāna lābhaḥ śāsanam pravrajya lābhaḥ dvitīyam nidhānam

original: (Vaidya 157)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śraddhāya lābhastṛtīyaṃ nidhānamayaṃ samādhiścaturthaṃ nidhānam // SRS_25.12 //
analyzed: śraddhāya lābhaḥ tṛtīyam nidhānam ayam samādhiḥ caturtham nidhānam

original: śratvā imaṃ śūnyata buddhagocaraṃ tasyāpratikṣepu nidhānalambhaḥ /
analyzed: śratvā imam śūnyata buddha gocaram tasya a pratikṣepu nidhāna lambhaḥ

original: anantu pratibhānu nidhānalambho yā dhāraṇī tat paramaṃ nidhānam // SRS_25.13 //
analyzed: anantu pratibhānu nidhāna lambhaḥ yā dhāraṇī tat paramam nidhānam

original: yāvanti dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
analyzed: yāvanti dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlam śrutam tyāgu tathā eva kṣāntiḥ

original: sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśitaḥ // SRS_25.14 //
analyzed: sarveṣa mūlam hi ayam apramādaḥ nidhāna lambhaḥ sugatena deśitaḥ

original: ye apramattā iha buddhaśāsane samyak ca yeṣāṃ praṇidhānamasti /
analyzed: ye apramattāḥ iha buddha śāsane samyak ca yeṣām praṇidhānam asti

original: na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhirāsannabhūtā iha buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.15 //
analyzed: na durlabhaḥ ayam samādhiḥ āsanna bhūtāḥ iha buddha śāsane

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje anumodanāparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje anumodanāparivartaḥ nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 158)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 26 Dānānuśaṃsāparivartaḥ /
analyzed: dāna anuśaṃsā parivartaḥ

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra apramatto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam,
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra apramattaḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam

original: apramattasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
analyzed: apramattasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavati anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ

original: kimaṅga punarayaṃ samādhiḥ /
analyzed: kim aṅga punar ayam samādhiḥ

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ apramatto bhavati?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ apramattaḥ bhavati

original: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati /
analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddha śīlaḥ bhavati

original: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvaḥ apramatto bhavati /
analyzed: iha kumāra pariśuddha śīlaḥ bodhisattvaḥ apramattaḥ bhavati

original: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati /
analyzed: iha kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddha śīlaḥ bhavati

original: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito bhavati sarvajñatācittena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu /
analyzed: iha kumāra pariśuddha śīlaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ avirahitaḥ bhavati sarvajña tā cittena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu

original: tasyeme ānuśaṃsā bhavanti /
analyzed: tasya ime ānuśaṃsāḥ bhavanti

original: tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
analyzed: tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru

original: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
analyzed: bhāṣiṣye aham te

original: deśeme kumāra anuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
analyzed: deśa ime kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: katame daśa?
analyzed: katame daśa

original: yaduta mātsaryakleśo 'sya nigṛhīto bhavati /
analyzed: yat uta mātsarya kleśaḥ asya nigṛhītaḥ bhavati

original: tyāgānubṛṃhitaṃ cāsya cittaṃ sadā bhavati /
analyzed: tyāga anubṛṃhitam ca asya cittam sadā bhavati

original: bahujanasādhāraṇebhyaśca bhogebhyaḥ sāramādadāti /
analyzed: bahu jana sādhāraṇebhyaḥ ca bhogebhyaḥ sāram ādadāti

original: mahābhogeṣu ca kuleṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: mahā bhogeṣu ca kuleṣu upapadyate

original: jātamātrasya cāsya tyāgacittamāmukhībhavati /
analyzed: jāta mātrasya ca asya tyāga cittam āmukhībhavati

original: priyaśca bhavati catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmū /
analyzed: priyaḥ ca bhavati catasṛṇām parṣadā amū

original: viśāradaścāsaṃkucitaḥ parṣadamavagāhate /
analyzed: viśāradaḥ ca a saṃkucitaḥ parṣadam avagāhate

original: digvidikṣu cāsyodāro varṇakīrtiśabdaśloko loke 'bhyudgacchati /
analyzed: diś vidikṣu ca asya udāraḥ varṇa kīrti śabda ślokaḥ loke abhyudgacchati

original: mṛdutaruṇahastapādaśca bhavati samacaraṇatalapratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: mṛdu taruṇa hasta pādaḥ ca bhavati sama caraṇa tala pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: avirahitaśca bhavati kalyāṇamitrairyāvadbodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
analyzed: avirahitaḥ ca bhavati kalyāṇa mitraiḥ yāvat bodhimaṇḍa niṣadanāt

original: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
analyzed: ime kumāra daśa anuśaṃsāḥ dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: tatredamucyate -
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: nigṛhītaṃ si mātsaryaṃ tyāgacittaṃ ca bṛṃhitam /
analyzed: nigṛhītam si mātsaryam tyāga cittam ca bṛṃhitam

original: ādattasāro bhavati samṛddhe jāyate kule // SRS_26.1 //
analyzed: ādatta sāraḥ bhavati samṛddhe jāyate kule

original: jātamātrasya cittaṃ si tyāga eva pravartate /
analyzed: jāta mātrasya cittam si tyāgaḥ eva pravartate

original: priyo bhavati sattvānāṃ gṛhapravrajitāna ca // SRS_26.2 //
analyzed: priyaḥ bhavati sattvānām ca

original: viśāradaśca parṣatsu ama rūpa saṃkramet /
analyzed: viśāradaḥ ca parṣatsu ama rūpa saṃkramet

original: bhavatyudāraśabdo 'sya grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca // SRS_26.3 //
analyzed: bhavati udāra śabdaḥ asya grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca

original: mṛdū hastau ca pādau ca bhaviṣyanti na durlabhāḥ /
analyzed: mṛdū hastau ca pādau ca bhaviṣyanti na durlabhāḥ

original: kalyāṇamitrāṃllabhate buddhāṃśca śrāvakānapi // SRS_26.4 //
analyzed: kalyāṇa mitrān labhate buddhān ca śrāvakān api

original: mātsaryacittaṃ si na jātu bhoti tyāgeṣu citta ramate 'sya nityam /
analyzed: mātsarya cittam si na jātu tyāgeṣu citta ramate asya nityam

original: priyaśca bhoti bahusattvakoṭināṃ amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.5 //
analyzed: priyaḥ ca bahu sattva koṭinām

original: (Vaidya 159)
analyzed: vaidya

original: mahādhane cāpi kule sa jāyate jātasya tyāge ramate mano 'sya /
analyzed: mahādhane ca api kule sa jāyate jātasya tyāge ramate manaḥ asya

original: ādattasāraśca karoti kālamamatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.6 //
analyzed: ādatta sāraḥ ca karoti kālam amatsarisyāḥ imi

original: viśāradaśco pariṣāṃ vigāhate udāraśabdo 'sya diśāsu yāti /
analyzed: viśāradaḥ ca u pariṣām vigāhate udāra śabdaḥ asya diśāsu yāti

original: mṛdu hastapādo 'sya sadaiva jāyate amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.7 //
analyzed: mṛdu hasta pādaḥ asya sadā eva jāyate

original: kalyāṇamitrāsya na bhonti durlabhā buddhāṃśca yo paśyati śrāvakāṃśca /
analyzed: kalyāṇa mitrā asya na bhonti durlabhāḥ buddhān ca yaḥ paśyati śrāvakān ca

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tān pūjayate prasanno amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.8 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tān pūjayate prasannaḥ a matsarisyāḥ imi

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje dānānuśaṃsāparivarto nāma ṣaḍaviṃśatitamaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje dānānuśaṃsāparivartaḥ nāma ṣaḍaviṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 160)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 27 Śīlanirdeśaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: śīla nirdeśa parivartaḥ

original: daśeme kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
analyzed: daśa ime kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: katame daśa?
analyzed: katame daśa

original: yaduta jñānaṃ ca pariśodhayati paripūrayati /
analyzed: yat uta jñānam ca pariśodhayati paripūrayati

original: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśikṣate /
analyzed: buddhānām bhagavatām anuśikṣate

original: agarhito bhavati paṇḍitānām /
analyzed: a garhitaḥ bhavati paṇḍitānām

original: pratijñāto na calati /
analyzed: pratijñātaḥ na calati

original: pratipattau tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: pratipattau tiṣṭhati

original: saṃsārāt palāyate /
analyzed: saṃsārāt palāyate

original: nirvāṇamarpayati /
analyzed: nirvāṇam arpayati

original: niṣparyutthāno viharati /
analyzed: niṣparyutthānaḥ viharati

original: samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: samādhim pratilabhate

original: adaridraśca bhavati /
analyzed: a daridraḥ ca bhavati

original: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
analyzed: ime kumāra daśa anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: tatredamucyate -
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: jñānaṃ ca paripūreti buddhānāmanuśikṣate /
analyzed: jñānam ca paripūra iti buddhānām anuśikṣate

original: agarhitaḥ paṇḍitānāṃ bhoti nityaṃ viśāradaḥ // SRS_27.1 //
analyzed: a garhitaḥ paṇḍitānām nityam viśāradaḥ

original: pratijñāto na calati pratipattau ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: pratijñātaḥ na calati pratipattau ca tiṣṭhati

original: arpeti yena nirvāṇaṃ saṃsārātaḥ palāyate // SRS_27.2 //
analyzed: arpa iti yena nirvāṇam saṃsāra atas palāyate

original: niṣparyutthito viharati samādhiṃ labhate laghu /

analyzed: vivādaḥ na bhavati asya vaneṣu eka vihāriṇaḥ

original: avyāvadhyena cittena āsravānna vivardhayet /
analyzed: avyāvadhyena cittena āsravān na vivardhayet

original: nāsyādhikaraṇaṃ bhoti guṇāste 'raṇyavāsinaḥ // SRS_28.71 //
analyzed: na asya adhikaraṇam guṇāḥ te araṇya vāsinaḥ

original: upaśāntaḥ sa carate manovākkāyasaṃvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: upaśāntaḥ sa carate manaḥ vāc kāya saṃvṛtaḥ

analyzed: mokṣa anukūlaḥ bhavati vimuktim sparśati

original: na vivadati kadāci mukta yogī imi guṇa tasya bhavatyaraṇyavāse // SRS_28.73 //
analyzed: na vivadati kadācid mukta yogī guṇa tasya bhavati araṇya vāse

original: yada bhavati nirviṇṇu saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya spṛhā kahiṃci loke /
analyzed: bhavati saṃskṛte asau na bhavati tasya spṛhā kahiṃci loke

original: na ca bhavati vivṛddhirāsravāṇāṃ vani vasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.74 //
analyzed: na ca bhavati vivṛddhiḥ āsravāṇām vani vasataḥ asya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ

analyzed: na jātu ca asya viveka cārī

original: vacasi manasi kāye saṃvṛtasyo bahu guṇa tasya bhavantyaraṇyavāse // SRS_28.75 //
analyzed: vacasi manasi kāye

original: (Vaidya 170)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: bhavati ca tasya mokṣaḥ laghu

original: vani vasati vimukti sevato 'syā imi guṇa bhonti araṇyavāsi sarve // SRS_28.76 //
analyzed: vani vasati vimukti sevataḥ asyāḥ imi guṇa bhonti araṇyavāsi sarve

original: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍacārikasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
analyzed: daśa ime kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍacārikasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: katame daśa?
analyzed: katame daśa

original: yaduta jñātrakāmatāsya na bhavati /
analyzed: yat uta jñātra kāma tā asya na bhavati

original: yaśaskāmatāsya na bhavati /
analyzed: yaśaskāma tā asya na bhavati

original: lābhasatkārakāmatāsya na bhavati /
analyzed: lābha satkāra kāma tā asya na bhavati

original: āryavaṃśapratiṣṭhitaśca bhavati /
analyzed: ārya vaṃśa pratiṣṭhitaḥ ca bhavati

original: kuhanalapanatāsya na bhavati /
analyzed: kuhana lapana tā asya na bhavati

original: ātmānaṃ notkarṣayati /
analyzed: ātmānam na utkarṣayati

original: parānna paṃsayati /
analyzed: parān na paṃsayati

original: anunayapratighaprahīṇaḥ paragṛhe carati /
analyzed: anunaya pratigha prahīṇaḥ para gṛhe carati

original: nirāmiṣaṃ ca dharmadānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: nirāmiṣam ca dharma dānam dadāti

original: dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya cāsya grāhyā dharmadeśanā bhavati /
analyzed: dhūta guṇa saṃlekha pratiṣṭhitasya ca asya grāhyā dharma deśanā bhavati

original: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍapātikasya dhūpaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
analyzed: ime kumāra daśa anuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍapātikasya dhūpaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: tatredamucyate -
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: na jñātrakāmo bhavati yaśo nāpyabhinandate /
analyzed: na jñātra kāmaḥ bhavati yaśaḥ na api abhinandate

original: lābhālābhe samacitto yo dhūteṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_28.77 //
analyzed: lābha alābhe sama cittaḥ yaḥ dhūteṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: notsṛjatyāryavaṃśaṃ ca kuhanā lapanā na ca /
analyzed: na utsṛjati ārya vaṃśam ca kuhanā lapanā na ca

original: utkarṣeti na cātmānaṃ parān paṃsayate na ca // SRS_28.78 //
analyzed: utkarṣa iti na ca ātmānam parān paṃsayate na ca

original: pratighānunayau cāsya dharmaṃ deśī nirāmiṣam /
analyzed: pratigha anunayau ca asya dharmam deśī nirāmiṣam

original: grāhyaṃ si vacanaṃ bhoti piṇḍapāte guṇā amī // SRS_28.79 //
analyzed: grāhyam si vacanam piṇḍapāte guṇāḥ amī

original: na mārgate jñātra yaśo na lābhaṃ caturāryavaṃśe bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: na mārgate yaśaḥ na lābham catur ārya vaṃśe bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: akuhako alapaku bhoti paṇḍito dhūtādhimuktasya imīdṛśā guṇāḥ // SRS_28.80 //
analyzed: akuhakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ dhūta adhimuktasya imā īdṛśāḥ guṇāḥ

original: nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsī puruṣaṃ pi ukto na kadāci kupyate /
analyzed: na ātmānam utkarṣi parān na paṃsī puruṣam uktaḥ na kadācid kupyate

original: varṇaṃ pi śrutvā janaye na harṣaṃ yaḥ piṇḍapātena bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ // SRS_28.81 //
analyzed: varṇam śrutvā janaye na harṣam yaḥ piṇḍapātena bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ

original: nirāmiṣaṃ deti ca dharmadānaṃ na lābhasatkāra gaveṣate 'sau /
analyzed: nirāmiṣam ca dharma dānam na asau

original: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate 'sya bhāṣitaṃ dhūtādhimuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.82 //
analyzed: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate asya bhāṣitam dhūta adhimuktasya ime anuśaṃsāḥ

original: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: iti hi kumāraḥ evaṃrūpeṣu dhūta guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ araṇye viharan buddha nidhānam pratilabhate

original: dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: dharma nidhānam pratilabhate

original: jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: jñāna nidhānam pratilabhate

original: pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ (Vaidya 171)
analyzed: pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpanna jñāna nidhānam vaidya

original: pratilabhate /
analyzed: pratilabhate

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ buddha nidhānam pratilabhate

original: imāḥ kumāra vivekacārī bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ pratilabhate /
analyzed: imāḥ kumāra viveka cārī bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pañca abhijñāḥ pratilabhate

original: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
analyzed: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyām diśi aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām diśi aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati

original: so 'virahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /
analyzed: saḥ avirahitaḥ bhavati buddha darśanena

original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: evam hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ buddha nidhānam pratilabhate

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dharma nidhānam pratilabhate

original: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
analyzed: yam ca te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ dharmam deśayanti

original: taṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā sarvaṃ śṛṇoti /
analyzed: tam sa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ divyena śrotradhātunā sarvam śṛṇoti

original: so 'virahito bhavati dharmaśravaṇena /
analyzed: saḥ avirahitaḥ bhavati dharma śravaṇena

original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: evam hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ dharma nidhānam pratilabhate

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ jñāna nidhānam pratilabhate

original: yena jñānena sarvadharmānārādhayati /
analyzed: yena jñānena sarva dharmān ārādhayati

original: ārādhayitvā avipramuṣitasmṛtiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
analyzed: ārādhayitvā a vipramuṣita smṛtiḥ sattvānām dharmam deśayati

original: tasya ca yo 'rthaḥ sa prajānāti /
analyzed: tasya ca yaḥ arthaḥ sa prajānāti

original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: evam hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ jñāna nidhānam pratilabhate

original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
analyzed: katham ca kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpanna jñāna nidhānam pratilabhate

original: so 'bhijñayā atītānāgatapratyutpannasattvacittacaritajñānamavatarati /
analyzed: saḥ abhijñayā atīta anāgata pratyutpanna sattva citta carita jñānam avatarati

original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: evam hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpanna jñāna nidhānam pratilabhate

original: saṃkṣiptena kumāra evaṃguṇadharmapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmān pratilabhate yatrābhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām,
analyzed: saṃkṣiptena kumāraḥ evaṃguṇa dharma pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva buddha dharmān pratilabhate yatra abhūmiḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaparapravādinām //
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarva parapravādinām

original: tatredamucyate -
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: buddhanidhānaṃ ca dharmanidhānaṃ jñānanidhānaṃ ca pūrvāntanidhānam /
analyzed: buddha nidhānam ca dharma nidhānam jñāna nidhānam ca pūrva anta nidhānam

original: pañca abhijñāḥ sa kṣipraṃ labhati yo vidu raṇṇi sadā sthitu bhoti // SRS_28.83 //
analyzed: pañca abhijñāḥ sa kṣipram labhati yaḥ sadā

analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje daśānuśaṃsāparivartaḥ nāma aṣṭāviṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 172)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 29 Tejaguṇarājaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: teja guṇa rāja parivartaḥ

analyzed: tatra bhagavān punar api candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi kumāra

original: divyāni cakravartirājyaiśvaryasukhānyapahāya pravrajiṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam /
analyzed: divyāni cakravarti rājya aiśvarya sukhāni apahāya pravrajiṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam

original: pravrajitena kumāra dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitena vivekacāriṇā kṣāntisauratyasaṃpannena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: pravrajitena kumāra dhūta guṇa saṃlekha pratiṣṭhitena viveka cāriṇā kṣānti sauratya saṃpannena bhavitavyam

analyzed: sadā ca ārabdha vīryeṇa te kumāraḥ ādīpta śiraḥ caila upamena ayam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitaḥ

original: samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ pravartayitavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ
analyzed: samādhiḥ śrotavyaḥ udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ dhārayitavyaḥ vācayitavyaḥ

original: uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo 'raṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ,
analyzed: uddeṣṭavyaḥ su ādhyātavyaḥ araṇā bhāvanayā bhāvayitavyaḥ bahulīkartavyaḥ

original: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ

original: khaṅgaviṣāṇabhūtena advitīyena ca te kumāra araṇyaniṣeviṇā sadā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: khaṅgaviṣāṇa bhūtena advitīyena ca te kumāra araṇya niṣeviṇā sadā bhavitavyam

original: ātmaparityāgenāpi te kumāra sarvasattvānāmarthaḥ sadā karaṇīya iti //
analyzed: ātma parityāgena api te kumāra sarva sattvānām arthaḥ sadā karaṇīyaḥ iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmetamevārthamudbhāvayaṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ pūrvayogakathāparivartaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa  #
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyāḥ velāyām etam eva artham udbhāvayan candraprabhasya kumāra bhūtasya imam pūrva yoga kathā parivartam gāthā abhigītena vistareṇa  /

original: saṃprakāśayati sma -
analyzed: saṃprakāśayati sma

original: smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /
analyzed: atīta bahu kalpa śatā yadā āsi ananta yaśāḥ

original: naradevanāgagaṇapūjaniyo nāmena tejaguṇi rāja jino // SRS_29.1 //
analyzed: naradeva nāga gaṇa pūjaniyaḥ

original: daśa bhikṣukoṭi ṣaḍabhijñaruhāḥ pratisaṃvidāna vaśipāragatāḥ /
analyzed: daśa ṣaḍabhijñaruhāḥ

original: dhūtavṛtta saṃlekhita śāntamanāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ // SRS_29.2 //
analyzed: dhūta vṛtta saṃlekhita śānta manāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ

analyzed: ṣaṭsaptatī nagara koṭi śatāḥ pañcāśa yojana pramāṇa samāḥ

original: ratanāna saptana viśiṣṭavarā iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt // SRS_29.3 //
analyzed: iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt

original: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitā bahu udyānaśataiḥ /
analyzed: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitāḥ bahu udyāna śataiḥ

analyzed: ghana megha nibhāḥ phala puṣpa maṇḍita taru nicitāḥ

original: phalavṛkṣajāti vividhā rucirāḥ lakucāmrajambupanasairnicitāḥ /
analyzed: vividhāḥ rucirāḥ lakuca āmra jambu panasaiḥ nicitāḥ

original: (Vaidya 173)
analyzed: vaidya

original: karṇikāracampakapunnāgaśataiḥ pratimaṇḍitāsta udyānavarāḥ // SRS_29.5 //
analyzed: karṇikāra campaka punnāga śataiḥ pratimaṇḍitāḥ te udyāna varāḥ

original: nyagrodha sarvi dvijasaṃgharutāḥ kalaviṅkakokilamayūraśataiḥ /
analyzed: nyagrodha sarvi dvija saṃgha rutāḥ kalaviṅka kokila mayūra śataiḥ

original: śukajīvaṃjīvakakuṇālarutā bahupakṣisaṃgharuta kāli tadā // SRS_29.6 //
analyzed: śuka jīvaṃjīvaka kuṇāla rutā bahu pakṣi saṃgha ruta kāli tadā

original: dhṛtarāṣṭrarājahaṃsopanibhā bhṛṅgakuṇālā varaghoṣarutāḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭra rājahaṃsa upanibhāḥ bhṛṅga kuṇālāḥ vara ghoṣa rutāḥ

original: citrāṅgaraktamahāvarṇaprabhāḥ sumanojñaśabda madhurā muditāḥ // SRS_29.7 //
analyzed: citra aṅga rakta mahā varṇa prabhāḥ su manojña śabda madhurāḥ muditāḥ

original: iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅkamayūravihaṅgarutaiḥ /
analyzed: iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅka mayūra vihaṅga rutaiḥ

original: parapuṣṭa śārika vicitra dvijā bahupakṣighoṣaruta nānavidhāḥ // SRS_29.8 //
analyzed: dvijāḥ

original: tehi niṣevita udyānaśatā mucilindavārṣika aśokaśataiḥ /
analyzed: niṣevitaḥ udyāna śatā aśoka śataiḥ

original: atimuktakātha javapuṣpapatraiḥ padmotpalaiḥ kumudapuṇḍarikaiḥ // SRS_29.9 //
analyzed: atimuktakā atha java puṣpa patraiḥ padma utpalaiḥ kumuda puṇḍarikaiḥ

original: padumaiḥ sahasraśatapatracitā imi puṣpa puṣkariṇiśobhakarāḥ /
analyzed: padumaiḥ sahasra śata patra citāḥ imi

original: pratimaṇḍitāḥ surabhigandhavarāḥ śobhanti puṣkariṇiyo rucirāḥ // SRS_29.10 //
analyzed: pratimaṇḍitāḥ surabhi gandha varāḥ śobhanti puṣkariṇiyaḥ rucirāḥ

original: tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
analyzed: rājaḥ iha jambudhvaje manuja adhipatiḥ

original: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ // SRS_29.11 //
analyzed: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ parama darśanikāḥ

original: tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
analyzed: abhūt anupadrutam su ramaṇīya śivam

original: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam // SRS_29.12 //
analyzed: jambudvīpa kusumaiḥ nicitaḥ deva bhavanehi samam

original: (Vaidya 174)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tahi kāli so daśabalo anidho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
analyzed: saḥ daśabalaḥ anidhaḥ bhāṣate imu samādhi varam

original: svapnopamā bhavagatī sakalā na va kaści jāyati na co mriyate // SRS_29.13 //
analyzed: svapna upamā bhava gatī sakalā na jāyati na ca u mriyate

original: na sattva labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
analyzed: na dharma phena kadalī sadṛśāḥ

original: māyopamā gaganavidyusamā dakacandrasaṃnibha marīcisamāḥ // SRS_29.14 //
analyzed: māyā upamāḥ gagana vidyu samāḥ daka candra saṃnibha marīci samāḥ

original: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloki saṃkramati gacchati vā /
analyzed: na ca asmi loki kaści para loki saṃkramati gacchati vā

original: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalameti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato // SRS_29.15 //
analyzed: na ca karma naśyati kadācid kṛtam phalam eti kṛṣṇa śubha

original: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca ucchedu puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
analyzed: na ca śāśvatam na ca ucchedu punar na ca karma saṃcayu na ca api sthitiḥ

original: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punaraspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate // SRS_29.16 //
analyzed: na ca saḥ api kṛtva punar a spṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva punar vedayate

original: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
analyzed: na ca saṃkramaḥ na ca punar āgamanam na ca sarvam asti na ca na asti punar

original: na ca dṛṣṭisthānu gatiśuddhiriho na ca sattvacaru na praśāntagatī // SRS_29.17 //
analyzed: na ca gati śuddhiḥ iha u na ca sattva caru na praśānta gatī

original: anupādu śāntu animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ /
analyzed: anupādu śāntu animitta padam sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ

original: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā // SRS_29.18 //
analyzed: bala dhāraṇī balam buddhāniyam vṛṣabhitā paramā

original: varaśukladharma guṇasaṃnicayo guṇajñānadhāraṇibalaṃ paramam /
analyzed: vara śukla dharma guṇa saṃnicayaḥ guṇa jñāna dhāraṇi balam paramam

original: ṛddhivikurvaṇāvidhiḥ paramā varapañcābhijñā pratilābhanayaḥ // SRS_29.19 //
analyzed: ṛddhi vikurvaṇā vidhiḥ paramā vara pañca abhijñā pratilābha nayaḥ

original: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
analyzed: na ca sa prajānati iha kvacid agata agatī nipuṇa dharma gatī

original: (Vaidya 175)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na ca dharmadhātu vrajatīha kvaci evaṃ gatī agati dharmagatī // SRS_29.20 //
analyzed: na ca dharmadhātu vrajati iha kvaci evam gatī agati dharma gatī

original: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu svabhāvagatī gatiyo svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ghoṣa saṃcayu svabhāva gatī svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ

original: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam // SRS_29.21 //
analyzed: a sthitā a niśritā svabhāva gatī jina gocaraḥ śānta padam

original: śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
analyzed: śānta praśāntaḥ upaśānta gatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī

original: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satataṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśu padaṃ acalam // SRS_29.22 //
analyzed: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satatam nipuṇam su durdṛśu padam acalam

original: na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /
analyzed: na ca sā calā hi svayam eva sthitā asthitā sthitā

original: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī // SRS_29.23 //
analyzed: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharma sthitī

original: ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
analyzed: ghoṣaḥ ca na ca ghoṣa gatī ghoṣa svabhāva gati dharma gatī

original: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī // SRS_29.24 //
analyzed: na ca ghoṣa saṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharma gatī

original: gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /
analyzed: gati śabdaḥ

original: ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ // SRS_29.25 //
analyzed: ghoṣaḥ api na ca sattva gatī na ca na sattva gatiḥ

original: na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /
analyzed: na ca ananta na anta na ca madhya gatiḥ na eva asti na asti na ca deśa gatī

original: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā // SRS_29.26 //
analyzed: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāva gatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā

analyzed: virajam viśuddhi paramārtha padam śānta praśānta arajam virajam

original: na ca kalpa manyana praśāntapadaṃ jinu bhāṣate paramakāruṇiko // SRS_29.27 //
analyzed: na ca bhāṣate parama kāruṇikaḥ

original: (Vaidya 176)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
analyzed: na ca asti akṣara pracāraḥ iha u vipulā gatiḥ vipulā artha gatī

original: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī // SRS_29.28 //
analyzed: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharma naya sūkṣma gatī

original: dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /
analyzed: dharma nidhāna virajam vipulam yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā

original: deśenti dharmaratanaṃ virajaṃ paramārthaśūnya nipuṇārthagatī // SRS_29.29 //
analyzed: deśenti dharma ratanam virajam

original: aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipadendra bhāṣati samādhimimam /
analyzed: aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipada indra bhāṣati samādhim imam

original: so 'śītikoṭinayutehi tadā upasaṃkramī tada jinu kāruṇikam // SRS_29.30 //
analyzed: saḥ tadā kāruṇikam

analyzed: balavantu gauravu jine

analyzed: puratas sthitaḥ daśabalasya tadā kṛtāñjaliḥ daśa nakhaḥ pramuditaḥ

original: tasyo viditva pariśuddha carīṃ jina indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ /
analyzed: viditvā pariśuddha carīm jinaḥ indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ

original: adhumuktikovidu naraḥ pravaro imu tasya deśayi samādhivaram // SRS_29.32 //
analyzed: naraḥ samādhi varam

original: yada tena rājña paramārtha śruto utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā /
analyzed: yada tena rājña paramārtha śrutaḥ utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā

original: ujjhitva dvīpa sakalāṃścaturo vijahitva kāma abhiniṣkrami so // SRS_29.33 //
analyzed: ujjhitvā dvīpa sakalān caturaḥ vijahitvā kāma abhiniṣkrami saḥ

analyzed: yada rāja pravraji jahitva mahīm bodhāya

original: sarve manuṣya iha jambudhvaje vijahitva kāmaratī pravrajitā // SRS_29.34 //
analyzed: sarve manuṣyaḥ iha jambudhvaje vijahitvā kāma ratī pravrajitā

analyzed: vipulaḥ gaṇaḥ daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayukta manāḥ

original: (Vaidya 177)
analyzed: vaidya

original: akṛṣṭā anupta tada oṣadhayo prādurbhūtā marutparicarāḥ // SRS_29.35 //
analyzed: a kṛṣṭāḥ tadaḥ oṣadhayaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ marut paricarāḥ

analyzed: kāṣāya tri cīvara samacchinna su sīvita te anupamāḥ

analyzed: amalāḥ virajāḥ ca suvarṇa cittāḥ buddhasya guṇa ucita puṇya balāḥ

analyzed: paśya u kumāra sa hi rāja varaḥ pravrajitaḥ

analyzed: sattva kṣaya kāli bahu aparītta bhogāḥ na tyajanti gṛhān

analyzed: tāḍana bandhana kudaṇḍa bahu ākrośa tarjanam aniṣṭa dukham

analyzed: sahiṣyanti rāja kula bahu su parītta bhoga na ca gṛhe

analyzed: na ca asti dhanam su mahān pramādu na ca puṇya balam

analyzed: na ca śilpasthāna kuśalāḥ abudhāḥ dāridriyam ca na ca gṛhe

analyzed: para dāra gṛddha aviśuddha manāḥ īrṣyālukāḥ parama sāhasikāḥ

analyzed: sāhasikā aham āḍhyu

analyzed: upaghātakāḥ kuhaka naikṛtikāḥ vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyāma vayam

analyzed: vadha bandhu padravi parasya ratāḥ duḥśīla dāruṇa praduṣṭa manāḥ

analyzed: yasya eva tena bodhi carī tasya eva

original: (Vaidya 178)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: tat imām kumāra mama giram mā tehi saṃstavu karohi tadā

analyzed: supina antare api yadi icchase bodhi carīm

analyzed: bhavathā sadā api akhilāḥ madhurāḥ sada śuddha śīla su prasanna manāḥ

analyzed: pariśuddha śīla bhavathā satatam nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhi varam

analyzed: na karotha māna na janetha khilam pariśuddha mānasa sadā bhavathā

analyzed: mada māna mrakṣa vijahitva tatas pratilapsyathāḥ samādhi varam

analyzed: guṇataḥ jinam satatam vara kāñcana chavi prabhāsa karam

analyzed: dhvaja chatra vitāna patāka varām cūrṇa anulepanam gṛhītvā bahūn

analyzed: pūjām karotha sugatasya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhi varam

original: (Vaidya 179)
analyzed: vaidya

original: jinastūpi pūja prakarotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.50 //
analyzed: jina stūpi sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhi varam

analyzed: madhura svaraiḥ viṃvidha vādya gaṇaiḥ prasanna manāḥ

analyzed: kāretha buddha pratimām rucirām rata nāmayīm su parikarma kṛtām

analyzed: prāsādikām parama su darśanīyām nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhi varam

analyzed: vana ṣaṇḍa vivikta sadā vijahitva grāma nagareṣu ratim

original: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.53 //
analyzed: advitīya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhi varam

original: ahu dharmasvāmi mama yūyu sutā anuśikṣathā mama samādhicarim /
analyzed: ahu dharmasvāmi mama sutāḥ anuśikṣathāḥ mama samādhicarim

analyzed: ahu saḥ diśatā su viśrutaḥ dṛḍhadattu nāma manuja adhipatiḥ

analyzed: maya buddha pūjita ananta pure maya śīlu rakṣitu viśuddha manāḥ

analyzed: gauravam daśa baleṣu kṛtam samādhi varam

analyzed: maya putra dāra parityakta pure śira hasta pāda nayana agra varāḥ

original: na ca līnacittata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.56 //
analyzed: na ca kadāci kṛtāḥ samādhi varam

original: (Vaidya 180)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: dhana dhānya dāsa bahu dāsi śatā ratanā prabhūta parityakta mayā

analyzed: saṃtarpitā pi bahu yācanakāḥ samādhi varam

analyzed: maya mukti sphāṭika suvarṇa bahu vaidūrya śaṅkha śila tyakta pure

original: maṇi śuddharūpiya pravāla ghanā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.58 //
analyzed: samādhi varam

original: maya tyakta ābharaṇa nānavidhā varamuktahāra tatha sīhanukāḥ /

original: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.59 //
analyzed: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu samādhi varam

original: maya vastrakoṭya paramā sukhumāḥ pariśuddha kāśikadukūlavarāḥ /
analyzed: su khumāḥ

original: bahuhemacitra parityakta pare imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.60 //
analyzed: bahu hema citra parityakta pare samādhi varam

analyzed: maya hasti aśva ratha nānavidhāḥ parityakta sva priya sutaḥ mahilāḥ

original: na ca daurmanasyata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.61 //
analyzed: na ca kadācid kṛtāḥ samādhi varam

original: maya dṛṣṭva pūrvi sudaridra narāḥ paryeṣṭiduḥkhita ca kṛcchragatāḥ /
analyzed: su daridra narāḥ ca kṛcchra gatāḥ

original: maya te dhanena adaridra kṛtāḥ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.62 //
analyzed: maya te dhanena adaridra kṛtāḥ imu samādhi varam

analyzed: hastī ratha aśva rathakāḥ nayutāḥ pracchanna ratana maṇi jāla citāḥ

original: dattā mayā yācanakāna purā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.63 //
analyzed: dattāḥ mayā samādhi varam

original: udyāna koṭinayutā bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
analyzed: udyāna koṭi nayutāḥ bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā

original: (Vaidya 181)
analyzed: vaidya

original: harṣetva mānasu janitva kṛpāṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.64 //
analyzed: mānasu kṛpām samādhi varam

original: grāmātha rāṣṭranagarā nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
analyzed: grāma atha rāṣṭra nagarāḥ nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā

original: datvā ca prītimanubhomi sadā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.65 //
analyzed: ca prītim anubhomi sadā samādhi varam

analyzed: rāśaya cīvara ābharaṇakāḥ ca bahu

original: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.66 //
analyzed: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu samādhi varam

original: sudaridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchraprāpta paritrāta bahu /
analyzed: su daridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchra prāpta paritrāta bahu

analyzed: aṣṭabhiḥ loka dharmaiḥ

original: imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.3 //
analyzed: samādhim dhārayan mokṣa kāmaḥ

analyzed: akhila madhura vāṇī ślakṣṇa vācā su yuktā apagata bhrukuṭiḥ bhoti

original: satatasmitamukhaśco śikṣito nāyakānām imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.4 //
analyzed: śikṣitaḥ nāyakānām viraja samādhim dhārayan mokṣa kāmaḥ

original: bhavati sa sukhavāsaḥ sūrataḥ snigdhacitto bhavati sada sudānto dāntabhūmisthitaśca /
analyzed: bhavati sa sukha vāsaḥ sūrataḥ snigdha cittaḥ bhavati su dāntaḥ dānta bhūmi sthitaḥ ca

original: sumadhura priyavāṇī snigdhasatyābhidhāyī imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.5 //
analyzed: snigdha satya abhidhāyī viraja samādhim dhārayan bodhi kāmaḥ

original: na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
analyzed: na ca sa vaigrahīm no vivādān apagata khila doṣāḥ varjitāḥ tena śeṣāḥ

original: (Vaidya 189)
analyzed: vaidya

original: pramuditu sada bhotī sūrato mārdavaśca imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.6 //
analyzed: sūrataḥ mārdavaḥ ca samādhim dhārayan bodhi kāmaḥ

original: bhavati ca sada vidvāṃstyāgi nityābhiyuktaḥ sudukhita jana dṛṣṭvā teṣamannaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: bhavati ca vidvān tyāgi nitya abhiyuktaḥ su dukhita jana dṛṣṭvā teṣam annam dadāti

original: priyataru parityaktuṃ bhoti nityaṃ sudātā imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.7 //
analyzed: parityaktum viraja samādhim dhārayan bodhi kāmaḥ

original: devaśatasahasrāṇa spṛhāṃ ye saṃjanentī nāga asura yakṣā nityupasthāyakāsya /
analyzed: deva śata sahasrāṇaḥ spṛhām ye

original: vani pavani vasante rakṣa tasyā karontī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayati // SRS_30.8 //
analyzed: vani pavani vasante rakṣa tasyā karontī imu viraja samādhim yaḥ naraḥ dhārayati

original: bhaṇi vacanamasaktaṃ brahmadhoṣasvaro 'sau haṃsaravitaghoṣaḥ kinnarodgītaghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: vacanam asaktam brahma dhoṣa svaraḥ asau haṃsa ravita ghoṣaḥ kinnara udgīta ghoṣaḥ

original: pañcaśatasvarāṅgo harṣaṇīyasvaraśco bhavati naditaśabdo ghuṣṭaśabdaḥ suśabdaḥ // SRS_30.9 //
analyzed: pañca śata svara aṅgaḥ bhavati nadita śabdaḥ ghuṣṭa śabdaḥ su śabdaḥ

original: yāvatatu pṛthu kṣatrāṇa naraḥ kaścideva sūkṣma raja kareyyā śakya te lakṣaṇāya /
analyzed: naraḥ kaścid eva sūkṣma raja kareyyā śakya te lakṣaṇāya

original: tatu bahutaru tasyo ye svarā niścarantī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayāti // SRS_30.10 //
analyzed: ye svarāḥ niścarantī samādhim yaḥ naraḥ dhārayāti

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje 'nuśaṃsāparivarto nāma triṃśatitamaḥ // 30 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje anuśaṃsāparivartaḥ nāma triṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 190)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 31 Sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: sarva dharma svabhāva nirdeśa parivartaḥ

original: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kimityahaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: tatra bhagavān punar api candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi kumāra yaḥ ākāṅkṣet bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kim iti aham sarva dharmāṇām

original: svabhāvaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmiti,
analyzed: svabhāvam katham jānīyām iti

analyzed: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ

original: śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavya uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ
analyzed: śrotavyaḥ udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ dhārayitavyaḥ vācayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ su ādhyātavyaḥ

original: araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ //
analyzed: araṇā bhāvanayā bhāvayitavyaḥ bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: tasyo rāgu na jātu kupyate na ca doṣo tasyo moha na jātu kupyate vṛṣabhisya /
analyzed: tasya u rāgu na jātu kupyate na ca doṣu tasya u moha na jātu kupyate vṛṣabhisya

original: teno sarvi kileśa cchoritānavaśeṣā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu oṣirī sugatānāṃ so 'sau śūru na jātu istriyāṇāṃ vaśameti /
analyzed: saḥ asau na jātu oṣirī sugatānām saḥ asau śūru na jātu istriyāṇām vaśam eti

original: so 'sau śāsani prīti vindate sugatānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.2 //
analyzed: saḥ asau śāsani prīti vindate sugatānām yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: so 'sau jñānavidhijña paṇḍito matimāṃśca so 'sau buddha ananta paśyatī aparyantāṃ /
analyzed: saḥ asau jñāna vidhi jña paṇḍitaḥ matimān ca saḥ asau buddha ananta

original: so 'sau dhāraṇijñānu jānatī aparyantaṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī nayayuktim // SRS_31.3 //
analyzed: saḥ asau jānatī aparyantam yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī naya yuktim

original: so 'sau neha cireṇa bheṣyati dvipadendraḥ so 'sau vaidyu bhiṣaku bheṣyate sukhadātā /
analyzed: saḥ asau na iha cireṇa dvipada indraḥ saḥ asau sukha dātā

original: so 'sau uddhari śalya sarvaśo dukhitānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.4 //
analyzed: saḥ asau sarvaśas dukhitānām yaḥ asau

original: so 'sau āturu jñātva duḥkhitānimi sattvān so 'sau bherī sadā parāhanī amṛtasya /
analyzed: saḥ asau sattvān saḥ asau amṛtasya

original: so 'sau bheṣyati nāyako jino nacireṇa yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.5 //
analyzed: saḥ asau nāyakaḥ jinaḥ nacireṇa yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: (Vaidya 191)
analyzed: vaidya

original: so 'sau bhaiṣajyanayeṣu kovido varavaidyo ādiṃ jānati sarvavyādhināṃ yatra muktiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asau bhaiṣajya nayeṣu kovidaḥ vara vaidyaḥ ādim jānati sarva vyādhinām yatra muktiḥ

original: so 'sau bhūtanayaśikṣito matimanto śikṣitvā bahusattva mocayī pṛthu naṣṭān // SRS_31.6 //
analyzed: saḥ asau bhūta naya śikṣitaḥ śikṣitvā naṣṭān

original: so 'sau śūnyanayeṣu kovido matiśūraḥ so 'sau loki asaktu bhuñjati sada piṇḍam /
analyzed: saḥ asau śūnya nayeṣu kovidaḥ mati śūraḥ saḥ asau loki asaktu bhuñjati piṇḍam

original: so 'sau bodhivarāya sthāpayi bahusattvān yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.7 //
analyzed: saḥ asau bodhi varāya bahu sattvān yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: so 'sau kṣāntibalena udgato naracandraḥ so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍatāḍito na ca kupyī /
analyzed: saḥ asau kṣānti balena udgataḥ nara candraḥ saḥ asau loṣṭaka daṇḍa tāḍitaḥ na ca kupyī

original: so 'sau chidyatu aṅgamaṅgaśo na ca kṣubhye yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.8 //
analyzed: saḥ asau chidyatu aṅgam aṅgaśas na ca kṣubhye yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

analyzed: saḥ asau kṣānti bale pratiṣṭhitaḥ balavantaḥ saḥ asau su praśāntaḥ

original: so 'sau kṣāntibalena manyate matiśūro yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.9 //
analyzed: saḥ asau kṣānti balena manyate mati śūraḥ yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

analyzed: saḥ asau vastu na jātu manyate chinnā tena u sarvi bhavāḥ vibhāvitāḥ sada śūnyāḥ

original: tasyo saṃjñā prahīṇa sarvaśo nikhileno yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.10 //
analyzed: tasya u saṃjñā sarvaśas yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: te te dharmasvabhāvu deśayī supraṇītaṃ te te bodhi spṛśī anuttarāṃ nacireṇa /
analyzed: te te su praṇītam te te bodhi spṛśī anuttarām nacireṇa

original: yeṣāṃ dharmasvabhāvu gocaraḥ sunidhyapto teṣāṃ datta ananta dakṣiṇā aparyantā // SRS_31.11 //
analyzed: yeṣām gocaraḥ teṣām datta ananta dakṣiṇā aparyantā

original: so 'sau bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yatha gaṅganadīya vālikāstatu bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asau bhāṣati aparyantāḥ bhūyas

original: no cāsyu pratibhānu chidyate varṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.12 //
analyzed: no ca asyu chidyate varṇa māne yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: so 'sau kalpasahasrakoṭiśo nayutāni jñāneno sada bhoti udgato yatha meruḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asau kalpa sahasra koṭiśas nayutāni udgataḥ meruḥ

original: (Vaidya 192)
analyzed: vaidya

original: dharma tasya kṣayo na vidyate bhaṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.13 //
analyzed: tasya kṣayaḥ na vidyate bhaṇamāne yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

analyzed: vistīrṇam vipulam acintiyam pratibhānam bodhi varām gaveṣataḥ

original: nityaṃ bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.14 //
analyzed: nityam bhāṣati aparyantā yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī su praśāntam

original: yaṃ caite dvipadottamā jinā bhaṇi dharmaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva gṛhṇatī paripūrṇam /
analyzed: yam ca ete dvipada uttamāḥ dharmam sarvam tam ca gṛhṇatī paripūrṇam

analyzed: na u vai eka pade api vidyate yaḥ asau dharmān

original: so 'sau bhoti viśiṣṭa tyāgavān sada kālaṃ bhotī dānapatiḥ sukhaṃdado dukhitānām /
analyzed: saḥ asau tyāgavān dukhitānām

original: dṛṣṭā duḥkhita sattva tarpayī ratanehī yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam // SRS_31.16 //
analyzed: yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam

original: sau 'sau jambudhvaje bhaviṣyatī sada rājā sattvānāṃ sada saukhya kāhitī aparyantam /
analyzed: aparyantam

original: maitrāye samupetu prāṇīnāṃ sada kāle yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam // SRS_31.17 //
analyzed: samupetu prāṇīnām kāle yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam

analyzed: putrān tyajya dhīraḥ hastau pāda śirāṃsi sa tyajī rājyam

analyzed: no ca ālīyati tasya mānasam yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī śūnyam

original: aṅgāṅgaṃ puna tasya chidyatī yadi kāyo no tasya pratihanyate manaḥ supine 'pi /
analyzed: aṅga aṅgam yadi kāyaḥ no tasya pratihanyate manaḥ supine api

original: teno pūjita bhonti nāyakā dvipadendrā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam // SRS_31.19 //
analyzed: tena u pūjita bhonti nāyakāḥ dvipada indrāḥ yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam

original: teno pūjita sarvi nāyakā ya atītāstatha pūjita ye anāgatā dvipadendrāḥ /
analyzed: nāyakāḥ nāyakāḥ pūjita ye anāgatāḥ dvipada indrāḥ

original: tehī satkṛta sarvi nāyakā sthita ye co yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam // SRS_31.20 //
analyzed: satkṛta sarvi nāyakā sthita ye yaḥ asau dharma svabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam

original: (Vaidya 193)
analyzed: vaidya

original: so 'sau kośa dhareti paṇḍitaḥ sugatānāṃ so 'sau dhāraṇiye pratiṣṭhitaḥ paramāyām /
analyzed: saḥ asau paṇḍitaḥ sugatānām saḥ asau dhāraṇiye pratiṣṭhitaḥ paramāyām

analyzed: saḥ asau loka nāyakaḥ naciareṇa yat śutvā sūtram dhārayet kṣaya kāle

original: so 'ndho naiva kadāci bheṣyatī vidu jātu no co aṅgavihīnu bheṣyatī bahukalpān /
analyzed: saḥ andhaḥ na eva kadācid bheṣyatī vidu jātu no ca u bahu kalpān

original: teno akṣaṇa aṣṭa varjitā imi nityaṃ yeno sūtramidaṃ prabhāṣitaṃ apramuṣṭam // SRS_31.22 //
analyzed: tena u aṣṭa varjitāḥ nityam yena u sūtram idam prabhāṣitam a pramuṣṭam

analyzed: na asau durgatiṣu gamiṣyati punar jātu nityam lakṣaṇa dhāri abhirūpaḥ

original: pacco tasya abhijña bhāvitā imi nityaṃ purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sada śūraḥ // SRS_31.23 //
analyzed: tasya abhijña bhāvitā imi nityam puratas saḥ sugatāna sthāsyatī sada śūraḥ

original: bahukān nirmita nirmiṇitvāna ayu jñānī preṣatī bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu vinayārtham /
analyzed: bahukān jñānī bahu kṣetra koṭiṣu vinaya artham

original: yehi dṛṣṭa bhavanti nirmitā bahu buddhāḥ tehī bodhivarāya sthāpitā bahu sattvāḥ // SRS_31.24 //
analyzed: yehi dṛṣṭa bhavanti nirmitāḥ bahu buddhāḥ tehi bodhivarāya sthāpitāḥ bahu sattvāḥ

original: smṛtimantaḥ gatimantaḥ prajñāvān dhṛtimāṃśca sthāmnā vīryabalena so sadā samupetaḥ /
analyzed: smṛtimantaḥ gatimantaḥ prajñāvān dhṛtimān ca sthāmnā vīrya balena saḥ sadā samupetaḥ

original: dharmapāramiprāpta bheṣyati mahatejā yaḥ śrutvā imu sūtra dhārayet kṣayakāle // SRS_31.25 //
analyzed: dharmapārami prāpta mahā tejāḥ yaḥ śrutvā sūtra dhārayet kṣaya kāle

original: raśmikoṭisahasra niścarī sada teṣāṃ vyomāḥ sarvi karonti maṇḍalāḥ suriyāṇām /
analyzed: teṣām vyomāḥ sarvi maṇḍalāḥ suriyāṇām

original: yehī bhāvita bhonti śūnyakā imi dharmāste te śūra bhavanti nāyakā nacireṇa // SRS_31.26 //
analyzed: bhāvita bhonti śūnyakāḥ dharmāḥ te te śūra bhavanti nāyakāḥ nacireṇa

original: eṣo gocaru śāntu bhāvito maya pūrvaṃ bahukalpāna sahasra koṭiyo niyutāni /
analyzed: eṣaḥ gocaru śāntu bhāvitaḥ pūrvam

original: (Vaidya 194)
analyzed: vaidya

original: vīryaṃ me na kadāci sahasita iha mārge yadahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa vyākṛto jinabhūmī // SRS_31.27 //
analyzed: vīryam me na kadācid sa hasite iha mārge yat aham dīpaṃkareṇa vyākṛtaḥ jina bhūmī

original: yūyaṃ pī mama caryā śikṣathā iha sūtre gambhīrā paramārtha deśitā iya netrī /
analyzed: yūyam mama caryā śikṣathā iha sūtre gambhīrā paramārtha deśitā

original: yatrāmī bahu naṣṭa tīrthikā viparitā kṣiptvā bodhimapāyi bhairave prapatanti // SRS_31.28 //
analyzed: yatra amī kṣiptvā bodhim apāyi bhairave prapatanti

original: bahukalpāna sahasrakoṭiyo nayutāni veditvā amu tatra vedanā kaṭu tībrāḥ /
analyzed: sahasra koṭiyaḥ nayutāni veditvā amu tatra vedanā kaṭu tībrāḥ

original: bahukalpā nayutānamatyayāt punareva hetuḥ so amṛtasya prāptaye bhaviṣyate // SRS_31.29 //
analyzed: bahu kalpāḥ punar eva hetuḥ saḥ amṛtasya prāptaye bhaviṣyate

original: ye te paścimi kāli bhairave sugatasyo rakṣanti imu sūtramīdṛśaṃ praśāntam /
analyzed: ye te paścimi bhairave rakṣanti sūtram īdṛśam praśāntam

original: teṣāṃ bodhi varā na durlabhā iya śreṣṭhā te te paścimi kāli vyākṛta dhari dharmān // SRS_31.30 //
analyzed: teṣām bodhi varā na durlabhā śreṣṭhā te te dharmān

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśaparivarto nāmaikatriṃśatitamaḥ // 31 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśaparivartaḥ nāma ekatriṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 195)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 32 Sūtradhāraṇānuśaṃsāparivartaḥ /
analyzed: sūtradhāraṇa anuśaṃsā parivartaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva candraprabham kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma tasmāt tarhi

original: kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhijñāparikarma dhārayitukāmenāyaṃ samādhirdhārayitavyaḥ
analyzed: kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahā abhijñā parikarma dhārayitu kāmena ayam samādhiḥ dhārayitavyaḥ

original: udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ
analyzed: udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ dhārayitavyaḥ vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ

original: svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
analyzed: su ādhyātavyaḥ bhāvayitavyaḥ

original: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavya /
analyzed: parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa

original: katamacca tat kumāra sarvadharmāṇāmabhijñāparikarma?
analyzed: katamat ca tat kumāra sarva dharmāṇām abhijñā parikarma

original: yaduta sarvadharmāṇāmaparigrahaḥ aparāmarśaḥ śīlaskandhasyāmanyanā samādhiskandhasya
analyzed: yat uta sarva dharmāṇām aparigrahaḥ aparāmarśaḥ śīla skandhasya amanyanā samādhi skandhasya

original: apracāraḥ prajñāskandhasya vivekadarśanaṃ vimuktiskandhasya yathābhūtadarśanaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhasya
analyzed: a pracāraḥ prajñā skandhasya viveka darśanam vimukti skandhasya yathā bhūta darśanam vimukti jñāna darśana skandhasya

original: svabhāvaśūnyatādarśanaṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
analyzed: svabhāva śūnyatā darśanam sarva dharmāṇām

original: yayābhijñayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasamādhivikurvitāni vikurvan sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
analyzed: yayā abhijñayā samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva samādhi vikurvitāni vikurvan sarva sattvānām dharmam deśayati

original: idamucyate kumāra mahābhijñāparikarmeti //
analyzed: idam ucyate kumāra mahā abhijñā parikarma iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: mahābhijñāparikarma avivādena deśitam /
analyzed: mahā abhijñā parikarma avivādena deśitam

original: vivāde yastu carati sodgṛhṇan na vimucyate // SRS_32.1 //
analyzed: vivāde yaḥ tu carati saḥ udgṛhṇan na vimucyate

original: abhijñā tasya sā prajñā bauddhaṃ jñānamacintiyam /
analyzed: abhijñā tasya sā prajñā bauddham jñānam acintiyam

original: udgrahe yaḥ sthito bhoti jñānaṃ tasya na vidyate // SRS_32.2 //
analyzed: udgrahe yaḥ sthitaḥ jñānam tasya na vidyate

original: bahavo 'cintiyā dharmā ye śabdena prakāśitāḥ /
analyzed: bahavaḥ acintiyāḥ dharmāḥ ye śabdena prakāśitāḥ

original: yastatra niviśecchabde saṃghābhāṣyaṃ na jānati // SRS_32.3 //
analyzed: yaḥ tatra niviśet śabde saṃgha ābhāṣyam na jānati

original: saṃghābhāṣyamajānānaḥ kiṃ saṃghāya tu bhāṣitam /
analyzed: saṃgha ābhāṣyam a jānānaḥ kim saṃghāya tu bhāṣitam

original: adharmaṃ bhāṣate dharmaṃ dharmatāyāmaśikṣitaḥ // SRS_32.4 //
analyzed: adharmam bhāṣate dharmam dharmatāyām aśikṣitaḥ

original: lokadhātusahasreṣu ye mayā sūtra bhāṣitāḥ /
analyzed: lokadhātu sahasreṣu ye mayā sūtra bhāṣitāḥ

original: nānāvyañjana ekārthā na śakyaṃ parikīrtitum // SRS_32.5 //
analyzed: nānā vyañjane ekārthāḥ na śakyam parikīrtitum

original: ekaṃ padārthaṃ cintetvā sarve te bhonti bhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: ekam padārtham cintetvā sarve te bhonti bhāvitāḥ

original: yāvantaḥ sarvabuddhehi bahu dharmāḥ prakāśitāḥ // SRS_32.6 //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ sarva buddhehi bahu dharmāḥ prakāśitāḥ

original: nairātmyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ye narā arthakovidāḥ /
analyzed: nairātmyam sarva dharmāṇām ye narāḥ artha kovidāḥ

original: asmin pade tu śikṣitvā buddhadharmā na durlabhāḥ // SRS_32.7 //
analyzed: asmin pade tu śikṣitvā buddha dharmāḥ na durlabhāḥ

original: sarvadharmā buddhadharmā dharmatāyāṃ ya śikṣitāḥ /
analyzed: sarva dharmāḥ buddha dharmāḥ dharmatāyām śikṣitāḥ

original: ye dharmatāṃ prajānanti na virodhenti dharmatām // SRS_32.8 //
analyzed: ye dharmatām prajānanti na virodhenti dharmatām

original: (Vaidya 196)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sarvā vāg buddhavāgeva sarvaśabdo hyavastukaḥ /
analyzed: sarvā vāc buddha vāc eva sarva śabdaḥ hi avastukaḥ

original: diśo daśa gaveṣitvā buddhavāg naiva labhyate // SRS_32.9 //
analyzed: diśaḥ daśa gaveṣitvā buddha vāc nā eva labhyate

original: eṣā vācā buddhavācā gaveṣitvā diśo daśa /
analyzed: eṣā vācā buddha vācā gaveṣitvā diśaḥ daśa

original: na labhyate 'nuttaraiṣā na labdhā na ca lapsyate // SRS_32.10 //
analyzed: na labhyate anuttarā eṣā na labdhā na ca lapsyate

analyzed: anuttarā buddha vācā buddha vācā niruttarā

original: aṇurna lapsyate 'treti tenokteyamanuttarā // SRS_32.11 //
analyzed: aṇuḥ na lapsyate atrā iti tena uktā iyam anuttarā

analyzed: aṇu na utpadyate dharmaḥ aṇu śabdena deśitaḥ

analyzed: aṇu mātraḥ na caḥ labdhaḥ loke śabdena deśitaḥ

original: alabdhirlabdhadharmāṇāṃ labdhau labdhirna vidyate /

original: ya evaṃ dharma jānanti budhyante bodhimuttamām // SRS_32.13 //
analyzed: ye evam dharma jānanti budhyante bodhim uttamām

analyzed: te buddha anuttarām bodhim dharmacakram

original: dharmacakraṃ pravartitvā buddhadharmān prakāśayī // SRS_32.14 //
analyzed: dharmacakram pravartitvā buddha dharmān

original: bodhisattvāśca budhyante buddhajñānamanuttaram /
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ ca budhyante buddha jñānam anuttaram

original: tena buddhā iti proktā buddhajñānā prabodhanāt // SRS_32.15 //
analyzed: tena buddhāḥ iti proktā buddha jñānā prabodhanāt

original: ebhirvimokṣadvārehirdvāraṃ buddhaḥ prakāśayī // SRS_32.16 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ vimokṣa dvāra ihiḥ dvāram buddhaḥ

original: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manastathā /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrotram ca ghrāṇam ca jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ tathā

original: ete śūnyāḥ svabhāvena saṃbuddhaiḥ saṃprakāśitāḥ // SRS_32.17 //
analyzed: ete śūnyāḥ svabhāvena saṃbuddhaiḥ saṃprakāśitāḥ

original: etādṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ yaḥ prajānati /
analyzed: etādṛśānām dharmāṇām svabhāvam yaḥ prajānati

original: nāsau vivādaṃ kurute jñātvā dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam // SRS_32.18 //
analyzed: na asau vivādam kurute jñātvā lakṣaṇam

original: eṣa gocaru śūrāṇāṃ bodhisattvāna tāyinām /
analyzed: eṣa gocaru śūrāṇām tāyinām

analyzed: dharma svabhāvam jānāti buddhaḥ tena ucyate hi saḥ

original: bodhaye vinayī sattvānaprameyānacintiyān // SRS_32.20 //
analyzed: bodhaye vinayī sattvān aprameyān acintiyān

original: satkṛto buddhaśabdena śīlaśabdena so kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: satkṛtaḥ buddha śabdena śīla śabdena saḥ u kṛtaḥ

original: śīlaśabdo buddhaśabda ubhau tāvekalakṣaṇau // SRS_32.21 //
analyzed: śīla śabdaḥ buddha śabdaḥ ubhau tau eka lakṣaṇau

analyzed: yāvantaḥ kīrtitāḥ śabdāḥ hīnaḥ utkṛṣṭa madhyamāḥ

analyzed: samāhita eka śabdena buddha śabdena deśitāḥ

original: na cotpannā niruddhā va ekatvena pṛthak tathā // SRS_32.23 //
analyzed: na ca utpannāḥ niruddhāḥ vaḥ ekatvena pṛthak tathā

original: (Vaidya 197)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: na ca ghoṣasya sā bhūmiḥ prātihāryam muneḥ idam

analyzed: anāsravāḥ hi te dharmāḥ nena ucyanti hi

analyzed: stṛtā a paryāpannā daśa diśe eṣā buddhāna deśanā

analyzed: parinirvṛtasya buddhasya dṛśyate buddha vigrahaḥ

analyzed: tat sthānam manasīkurvan prātihāryam sa paśyati

analyzed: evam ca diśitaḥ dharmaḥ bahavaḥ sattva mocitāḥ

analyzed: yathā candraḥ ca sūryaḥ ca kāṃsapātrīya dṛśyate

analyzed: na ca yāti svakam bimbam evam lakṣaṇam

analyzed: na eva te rūpa kāyena paśyante buddha vigraham

analyzed: a vigrahaḥ hi ayam dharmaḥ vigrahaḥ na atra kaścana

analyzed: dharma kāyena paśyanti ye te paśyanti nāyakam

analyzed: pratītya pratinirdiṣṭāḥ a prati pratideśitāḥ

analyzed: na atra utthāpyakaḥ hi asti yasya skandhāḥ samutthitāḥ

original: (Vaidya 198)
analyzed: vaidya

original: yathāntarīkṣaṃ gaganamevaṃ dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: yathā āntarīkṣam gaganam evam lakṣaṇam

original: pūrvāntamaparāntaṃ ca pratyutpannaṃ ca paśyantaḥ // SRS_32.39 //
analyzed: pūrva antam apara antam ca pratyutpannam ca paśyantaḥ

original: agrāhyaṃ gaganaṃ proktaṃ grāhyamatra na labhyate /
analyzed: agrāhyam gaganam proktam grāhyam atra na labhyate

original: eṣa svabhāvo dharmāṇāmagrāhyo gaganopamaḥ // SRS_32.40 //
analyzed: eṣa svabhāvaḥ dharmāṇām agrāhyaḥ gagana upamaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ ca u na paśyatī dharmam tasya dharmāḥ acintiyāḥ

analyzed: yoginām gocaraḥ hi eṣa ye yuktāḥ buddha bodhaye

original: ya evaṃ jānāti dharmān sa na dharmeṣu sajjate /
analyzed: yaḥ evam jānāti dharmān sa na dharmeṣu sajjate

original: asajjamāno dharmeṣu dharmasaṃjñā prabodhayī // SRS_32.43 //
analyzed: a sajjamānaḥ dharmeṣu dharma saṃjñā prabodhayī

original: vibhāvitāḥ sarvadharmā bodhisattvena tāyinā /
analyzed: vibhāvitāḥ sarva dharmāḥ bodhisattvena tāyinā

original: dharmasaṃjñā vibhāvitvā buddhadharmānna manyate // SRS_32.44 //
analyzed: dharma saṃjñāḥ vibhāvitvā buddha dharmān na manyate

original: amanyamānā hi sā koṭī kalpetvā koṭi vyāhṛtā /

original: ya evaṃ koṭiṃ jānāti kalpakoṭiṃ na manyate // SRS_32.45 //
analyzed: yaḥ evam koṭim jānāti kalpa koṭim na manyate

original: purimāṃ koṭi kalpitvā bālaḥ saṃsāri saṃsari /

original: na cāsya labhyate sthānaṃ gaveṣitvā diśo daśa // SRS_32.46 //
analyzed: na ca asya labhyate sthānam gaveṣitvā diśaḥ daśa

original: śūnyaṃ jñātvā ca saṃsāraṃ bodhisattvo na sajjate /

original: caranti caiva bodhyarthaṃ caristeṣāṃ na labhyate // SRS_32.47 //

original: śakunānāṃ yathākāśe padaṃ teṣāṃ na labhyate /

original: evaṃsvabhāvā sā bodhirbodhisattvaiśca budhyate // SRS_32.48 //
analyzed: evaṃsvabhāvā sā bodhiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ ca budhyate

original: yathā māyāṃ vidarśeti māyākāraḥ suśikṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā māyām vidarśa iti māyākāraḥ su śikṣitaḥ

original: nānāprakārarūpāṇi na ca rūpopalabhyate // SRS_32.49 //
analyzed: nānā prakāra rūpāṇi na ca rūpā upalabhyate

original: alabdhilabdhirno manye labdhe labdhirna vidyate /
analyzed: a labdhi labdhiḥ naḥ manye labdhe labdhiḥ na vidyate

original: māyopamaṃ ca tajjñānaṃ na māyāyāṃ ca tat sthitam // SRS_32.50 //
analyzed: māyā upamam ca tat jñānam na māyāyām ca tat sthitam

original: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu bālabuddhiṃ vikalpayet /
analyzed: evam śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu bāla buddhim vikalpayet

original: vikalpe caramāṇānāṃ gatayaḥ ṣaṭa parāyaṇam // SRS_32.51 //
analyzed: vikalpe caramāṇānām gatayaḥ ṣaṭ parāyaṇam

original: jātijaropagāḥ sattvā jātisteṣāṃ na kṣīyate /

original: jātimaraṇaskandhānāṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāmanantakam // SRS_32.52 //
analyzed: jāti maraṇa skandhānām duḥkham teṣām anantakam

original: duḥkho jātisaṃsāro bālabuddhīhi kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhaḥ jāti saṃsāraḥ bāla buddhīhi kalpitaḥ

original: kalpāsteṣāṃ na kṣīyante kalpakoṭyaśca saṃsarī // SRS_32.53 //
analyzed: kalpāḥ teṣām na kṣīyante kalpa koṭyaḥ ca saṃsarī

original: (Vaidya 199)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ayuktāḥ saṃprayuktāśca karmayogasmi te sthitāḥ /
analyzed: ayuktāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ ca te sthitāḥ

original: karmaṇaste na mucyate karmopādāni ye ratāḥ // SRS_32.54 //
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ te na mucyate karma upādāni ye ratāḥ

original: karmaughe vahatāṃ teṣāṃ karma na kṣīyate sadā /
analyzed: karma oghe vahatām teṣām karma na kṣīyate sadā

original: punaḥ punaśca mrīyante mārapakṣe sthitāḥ sadā // SRS_32.55 //
