original: parivāravān so bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ sa abhedyapakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ /
analyzed: parivāravān saḥ bhaviṣyati nityakālam sa abhedya pakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ

original: caramāṇu śreṣṭhāṃ varāṃ śiva bodhicaryāṃ dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.173 //
analyzed: śreṣṭhām varām śiva bodhi caryām dhāritva sūtram virajam samādhim

original: śokātha śalyā tathariva cittapīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya /
analyzed: śokā atha śalyā citta pīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya

original: ārogyaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.174 //
analyzed: ārogya prāptaḥ bhaviṣyati sarvakālam śāntam virajam samādhim

original: ye kāyaśūlāstathariva cittaśūlāḥ ye dantaśūlāstathapi ca śīrṣaśūlāḥ /
analyzed: ye kāya śūlāḥ citta śūlāḥ ye danta śūlāḥ ca śīrṣa śūlāḥ

original: no tasya bhontī vyādhayu jīvaloke dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.175 //
analyzed: no tasya jīva loke samādhim

original: yāvanta rogā bahuvidha martaloke ye kāyarogāstathariva cittarogāḥ /
analyzed: rogāḥ marta loke ye citta rogāḥ

original: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.176 //
analyzed: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti śāntam imu virajam samādhim

original: cittasya vā ye bahuvidhu yatkileśāḥ kāye vāpi bahuvidha rogajātāḥ /
analyzed: cittasya vā ye kāye vā api roga jātāḥ

original: te tasya nāstī bahuvidha saṃkileśā dhāritva śāntaṃ imu viraja samādhim // SRS_32.177 //
analyzed: te tasya bahuvidha saṃkileśāḥ

original: yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca /
analyzed: yathā antarīkṣam gagana manaḥ upaliptam prakṛti viśuddham prabhāsvaram ca

original: (Vaidya 208)
analyzed: vaidya

original: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati viśuddha tasyo dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.178 //
analyzed: cittam tathā eva bhavati viśuddha śāntam samādhim

original: candrasya ābhā tathariva sūryaābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāśca /
analyzed: candrasya ābhā sūrya ābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāḥ ca

original: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati prabhāsvaraṃ ca dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.179 //
analyzed: cittam tathā eva bhavati prabhāsvaram ca śāntam virajam samādhim

original: yatha antarīkṣaṃ na sukaru citraṇāya raṅgān gṛhītvā bahuvidha naikarūpān /
analyzed: antarīkṣam na raṅgān

original: cittaṃ tathaiva na sukaru citrituṃ sevetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.180 //
analyzed: cittam tathā eva na śāntam samādhim

original: vāto yathaiva caturdiśa vāyamāno asajjamāno vrajati diśaḥ samantāt /
analyzed: vātaḥ yathā eva caturdiśa vāyamānaḥ a sajjamānaḥ vrajati diśaḥ samantāt

original: vātasamānā bhavati sa cittadhārā jagi so asakto vrajati anopaliptaḥ // SRS_32.181 //
analyzed: vāta samānā bhavati sa citta dhārā saḥ asaktaḥ vrajati anopaliptaḥ

original: jālena śakyaṃ gṛhṇitu vāyamānaḥ pāśena cāpī bandhitu śakya vātaḥ /
analyzed: jālena śakyam gṛhṇitu vāyamānaḥ pāśena cāpī bandhitu śakya vātaḥ

original: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntamimu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.182 //
analyzed: no tasya cittam vijānanāya śāntam imu virajam samādhim

original: pratibhāsu śakyaṃ jalagata gṛhṇanāya saṃprāptu toyaṃ tathapi ca tailapātre /
analyzed: pratibhāsu toyam ca taila pātre

original: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.183 //
analyzed: no tasya cittam vijānanāya śāntam imu virajam samādhim

original: garjanti meghā vidyulatā carantā śakyaṃ grahītu pāṇina mānuṣeṇa /
analyzed: garjanti meghāḥ vidyutā carantā śakyam grahītu mānuṣeṇa

original: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru pramāṇu jñātuṃ bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.184 //
analyzed: no tasya cittam jñātum śāntam imu virajam samādhim

original: sattvāna śakyaṃ rūtaravitaṃ grahītuṃ ye santi sattvā daśadiśi buddhakṣetra /
analyzed: śakyam rūta ravitam grahītum ye santi sattvāḥ daśa diśi

original: cittasya tasyo na sukaru jñātu koṭiṃ samādhilabdho yada bhavi bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.185 //
analyzed: koṭim samādhi labdhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: (Vaidya 209)
analyzed: vaidya

original: so tāṃ labhitva virajaṃ samādhibhūmiṃ asaṃṃkiliṣṭo bhavati anopaliptaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ tām labhitvā virajam samādhi bhūmim a saṃkiliṣṭaḥ bhavati an upaliptaḥ

original: no tasya bhūyo tribhavi niveśa jātu anena labdho bhavati samādhi śāntaḥ // SRS_32.196 //
analyzed: no tasya bhūyas tri bhavi niveśa jātu anena labdhaḥ bhavati samādhi śāntaḥ

original: no kāmalolo na ca puna rūpalolo na istrilolo na ca puna bhrāntacittaḥ /
analyzed: no kāma lolaḥ na ca punar rūpa lolaḥ na istri lolaḥ na ca punar bhrānta cittaḥ

original: śāntaḥ praśānto bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.187 //
analyzed: śāntaḥ praśāntaḥ bhavati samādhiḥ

original: na putralolo na ca puna dhītalolo no bhāryalolo na ca parivāralolaḥ /
analyzed: na putra lolaḥ na ca puna dhīta lolaḥ no bhārya lolaḥ na ca parivāra lolaḥ

original: suśāntacārī bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.188 //
analyzed: su śānta cārī bhavati samādhiḥ

original: na hiraṇyalolo na ca punararthalolo na svargalolo dhanarataneṣvasaktaḥ /
analyzed: na hiraṇya lolaḥ na ca punarartha lolaḥ na svarga lolaḥ dhana rataneṣu asaktaḥ

original: suviśuddhacitto bhavati sa nirvikalpaḥ samādhiprāpto ayu bhavatī viśeṣaḥ // SRS_32.189 //
analyzed: su viśuddha cittaḥ bhavati sa nirvikalpaḥ samādhi prāptaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: na svargahetoścarati sa brahmacaryaṃ na svargalolo dadati sadā nu vijñaḥ /
analyzed: na svarga hetoḥ carati sa brahmacaryam na svarga lolaḥ dadati sadā nu vijñaḥ

original: saṃbodhikāmaḥ kuśalacariṃ carantaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbodhi kāmaḥ kuśala carim carantaḥ

original: samādhiprāpto ayu bhavatī viśeṣaḥ // SRS_32.190 //
analyzed: samādhi prāptaḥ bhavatī viśeṣaḥ

original: no rājyahetoścarati tapo vrataṃ vā naiśvaryamarthāstribhuvani prārthamānaḥ /
analyzed: no rājya hetoḥ carati tapaḥ vratam vā na aiśvaryam arthāḥ tribhuvani prārthamānaḥ

original: saṃbodhilolo bahujanahitāya niṣpādayī so imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.191 //
analyzed: saṃbodhi lolaḥ bahu jana hitāya saḥ imu virajam samādhim

original: no tasya rāgo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ yo na strīlolo so bhavati bhrāntacittaḥ /
analyzed: no tasya rāgaḥ janayati jātu pīḍām yaḥ na strī lolaḥ saḥ bhavati bhrānta cittaḥ

original: tathāpi tena prakṛtiprajñāya rāgo labhitva etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.192 //
analyzed: tathā api tena prakṛti prajñāya rāgaḥ labhitvā etam śāntam

original: no tasya doṣo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ vyāpādu yeno pratighamatho kareyya /
analyzed: no tasya doṣaḥ janayati jātu pīḍām yena u pratigham atho kareyya

original: (Vaidya 210)
analyzed: vaidya

original: maitrāya teno nihata sa doṣadhātu pratilabhya etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.193 //
analyzed: maitrāya sa doṣa dhātu pratilabhya etam viraju samādhi śāntam

original: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ prajñāya teno nihata sa moha avidyā /
analyzed: no tasya mohaḥ janayati jātu pīḍām prajñāya tena u nihata sa moha avidyā

original: taṃ jñānu labdhaṃ vitimiramaprameyaṃ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.194 //
analyzed: tam labdham vitimiram aprameyam samādhi prāpte aprameyāḥ

original: aśubhāya rāgaḥ satata sunigṛhīto maitryāya doṣo nihatu sadā aśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: aśubhāya rāgaḥ satata su nigṛhītaḥ maitryāya doṣaḥ nihatu sadā aśeṣaḥ

original: prajñāya moho vidhamiya kleśajālaṃ samādhiprāptaḥ pratapati sarvaloke // SRS_32.195 //
analyzed: prajñāya mohaḥ kleśa jālam samādhi prāptaḥ pratapati sarva loke

original: no tasya middhaṃ janayati jātu pīḍāṃ subhāvitā se vividha utkileśāḥ /
analyzed: no tasya middham janayati jātu pīḍām su bhāvitā se vividhe

original: anopalipto bhavati ca vipramuktaḥ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.196 //
analyzed: bhavati ca vipramuktaḥ samādhi prāpte guṇa aprameyāḥ

original: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ tathā hi tyāge abhiratu nityakālam /
analyzed: no tasya mohaḥ janayati jātu pīḍām tathā hi tyāge nityakālam

original: sarvasvatyāgī bhavati sukhasya dātā ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.197 //
analyzed: sarvasva tyāgī bhavati sukhasya dātā yaḥ imam samādhim dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ

original: sthāmenupeto bhavati anopameyo sa balenupeto bhavati nityakālam /
analyzed: sthāmena upetaḥ bhavati sa balena upetaḥ bhavati nityakālam

original: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.198 //
analyzed: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid yaḥ imam samādhim dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ

original: yadāpi rājā sa bhavati cakravartīṃ manujānu loke upagata jambudvīpe /
analyzed: yadā api rājā sa bhavati cakravartīm manuja anu loke jambudvīpe

original: tadāpi bhotī bahujanapūjanīyo viśeṣaprāpto matima viśiṣṭaprajñaḥ // SRS_32.199 //
analyzed: tadā api bhotī bahu jana pūjanīyaḥ viśeṣa prāptaḥ matima viśiṣṭa prajñaḥ

original: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kularatanā viśiṣṭāḥ suprabhūtabhogā bahujanasvāpateyāḥ /
analyzed: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kula ratanāḥ viśiṣṭāḥ su prabhūta bhogāḥ bahu jana svāpateyāḥ

original: yatrāśva hastī rathavara yugyayānā hiraṇyasvarṇaṃ maṇīratanaṃ prabhūtam // SRS_32.200 //
analyzed: yatra aśva hastī ratha vara yugyayānā hiraṇya svarṇam maṇī ratanam prabhūtam

original: (Vaidya 211)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ye śrāddha bhontī iha varabuddhajñāne te jambudvīpe kularatanābhiyuktāḥ /
analyzed: ye iha vara buddha jñāne te jambudvīpe kula ratana abhiyuktāḥ

original: tatropapannaḥ kularatane viśiṣṭe karoti so 'rthaṃ suvipula jñātisaṃghe // SRS_32.201 //
analyzed: tatra upapannaḥ kula ratane viśiṣṭe karoti saḥ artham su vipula jñāti saṃghe

original: aśrāddha ye vā iha kula jambudvipe śraddhāṃ sa teṣāṃ janayati apramattaḥ /
analyzed: ye vā iha jambudvipe śraddhām sa teṣām janayati apramattaḥ

original: yaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhiti sattvakāye te buddha bhontī jinapravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ // SRS_32.202 //
analyzed: yam bodhi citte sattva kāye te buddha jina pravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ

original: te ca spṛśitva atuliyamagrabodhiṃ cakraṃ pravartentyasadṛśa buddhakṣetre /
analyzed: te ca spṛśitvā atuliyam agra bodhim cakram buddhakṣetre

original: ye co vijānī imu tada dharmacakraṃ anutpattidharme nikhila te saṃpratiṣṭhī // SRS_32.203 //
analyzed: ye

original: subahukarāśco ami tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ /
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ

original: karonti te 'rthaṃ atuliya nityakālaṃ sattvāna cakṣurvitimiru te janenti // SRS_32.204 //
analyzed: karonti te nityakālam

original: bahava śatasahasrāḥ sattvakoṭī anantā yeṣa kuśalamūlā bhonti tatra śruṇitvā /
analyzed: bahava śata sahasrāḥ sattva koṭī anantāḥ kuśala mūlāḥ bhonti tatra

original: te api pratilabhante uttamaṃ bodhicittaṃ yada jinu anuśāsī bodhisattvaṃ mahātmā // SRS_32.205 //
analyzed: te api pratilabhante uttamam bodhi cittam bodhisattvam mahātmā

original: aśūnyakṣetrā pramudita bhonti nityaṃ nirupalepā ami tada buddha bhontī /
analyzed: a śūnya kṣetrā bhonti nityam nirupalepāḥ

original: yatra sthihantī imi tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvānamartha aparimitaṃ karonti // SRS_32.206 //
analyzed: yatra bodhisattvāḥ sattvānam artha aparimitam karonti

original: rakṣanti śīlaṃ asadṛśu brahmacaryaṃ bhāvī samādhī vipulamanantakalpān /
analyzed: rakṣanti brahmacaryam bhāvī samādhī vipulam ananta kalpān

original: dhyāne vimokṣe suniśrita nityakālaṃ te bodhisattvā bhavi sada buddhaputrāḥ // SRS_32.207 //
analyzed: dhyāne vimokṣe su niśrita nityakālam te bodhisattvāḥ

original: te ṛddhipādān satat niṣevamāṇā kṣetrāṇi gatvā bahu vividhānanantān /
analyzed: te ṛddhipādān satat niṣevamāṇā kṣetrāṇi gatvā bahu vividhānanantān

original: (Vaidya 212)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ sugatavaraprabhāṣaṃ sarvaṃ ca gṛhṇī pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_32.208 //
analyzed: śṛṇvanti dharmam sugata vara prabhāṣam sarvam ca dhāraṇīye

original: prabhāṣi sūtrānaparimitānanantān ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ /
analyzed: prabhāṣi sūtrān aparimitān anantān ye dhāraṇīye bodhisattvāḥ

original: sattvāna arthaṃ aparimitaṃ karonti ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ // SRS_32.209 //
analyzed: sattvāna artham aparimitam karonti ye dhāraṇīye bodhisattvāḥ

original: cyutopapādaṃ jānāti sattvānāmāgatiṃ gatim /
analyzed: cyuta upapādam jānāti sattvānām āgatim gatim

original: yādṛśaṃ taiḥ kṛtaṃ karma vipāko 'pi ca tādṛśaḥ // SRS_32.210 //
analyzed: yādṛśam taiḥ kṛtam karma vipākaḥ api ca tādṛśaḥ

original: karmaṇo na ca saṃkrāntiraṇumātrāṇi labhyate /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ na ca saṃkrāntiḥ aṇu mātrāṇi labhyate

original: te 'pi teṣāṃ vijānanti bodhisattvā mahāyaśāḥ // SRS_32.211 //
analyzed: te api teṣām vijānanti bodhisattvāḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: śūnyatā ca mahātmānāṃ vihāro bhoti uttamaḥ /
analyzed: śūnyatā ca mahātmānām vihāraḥ uttamaḥ

original: sthāpayanti mahāyāne sattvakoṭīracintiyāḥ // SRS_32.212 //
analyzed: sthāpayanti mahāyāne sattva koṭīḥ acintiyāḥ

original: na teṣāmovadantānāṃ sattvasaṃjñā pravartate /
analyzed: na sattva saṃjñā pravartate

original: apravṛttiṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvāḥ prakāśayī // SRS_32.213 //
analyzed: apravṛttim ca dharmāṇām bodhisattvāḥ

original: na prakāśayatāṃ dharmāṇupalambhaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: na prakāśayatām dharma aṇ upalambhaḥ pravartate

original: śūnyāvihāriṇo bhonti dṛḍhajñāne pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_32.214 //
analyzed: śūnyāvihāriṇaḥ bhonti dṛḍha jñāne pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: uddiśyemaṃ samādhiṃ ca vihāraṃ sarvaśāstunām /
analyzed: uddiśya imam samādhim ca vihāram sarva śāstunām

original: na teṣāṃ vartate saṃjñā istrisaṃjñā svabhāvatā // SRS_32.215 //
analyzed: na teṣām vartate saṃjñā istri saṃjñā svabhāva tā

original: istrisaṃjñāṃ vibhāvitvā bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati /
analyzed: istri saṃjñām bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati

original: bodhimaṇḍe niṣiditvā mārasaṃjñā nivartate // SRS_32.216 //
analyzed: bodhimaṇḍe niṣiditvā māra saṃjñā nivartate

original: na cātra paśyate māraṃ mārasainyaṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: na ca atra paśyate māram māra sainyam ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: na ca paśyati mārasya tisro duhitaro 'pi saḥ // SRS_32.217 //
analyzed: na ca paśyati mārasya tisraḥ duhitaraḥ api saḥ

original: bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya sarvasaṃjñā prahīyate /
analyzed: bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya sarva saṃjñā prahīyate

original: saervasaṃjñāprahīṇasya sarvā kampati medinī // SRS_32.218 //
analyzed: saerva saṃjñā prahīṇasya sarvā kampati medinī

original: sumeravaḥ samudrāśca yāva santi daśā diśe /
analyzed: sumeravaḥ samudrāḥ ca yāva santi daśā diśe

original: taṃ ca sattvā vijānanti sarvadikṣu daśasvapi // SRS_32.219 //
analyzed: tam ca sattvāḥ vijānanti sarva dikṣu daśasu api

original: bodhisattvasya ṛddhyeyaṃ medinī saṃprakampitā /
analyzed: bodhisattvasya ṛddhyā iyam medinī saṃprakampitā

original: ṣaḍvikāraṃ tadā kāle budhyato bodhimuttamām // SRS_32.220 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ vikāram tadā kāle budhyataḥ bodhim uttamām

original: yāvantaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā ye ca dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ saṃskṛtāḥ dharmāḥ ye ca dharmāḥ asaṃskṛtāḥ

original: sarvāṃstān budhyate dharmān dharmaśabdena deśitān // SRS_32.221 //
analyzed: sarvān tān budhyate dharmān dharma śabdena deśitān

original: (Vaidya 213)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na cātra budhyate kaścit siṃhanādaśca vartate /
analyzed: na ca atra budhyate kaścid siṃhanādaḥ ca vartate

original: vartanīyaṃ vijānitvā bhoti buddhaḥ prabhākaraḥ // SRS_32.222 //
analyzed: vartanīyam vijānitvā bhoti buddhaḥ prabhākaraḥ

original: pratītya dharmā vartante utpadyante pratītya ca /
analyzed: pratītya dharmāḥ vartante utpadyante pratītya ca

original: pratītyatāṃ yaddharmāṇāṃ sarve jānanti te viduḥ // SRS_32.223 //
analyzed: pratītyatām yat dharmāṇām sarve jānanti te viduḥ

original: vidhijñāḥ sarvadharmeṣu śūnyatāyā gatiṃgatāḥ /
analyzed: vidhi jñāḥ sarva dharmeṣu śūnyatāyāḥ gatiṃgatāḥ

original: gatiṃ ca te prajānanti sarvadharmagatiṃgatāḥ // SRS_32.224 //

analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena ghoṣadattaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi

analyzed: vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca

original: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho aprameyānacintyānaparimāṇānasaṃkhyeyān
analyzed: sa khalu punar kumāra ghoṣadattaḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ aprameyān acintyān aparimāṇān asaṃkhyeyān

original: sattvānāsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: sattvān āsrava kṣayāya arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvāpya aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān ca sattvān anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau a vinivartanīya tve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛtaḥ abhūt

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūcchrīghoṣo nāma /
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt śrīghoṣaḥ nāma

original: sa tasya tathāgatasya pūjārthaṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhāṇi caturaśītistūpakoṭisahasrāṇi kārayāmāsa /
analyzed: sa tasya tathāgatasya pūjā artham tathāgata dhātu garbhāṇi caturaśīti stūpa koṭi sahasrāṇi kārayāmāsa

original: ekaikasmiṃśca stūpe caturaśīticaturaśītidīpārdhyakoṭīniyutasahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
analyzed: ekaikasmin ca stūpe caturaśīti caturaśīti dīpa ārdhya koṭī niyuta sahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa

original: evaṃ vādyānāṃ tūryāṇāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākānām /
analyzed: evam vādyānām tūryāṇām puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākānām

original: ekaikatra ca stūpe caturaśīticaturaśītikoṭisahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
analyzed: ekaikatra ca stūpe caturaśīti caturaśīti koṭi sahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa

original: ihi hi kumāra sa rājā śrīghoṣastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā caturaśītyā bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇāṃ
analyzed: ihi hi kumāra sa rājā śrīghoṣaḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām pūjām kṛtvā caturaśītyā bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahastrāṇām

original: mahāntaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ kārayitvā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānena
analyzed: mahāntam bodhisattva saṃnipātam kārayitvā teṣām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām sarva sukha upadhānena

original: pūjāyāmudyukto 'bhūt /
analyzed: pūjāyām udyuktaḥ abhūt

original: sarve ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan anācchedyapratibhānāḥ samādhipratilabdhāḥ
analyzed: sarve ca te bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ dharma bhāṇakāḥ abhūvan an ācchedya pratibhānāḥ samādhi pratilabdhāḥ

original: asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhūtaguṇadharmadeśakāḥ pariśuddhadharmadeśakāḥ bodhisattvavaśipāramiprāptāḥ /
analyzed: asaṅga dhāraṇī pratilabdhāḥ bhūta guṇa dharma deśakāḥ pariśuddha dharma deśakāḥ bodhisattva vaśi pārami prāptāḥ

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tatraiva parṣadi kṣemadatto nāma bodhisattvo
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tatra eva parṣadi kṣemadattaḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ

original: mahāsattvo 'bhūcchiśurdaharaḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgate bhadrake vayasi
analyzed: mahāsattvaḥ abhūt śiśuḥ daharaḥ kṛṣṇa keśaḥ prathama yauvana samanvāgate bhadrake vayasi

original: vartamānaḥ avikrīḍitāvī kāmeṣu kaumārabrahmacārī ekavarṣa upasaṃpadā /
analyzed: vartamānaḥ a vikrīḍitāvī kāmeṣu kaumārabrahmacārī eka varṣa upasaṃpadā

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rāja śrīghoṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvamahāsattvagaṇamadhyeṣate sma yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃgītau /
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rāja śrīghoṣaḥ tam mahāntam bodhisattva mahāsattva gaṇam adhyeṣate sma yat uta ṣaṣ pāramitā saṃgītau

original: bodhisattvapiṭakamahādhāraṇyupāyakauśalyavaśivinayāsaṅgābhinirhārārthaṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānadhyeṣya rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ
analyzed: bodhisattva piṭaka mahā dhāraṇī upāya kauśalya vaśi vinaya āsaṅga abhinirhāra artham tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān adhyeṣya rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyām

original: tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ tatrānekāni dīpārdhyakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi prajvālitāni /
analyzed: tathāgata caityasya puratas tatra anekāni dīpa ardhya koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi prajvālitāni

original: siktasaṃmṛṣṭaśodhitaśca maṇḍalamātraḥ kṛto 'bhūt puṣpābhikīrṇo nānāvicitraśayanāsanaprajñaptaḥ /
analyzed: sikta saṃmṛṣṭa śodhitaḥ ca maṇḍala mātraḥ kṛtaḥ abhūt puṣpa abhikīrṇaḥ nānā vicitra śayana āsana prajñaptaḥ

original: rājāpi śrīghoṣaḥ sāntaḥpuragrāmanagarajanapadapāriṣadyaḥ sapauro niṣkrāntaḥ /
analyzed: rājā api śrīghoṣaḥ sa antaḥpura grāma nagara janapada pāriṣadyaḥ sa pauraḥ niṣkrāntaḥ

original: vādyatūryatālāvacarapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
analyzed: vādya tūrya tālāvacara puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: parigṛhītābhistathāgatacaityasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā sārdhamantaḥpūreṇa prāsādatalamabhirūḍho
analyzed: parigṛhītābhiḥ tathāgata caityasya pūjām kṛtvā sārdham antaḥpūreṇa prāsāda talam abhirūḍhaḥ

original: 'bhuddharmaśravaṇāya /
analyzed: abhut dharma śravaṇāya

original: mahatī ca devamānuṣikā pariṣat saṃnipatitā dharmaśravaṇārthikā /
analyzed: mahatī ca deva mānuṣikā pariṣad saṃnipatitā dharma śravaṇa arthikā

original: adrākṣīt kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsatvastāni ca mahānti dīpārdhyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃprajvalitāni /
analyzed: adrākṣīt kṣemadattaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ tāni ca mahānti dīpa ardhya koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi saṃprajvalitāni

original: avabhāsenaiva (Vaidya 219)
analyzed: avabhāsena eva vaidya

original: sphuṭamabhūt /
analyzed: sphuṭam abhūt

original: sadevamānuṣikāṃ ca janatāṃ dharmaśravaṇāya saṃnipatitāṃ viditvā tasyaitadabhūt - ahamapi mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ /
analyzed: sa deva mānuṣikām ca janatām dharma śravaṇāya saṃnipatitām viditvā tasya etat abhūt aham api mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ

original: yannvahamimaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣastathāgatapūjāṃ kuryām,
analyzed: yat nu aham imam samādhim ākāṅkṣaḥ tathāgata pūjām kuryām

original: yathārūpayā pūjayā sadevamānuṣāsuralokaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhaveddharmālokaprāptaḥ /
analyzed: yathārūpayā pūjayā sa deva mānuṣa asura lokaḥ citrīkāra prāptaḥ bhavet ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ bhavet dharma āloka prāptaḥ

original: imāṃ ca sarvāṃ tathāgatapūjāmabhibhaveyaṃ yeyaṃ śrīghoṣeṇa rājñā kṛtā /
analyzed: imām ca sarvām tathāgata pūjām abhibhaveyam yā iyam śrīghoṣeṇa rājñā kṛtā

original: rājā ca śrīghoṣaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ //
analyzed: rājā ca śrīghoṣaḥ citrīkāra prāptaḥ bhavet ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ sa antaḥpura parivāraḥ

original: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattva evaṃcittaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu kṣemadattaḥ bodhisattvaḥ evaṃcittaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ tam mahāntam jana kāyam

original: saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ
analyzed: saṃnipatitam viditvā dharmaśravaṇikānām rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyām tathāgata caityasya puratas

original: sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ cīvarapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā tailaplutaṃ kṛtvā dīpayāmāsa /
analyzed: sthitvā dakṣiṇam bāhum cīvara pariveṣṭitam kṛtvā taila plutam kṛtvā dīpayāmāsa

original: atha khalu kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣamāṇasya tathā pradīpte dakṣiṇe pāṇau nābhūt  #
analyzed: atha khalu kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya adhyāśayena anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim paryeṣamāṇasya tathā pradīpte dakṣiṇe pāṇau na abhūt

original: cittasya mukhavarṇasya vā anyathātvam /
analyzed: cittasya mukha varṇasya vā anyathātvam

original: atha khalu kumāraḥ samanantarapradīpte kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāṇau saṃprajvalite saṃjyotībhūte ekajvālāprāpte,
analyzed: atha khalu kumāraḥ samanantara pradīpte kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāṇau saṃprajvalite saṃjyotībhūte eka jvālā prāpte

original: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ prādurabhūt /
analyzed: atha khalu tasyām velāyām mahā pṛthivīcālaḥ prādurabhūt

original: tasya pāṇau dīpyamānasya prabhayā tānyanekāni dīpārdhyakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhyāmīkṛtānyabhūvan /
analyzed: tasya pāṇau dīpyamānasya prabhayā tāni anekāni dīpa ardhya koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi dhyāmīkṛtāni abhūvan

original: sarvāsu ca dikṣu mahānavabhāso 'bhūt,
analyzed: sarvāsu ca dikṣu mahān avabhāsaḥ abhūt

original: yenāvabhāsena sarvā diśo 'vabhāsitāḥ samantāt sphuṭā abhūvan /
analyzed: yena avabhāsena sarvāḥ diśaḥ avabhāsitāḥ samantāt sphuṭāḥ abhūvan

original: sa prītisaumanasyajāta imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ valgunā
analyzed: sa prīti saumanasya jātaḥ imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitam samādhim valgunā

original: manorameṇa svareṇa viśiṣṭayā vācānuprabaddhaiḥ padavyañjanairvistareṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ
analyzed: manorameṇa svareṇa viśiṣṭayā vācā anuprabaddhaiḥ pada vyañjanaiḥ vistareṇa sarva parṣadam

original: vijñāpayan saṃprakāśayati sma /
analyzed: vijñāpayan saṃprakāśayati sma

original: tatra dvādaśa sahasrāṇi trāyatriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devānāṃ saṃnipatitāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
analyzed: tatra dvādaśa sahasrāṇi trāyatriṃśatkāyikānām devānām saṃnipatitāni dharma śravaṇāya

original: te prītisaumanasyajātā vividhāṃ divyāṃ pūjāmakārṣuḥ,
analyzed: te prīti saumanasya jātāḥ vividhām divyām pūjām akārṣuḥ

original: apsarogaṇāśca divyāḥ saṃgītīḥ prayojayāmāsuḥ /
analyzed: apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ ca divyāḥ saṃgītīḥ prayojayāmāsuḥ

original: adrākṣīdrājā śrīghoṣaḥ upariṣṭāt prāsādatalagataḥ svajanapuraskṛtaḥ antaḥpuramadhyagato
analyzed: adrākṣīt rājā śrīghoṣaḥ upariṣṭāt prāsāda tala gataḥ sva jana puraskṛtaḥ antaḥpura madhya gataḥ

original: 'ṣṭāṅgapoṣadhasamādattaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhunāvabhāsayantaṃ
analyzed: aṣṭāṅga poṣadha samādattaḥ kṣemadattam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam bāhunā avabhāsayantam

original: sarvāḥ prabhā abhibhūya divyayā atikrāntamānuṣikayāvabhāsitam /
analyzed: sarvāḥ prabhāḥ abhibhūya divyayā atikrānta mānuṣikayā avabhāsitam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhūt - abhijñāprāpto batāyaṃ kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya etat abhūt abhijñā prāptaḥ bata ayam kṣemadattaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: sa tīvraṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ ca cipasthāpya saparivāro mahākuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhopastabdhaḥ
analyzed: sa tīvram prema ca prasādam ca gauravam ca sa parivāraḥ mahā kuśala mūla puṇya skandha upastabdhaḥ

original: sārdhamaśītyāntaḥpurikābhistataḥ prāsādatalādātmānamutprākṣipat yadut kṣemadattasya
analyzed: sārdham aśītyā antaḥpurikābhiḥ tatas prāsāda talāt ātmānam utprākṣipat yat ud kṣemadattasya

original: bodhisattvasya darśanāya prītisaṃmodanāya /
analyzed: bodhisattvasya darśanāya prīti saṃmodanāya

original: sa gauravanirjātena kuśalamūlena dṛṣṭa eva dharme saparivāro devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparigrahaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: sa gaurava nirjātena kuśala mūlena dṛṣṭe eva dharme sa parivāraḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga parigraham pratilabhate

original: sa devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparigṛhītaḥ
analyzed: sa deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga parigṛhītaḥ

original: punareva rājā śrīghoṣaḥ saparivāraḥ paripūrṇāddhastaśatasahasrikāt prāsādāt patitaḥ /
analyzed: punar eva rājā śrīghoṣaḥ sa parivāraḥ paripūrṇāt hastaśatasahasrikāt prāsādāt patitaḥ

original: na cāsya kāyaviheṭhaścittaviheṭho vā avalīnatā vābhūt //
analyzed: na ca asya kāya viheṭhaḥ citta viheṭhaḥ vā avalīna tā vā abhūt

original: (Vaidya 220)
analyzed: vaidya

original: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ ubhau bāhū pragṛhya mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ ubhau bāhū pragṛhya mahatā jana kāyena sārdham mahāntam

original: nirnādanirghoṣamākrandraṃ cākārṣīt yaduta kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: nirnāda nirghoṣam ākrandram ca akārṣīt yat uta kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: bāhuṃ dahyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃprajvalitam /
analyzed: bāhum dahyamānam dṛṣṭvā saṃprajvalitam

original: sa rājā tena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ //
analyzed: sa rājā tena mahatā jana kāyena sārdham prārodīt aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ

original: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ rājānaṃ śrīghoṣamāmantrayate sma -
analyzed: atha khalu kṣemadattaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ rājānam śrīghoṣam āmantrayate sma

original: kiṃ punasttvaṃ mahārāja anena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamākrandaṃ
analyzed: kim punar tvam mahā rāja anena mahatā jana kāyena sārdham mahāntam nirnāda nirghoṣam ākrandam

original: kurvan rodiṣi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi?
analyzed: kurvan rodiṣi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi

original: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ gāthābhigītena prābhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ kṣemadattam bodhisattvam gāthā abhigītena prābhāṣata

original: kṣemadattaṃ mahāprājñaṃ paṇḍitaṃ dharmabhāṇakam /
analyzed: kṣemadattam mahā prājñam paṇḍitam dharma bhāṇakam

original: aṅgahīnaṃ viditvainaṃ jano 'yaṃ tena roditi // SRS_33.1 //
analyzed: aṅga hīnam viditvā enam janaḥ ayam tena roditi

original: etādṛśaṃ rūpamidaṃ tejorāśisamudgatam /
analyzed: etādṛśam rūpam idam tejaḥ rāśi samudgatam

original: bāhuhīnaṃ viditvā hi bhūyo 'hamapi duḥkhitaḥ // SRS_33.2 //
analyzed: bāhu hīnam viditvā hi bhūyas aham api duḥkhitaḥ

original: yastvayā dīpito bāhuḥ prabhā muktā diśo daśa /
analyzed: yaḥ tvayā dīpitaḥ bāhuḥ prabhāḥ muktāḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: ime jihmīkṛtā dītā divyayā tvatprabhūtayā // SRS_33.3 //
analyzed: ime jihmīkṛtāḥ dītāḥ divyayā tvad prabhūtayā

original: prakampiteyaṃ pṛthivī cittaṃ te na ca līiyate /
analyzed: prakampitā iyam pṛthivī cittam te na ca līiyate

original: tata utpāditaṃ cittaṃ naiṣo avarakovidaḥ // SRS_33.4 //
analyzed: tatas utpāditam cittam na eṣaḥ avara kovidaḥ

original: hastaśatasahasrātaḥ prāsādāt patito hyaham /
analyzed: prāsādāt patitaḥ hi aham

original: sārdhamantaḥpureṇeha na ca me kāyu hiṃsitaḥ // SRS_33.5 //
analyzed: sārdham antaḥpureṇa iha na ca me hiṃsitaḥ

original: sādhu te jñānamāścaryaṃ sādhu cittamanuttaram /
analyzed: sādhu te jñānam āścaryam sādhu cittam anuttaram

original: sādhu vīryaṃ ca svārabdhaṃ sādhuṃ cādhyāśayo mahān // SRS_33.6 //
analyzed: sādhu vīryam ca su ārabdham sādhum ca adhyāśayaḥ mahān

original: yasya hastau vidahyante na jātvastīha iñjanā /
analyzed: yasya hastau vidahyante na jātu asti iha iñjanā

original: prītiprāmodyajātaśca bhūyo dharmaṃ prabhāṣate // SRS_33.7 //
analyzed: prīti prāmodya jātaḥ ca bhūyas dharmam prabhāṣate

original: pūrṇamāsyāṃ yathā candraḥ sūryo vāsau nabhastale /

analyzed: aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān buddha nirmitān nirmāya aparimāṇānām ca sattvānām vinayam kṛtvā

original: (Vaidya 224) āsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya aparimāṇāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya tatraiva divase  #
analyzed: vaidyaḥ āsrava kṣayāya arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpya aparimāṇān ca sattvān anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau a vinivartanīya tve pratiṣṭhāpya tatra eva divase

original: parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
analyzed: parinirvṛtaḥ abhūt

original: tasya khalu punarbhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya caturaśītiḥ varṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi saddharmo 'tiṣṭhat /
analyzed: tasya khalu punar bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya caturaśītiḥ varṣa koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi saddharmaḥ atiṣṭhat

original: tasya ca bhagavato 'cintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājasya tathāgatasya śāsanāntardhānakālasamaye
analyzed: tasya ca bhagavataḥ acintya praṇidhāna viśeṣa samudgatarājasya tathāgatasya śāsana antardhāna kāla samaye

original: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ bahavo bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūtā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: paścimāyām pañcaśatyām vartamānāyām bahavaḥ bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ upalambha dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: teṣāmevaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā na rocante na cādhimucyante pratibādhante pratikṣipanti /
analyzed: teṣām evaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntāḥ na rocante na ca adhimucyante pratibādhante pratikṣipanti

original: īdṛśānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pīḍāṃ kurvanto yāvajjīvitād vyavaropaṇamakārṣuḥ /
analyzed: īdṛśānām ca sūtrānta dhārakāṇām bhikṣūṇām pīḍām kurvantaḥ yāvat jīvitāt vyavaropaṇam akārṣuḥ

original: tairabhisatkārādhyavasitairīdṛśasutrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ sahasraṃ jīvitād vyavaropitamabhūt /
analyzed: taiḥ abhisatkāra adhyavasitaiḥ īdṛśa sutrānta dhārakāṇām bhikṣuṇām sahasram jīvitāt vyavaropitam abhūt

original: tena ca punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūd jñānabalo nāma jambudvīpeśvaraḥ saddharmaparigrāhakaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasaṃpannaḥ /
analyzed: tena ca punar kumāra kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt jñānabalaḥ nāma jambudvīpa īśvaraḥ saddharma parigrāhakaḥ pūrva praṇidhāna saṃpannaḥ

original: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena iha jambudvīpe eko bhikṣurdharmabhāṇako
analyzed: tena khalu punar kumāra kālena tena samayena iha jambudvīpe ekaḥ bhikṣuḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: 'bhūt tasya samādherdhārako bhūtamatirnāmnā tasya rājñaḥ kulapraveśakaḥ kalyāṇamitro
analyzed: abhūt tasya samādheḥ dhārakaḥ bhūtamatiḥ nāmnā tasya rājñaḥ kula praveśakaḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ

original: hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ arthakāmaḥ /
analyzed: hita eṣī anukampakaḥ artha kāmaḥ

original: sa cāsya rājā atṛpto darśanenābhīkṣṇapratikāṅkṣī cābhūddarśanena dharmasaṃkathanopasaṃkramaṇaparyupāsanaparipṛcchāgrahaṇadhāraṇavācanavijñāpanasamarthaḥ
analyzed: sa ca asya rājā atṛptaḥ darśanena abhīkṣṇa pratikāṅkṣī ca abhūt darśanena dharma saṃkathana upasaṃkramaṇa paryupāsana paripṛcchā grahaṇa dhāraṇa vācana vijñāpana samarthaḥ

original: sa khalu punardharmabhāṇako bhikṣuḥ sattvānāmīryācaryādhimuktidhātuvāsanākuśalo 'bhūt /
analyzed: sa khalu punar dharmabhāṇakaḥ bhikṣuḥ sattvānām īryā caryā adhimukti dhātu vāsanā kuśalaḥ abhūt

original: sattvānāmindriyabalavīryavimātratājñānadhātuvāsanākuśalaḥ satyasaṃdhikuśalaḥ visaṃdhiprativacanakuśalaḥ
analyzed: sattvānām indriya bala vīrya vimātra tā jñāna dhātu vāsanā kuśalaḥ satya saṃdhi kuśalaḥ visaṃdhi prativacana kuśalaḥ

original: arthaviniścayakuśalaḥ gambhīrapratibhānaḥ sattvānāṃ vinayavidhijñaḥ pūrvābhilāpī
analyzed: artha viniścaya kuśalaḥ gambhīra pratibhānaḥ sattvānām vinaya vidhi jñaḥ pūrva abhilāpī

original: smitamukhaḥ apagatabhrūkuṭimukho mahadgatacittavihārī mahākarūṇābhiyuktaḥ anabhibhūtaḥ
analyzed: smita mukhaḥ apagata bhrūkuṭi mukhaḥ mahadgata citta vihārī mahā karūṇa abhiyuktaḥ anabhibhūtaḥ

original: sarvaparapravādibhiḥ /
analyzed: sarva para pravādibhiḥ

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rājño jñānabalasya duhitā dārikābhūt ṣoḍaśavarṣā
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rājñaḥ jñānabalasya duhitā dārikā abhūt ṣoḍaśa varṣā

original: jātyā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā jñānāvatī nāma /
analyzed: jātyā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubha varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgatā jñānāvatī nāma

original: tasyāḥ sa bhūtamatirbhikṣurācāryo 'bhūt kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ sa bhūtamatiḥ bhikṣuḥ ācāryaḥ abhūt kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya

original: bhikṣormahākṛṣṇavaisarpaḥ ūrau prādurabhūt duścikitsyo durlabhabhaiṣajyaḥ /
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ mahākṛṣṇavaisarpaḥ ūrau prādurabhūt duścikitsyaḥ durlabha bhaiṣajyaḥ

original: sa vaidyeḥ glānaḥ pratikṣipto 'bhūt //
analyzed: sa vaidyeḥ glānaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ abhūt

original: atha khalu rājā sāntapuraḥ saputraḥ saduhitṛparivāraḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā
analyzed: atha khalu rājā sa antapuraḥ sa putraḥ sa duhitṛ parivāraḥ tam bhikṣum glānam viditvā

original: prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayati sma sārdhamaśītyā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ paurairnāgaraiḥ
analyzed: prārodīt aśrūṇi pravartayati sma sārdham aśītyā strī sahasraiḥ sārdham pauraiḥ nāgaraiḥ

original: sārdhaṃ rāṣṭreṇa naigamajānapadairgaṇakamahāmātraiḥ sārdhamamātyadauvārikapāriṣadyaiḥ /
analyzed: sārdham rāṣṭreṇa naigama jānapadaiḥ gaṇaka mahāmātraiḥ sārdham amātya dauvārika pāriṣadyaiḥ

original: te sarve taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prarodantaḥ aśraṇi pravartayāmāsuḥ - mā khalvayaṃ bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryāditi /
analyzed: te sarve tam bhikṣum glānam viditvā prarodantaḥ pravartayāmāsuḥ mā khalu ayam bhikṣuḥ kālam kuryāt iti

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājño jñānabalasyānyatarā devatā purāṇasālohitābhūdanubaddhā /
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājñaḥ jñāna balasya anyatarā devatā purāṇa sālohitā abhūt anubaddhā

original: sā tasya rājñaḥ svapnāntargatasyāpadarśayati sma - sacet mahārāja etasya bhikṣornavakenāsaṃkliṣṭena mānuṣyeṇa rudhireṇaiṣa kṛṣṇavaisarpa ālipyeta,
analyzed: sā tasya rājñaḥ svapna antargatasya apadarśayati sma saced mahā rāja etasya bhikṣoḥ navakena asaṃkliṣṭena mānuṣyeṇa rudhireṇa eṣa kṛṣṇavaisarpaḥ ālipyeta

original: navakaṃ cāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ mānuṣaṃ māsaṃ nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyeta,
analyzed: navakam ca asaṃkliṣṭam mānuṣam māsam nānā rasa saṃprayuktam bhojanam dīyeta

original: evameṣa bhikṣurasmādābādhād vyuttiṣṭheta /
analyzed: evam eṣa bhikṣuḥ asmāt ābādhāt vyuttiṣṭheta

original: atha khalu rājā jñānabalastasyā rātryā atyayena tataḥ svapnāntarāt prativibuddho 'ntaḥpuramadhyagataḥ imāṃ svapnaprakṛtimantaḥpurāyārocayāmāsa  #
analyzed: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena tatas svapna antarāt prativibuddhaḥ antaḥpura madhya gataḥ imām svapna prakṛtim antaḥpurāya ārocayāmāsa  /

original: - evaṃrūpaḥ svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃrūpaḥ svapnaḥ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ

original: iti hi kumāra tataḥ stryāgārāttataśca rājakulānna kācit strī utsahate tasya (Vaidya 225)
analyzed: iti hi kumāra tatas stryāgārāt tatas ca rājakulāt na kācid strī utsahate tasya vaidya

original: bhikṣostadbhaiṣajyaṃ dātum /
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ tat bhaiṣajyam dātum

original: jñānāvatyapi rājaduhitā imamīdṛśameva svapnamadrākṣīt /
analyzed: jñānāvatī api rāja duhitā imam īdṛśam eva svapnam adrākṣīt

original: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prativibuddhā antaḥpuramadhye imāmeva svapnaprakṛtiṃ mātṝṇāṃ parivārasya cārocayati sma /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar prativibuddhā antaḥpura madhye imām eva svapna prakṛtim mātṝṇām parivārasya ca ārocayati sma

original: na ca kācidutsahate strī tasya bhikṣoretad bhaiṣajyaṃ dātum //
analyzed: na ca kācid utsahate strī tasya bhikṣoḥ etat bhaiṣajyam dātum

original: atha khalu jñānavatī rājaduhitā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā
analyzed: atha khalu jñānavatī rāja duhitā tuṣṭā udagrā ātta manaskā pramuditā prīti saumanasya jātā

original: evaṃ vyavasāyamakārṣīt - yannvahametad bhaiṣajyaṃ svakāccharīrād yathopadiṣṭaṃ navaṃ
analyzed: evam vyavasāyam akārṣīt yat nu aham etat bhaiṣajyam svakāt śarīrāt yathā upadiṣṭam navam

original: rudhiraṃ navaṃ ca māṃsaṃ dadyām /
analyzed: rudhiram navam ca māṃsam dadyām

original: ahameveha rājakule sarvadaharā ca sarvataruṇī ca asaṃkliṣṭakāyavāṅbhanaskarmā ca /
analyzed: aham eva iha rāja kule sarva daharā ca sarva taruṇī ca asaṃkliṣṭa kāya vāc bhanaskarmā ca

original: asaṃkliṣṭaṃ jñānameṣāmi asaṃkliṣṭasya dharmabhāṇakasya svaśarīrāda rudhiraṃ ca māṃsaṃ copanāmayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: asaṃkliṣṭam jñānam eṣāmi asaṃkliṣṭasya dharma bhāṇakasya sva śarīrāt rudhiram ca māṃsam ca upanāmayiṣyāmi

original: apyeva nāmaiṣa bhikṣurasmādābādhād vyuttiṣṭheta /
analyzed: api eva nāma eṣa bhikṣuḥ asmāt ābādhāt vyuttiṣṭheta

original: atha khalu sā jñānavatī rājaduhitā svakamāvāsaṃ gatvā tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dharmāntargatena
analyzed: atha khalu sā jñānavatī rāja duhitā svakam āvāsam gatvā tīkṣṇam śastram gṛhītvā dharma antargatena

original: mānasena svakamūrumāṃsaṃ chittvā nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ praṇītamabhisaṃskṛtya lohitaṃ
analyzed: mānasena svakam ūru māṃsam chittvā nānā rasa saṃprayuktam praṇītam abhisaṃskṛtya lohitam

original: ca pragṛhya taṃ cācāryaṃ praveśya rājño jñānabalasya purato niṣadya lohitena taṃ
analyzed: ca pragṛhya tam ca ācāryam praveśya rājñaḥ jñāna balasya puratas niṣadya lohitena tam

original: visarpamālepayitvā tena ca svabhisaṃskṛtena bhojanena saṃtarpayati /
analyzed: visarpam ālepayitvā tena ca su abhisaṃskṛtena bhojanena saṃtarpayati

original: atha khalu sa bhikṣurajānannaparibudhyamānaḥ apariśaṅkamānastadbhaktaṃ paribhuktavān /
analyzed: atha khalu sa bhikṣuḥ a jānan a paribudhyamānaḥ a pariśaṅkamānaḥ tat bhaktam paribhuktavān

original: samanantaraparibhukte ca tasminnāhāre tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvāstā vedanā pratiprasrabdhāḥ,
analyzed: samanantara paribhukte ca tasmin āhāre tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvāḥ tāḥ vedanāḥ pratiprasrabdhāḥ

original: sarvaśca vyādhirapagataḥ /
analyzed: sarvaḥ ca vyādhiḥ apagataḥ

original: tena vigataparidāhena sarvasukhasamarpitena tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato 'ntaḥpurāttataśca
analyzed: tena vigata paridāhena sarva sukha samarpitena tathā dharmaḥ deśitaḥ yathā tatas antaḥpurāt tatas ca

original: nagarajanapadarāṣṭrasaṃnipātād dvādaśānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni //
analyzed: nagara janapada rāṣṭra saṃnipātāt dvādaśānām prāṇi sahasrāṇām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpannāni

original: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ svakāṃ duhitaraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ svakām duhitaram gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata

original: kutastvayā śoṇitu labdhu dārike kuto idaṃ āhṛtu māṃsa mānuṣam /
analyzed: kutas tvayā labdhu dārike kutas idam māṃsa mānuṣam

original: āhāru yaḥ sādhitu te 'dya dhīte yeno sukhīyaṃ kṛtu dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_34.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ sādhitu te adya dhīte

original: hato hyayaṃ vātha mṛto 'tha labdho yat sādhitaṃ nānarasehi vyañjanam /
analyzed: hataḥ hi ayam vā atha mṛtaḥ atha labdhaḥ yat sādhitam vyañjanam

original: kutaśca te śoṇitu labdhu dārike yeno ayaṃ mocitu vyādhi pāpakaḥ // SRS_34.2 //
analyzed: kutas ca te labdhu dārike yena u ayam pāpakaḥ

original: pituḥ śruṇitvā vacanaṃ ca dārikā jñānāvatī tasya idaṃ bravīti /
analyzed: pituḥ śruṇitvā vacanam ca dārikā jñānāvatī tasya idam bravīti

original: alīnacittā ca giraṃ prabhāṣate śṛṇuṣva tātā yadahaṃ bravīmi te // SRS_34.3 //
analyzed: alīna cittā ca giram prabhāṣate śṛṇuṣva tātā yat aham bravīmi te

original: dṛṣṭastāta mayā svapno devatāyā nidarśitaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ tāta mayā svapnaḥ devatāyāḥ nidarśitaḥ

original: śṛṇuṣva me bhūmipate bhūtamarthaṃ vijānatha // SRS_34.4 //
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva me bhūmipate bhūtam artham vijānatha

original: (Vaidya 226)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sā devatā mamāvicanmānuṣaṃ māṃsaśoṇitam /
analyzed: sā devatā mama avicat mānuṣam māṃsa śoṇitam

original: yo dadyādasya bhikṣusya vyādhermucyet sa pāpakāt // SRS_34.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadyāt asya bhikṣusya vyādheḥ mucyet sa pāpakāt

original: mayā cotthāya śayyātaḥ praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: mayā ca utthāya śayyātaḥ praviśya antaḥpuram nṛpa

original: svapnastadāyamākhyāto jyeṣṭhikānāṃ hi mātṛṇām // SRS_34.6 //
analyzed: svapnaḥ tadā ayam ākhyātaḥ jyeṣṭhikānām hi mātṛṇām

original: ceṭikānāṃ mayākhyātaṃ kā śaktā kartumīdṛśam /
analyzed: ceṭikānām mayā ākhyātam kā śaktā kartum īdṛśam

original: mānuṣaṃ śoṇitaṃ māṃsaṃ rasasiddhaṃ susaṃskṛtam // SRS_34.7 //
analyzed: mānuṣam śoṇitam māṃsam rasa siddham susaṃskṛtam

original: bhojanaṃ ca pradātavyaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam /
analyzed: bhojanam ca pradātavyam śoṇitena ca lepanam

original: kṛṣṇavaisarpato eṣa kathaṃ bhikṣurvimucyate // SRS_34.8 //
analyzed: eṣa katham bhikṣuḥ vimucyate

original: yadi kriyā na kriyate kṣiprametena vyādhinā /
analyzed: yadi kriyā na kriyate kṣipram etena vyādhinā

original: kālaṃ kuryādayaṃ bhikṣurbhaiṣajyena vineti vā // SRS_34.9 //
analyzed: kālam kuryāt ayam bhikṣuḥ bhaiṣajyena vinā iti vā

original: tribhave ko na sattvastyājayet svamāṃsaśoṇitam /
analyzed: tri bhave kaḥ na sattvaḥ tyājayet sva māṃsa śoṇitam

original: imaṃ dṛṣṭvā na ko vidvān kuryāt kāyasmi niśrayam // SRS_34.10 //
analyzed: imam dṛṣṭvā na kaḥ vidvān kuryāt niśrayam

original: antaḥpurasyo prativedayāmyahaṃ na eka nārīpi bhaṇāti dāsye /
analyzed: prativedayāmi aham naḥ bhaṇāti dāsye

original: priyaśca me bhikṣuḥ priyaśca ātmā bodhyarthu tyaktaṃ maya māṃsaśoṇitam // SRS_34.11 //
analyzed: priyaḥ ca me bhikṣuḥ priyaḥ ca ātmā bodhi arthu tyaktam maya māṃsa śoṇitam

original: teṣāṃ na kāyesmi ca bhakti niśritā premāpi naivātmani cāṇumātram /
analyzed: teṣām na ca bhakti niśritā premā api nā evā ātmani ca aṇu mātram

original: tyaktvāpi cātmānu na bhoti durmanāḥ ye bodhi prārthenti śivāmaśokām // SRS_34.12 //
analyzed: tyaktvā api na durmanāḥ ye bodhi prārthenti śivām aśokām

original: antaḥpuraṃ tataḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ tadvismitaṃ abhūt /
analyzed: antaḥpuram tatas śrutvā sarvam tat vismitam abhūt

original: na cātrotsahate kācidenāṃ yojayituṃ kriyām // SRS_34.13 //
analyzed: na ca atrā utsahate kācid enām yojayitum kriyām

original: tato me nāmitaṃ cittaṃ bhikṣordāsyāmi bhojanam /
analyzed: tatas me nāmitam cittam bhikṣoḥ dāsyāmi bhojanam

original: svāni māṃsānyahaṃ chittvā śoṇitena ca lepanam // SRS_34.14 //
analyzed: svāni māṃsāni aham chittvā śoṇitena ca lepanam

original: svakamūruṃ mayā chittvā gṛhītaṃ māṃsaśoṇitam /
analyzed: svakam ūrum mayā chittvā gṛhītam māṃsa śoṇitam

original: māṃsapeśī mayā pakvā nānārasasusaṃskṛtā // SRS_34.15 //
analyzed: māṃsa peśī mayā pakvā nānā rasa su saṃskṛtā

original: bhikṣostasyāturasyāhaṃ dāsyāmi pituragrataḥ /
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ tasya āturasya aham dāsyāmi pituḥ agratas

original: bhojanaṃ mānuṣaṃ māṃsaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam // SRS_34.16 //
analyzed: bhojanam mānuṣam māṃsam śoṇitena ca lepanam

original: śṛṇohi mahyaṃ vacanaṃ narādhipā manuṣyamāṃsasmi avidyamāne /
analyzed: śṛṇohi mahyam vacanam narādhipā manuṣya māṃsasmi a vidyamāne

original: (Vaidya 227)
analyzed: vaidya

original: chittvā svamāṃsāni mayoruto nṛpā sādhetva dattānima dharmabhāṇake // SRS_34.17 //
analyzed: chittvā sva māṃsāni mayā ūrutaḥ nṛpā dattān ima dharma bhāṇake

original: eṣo mayānuttarabodhi arthe svakātta kāyātta kṛto mahārthaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ mayā anuttara bodhi arthe svakāt ta kāyāt ta kṛtaḥ mahā arthaḥ

original: bhikṣuśca muktaḥ kṛtu nirvikāro mayā ca puṇyaṃ kṛtamaprameyam // SRS_34.18 //
analyzed: bhikṣuḥ ca muktaḥ nirvikāraḥ mayā ca puṇyam kṛtam aprameyam

original: rājāpyavocadduhitāṃ kathaṃ te chidyanti kāyāttu svakāttu māṃse /
analyzed: rājā api avocat duhitām katham te chidyanti kāyāt tu svakāt tu māṃse

original: bhaiṣajyayoge kriyamāṇi dārike mā te abhūd duḥkha śarīravedanā // SRS_34.19 //
analyzed: bhaiṣajya yoge kriyamāṇi dārike mā te abhūt śarīra vedanā

original: sa rājadhītā matimān viśāradā tamālapī rāja śṛṇu narādhipā /
analyzed: sa rāja dhītā matimān viśāradā tamālapī rāja śṛṇu narādhipā

original: śrutvā ca tatra pratipadya yoniśo acintiyaḥ karmavipāku tādṛśaḥ // SRS_34.20 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca tatra pratipadya yoniśas acintiyaḥ karma vipāku tādṛśaḥ

original: pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena tātā niraye 'pi sattvā prapacanti dāruṇe /
analyzed: pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena tātāḥ niraye api sattvā prapacanti dāruṇe

original: nirmāṃsa bhūtvā ca samāṃsa bhonti paśyetu karmāṇa phalaṃ acintiyam // SRS_34.21 //
analyzed: nirmāṃsa bhūtvā ca samāṃsa bhonti paśyetu karmāṇa phalam acintiyam

original: pāpena karmeṇa nirmāṃsaśoṇitāḥ kṣaṇena co bhonti samāṃsaśoṇitāḥ /
analyzed: pāpena karmeṇa nirmāṃsa śoṇitāḥ kṣaṇena ca u bhonti sa māṃsa śoṇitāḥ

original: kiṃ vā punā tat kuśalena karmaṇā adhimuktito jāyati māṃsaśoṇitam // SRS_34.22 //
analyzed: kim vā punar tat kuśalena karmaṇā adhimuktitaḥ jāyati māṃsa śoṇitam

original: chidyanti māṃse na mamāsi vedanā āhāri me śoṇitu nāsti iñjanā /
analyzed: chidyanti māṃse na mama asi vedanā āhāri me śoṇitu nā asti iñjanā

original: na dharmakāyasya vraṇo na chidraṃ yadi sarvu chidyeyu mama svamāṃsam // SRS_34.23 //
analyzed: na dharmakāyasya vraṇaḥ na chidram yadi sarvu chidyeyu mama sva māṃsam

original: prītiṃ mayā dharmi parāṃ janitvā chittvā pradattaṃ svakamūrumāṃsam /
analyzed: prītim mayā dharmi parām janitvā chittvā pradattam svakam ūru māṃsam

original: na co mamā tāta vraṇena duḥkhaṃ jānāmi kāyo yathapūrvamāsīt // SRS_34.24 //
analyzed: na tāta vraṇena duḥkham jānāmi kāyaḥ yathapūrvam āsīt

original: (Vaidya 228)
analyzed: vaidya

original: audumbaraṃ puṣpu yathaiva tātā bahukalpakoṭīṣu kadāci dṛśyate /
analyzed: audumbaram yathā eva tātā bahu kalpa koṭīṣu kadācid dṛśyate

original: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇako kadāci dṛśyantiha jambudvīpe // SRS_34.25 //
analyzed: kadāci dṛśyanti iha jambudvīpe

original: yathaiva jāmbūnada niṣku bhāsate paśyanta sattvā na vitṛptimenti /
analyzed: yathā eva jāmbūnada bhāsate sattvāḥ na vitṛptim enti

original: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇakān dṛṣṭvā na tṛpyantiha devamānuṣāḥ // SRS_34.26 //
analyzed: etādṛśa dharma bhāṇakān dṛṣṭvā na tṛpyanti iha deva mānuṣāḥ

original: pītvā yathācchaṃ salilaṃ janasya tṛṣābhibhūtasya tṛṣā vigacchati /
analyzed: pītvā yathā accham salilam janasya tṛṣā abhibhūtasya tṛṣā vigacchati

original: emeva ete vidu dharmabhāṇakā dharmāmṛtaistṛṣṇa vinenti prāṇinām // SRS_34.27 //
analyzed: ema iva ete vidu dharma bhāṇakāḥ dharma amṛtaiḥ tṛṣṇa vinenti prāṇinām

original: sutyaktametanmaya māṃsaśoṇitaṃ yaddattu bhikṣusya gilānakasya /
analyzed: su tyaktam etat maya māṃsa śoṇitam yat dattu bhikṣusya gilānakasya

original: visarpu śāntaśca sa dharmabhāṇake kṛtaṃ mayā gauravu buddhavarṇitam // SRS_34.28 //
analyzed: śāntaḥ ca sa dharma bhāṇake kṛtam mayā gauravu buddha varṇitam

original: cāritravantasya bahuśrutasya imaṃ samādhīvaradhārakasya /
analyzed: cāritravantasya bahu śrutasya imam samādhīvara dhārakasya

original: yanme tu tyaktaṃ svakamātmamāṃsameteṣa dharmāṇa bhaveyya lābhinī // SRS_34.29 //
analyzed: yat me tu tyaktam svakam ātma māṃsam eteṣa lābhinī

original: yathaiva gandhaḥ surabhī manoramaḥ kālānusārī śubha candanasya /
analyzed: yathā eva gandhaḥ surabhī manoramaḥ kāla anusārī candanasya

original: pravāti gandho daśasu diśāsu emeva gandhopama dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.30 //
analyzed: pravāti gandhaḥ daśasu diśāsu ā ema iva gandha upama dharma bhāṇakāḥ

original: yathaiva merurdiśatāsu dṛśyate samantaprāsādiku darśanīyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva meruḥ diśatāsu dṛśyate samanta prāsādiku darśanīyaḥ

original: avabhāsayanto diśatāsu rocate tathaiva merūpama dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.31 //
analyzed: avabhāsayantaḥ diśata āsu rocate tathā eva meru upama dharma bhāṇakāḥ

original: yathaiva stūpaṃ patamānu kaścid vyutthāpayet saṃskari paṇḍito naraḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva stūpam patamānu kaścid vyutthāpayet saṃskari paṇḍitaḥ naraḥ

original: yastatra stūpe 'pi prasādu kuryād vyutthāpito yena sa tasya hetuḥ // SRS_34.32 //
analyzed: yaḥ tatra stūpe api prasādu kuryāt vyutthāpitaḥ yena sa tasya hetuḥ

original: (Vaidya 229)
analyzed: vaidya

original: emevayaṃ dharmastūpo gilānako vimocito lohitalepanena /
analyzed: dharma stūpaḥ gilānakaḥ vimocitaḥ lohita lepanena

original: svakena māṃsena ca dharmagauravād dīpo mayā dīpitu jambudvīpe // SRS_34.33 //
analyzed: svakena māṃsena ca dharma gauravāt dīpaḥ mayā dīpitu jambudvīpe

original: eṣo 'kariṣyad yadi bhikṣu kālaṃ samādhiśabdo 'piha jambudvīpe /
analyzed: eṣaḥ akariṣyat yadi bhikṣu kālam samādhi śabdaḥ api ha jambudvīpe

original: niruddhu sattvāna sadābhaviṣyat cikitsite 'smin sa samādhi labdhaḥ // SRS_34.34 //
analyzed: cikitsite asmin sa samādhi labdhaḥ

original: sarvasya lokasya paritrāṇu bhikṣurandhasya lokasya ca cakṣudāyakaḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya lokasya bhikṣuḥ andhasya lokasya ca cakṣu dāyakaḥ

original: rāgasya doṣasya mohasya caiva cikitsako 'yaṃ mama vaidyarājaḥ // SRS_34.35 //
analyzed: rāgasya doṣasya mohasya ca eva cikitsakaḥ ayam mama vaidya rājaḥ

original: mahadgate citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇu caryāya na tasya labhyate /
analyzed: mahadgate citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇu caryāya na tasya labhyate

original: suviniścitārtheṣu padeṣu śikṣito anābhibhūtaśca parapravādibhiḥ // SRS_34.36 //
analyzed: su viniścita artheṣu padeṣu śikṣitaḥ an abhibhūtaḥ ca parapravādibhiḥ

original: na mahya bhūyo vinipātato bhayaṃ strītvaṃ punarme na ca bhūyu bheṣyati /
analyzed: na bhūyas vinipātataḥ bhayam strī tvam punar me na ca

original: sahasrakalpāna ca koṭiyo bhuyo kṛtvā paraṃ gauravu dharmabhāṇake // SRS_34.37 //
analyzed: ca kṛtvā param dharma bhāṇake

original: yo buddhakṣetrān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ ratanāna pūrṇān dadi nāyakānām /
analyzed: yaḥ buddhakṣetrān gaṅgavālikāḥ nāyakānām

original: yaścaiva pādāṅgulimeka dadyādidaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣyate param // SRS_34.38 //
analyzed: dadyāt idam tatas viśiṣyate param

original: sā dārikā kālamitaśca kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
analyzed: sā dārikā kālam itas ca kṛtvā adrākṣi sahasra koṭyaḥ

original: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā imaṃ varaṃ śāntu samādhi deśayī // SRS_34.39 //
analyzed: sarveṣa ca u śāsani pravrajitvā imam varam śāntu samādhi deśayī

original: sarveṣa teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ caramismi kāle /
analyzed: teṣām dvipada uttamānām parinirvṛtānām kāle

original: (Vaidya 230)
analyzed: vaidya

original: pravrajyalābhinyabhu nityakālamasaṃkiliṣṭāḥ sugatāna putrakāḥ // SRS_34.40 //
analyzed: nityakālam asaṃkiliṣṭāḥ putrakāḥ

original: dīpaprabhasyātha tathāgatasya caritva sā śāsani brahmacaryam /
analyzed: dīpaprabhasya atha tathāgatasya sā śāsani brahmacaryam

original: strībhāvu tasmin vinivartayitvā abhūṣi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_34.41 //
analyzed: tasmin vinivartayitvā dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: maitreya jñānaṃbalu so narendraḥ saddharmaparigrāhaku nityakālam /
analyzed: saḥ narendraḥ nityakālam

original: dīpaṃkaro 'sau abhūddharmabhāṇako ahaṃ ca āsaṃ tada rājadhītā // SRS_34.42 //
analyzed: dīpaṃkaraḥ asau abhūt dharma bhāṇakaḥ aham ca āsam tada rāja dhītā

original: svakena māṃsena ca śoṇitena co upasthito me tada dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
analyzed: svakena māṃsena ca śoṇitena upasthitaḥ me dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: śāṭhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ parivarjayitvā imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā tadā // SRS_34.43 //
analyzed: śāṭhyam ca sarvam parivarjayitvā imam samādhim pratikāṅkṣatā tadā

original: yebhī tadā roditu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā gilānakaṃ pīḍitu vedanābhiḥ /
analyzed: tadā roditu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā gilānakam vedanābhiḥ

original: avivartikāste sada sarvi bhūvan na jātu yātā vinipātabhūmim // SRS_34.44 //
analyzed: avivartikāḥ te bhūvan na jātu yātāḥ vinipāta bhūmim

original: nābhūṣi teṣāṃ sada akṣirogo na śīrṣarogo na ca karṇarogaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sadaḥ akṣi rogaḥ na śīrṣa rogaḥ na ca karṇa rogaḥ

original: na ghrāṇarogo na ca jihvarogo na ca dantaśūlaṃ na kadācidāsīt // SRS_34.45 //
analyzed: na ghrāṇa rogaḥ na ca jihva rogaḥ na ca danta śūlam na kadācid āsīt

original: samantaprāsādiku bhonti nityaṃ śirīya tejena jvalantakāyāḥ /
analyzed: bhonti tejena jvalanta kāyāḥ

original: dvātriṃśaketuśatapuṇyalakṣaṇā upasthito yaistada bhikṣu glānakaḥ // SRS_34.46 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśa ketu śata puṇya lakṣaṇāḥ upasthitaḥ glānakaḥ

original: (Vaidya 231)
analyzed: vaidya

original: mahyaṃ ca te śāsani pravrajitvā pralujyamānānimu buddhabodhim /
analyzed: mahyam ca te śāsani pravrajitvā buddha bodhim

original: dhāritva te gañju tathāgatānāṃ drakṣyanti buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyo // SRS_34.47 //
analyzed: te gañju tathāgatānām drakṣyanti buddhāna

original: susaṃgṛhītvānima buddhabodhiṃ dhāretva nityaṃ ca hi gauraveṇa /
analyzed: buddha bodhim nityam ca hi gauraveṇa

original: te arthu kṛtvā vipulaṃ prajānāṃ drakṣyanti akṣobhya narāṇamuttamam // SRS_34.48 //
analyzed: te arthu kṛtvā vipulam prajānām drakṣyanti akṣobhya narāṇam uttamam

original: śrutvā ca te carya niruttarāmimāṃ lapsyanti prītiṃ cariyāṃ nirāmiṣām /
analyzed: śrutvā ca te niruttarām imām lapsyanti prītim cariyām nirāmiṣām

original: śrutvā ca te ātmana pūrvacaryāṃ kāhinti buddhāna udārapūjām // SRS_34.49 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca te ātmanaḥ pūrva caryām buddhānaḥ udāra pūjām

original: dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn vidu śīlavanto niḥśāṭhiyeno sada sevitavyāḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn vidu śīlavantaḥ sevitavyāḥ

original: akhilaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca vivarjayitvā seveta bhikṣuṃ tada dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.50 //
analyzed: akhilam ca doṣam ca vivarjayitvā seveta bhikṣum dharma bhāṇakāḥ

original: āghātu krodhaṃ ca vivarjayitvā pūjetha putrān mama dharmaśāsane /
analyzed: krodham ca vivarjayitvā pūjetha putrān mama dharma śāsane

original: mā andhabhūtā bahukalpakoṭiyo vinipātaprāptāśca bhaveta duḥkhitāḥ // SRS_34.51 //
analyzed: mā andha bhūtāḥ bahu kalpa koṭiyaḥ vinipāta prāptāḥ ca bhaveta duḥkhitāḥ

original: na śīlu trāyeta śrataṃ ca tasya na dhyānu trāyenna araṇyavāsaḥ /
analyzed: na śīlu trāyeta śratam ca tasya na dhyānu trāyet na araṇya vāsaḥ

original: tadā nu trāyenna ca buddhapūjā vyāpādu kṛtvāna paraspareṇa // SRS_34.52 //
analyzed: tadā nu paraspareṇa

original: iti śrīsamādhirāje jñānāvatīparivartaścatustriṃśatitamaḥ // 34 //
analyzed: iti śrī samādhirāje jñānāvatī parivartaḥ catustriṃśatitamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 232)
analyzed: vaidya

original: 35 Supuṣpacandraparivartaḥ /
atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam

original: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
analyzed: pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ
analyzed: pṛccheyam aham bhagavantam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham kaṃcid eva pradeśam

original: sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt praṣṭavyapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
analyzed: saced me bhagavān avakāśam kuryāt praṣṭavya praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - tena hyānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi,
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etat avocat tena hi ānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham yat yat eva ākāṅkṣasi

original: ahaṃ te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye /
analyzed: aham te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye

original: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtāvakāśo 'smi bhagavan,
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat kṛta avakāśaḥ asmi bhagavan

original: kṛtāvakāśo 'smi sugata praśnavyākaraṇāya /
analyzed: kṛta avakāśaḥ asmi sugata praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ purataḥ āsane niṣadya bhagavantametadavocat -
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ puratas āsane niṣadya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ko nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadiha ekatyā bodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā
analyzed: kaḥ nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yat iha ekatyāḥ bodhisattvāḥ bodhisattva cārikām caramāṇā

original: hastacchedān pādacchedān karṇacchedānakṣyutpāṭanāni aṅgottamāṅgacchedān nigacchanti
analyzed: hasta chedān pāda chedān karṇa chedān akṣi utpāṭanāni aṅga uttamāṅga chedān nigacchanti

original: pratyaṅgacchedāṃśca?
analyzed: pratyaṅga chedān ca

original: vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
analyzed: vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti

original: no ca hīyante?
analyzed: na u ca hīyante

original: na ca parikṣīyante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
analyzed: na ca parikṣīyante anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - sacet tvamānanda jānīyā yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samudānayitum,
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etat avocat saced tvam ānanda jānīyāḥ yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imām anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim samudānayitum

original: etadapi te ca pratibhāyāt /
analyzed: etat api te ca pratibhāyāt

original: kiṃ punaryattathāgataṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyathāḥ /
analyzed: kim punar yat tathāgatam paripraṣṭavyam manyathāḥ

original: tad yathāpi nāma ānanda iha kāścideva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pādatalamupādāya yāvanmūrdhakādādīpto bhavet prajvalitaḥ ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma ānanda iha kāścid eva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pāda talam upādāya yāvat mūrdhakāt ādīptaḥ bhavet prajvalitaḥ eka jvālībhūtaḥ

original: taṃ kaścideva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet - ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ  #
analyzed: tam kaścid eva puruṣaḥ upasaṃkramya evam vadet ehi tvam bhoḥ puruṣa a nirvāpitena ātma bhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāma guṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ  /

original: krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
analyzed: krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva iti

original: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta?
analyzed: tat kim manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ a nirvāpitena ātma bhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāma guṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta

original: ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha no hi idam bhagavan

original: bhagavānāha - krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo rameta paricārayeta parikalpamupādāyānirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān āha krīḍeta ānanda sa puruṣaḥ rameta paricārayeta parikalpam upādāya a nirvāpitena ātma bhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāma guṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ

original: na tveva tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇasya sattvāṃstribhirupāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrānnābhūt sukhaṃ
analyzed: na tu eva tathāgatasya pūrvam bodhisattva cārikām caramāṇasya sattvān tribhiḥ upāyaiḥ duḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrān na abhūt sukham

original: vā saumanasyaṃ vā cittapraharṣo vā /
analyzed: vā saumanasyam vā citta praharṣaḥ vā

original: ye ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā akhaṇḍaśīlā bhavanti achidraśīlāḥ akalmāṣaśīlā aśabalaśīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlāḥ
analyzed: ye ānanda bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ pūrvam bodhisattva cārikām caramāṇāḥ akhaṇḍa śīlāḥ bhavanti achidra śīlāḥ akalmāṣa śīlāḥ aśabala śīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭa śīlāḥ

original: alulitaśīlā akopyaśīlāḥ,
analyzed: a lulita śīlāḥ a kopya śīlāḥ

original: nottānaśīlāḥ,
analyzed: na uttāna śīlāḥ

original: na paradarśanaśīlāḥ na visaṃvādaśīlāḥ,
analyzed: na para darśana śīlāḥ na visaṃvāda śīlāḥ

original: ṛjuśīlāḥ yathāpratijñāśīlāḥ sattvānugrahaśīlāḥ /
analyzed: ṛju śīlāḥ yathā pratijñā śīlāḥ sattva anugraha śīlāḥ

original: evaṃrūpeṇa śīlena samanvāgatā bhavanti,
analyzed: evaṃrūpeṇa śīlena samanvāgatāḥ bhavanti

original: te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anantāṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā na hastacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
analyzed: te ānanda bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ anantām bodhisattva cārikām caramāṇāḥ na hasta chedena parihāṇim nigacchanti

original: na pādacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
analyzed: na pāda chedena parihāṇim nigacchanti

original: na karṇanāsācchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
analyzed: na karṇa nāsā chedena parihāṇim nigacchanti

original: (Vaidya 233) na netrotpāṭanaśīrṣacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
analyzed: vaidya na netra utpāṭana śīrṣa chedena parihāṇim nigacchanti

original: nāṅgapratyaṅgacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
analyzed: na aṅga pratyaṅga chedena parihāṇim nigacchanti

original: na ca vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
analyzed: na ca vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti

original: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
analyzed: kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyakalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairapramāṇairacintyairatulyairamāpyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt /
analyzed: bhūta pūrvam ānanda atīte adhvani asaṃkhyeya kalpaiḥ asaṃkhyeyataraiḥ vipulaiḥ apramāṇaiḥ acintyaiḥ atulyaiḥ a māpyaiḥ aparimāṇaiḥ yat āsīt

original: tena kālena tena samayena ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan
analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan

original: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ

original: śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt
analyzed: tena khalu punar ānanda samayena tasya bhagavataḥ ratnapadmacandraviśuddha abhyudgata rājñaḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya navati kalpa koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi āyuṣpramāṇam abhūt

original: sarvatra ca divase navatikalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi sattvānāmavaivartikatāyāṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
analyzed: sarvatra ca divase navati kalpa koṭī sahasrāṇi sattvānām a vaivartika tāyām buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma

original: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ
analyzed: tena khalu punar ānanda samayena tasya bhagavataḥ ratna padma candra viśuddha abhyudgata rājñaḥ tathāgatasya arhataḥ

analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya caramikāyām pañcāśati saddharma antardhāna kāla samaye

analyzed: saddharma vipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntāḥ bahu jana jugupsitā bahu jana vivarjitā

analyzed: bahu jana viruddhāḥ mahā jana utsṛṣṭāḥ ca abhūvan

original: mahābhayabhairavakāle vartamāne mahopadrave ativṛṣṭikālasamaye anāvṛṣṭikālasamaye
analyzed: mahā bhaya bhairava kāle vartamāne mahā upadrave ati vṛṣṭi kāla samaye anāvṛṣṭi kāla samaye

analyzed: vartamāne vyāla kāla samaye vartamāne vidyut kāntāra kalpa samaye durbhikṣa kāla samaye

analyzed: mithyā dṛṣṭi kāla samaye asamyak dṛṣṭi kāla samaye tīrthika mantra paryeṣṭi kāla samaye buddha bodheḥ

original: pralujyamānakālasamaye vartamāne sapta bodhisattvasahasrāṇi grāmanagaranigamarā rājadhānījanapadebhyo
analyzed: pralujyamāna kāla samaye vartamāne sapta bodhisattva sahasrāṇi grāma nagara nigama rāḥ rājadhānī janapadebhyaḥ

analyzed: nirvāsitāni samantabhadram nāma vana khaṇḍam tat upaniśritya viharanti sma sārdham

original: supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena,
analyzed: supuṣpa candreṇa dharma bhāṇakena

analyzed: sa khalu punar rājā supuṣpacandraḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ ekaḥ rahaḥ gataḥ pratisaṃlīnaḥ divyena

analyzed: cakṣuṣā atikrānta mānuṣeṇa paśyati sma bahvīḥ bodhisattva koṭiḥ avarupta kuśala mūlā

analyzed: anyonyebhyaḥ buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ iha upapannāḥ

original: sacette labheran dhāraṇīdharmaparyāyaśravaṇāya,
analyzed: saced te labheran dhāraṇī dharmaparyāya śravaṇāya

analyzed: na nivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

analyzed: atha na labheran dhāraṇī dharmaparyāya śravaṇāya

analyzed: vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

original: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya
analyzed: atha khalu supuṣpacandraḥ dharmabhāṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan tatas samādheḥ vyutthāya

analyzed: yena asau mahān bodhisattva gaṇaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya tam mahāntam bodhisattva gaṇam etat avocat

analyzed: gamiṣyāmaḥ kula putrāḥ

analyzed: grāma nagara nigama rāṣṭa rājadhānīḥ avataritvā sattvebhyaḥ dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: atha khalu sa mahān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ supuṣpacandraṃ dharmabhāṇakametadavocat - nāsmākamabhipretaṃ yadāyuṣmānito vanaṣaṇḍād grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīravataret
analyzed: atha khalu sa mahān bodhisattva gaṇaḥ supuṣpacandram dharmabhāṇakam etat avocat na asmākam abhipretam yat āyuṣmān itas vana ṣaṇḍāt grāma nagara nigama rāṣṭra rājadhānīḥ avataret

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: bahvayo 'bhimānikā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ/
analyzed: bahvayaḥ abhimānikāḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ

analyzed: saddharma pratikṣepa kālaḥ ca vartate

original: tamāyuṣmantaṃ jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyanti /
analyzed: tam āyuṣmantam jīvitāt vayavaropayiṣyanti

analyzed: āyuṣmān ca atīva prāsādikaḥ abhirūpaḥ darśanīyaḥ prathama yauvana samanvāgataḥ bhadrake vayasi vartate

original: sa dhautakāñcanahāṭakacchaviḥ (Vaidya 234)
analyzed: sa dhauta kāñcana hāṭaka chaviḥ vaidya

original: śaṅkhakundenduvarṇayorṇayā pratimaṇḍito 'pi śobhitalalāṭo nīlakuñcitakeśoṇīṣaśca /
analyzed: śaṅkha kunda indu varṇayā ūrṇayā pratimaṇḍitaḥ api śobhita lalāṭaḥ nīla kuñcita keśa uṇīṣaḥ ca

original: mā te rājaputrā vā anye vā tatpratimā īrṣyāmātsaryopahacetaso jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyanti /
analyzed: mā te rāja putrāḥ vā anye vā tad pratimāḥ īrṣyā mātsarya upaha cetasaḥ jīvitāt vayavaropayiṣyanti

original: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇametadavocat - sacenme ātmā ārakṣyo bhavet,
analyzed: atha khalu supuṣpacandraḥ dharmabhāṇakaḥ tam bodhisattva gaṇam etat avocat saced me ātmā ārakṣyaḥ bhavet

original: na mayā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane ārakṣā kṛtā bhavet /
analyzed: na mayā atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām śāsane ārakṣā kṛtā bhavet

original: tasyāṃ ca velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: tasyām ca velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: na ātmasaṃjñāya vasitva jātu śakyaṃ ihā śāsani rakṣa kurvaṇā /
analyzed: na ātmasaṃjñāya vasitva jātu śakyam iha ā śāsani rakṣa kurvaṇā

original: mahāvitānā sugatāna bodhiḥ prakāśanā paścimi kāli dāruṇe // SRS_35.1 //
analyzed: mahā vitānā bodhiḥ prakāśanā paścimi kāli dāruṇe

original: yo ātmasaṃjñā prajahitva sarvaśaḥ sattvānimān pudgalavādaniśritān /
analyzed: ātma saṃjñā prajahitvā sarvaśas sattvān imān pudgala vāda niśritān

original: rūpāṇi śabdāṃśca rasāṃśca gandhān spraṣṭavyu varjeti sa rakṣi śāsanam // SRS_35.2 //
analyzed: rūpāṇi śabdān ca rasān ca gandhān spraṣṭavyu varja iti sa rakṣi śāsanam

original: buddhāna koṭīnayutānyupasthihedannena pānena prasannacittaḥ /
analyzed: koṭī nayutāni upasthihet annena pānena prasanna cittaḥ

analyzed: chatraiḥ patākābhiḥ dīpa kriyābhiḥ

original: yaścaiva saddharma pralujyamāne nirudhyamāne sugatāna śāsane /
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva saddharma pralujyamāne nirudhyamāne śāsane

original: rātriṃdivaṃ eka careyya śiṣyān idaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣṭu bhoti // SRS_35.4 //
analyzed: rātriṃdivam śiṣyān idam tatas puṇyu viśiṣṭu

original: ye dāni teṣāṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ saddharmi lujyanti upekṣi bhāvayī /
analyzed: ye dāni teṣām puruṣa ṛṣabhāṇām saddharmi lujyanti

original: na tairjinā satkṛta bhonti kecit na co kṛtaṃ gauravu nāyakeṣu // SRS_35.5 //
analyzed: na taiḥ jinā satkṛta bhonti kecid na ca kṛtam nāyakeṣu

original: yuṣme bhotha sukhī svakārthu kuruthā gopāyathā
analyzed: yuṣme bhotha sukhī svakārthu kuruthā gopāyathā

original: ātmanaṃ yuṣme bhotha ihāpramatta vinaye maitrīvihārī sadā /
analyzed: ātmanam yuṣme bhotha iha apramatta vinaye maitrī vihārī sadā

original: śīlaṃ rakṣatha ujjvalaṃ aśabalaṃ śuddhaṃ śuci nirmalaṃ
analyzed: śīlam rakṣathaḥ ujjvalam a śabalam śuddham śuci nirmalam

original: yehī rakṣitu śīlu bhoti amalaṃ buddhebhi saṃvarṇitam // SRS_35.6 //
analyzed: rakṣitu śīlu bhoti amalam buddhebhi saṃvarṇitam

original: (Vaidya 235)
analyzed: vaidya

original: yehī satkṛtu bhonti sarvi sugatā yāvanta pūrve abhūt
analyzed: bhonti sarvi sugatā yāvanta pūrve abhūt

original: tehi trāyitu bhonti sarvajanatā yā bodhisaṃprasthitā /
analyzed: bhonti sarva janatā yā bodhisaṃprasthitā

original: tehī uddharitāḥ bhavanti narakā sattvā bahū pāpakāḥ
analyzed: tehī uddharitāḥ bhavanti narakā sattvā bahū pāpakāḥ

original: yehī rakṣitu bhonti śīlu amalaṃ buddhaiḥ praśastaṃ purā // SRS_35.7 //
analyzed: rakṣitu bhonti śīlu amalam buddhaiḥ praśastam purā

original: dānaṃ detha viśiṣṭa dharmaratanaṃ kṣāntiṃ sadā rakṣathāraṇyaṃ cāśrayathā samādhikuśalā bhāvetha co mārdavam /
analyzed: dānam detha viśiṣṭa dharma ratanam kṣāntim sadā rakṣatha araṇyam ca āśrayatha samādhi kuśalāḥ bhāvetha mārdavam

original: mā co vigraha sarvathā vicarathā śiṣṭāṃ śivāṃ cārikāṃ
analyzed: mā ca u vigraha sarvathā vicarathā śiṣṭām śivām cārikām

original: gacchāmo vayu rājadhāni nagaraṃ sattvāna trāṇārthikāḥ // SRS_35.8 //
analyzed: gacchāmaḥ rājadhāni nagaram trāṇa arthikāḥ

original: tasminnotaratī mahāmatidhare sattvāgrasāre ṛṣau
analyzed: tasmin mahāmati dhare sattva agrasāre ṛṣau

original: vartentī imi aśrukāḥ sukaruṇaṃ pādehi anye patī /
analyzed: imi aśru kāḥ su karuṇam pādehi anye patī

original: mā hī otarahī mahāmati vidu prekṣa vane pādapān
analyzed: mā hī otarahī mahāmati vidu prekṣa vane pādapān

original: mañjugandha manoramān surucirānātmāna trāṇātmakaḥ // SRS_35.9 //
analyzed: mañjugandha manoramān trāṇa ātmakaḥ

original: te 'pī pūrva vināyakā daśabalāḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ
analyzed: vināyakāḥ daśa balāḥ śānta indriyāḥ sūratāḥ

original: gatvā kānani śailaśṛṅgaśikhare bodhādhigamyāṃ varām /
analyzed: gatvā kānani śaila śṛṅga śikhare bodha adhigamyām varām

original: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
analyzed: śreṣṭhām cārika bodhi hetu caritāḥ te puṇya jñānām varāḥ

original: teṣāṃ śikṣihi kānane nivasato mā gaccha tvaṃ suvrata // SRS_35.10 //
analyzed: teṣām śikṣihi kānane nivasataḥ mā gaccha tvam suvrata

analyzed: gātram lakṣaṇaiḥ su ruciraiḥ keśāḥ ca nīlāḥ tavā

original: varṇaḥ kāñcanasaṃnibhaprabhakaro obhāsate medinīm /
analyzed: varṇaḥ kāñcana saṃnibha prabha karaḥ o bhāsate medinīm

original: ūrṇā te bhramukhāntare surucirā śaṅkhanikāśaprabhā
analyzed: ūrṇā te bhra mukha antare su rucirā śaṅkha nikāśa prabhā

original: mā te īrṣyu janitva kāyu vikirī rājānurāje tathā // SRS_35.11 //
analyzed: mā te īrṣyu janitva kāyu vikirī rāja anurāje tathā

original: atha khalvānanda supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ gāthayābhyabhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu ānanda supuṣpacandraḥ dharmabhāṇakaḥ tam bodhisattva gaṇam gāthayā abhyabhāṣata

original: yāvantaḥ parimeṇa āsi sugatāḥ sarvajña kṣīṇāsravāḥ
analyzed: yāvantaḥ sugatāḥ sarvajña kṣīṇa āsravāḥ

original: sarve te 'tha kariṃsu loki tribhave bodhādhigamyāṃ varām /
analyzed: sarve te atha loki tri bhave bodha adhigamyām varām

original: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
analyzed: śreṣṭhām cārika bodhi hetu caritāḥ te puṇya jñānām varāḥ

original: teṣāṃ śikṣaya bodhisatva niyutā sattvāna trāṇārthikaḥ // SRS_35.12 //
analyzed: teṣām śikṣaya bodhisatva niyutā sattvāna trāṇa arthikaḥ

original: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ ṛṣividuṃ pādāni vanditvanā
analyzed: sarve pradakṣiṇam pādāni

original: ghoraṃ āśvasato svananti karuṇaṃ krandanta ārtasvaram /
analyzed: ghoram svananti karuṇam krandantaḥ ārta svaram

original: anye chinna prapāta medini patī mūrcchitva sālo yathā
analyzed: anye chinna prapāta medini patī mūrcchitva sālaḥ yathā

analyzed: na u ca te puṇya nicitaḥ sattva artha kāmaḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: pātraṃ cīvaru gṛhya prasthitu ṛṣī siṃho yathā kesarī
analyzed: ṛṣī siṃhaḥ yathā kesarī

original: no cāsyo guṇadoṣa tatra akarī dharmasvabhāve sthitaḥ /
analyzed: dharma svabhāve sthitaḥ

original: (Vaidya 236)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ghane kānani asmi loki vasataḥ sattvā apāye pati
analyzed: ghane kānani asmi loki vasataḥ sattvā apāye pati

analyzed: saḥ abhūt tam nagaram gamī pura varam sattvānam trāṇa arthikaḥ

original: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭarājadhānīravataritvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
analyzed: atha khalu supuṣpacandraḥ dharmabhāṇakaḥ grāma nagara nigama rāṣṭa rājadhānīḥ avataritvā sattvānām dharmam deśayati sma

original: tena pūrvāhṇe avataritvā sattvānāṃ navanavati prāṇikoṭyaḥ avaivartiṃkatāyāṃ sthāpitāḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
analyzed: tena pūrvāhṇe avataritvā sattvānām nava navati prāṇi koṭyaḥ a vaivartiṃka tāyām sthāpitāḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau

original: na ca tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ

original: so 'nupūrveṇa tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ anupūrveṇa tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ

original: sa tasyāḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāmupasaḥkramitvā anyatarasmin plakṣasālamūle vyahārṣīt /
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyām upasaḥkramitvā anyatarasmin plakṣa sāla mūle vyahārṣīt

analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ prāviśat

analyzed: praviśya ṣaṭatriḥśat prāṇi koṭīḥ avaivartika tve sthāpayati buddha dharmeṣu
