analyzed: na ca tāvat bhakta kṛtyam akārṣīt

original: sa bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya āsthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
analyzed: sa bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ niṣkramya yena bhagavataḥ nakha stūpaḥ tena upasaḥkramyaḥ āsthitakaḥ eva rātriḥdivam atināmayati sma

original: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena dvitīye prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya trayoviḥśatiprāṇikoṭīravaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena dvitīye prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya trayoviḥśati prāṇi koṭīra vaivartika buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: na ca tāvad bhaktakṛtyamakārṣīt /
analyzed: na ca tāvat bhakta kṛtyam akārṣīt

original: sa dvitīyabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati  #
analyzed: sa dvitīya bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ niṣkramya yena bhagavataḥ nakha stūpaḥ tena upasaḥkramyaḥ utthitakaḥ eva rātriḥdivam atināmayati  /

original: sma /
analyzed: sma

original: sa tasyāḥ rātryāmatītāyāḥ trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya navanavatiprāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu  #
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryām atītāyāḥ tri rātra bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya nava navati prāṇi koṭī śata sahasrāṇi a vaivartika buddha dharmeṣu

original: pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayati sma

original: na ca tāvad bhaktakṛtyamakārṣīt /
analyzed: na ca tāvat bhakta kṛtyam akārṣīt

original: sa trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva tṛtīyaḥ rātriḥdivamatināmayati  #
analyzed: sa tri rātra bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ niṣkramya yena bhagavataḥ nakha stūpaḥ tena upasaḥkramya utthitakaḥ eva tṛtīyaḥ rātriḥdivam atināmayati  /

original: sma /
analyzed: sma

original: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena caturthe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya navanavatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena caturthe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya nava navati prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi avaivartika buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: sa caturdivasabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati  #
analyzed: sa catur divasa bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ niṣkramya yena bhagavataḥ nakha stūpaḥ tena upasaḥkramyaḥ utthitakaḥ eva rātriḥ divam atināmayati  /

original: sma /
analyzed: sma

original: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena pañcame divase ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya rājño 'ntaḥpuraḥ prāviśat /
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena pañcame divase ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya rājñaḥ antaḥpuraḥ prāviśat

original: pravisya cāśītiḥ strīsahasrāṇyavaivartikatve 'nuttarāyāḥ samaksaḥbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
analyzed: pravisya ca aśītiḥ strī sahasrāṇi a vaivartika tve anuttarāyāḥ samaksaḥ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati sma

original: tasmācca nagarāt sarvasattvānavaivartikatāyāḥ sthāpayati buddhadharmeṣu /
analyzed: tasmāt ca nagarāt sarva sattvān avaivartika tāyāḥ sthāpayati buddha dharmeṣu

original: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena ṣaṣṭhe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya sahasraḥ
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ rātryāḥ atyayena ṣaṣṭhe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya sahasraḥ

original: rājaputrāṇāmavaivartikatve sthāpayati sma anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
analyzed: rāja putrāṇām avaivartika tve sthāpayati sma anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau

original: na ca tāvad bhaktasya kṛtyaḥ karoti sma /
analyzed: na ca tāvat bhaktasya kṛtyaḥ karoti sma

original: sa ṣaṣṭhe bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
analyzed: sa ṣaṣṭhe bhakta cheda chinnaḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ niṣkramya yena bhagavataḥ nakha stūpaḥ tena upasaḥkramya rātriḥdivam atināmayati sma

original: sa tasya rātryā atyayena saptame purobhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśyādrākṣīcchūradattaḥ
analyzed: sa tasya rātryāḥ atyayena saptame purobhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya adrākṣīt śūradattaḥ

original: rājānamudyānamabhiniṣkramantaḥ suvarṇamayena rathena rūpyamayaiḥ pakṣabhiruragasāracandanamayyā
analyzed: rājānam udyānam abhiniṣkramantaḥ suvarṇa mayena rathena rūpya mayaiḥ pakṣabhiḥ uragasāracandana mayyā

original: īṣayā vaidūryamayaiścakraiḥ ucchritacchatradhvajasamalaḥkṛtena īṣāpaṭṭāvanaddhena
analyzed: īṣayā vaidūrya mayaiḥ cakraiḥ ucchrita chatra dhvaja samalaḥkṛtena īṣā paṭṭa avanaddhena

original: dūṣyapaṭṭasaḥchāditena (Vaidya 237)
analyzed: vaidya

original: yatrāṣṭau śatāni kumārīṇāḥ ratnasūtraparigṛhītānām,
analyzed: yatra aṣṭau śatāni kumārīṇāḥ ratna sūtra parigṛhītānām

original: yāstaḥ rathaḥ vāhayanti abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhravarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāḥ pritikārye audvilyakārye bālānāḥ na piṇḍatānām
analyzed: yāstaḥ rathaḥ vāhayanti abhirūpāḥ prāsādikāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhra varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgatāḥ priti kārye audvilya kārye na piṇḍatānām

original: caturaśītikṣatriyamahāśālakulasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhānyabhūvan /
analyzed: caturaśīti kṣatriya mahāśāla kula sahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhāni abhūvan

original: caturaśītibrāhmaṇamahāśālasahasrāṇi caturaśītigṛhapatimahāśālasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhānyabhūvan /
analyzed: caturaśīti brāhmaṇa mahāśāla sahasrāṇi caturaśīti gṛhapati mahāśāla sahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas anubaddhāni abhūvan

original: pañca ca duhitṛśatāni ratnamayīśibikābhirūḍhāḥ purato niryānti sma /
analyzed: pañca ca duhitṛ śatāni ratnamayī śibikā abhirūḍhāḥ puratas niryānti sma

original: tāḥ sahadarśanenaiva tasya bhikṣoravaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
analyzed: tāḥ saha darśanena eva tasya bhikṣoḥ avaivartikāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau

original: aṣṭaḥaḥṭiścāntaḥpurikāśatasahasrāṇi sahadarśanenaiva tasya bhikḥuravaivartikānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
analyzed: aṣṭaḥaḥṭiḥ ca antaḥpurikā śata sahasrāṇi saha darśanena eva tasya bhikṣuḥ avaivartikāni abhūvan anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau

original: sa ca mahājanakāyo maṇikuṇḍalānyapanīya pādukāścāpanīya ekāḥsaḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya
analyzed: sa ca mahā jana kāyaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalāni apanīya pādukāḥ ca apanīya ekāḥ saḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya

original: dakḥiṇaḥ jānumaṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya yena sa bhikḥustenāñjaliḥ praṇamya namasyamānaḥ sthito 'bhūt /
analyzed: dakḥiṇaḥ jānu maṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya yena sa bhikḥuḥ tena añjaliḥ praṇamya namasyamānaḥ sthitaḥ abhūt

original: atha khalu tā api kumārthaḥ pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saḥcoditāḥ samānāstābhyaḥ śibikābhyo
analyzed: atha khalu tāḥ api kumārthaḥ pūrvakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ saḥ coditāḥ samānāḥ tābhyaḥ śibikābhyaḥ

original: 'vataritvā ekāḥsaḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya dakḥiṇaḥ jānumaṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya
analyzed: avataritvā ekāḥsaḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya dakḥiṇaḥ jānumaṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya

original: yena sa bhi stenāñjāla praṇamya gāthābhiradhyabhāḥanta -
analyzed: yena sa stenān jāla praṇamya gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣanta

original: avabhāsitamadyaivaṃ raviṇeva samantataḥ /
analyzed: avabhāsitam adyā evam raviṇā iva samantataḥ

original: bhikṣuṇā praviśantena janakāyaśca dhiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_35.15 //
analyzed: bhikṣuṇā praviśantena jana kāyaḥ ca dhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: rāgadoṣāḥ samucchinnā mohāśca vidhamīkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: rāga doṣāḥ samucchinnāḥ mohāḥ ca vidhamīkṛtāḥ

original: krodho doṣaśca īrṣyā ca sarvaṃ chinnaṃ tadantaram // SRS_35.16 //
analyzed: krodhaḥ doṣaḥ ca īrṣyā ca sarvam chinnam tad antaram

original: na rājaṃ prekṣate kaścinnaṃ caivamanuyātyasau /
analyzed: na rājam prekṣate kaścid nam ca evam anuyāti asau

original: yo rājñaḥ śūradattasya parivāraḥ sutādikaḥ // SRS_35.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ rājñaḥ śūradattasya parivāraḥ suta ādikaḥ

original: pūrṇamāsyāṃ yathā candro nakṣatraparivāritaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇamāsyām yathā candraḥ nakṣatra parivāritaḥ

original: evaṃ sa śobhate bhikṣū rājaputrapuraskṛtaḥ // SRS_35.18 //
analyzed: evam sa śobhate bhikṣuḥ rāja putra puraskṛtaḥ

original: svarṇabimbaṃ yathā citraṃ kuśalebhiḥ sucitritam /
analyzed: svarṇa bimbam yathā citram kuśalebhiḥ su citritam

original: puṣpitaḥ sālarājo vā emeva bhikṣu śobhate // SRS_35.19 //
analyzed: puṣpitaḥ sāla rājaḥ vā emā iva bhikṣu śobhate

original: śakraśca devendra mahānubhāvaḥ sahasranetrādhipatiḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
analyzed: śakraḥ ca deva indra mahā anubhāvaḥ sahasranetra adhipatiḥ puraṃdaraḥ

original: sumerumūrdhni tridaśāna īśvaro emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam // SRS_35.20 //
analyzed: sumeru mūrdhni bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate ayam

original: brahmeva manye pratiṣṭhitu brahmaloke sunirmito vādhipati devaputraḥ /
analyzed: brahmā iva manye brahma loke sunirmitaḥ vā adhipati devaputraḥ

original: suyāmu devo yathariva kāmadhātau emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam // SRS_35.21 //
analyzed: devaḥ kāmadhātau bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate ayam

original: (Vaidya 238)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sūryo vā manye pratapati antarīkṣe sahasraraśmirvidhamiya andhakāram /
analyzed: sūryaḥ vā manye pratapati antarīkṣe sahasra raśmiḥ vidhamiya andhakāram

original: obhāsayanto samu diśatā samantād emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam // SRS_35.22 //
analyzed: samu diśata samantāt bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate ayam

original: dānaṃ daditvā suvipula nantakalpān rakṣitva śīlaṃ aśabalu nityakālam /
analyzed: dānam daditvā nanta kalpān rakṣitvā śīlam

original: bhāvetva kṣāntimasadṛśa sarvaloke so lakṣaṇebhiḥ parivṛtu eva śobhī // SRS_35.23 //
analyzed: sarva loke saḥ lakṣaṇebhiḥ śobhī

original: janayitva vīryaṃ ariyajanapraśastaṃ sevitva dhyānā caturi alīnacittaḥ /
analyzed: janayitvā vīryam ariya jana praśastam sevitvā dhyānā caturi alīna cittaḥ

original: utpādya prajñāṃ nihaniya kleśajālaṃ tenaiṣa bhikṣuḥ pratapati sarvaloke // SRS_35.24 //
analyzed: utpādya prajñām kleśa jālam tena eṣa bhikṣuḥ pratapati sarva loke

original: ye buddhavīrā asadṛśa sattvasārāḥ samatīta śūrā vikiriya dharmaśreṣṭhān /
analyzed: ye buddha vīrāḥ asadṛśa sattva sārāḥ dharma śreṣṭhān

original: ye 'nāgate 'dhve tathariva pratyutpanne tenaiṣa putro vaśagānu dharmarājñaḥ // SRS_35.25 //
analyzed: ye anāgate adhve pratyutpanne tena eṣa putraḥ vaśaga anu dharmarājñaḥ

original: mā te anityaṃ bhavatu kadāci bhikṣo yadrapataivaṃ pratapasi sarvaloke /
analyzed: mā te anityam bhavatu kadācid bhikṣo yat rapata evam pratapasi sarva loke

original: saṃpaśya tejo surucira śabdaghoṣo rājāna tejo na tapati suṣṭhu bhūyaḥ // SRS_35.26 //
analyzed: saṃpaśya su rucira śabda ghoṣaḥ tejaḥ na tapati suṣṭhu bhūyas

original: dharmo yathāyaṃ adhigatu ātmanā te buddhānujñāto vicarasi sarvaloke /
analyzed: dharmaḥ yathā ayam ātmanā te buddha anujñātaḥ vicarasi sarva loke

original: emeva sarve vijahita istribhāvaṃ sarve 'pi yāmo yathariva eṣa bhikṣuḥ // SRS_35.27 //
analyzed: ā ema iva sarve vijahitaḥ istri bhāvam sarve api yāmaḥ yathā arivas eṣa bhikṣuḥ

original: te añjalīyo daśanakha kṛtva sarve bhāṣitva gāthāḥ kṣipiṃsu pilandhanāni /
analyzed: sarve bhāṣitva gāthāḥ kṣipiṃsu pilandhanāni

original: sauvarṇamālā tathapi ca muktahārānavataṃsakāni tathapi ca karṇaniṣkān // SRS_35.28 //
analyzed: sauvarṇa mālā tathā api ca mukta hārān avataṃsakāni tathā api ca karṇa niṣkān

original: rājā vai yatha cakravarti balavān sarvān vipaśyī mahī
analyzed: rājā vai cakravarti balavān sarvān vipaśyī mahī

original: putrasaṃjña upasthapeti vicaran dvīpāni catvārime /
analyzed: putra saṃjñaḥ upasthapā iti vicaran dvīpāni catvāri ime

original: (Vaidya 239)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śreṣṭhī kṣatriya brāhmaṇāṃ gṛhapatī ye koṭṭarājā svakā
analyzed: śreṣṭhī ye koṭṭa rājā svakā

original: no teṣāmatireku sneha janayī sarveṣu premaṃ samam // SRS_35.29 //
analyzed: no teṣām atireku sarveṣu pra imam samam

original: evaṃ śikṣita dhāraṇīvaśagato bhikṣū ayaṃ sūrato
analyzed: evam dhāraṇī vaśa gataḥ ayam

original: bodhyaṅgā bala indriyān bibhajati mārgaṃ ca aṣṭāṅgikam /
analyzed: bodhyaṅgā bale indriyān bibhajati mārgam ca aṣṭa āṅgikam

original: candro vā yatha rātriye pratapati tārāgaṇairmadhyago
analyzed: candraḥ vā rātriye pratapati tārā gaṇaiḥ madhya gaḥ

original: sūryaśco yatha maṇḍalaṃ pratapate vairocanastejavān // SRS_35.30 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam pratapate vairocanaḥ tejavān

original: sarvān buddhānnamasyāmo daśabalān śāntendriyān sūratān
analyzed: sarvān buddhān namasyāmaḥ daśa balān śānta indriyān sūratān

original: yeṣāṃ varṇanu kaścidutsahi naro kalpāśataiḥ kṣepitum /
analyzed: yeṣām kaścid utsahi kalpā śataiḥ kṣepitum

original: kalpā koṭisahasra bhāṣitu bahūn no ced guṇā kṣepituṃ
analyzed: bahūn no ced guṇā kṣepitum

original: no co varṇa kṣipeya lokapravare ekasya romasya hi // SRS_35.31 //
analyzed: no caḥ kṣipeya loka pravare ekasya romasya hi

original: yeno cakra pravartitaṃ asadṛśaṃ jñānopadaṃ deśitaṃ
analyzed: yena u cakra pravartitam a sadṛśam jñāna upadam deśitam

original: nipuṇaṃ dharma prabhāṣitasya virajaṃ no cāsya dṛśyaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: nipuṇam dharma prabhāṣitasya virajam no ca asya dṛśyam kvacid

original: śramaṇābrāhmaṇadevānāga asuraurmāraiḥ sabrahmādibhir
analyzed: śramaṇa abrāhmaṇa deva anāga sa brahma ādibhiḥ

original: no śakto guṇaārṇavaḥ prakathituṃ buddhasya sarvajñinaḥ // SRS_35.32 //
analyzed: no śaktaḥ guṇa arṇavaḥ prakathitum buddhasya sarvajñinaḥ

original: vandāmo jinavaidyarājamasamaṃ yasyedṛśā aurasāḥ
analyzed: vandāmaḥ jina vaidya rājam asamam yasya īdṛśāḥ aurasāḥ

original: bhāṣitvā imi gātha sarvi muditā rājñaḥ kumāryastadā /
analyzed: bhāṣitvā muditāḥ rājñaḥ kumāryaḥ tadā

original: svarṇaṃ kāñcanacūrṇakāṃśca prakirī cailāni ca prastarī
analyzed: svarṇam kāñcana cūrṇakān ca prakirī cailāni ca prastarī

original: cūḍānāṃ ca maṇīn sahārarucirā koṭīśatāmūlikā
analyzed: cūḍānām ca maṇīn sahāra rucirā

original: taṃ bhikṣuṃ abhichādayitva muditā bodhāya saṃprasthitāḥ // SRS_35.33 //
analyzed: tam bhikṣum abhichādayitvā muditāḥ bodhāya saṃprasthitāḥ

original: atha khalu rājñaḥ śūradattasyaitadabhavat - vipratipannaṃ batedamantaḥpuraṃ janakāyaśca vyutthitaḥ /
analyzed: atha khalu rājñaḥ śūradattasya etat abhavat vipratipannam bata idam antaḥpuram jana kāyaḥ ca vyutthitaḥ

original: sa ca jano maṇikuṇḍalānyapanīya ekāṃsaṃ cīvaramāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena sa bhikṣustenāñjaliṃ praṇamya namasyati  #
analyzed: sa ca janaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalāni apanīya eka aṃsam cīvaram āvṛtya dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena sa bhikṣuḥ tena añjalim praṇamya namasyati  /

original: sma /
analyzed: sma

original: sa ca rājā śūradattastāvat prāsādiko 'bhūt tāvaddarśanīyo na ca tāvadabhirūpo yāvadabhirūpaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ /
analyzed: sa ca rājā śūradattaḥ tāvat prāsādikaḥ abhūt tāvat darśanīyaḥ na ca tāvat abhirūpaḥ yāvat abhirūpaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ

original: sa rājyahetoruttrasto 'bhūt /
analyzed: sa rājya hetoḥ uttrastaḥ abhūt

original: rūpakāyapariniṣpattiṃ ca tasya bhikṣodṛṣṭvā atīva roṣamakārṣīt /
analyzed: rūpa kāya pariniṣpattim ca tasya bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā atīva roṣam akārṣīt

original: tasya ca bhikṣo rājamārgasthasya rājñaścakṣurbhyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca bhikṣoḥ rājamārga sthasya rājñaḥ cakṣurbhyām praviṣṭaḥ

original: tasyaitadabhavat - saṃraktacittenaitena bhikṣuṇā mamāntaḥpuraḥ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: tasya etat abhavat saṃrakta cittena etena bhikṣuṇā mama antaḥpuraḥ dṛṣṭam

original: akṣibhyāṃ cānena saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: akṣibhyām ca anena saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tasyaitadabhavat - ka idānīmimaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitād vyavaropayiṣyatīti /
analyzed: tasya etat abhavat kaḥ idānīm imam bhikṣum jīvitāt vyavaropayiṣyati iti

original: atha rājñaḥ śūradattasyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ putrasahasramanubaddhamabhūt /
analyzed: atha rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhatas putra sahasram anubaddham abhūt

original: sa tānāmantrayati sma - vyavaropayadhvaṃ kumārā etaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitāditi //
analyzed: sa tān āmantrayati sma vyavaropayadhvam kumārāḥ etam bhikṣum jīvitāt iti

original: (Vaidya 240)
analyzed: vaidya

original: atha khalu te kumārā rājñaḥ śūradattasya prativahanti sma tasya bhikṣoḥ kṛtaśaḥ /
analyzed: atha khalu te kumārāḥ rājñaḥ śūradattasya prativahanti sma tasya bhikṣoḥ kṛtaśas

original: tasyaitadabhavat - putrā api me ājñāṃ na kurvanti /
analyzed: tasya etat abhavat putrāḥ api me ājñām na kurvanti

original: eka evāhaṃ sthāpitaḥ advitīyaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva aham sthāpitaḥ advitīyaḥ

original: ka idānīmimaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyati?
analyzed: kaḥ idānīm imam bhikṣum jīvitāt vayavaropayiṣyati

original: atha rājñaḥ śūradattasya nandiko nāma vadhyaghātako 'bhūt caṇḍaḥ sāhasiko raudraḥ /
analyzed: atha rājñaḥ śūradattasya nandikaḥ nāma vadhya ghātakaḥ abhūt caṇḍaḥ sāhasikaḥ raudraḥ

original: atha rājā śūradattastuṣṭa udagraḥ āttamanāḥ evaṃ cintayāmāsa - ayaṃ nandika etaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyati /
analyzed: atha rājā śūradattaḥ tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ evam cintayāmāsa ayam nandikaḥ etam bhikṣum jīvitāt vayavaropayiṣyati

original: atha khalu nandiko vadhyaghātako yena rājā śūradattastenopasaṃkrāmat /
analyzed: atha khalu nandikaḥ vadhya ghātakaḥ yena rājā śūradattaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat

original: atha khalu rājā śūradattastamāha - śakṣyasi tvaṃ nandika etaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitādvayavaropayitum?
analyzed: atha khalu rājā śūradattaḥ tam āha śakṣyasi tvam nandike etam bhikṣum jīvitāt vayavaropayitum

original: mahāntaṃ te 'bhicchādaṃ dāsyāmi /
analyzed: mahāntam te abhicchādam dāsyāmi

original: nandika āha - suṣṭhu deva,
analyzed: nandikaḥ āha suṣṭhu deva

original: yathājñāpayasi /
analyzed: yathā ājñāpayasi

original: adyainaṃ bhikṣuṃ jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: adya enam bhikṣum jīvitāt vayavaropayiṣyāmi

original: tena hi nandika yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
analyzed: tena hi nandika yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: tīkṣṇamasiṃ gṛhītvā etaṃ bhikṣorhastapādaṃ chinda /
analyzed: tīkṣṇam asim gṛhītvā etam bhikṣoḥ hasta pādam chinda

original: karṇanāsāṃ chinda /
analyzed: karṇa nāsām chinda

original: anena me saṃraktacittenāntaḥpuraṃ prekṣitam /
analyzed: anena me saṃrakta cittena antaḥpuram prekṣitam

original: ato 'sya saṃdaṃśenākṣiṇī utpāṭaya /
analyzed: atas asya saṃdaṃśena akṣiṇī utpāṭaya

original: atha nandikena vadhyaghātakena tasyāmena velāyāṃ tīkṣṇamasiṃ gṛhītvā bhikṣohastapādāśchinnā akṣiṇī cotpāṭite /
analyzed: atha nandikena vadhya ghātakena tasyām ena velāyām tīkṣṇam asim gṛhītvā bhikṣo hasta pādāḥ chinnāḥ akṣiṇī ca utpāṭite

original: tato 'sau mahān janakāyo rudan krandan paridevamānaḥ punarapi ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: tatas asau mahān jana kāyaḥ rudan krandan paridevamānaḥ punar api ratnāvatīm rājadhānīm praviṣṭaḥ

original: atha khalu rājā śūradattaḥ saptāhasyātyayādudyānagato na ramate na krīḍati na paricārayati /
analyzed: atha khalu rājā śūradattaḥ saptāhasya atyayāt udyāna gataḥ na ramate na krīḍati na paricārayati

original: sa udyānānnivṛttaḥ saptāhasyātyayena ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ prāviśat /
analyzed: saḥ udyānāt nivṛttaḥ sapta ahasya atyayena ratnāvatīm rājadhānīm prāviśat

original: so 'drākṣīttaṃ bhikṣuṃ rājamārge choritaṃ saptāhamṛtakaṃ avivarṇaśarīram /
analyzed: saḥ adrākṣīt tam bhikṣum rājamārge choritam sapta aha mṛtakam a vivarṇa śarīram

original: tasyaitadabhūt - yathāyaṃ bhikṣuravivarṇaśarīraḥ,
analyzed: tasya etat abhūt yathā ayam bhikṣuḥ a vivarṇa śarīraḥ

original: niḥsaṃśayameṣa bhikṣuravaivartiko bhaviṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: niḥsaṃśayam eṣa bhikṣuḥ avaivartikaḥ bhaviṣyati anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: pāpaṃ mayā karma kṛtaṃ mahānagarakasaṃvartanīyam /
analyzed: pāpam mayā karma kṛtam mahā nagaraka saṃvartanīyam

original: kṣiprameva mayā mahāniraye pratipattavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: kṣipram eva mayā mahāniraye pratipattavyam bhaviṣyati

original: tasyaivaṃ cintayataḥ uparyantarīkṣe caturaśītibhirdevaputrasahasrairekarutasvaraghoṣaśabdamudīritam - evametanmahārāja yathā vadasi /
analyzed: tasya evam cintayataḥ upari antarīkṣe caturaśītibhiḥ devaputra sahasraiḥ eka ruta svara ghoṣa śabdam udīritam evam etat mahā rāja yathā vadasi

original: avaivartika eṣa bhikṣuranuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: a vaivartikaḥ eṣa bhikṣuḥ anuttarāyḥm samyaksaṃbodhau

original: tasya tḥvad bhūyasyḥ mḥtrayḥ bhayaṃ ca trḥsaṃ ca stambhitatvaṃ ca romaharṣaścotpanno vipratisḥraścḥbhūt /
analyzed: tasya tḥvat bhūyasyaḥ mḥtrayaḥ bhayam ca ca stambhita tvam ca romaharṣaḥ ca utpannaḥ vipratisḥraḥ cḥbhūt

original: atha rḥjḥ śūradatto duḥkhito durmanḥ vipratisḥrī tasyḥṃ velḥyḥmimḥ gḥthḥ abhḥṣata -
analyzed: atha śūradattaḥ duḥkhitaḥ durmanḥ vipratisḥrī tasyḥṃ gḥthḥ

original: rājyaṃ tyajiṣye tathapi ca rājadhānīṃ hiraṇya suvarṇaṃ tatha maṇimukta ratnān /
analyzed: rājyam tyajiṣye ca rājadhānīm hiraṇya suvarṇam ratnān

original: ghāteyamātmā svaya śastra gṛhya nihīnakarmāsmiha bālabuddhiḥ // SRS_35.34 //
analyzed: nihīna karmā asmi iha bāla buddhiḥ

original: supuṣpacandro 'yamiha bhikṣurāsīd dvātriṃśatā kavacitu lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
analyzed: supuṣpacandraḥ ayam iha bhikṣuḥ āsīt dvātriṃśatā kavaci tu lakṣaṇebhiḥ

original: obhāsayanto praviśati rājadhānīṃ nakṣatrarājo yathariva pūrṇamāsyām // SRS_35.35 //
analyzed: praviśati rājadhānīm nakṣatra rājaḥ yathā iva pūrṇamāsyām

original: (Vaidya 241)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ahaṃ ca hīnaḥ pralulitu kāmabhoge nārīgaṇenā pramuditu niṣkramāmi /
analyzed: aham ca hīnaḥ kāma bhoge nārī gaṇena niṣkramāmi

original: rathābhirūḍhaḥ parivṛtu kṣatriyebhiḥ ayaṃ ca etī surabhi sunetra bhikṣuḥ // SRS_35.36 //
analyzed: ratha abhirūḍhaḥ parivṛtu kṣatriyebhiḥ ayam ca etī surabhi sunetra bhikṣuḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭva bhikṣuṃ pramuditu nārisaṃgho sauvarṇamālānavasiri premajātā /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhikṣum prema jātā

original: sarve gṛhītvā daśanakhu añjalīyo gāthābhigītaistamabhistaviṃsu bhikṣum // SRS_35.37 //
analyzed: sarve gṛhītvā bhikṣum

original: te gītaśabdāḥ praśamita sarvi rājñaḥ sa rathābhirūḍhaḥ parivṛtu kṣatriyebhiḥ /
analyzed: te gīta śabdāḥ praśamita sarvi rājñaḥ sa ratha abhirūḍhaḥ parivṛtu kṣatriyebhiḥ

original: ayaṃ ca etī surabhi sunetro bhikṣurmahānubhāvaḥ sugatavarasya putraḥ // SRS_35.38 //
analyzed: ayam ca etī surabhi sunetraḥ bhikṣuḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ sugata varasya putraḥ

original: mama caiva cittaṃ parama nihīnu māsīdīrṣyāṃ ca krodhaṃ ca tatra janemi mūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: mama ca eva cittam parama mā āsīt īrṣyām ca krodham ca tatra janemi mūḍhaḥ

original: muditaṃ viditva suvipula nārisaṃgho ālokya bhikṣuṃ praviśatu rājadhānim // SRS_35.39 //
analyzed: muditam nāri saṃghaḥ ālokya bhikṣum praviśatu rājadhānim

original: atighorarūpā ahu giri bhāṣi tatra putrasahasraṃ bhaṇami tatkṣaṇasmin /
analyzed: tatra putra sahasram

original: gatvāna bhikṣuṃ prakuruta khaṇḍakhaṇḍāmeṣo hi mahyaṃ parama amitra ghoraḥ // SRS_35.40 //
analyzed: gatvāna bhikṣum prakuruta khaṇḍa khaṇḍām eṣaḥ hi mahyam parama amitra ghoraḥ

original: te kumāra sarve paramasuśīlavanto svahitaiṣicittā abhirata yena bhikṣuḥ /
analyzed: te kumāra sarve parama su śīlavantaḥ sva hita eṣi cittāḥ abhirata yena bhikṣuḥ

original: āṇatti devā na kariya evarūpā śokābhibhūto ahamabhu tasmi kāle // SRS_35.41 //
analyzed: devāḥ na tasmin kāle

original: imu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā parama suśīlavantaṃ maitryā upetaṃ pitaramiva pravṛttam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā su śīlavantam maitryā upetam pitaram iva pravṛttam

original: sudṛṣṭacitto avasari ghātanārthaṃ patito avīcau ahu paścakāle // SRS_35.42 //
analyzed: su dṛṣṭa cittaḥ avasari ghātana artham patitaḥ avīcau paśca kāle

original: yannandiko 'yaṃ iha sthitu rājamārge atiraudrakarmā dukhakaru mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: ayam iha rājamārge ati raudra karmā mānuṣāṇām

original: (Vaidya 242)
analyzed: vaidya

original: āṇatti tenā mama kṛta evarūpā mālāguṇo vā ayamiha chinna bhikṣuḥ // SRS_35.43 //
analyzed: mama kṛtaḥ evarūpā mālā guṇaḥ vā ayam iha bhikṣuḥ

original: samantabhadre vanavari premaṇīye dvijābhikīrṇe kusumitamañjugandhe /
analyzed: samanta bhadre vana vari premaṇīye dvija abhikīrṇe kusumita mañju gandhe

original: so cāpi anyaḥ suvipula bhikṣusaṃgho mātrā vihīno yathariva ekaputrakaḥ // SRS_35.44 //
analyzed: saḥ ca api anyaḥ su vipula bhikṣu saṃghaḥ mātrā vihīnaḥ eka putrakaḥ

original: uttiṣṭha bhikṣo prativasa kānanasmin kṛto te arthaḥ suvipula mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha bhikṣo prativasa kānanasmin kṛtaḥ te arthaḥ su vipula mānuṣāṇām

original: yadrājadhānīmimu tada āgato 'si eṣyanti bhikṣu sukaruṇa krandamānāḥ // SRS_35.45 //
analyzed: yad rājadhānīm imu tadā āgataḥ asi eṣyanti bhikṣu su karuṇa krandamānāḥ

original: puṣpadhvajāni ima kṛta dakṣiṇenā vāmena anye surucira darśanīyāḥ /
analyzed: puṣpadhvajāni ima kṛta dakṣiṇenā vāmena anye surucira darśanīyāḥ

original: prajñapta mārgaḥ sphuṭa kṛta cīvarebhi uttiṣṭha bhikṣo pratibhaṇa dharma śreṣṭham // SRS_35.46 //
analyzed: prajñapta mārgaḥ sphuṭa kṛta cīvarebhi uttiṣṭha bhikṣo pratibhaṇa dharma śreṣṭham

original: cirapraviṣṭo tuhu iha rājadhānyāmeṣyanti bhikṣu sukaruṇu krandamānāḥ /
analyzed: cira praviṣṭaḥ iha rājadhānyām eṣyanti bhikṣu su karuṇu krandamānāḥ

original: mā antarāyo bhava siya jīvitasya pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin // SRS_35.47 //
analyzed: mā antarāyaḥ bhava jīvitasya pralopa kāle

original: yathaiva kaścita puruṣa mahānubhāvo dikṣu vidikṣu satatu vighuṣṭaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva kaścid puruṣa mahā anubhāvaḥ dikṣu vidikṣu satatu vighuṣṭa śabdaḥ

original: mahāprapātaṃ prapatati vasuṃdharāyāṃ sarvābhibhūya tribhavamimaṃ samantāt // SRS_35.48 //
analyzed: mahā prapātam prapatati vasuṃdharāyām tri bhavam imam samantāt

original: emeva bhikṣuriha patito dharaṇyāṃ surūparūpo bhūṣitu lakṣaṇairvaraiḥ /
analyzed: bhikṣuḥ iha patitaḥ dharaṇyām su rūpa rūpaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ varaiḥ

original: adoṣaduṣṭo maya kṛta pāpabuddhinā supuṣpacandro tiṣṭhati khaṇḍakhaṇḍaḥ // SRS_35.49 //
analyzed: adoṣa duṣṭaḥ pāpa buddhinā tiṣṭhati khaṇḍa khaṇḍaḥ

original: bhikṣu iho duḥkhahata sarva eva aprītijātāstathapi ca śalyacittāḥ /
analyzed: sarve eva ca śalya cittāḥ

original: (Vaidya 243)
analyzed: vaidya

original: bheṣyanti kṣipraṃ dṛṣṭvimu dharmabhāṇakaṃ supuṣpacandraṃ hatu patitaṃ pṛthivyām // SRS_35.50 //
analyzed: kṣipram dṛṣṭvā imu dharma bhāṇakam su puṣpa candram hatu patitam pṛthivyām

original: supuṣpacandro yathariva śailarājo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacitu lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
analyzed: su puṣpa candraḥ śailarājaḥ dvātriṃśatībhiḥ lakṣaṇebhiḥ

original: mālāguṇeva pramadagaṇena gṛhya kṣaṇe vikīrṇaṃ kṛtu khaṇḍakhaṇḍam // SRS_35.51 //
analyzed: mālā guṇā iva pramada gaṇena gṛhya kṣaṇe vikīrṇam kṛtu khaṇḍa khaṇḍam

original: kṛtasmi karmaṃ parama sughorarūpam avīci gamiṣye yamaviṣayamanātho /
analyzed: karmam parama su ghora rūpam avīci gamiṣye yama viṣayam anāthaḥ

original: buddhāna bheṣye parama sudūradūre sa bhikṣuḥ kṛtu iha khaṇḍakhaṇḍam // SRS_35.52 //
analyzed: sa bhikṣuḥ kṛtu iha khaṇḍa khaṇḍam

original: na putra trāṇa na pi mama jñātisaṃgho no cāsya mānyā na ca bhaṭapādamūlikāḥ /
analyzed: na putra mama jñāti saṃghaḥ no ca asya mānyāḥ na ca bhaṭa pāda mūlikāḥ

original: meṣyanti trāṇaṃ narakagatasya mahyaṃ svayaṃ karitva parama nihīnakarma // SRS_35.53 //
analyzed: meṣyanti trāṇam naraka gatasya mahyam svayam karitva parama nihīna karma

original: ye 'tīta buddhāstathapi ca ye anāgatāstiṣṭhanti ye co daśasu diśāsu kecit /
analyzed: ye buddhāḥ ca ye anāgatāḥ tiṣṭhanti ye daśasu diśāsu kecid

original: te sārthavāhā daśabalā niṣkileśāḥ śaraṇaṃ upaimī vajraghana ātmabhāvān // SRS_35.54 //
analyzed: te sārthavāhāḥ daśa balāḥ niṣkila īśāḥ śaraṇam upaimi vajra ghane ātmabhāvān

original: dṛṣṭvān bhikṣuṃ kṛtu iha khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ krośaḥ pramuktaḥ sukaruṇa devatābhiḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvān bhikṣum iha khaṇḍa khaṇḍam krośaḥ pramuktaḥ su karuṇa devatābhiḥ

original: gatvāna te ārocayi bhikṣusaṃghe supuṣpacandro itu iha rājyadhānyām // SRS_35.55 //
analyzed: gatvāna te ārocayi bhikṣu saṃghe supuṣpa candraḥ itu iha rājyadhānyām

original: yo 'sau vidu paṇḍitu dharmabhāṇako mahānubhāvo diśividiśāsu ghuṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ asau dharma bhāṇakaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ diśi vidiśāsu ghuṣṭaḥ

original: so bodhisattvo pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye supuṣpacandro hatu iha rājadhānyām // SRS_35.56 //
analyzed: saḥ bodhisattvaḥ dhāraṇīye su puṣpa candraḥ iha rājadhānyām

original: yo deti dānaṃ vividhamanantakalpān yo śīla rakṣatyaśabalamasaṃpravedhim /
analyzed: deti dānam vividham ananta kalpān rakṣati aśabalam asaṃpravedhim

original: yo bhāvi kṣāntīmasadṛśa sarvaloke supuṣpacandro hatu iha rājadhānyām // SRS_35.57 //
analyzed: yaḥ sarva loke su puṣpa candraḥ hatu iha rājadhānyām

original: (Vaidya 244)
analyzed: vaidya

original: yo vīryavantaḥ satatamanantakalpān yo dhyānu dhyāyī caturi alīnacitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vīryavantaḥ satatam ananta kalpān yaḥ alīna citaḥ

original: yaḥ prajña bhāveti kileśaghātakīṃ supuṣpacandro hatu iha rājadhāniye // SRS_35.58 //
analyzed: yaḥ kileśa ghātakīm supuṣpa candraḥ hatu iha

original: yaḥ kāyapremaṃ vijahitva sarvaśo ' napekṣa bhūtvā tatha jīvitāto /
analyzed: yaḥ kāya premam vijahitvā sarvaśas bhūtvā

original: samantabhadrādvanatotaritvā supuṣpacandro hatu iha rājadhāniye // SRS_35.59 //
analyzed: su puṣpa candraḥ hatu iha

original: te rājadhānīṃ praviśitva sūratā ārtasvaraṃ krandiṣu ghorarūpam /
analyzed: te rājadhānīm praviśitvā sūratāḥ ārta svaram krandiṣu ghora rūpam

original: dṛṣṭvān bhikṣuṃ kṛtu iha khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ mūrcchitva sarve prapatita te dharaṇyām // SRS_35.60 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvān bhikṣum iha khaṇḍa khaṇḍam mūrcchitvā sarve te dharaṇyām

original: rājāna taṃ so avaciṣu bhikṣusaṃgho kimāparāddhaṃ tava deva bhikṣuṇā /
analyzed: rājāna tam saḥ avaciṣu bhikṣu saṃghaḥ kim āparāddham tava deva bhikṣuṇā

original: acchidaśīlena susaṃvṛtena yaḥ pūrvajātiṃ smarate acintiyām // SRS_35.61 //
analyzed: acchida śīlena su saṃvṛtena yaḥ pūrva jātim smarate acintiyām

original: eṣo vaśī dhāraṇijñānapārago eṣa prajānātiha śūnya saṃskṛtam /
analyzed: eṣaḥ vaśī dhāraṇi jñāna pāragaḥ eṣa prajānāti ha śūnya saṃskṛtam

original: eṣo 'nimittaṃ jagato nidarśayī praṇidhānasaṃjñāṃ iti sarva varjayī // SRS_35.62 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ animittam jagataḥ nidarśayī praṇidhāna saṃjñām iti

original: eṣo muñci manojña ghoṣa ruciraṃ śāntendriyaḥ sūrato
analyzed: eṣaḥ manojña ghoṣa ruciram śānta indriyaḥ sūrataḥ

original: eṣo pūrvanivāsapāramigato lokasya abhyudgataḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ pūrva nivāsa pārami gataḥ lokasya abhyudgataḥ

original: eṣo buddha svayaṃbhu jñānavṛṣayo lokasya citrīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ buddha svayaṃbhu jñāna vṛṣayaḥ lokasya citrīkṛtaḥ

original: śuddhā cakṣuṣa prekṣiṣū vitimiro atyarthamaitrīkṛpaḥ // SRS_35.63 //
analyzed: vitimiraḥ

original: kāmā hīna jaghanya duḥkhajananāḥ svargasya nirnāśakāḥ
analyzed: kāmāḥ hīna jaghanya duḥkha jananāḥ svargasya nirnāśakāḥ

original: kāmān sevatu bhonti śrotravikalāḥ prajñāvihīnā narāḥ /
analyzed: kāmān sevatu bhonti śrotra vikalāḥ prajñā vihīnāḥ narāḥ

original: kāmān sevatu andhu bhoti manujo mātāpita ghātayī
analyzed: kāmān sevatu manujaḥ mātā pita ghātayī

original: kāmān sevatu śīlavantu vadhayī tasmādvivarjennaro // SRS_35.64 //
analyzed: kāmān sevatu śīlavantu

original: (Vaidya 245)
analyzed: vaidya

original: kāmān sevatu rāja pārthivavarā varjetva ṛddhimimāṃ
analyzed: kāmān sevatu rāja pārthiva varā ṛddhim imām

original: ghorān gacchati karkaśān dukhakarānnarakān bhayānantakān /
analyzed: ghorān gacchati karkaśān dukha karān narakān bhaya anantakān

original: pāpaṃ karma karoti īdṛśa viduṃ bhikṣuṃ vadhetī sadā
analyzed: pāpam karma karoti bhikṣum sadā

original: tasmāt pāpu vivarjitavyu vividhaṃ yo icchi bodhiṃ śivām // SRS_35.65 //
analyzed: tasmāt bodhim śivām

original: rūpāṇi śabdān rasa tatha gandha śreṣṭhān spraṣṭavyadharmān tyajati alīnacittaḥ /
analyzed: rūpāṇi śabdān rasa gandha śreṣṭhān spraṣṭavya dharmān tyajati alīna cittaḥ

original: kāyaṃ viditva yathariva māya tucchaṃ cakṣuṃ ca śrotraṃ tathariva ghrāṇa jihvam // SRS_35.66 //
analyzed: kāyam viditva yathariva māya tuccham cakṣum ca śrotram tathariva ghrāṇa jihvam

original: dāne śikṣitu śīli apratisamaḥ kṣāntiṃ ca vīryaṃ tathā
analyzed: dāne kṣāntim ca vīryam tathā

original: dhyānaṃ sevatu prajñapāramigataḥ sattvāna arthakaraḥ /
analyzed: dhyānam sevatu prajñapārami gataḥ artha karaḥ

original: lokaḥ sarvu sadevakaḥ samanujaḥ prekṣanti maitryā jinaṃ
analyzed: lokaḥ sarvu sa devakaḥ sa manujaḥ prekṣanti maitryā jinam

original: teno cakṣu mahāndhakāragahane budhyanti bodhiṃ śivām // SRS_35.67 //
analyzed: tena u cakṣu mahā andhakāra gahane budhyanti bodhim śivām

original: hastī aśvarathāṃstyajanti muditā aṅgālamañcāṃstathā
analyzed: hastī aśva rathān tyajanti muditāḥ aṅgāla mañcān tathā

original: śibikāṃ dollikayugyayānavṛṣabhān grāmāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi ca /
analyzed: śibikām dollika yugya yāna vṛṣabhān grāmāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi ca

original: nagaraṃ rājya tyajitva svarṇasphaṭikāṃ rūpyaṃ pravālāṃstathā
analyzed: nagaram tyajitvā svarṇa sphaṭikām rūpyam pravālān tathā

original: bhāryāpriyaputradhīrasvaśirāstyajitvā bodhiprasthitāḥ // SRS_35.68 //
analyzed: bhāryā priya putra dhīra sva śirāḥ tyajitvā bodhi prasthitāḥ

original: pūjāṃ co atulāṃ karonti muditāḥ puṣpebhi gandhebhi co
analyzed: pūjām ca u atulām karonti muditāḥ puṣpebhi gandhebhi ca

original: gṛhya cchatradhvajā patāka vividhā saṃgītibhāṇḍāni ca /
analyzed: gṛhya saṃgīti bhāṇḍāni ca

original: no cāpī abhinandiṣu bhavagatiṃ jñātvāna śūnyān bhavān
analyzed: no abhinandiṣu bhava gatim śūnyān bhavān

original: teno lakṣaṇacitritā daśabalā bhāsanti sarvā diśaḥ // SRS_35.69 //
analyzed: tena u lakṣaṇa citritāḥ daśa balāḥ bhāsanti sarvāḥ diśaḥ

original: na kāmadhātau na ca rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātau ca na te niviṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: na kāmadhātau na ca rūpadhātau ārūpya dhātau ca na te niviṣṭāḥ

original: traidhātukaṃ nābhiniviṣṭadharmā ye bodhisattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.70 //
analyzed: traidhātukam na abhiniviṣṭa dharmāḥ ye bodhisattvāḥ dhāraṇīye

analyzed: ātma saṃjñā na ca puna sattva saṃjñā no jīva saṃjñā pudgala saṃjña

original: nityaṃ carantā aśabalu brahmacaryaṃ ye bodhisattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.71 //
analyzed: nityam brahmacaryam ye bodhisattvāḥ dhāraṇīye

analyzed: na bhāva saṃjñā na ca punar abhāva saṃjñā na kṣema saṃjñā na punar akṣema saṃjñā

original: (Vaidya 246)
analyzed: vaidya

original: no saukhyasaṃjñā na punarasaukhyasaṃjñā ye bodhisattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.72 //
analyzed: no saukhya saṃjñā na punar asaukhya saṃjñā ye bodhisattvāḥ dhāraṇīye

original: no astisaṃjñā na punarnāstisaṃjñā no istrisaṃjñā na punaḥ puruṣasaṃjñā /
analyzed: no asti saṃjñā na punar nāsti saṃjñā no istri saṃjñā na punar puruṣa saṃjñā

original: na grāmasaṃjñā na ca nagareṣu saṃjñā no rāṣṭrasaṃjñā na pi nigameṣu saṃjñā // SRS_35.73 //
analyzed: na grāma saṃjñā na ca nagareṣu saṃjñā no rāṣṭra saṃjñā na nigameṣu saṃjñā

original: no rāgasaṃjñā na puna virāgasaṃjñā no doṣasaṃjñā na punaradoṣasaṃjñā /
analyzed: no rāga saṃjñā na punar virāga saṃjñā no doṣa saṃjñā na punar adoṣa saṃjñā

original: no mohasaṃjñā na punaramohasaṃjñā ye bodhisattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.74 //
analyzed: no moha saṃjñā na punar amoha saṃjñā ye bodhisattvāḥ dhāraṇīye

original: no indriyebhirna puna te balebhirbodhyaṅgadhyāne na ca puna te niviṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: no indriyebhiḥ na puna te balebhiḥ bodhyaṅga dhyāne na ca puna te niviṣṭāḥ

original: traidhātuke te pravijahi doṣa sarva ye bodhisattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.75 //
analyzed: traidhātuke te pravijahi doṣa sarva ye bodhisattvāḥ dhāraṇīye

analyzed: no rāga raktāḥ na ca puna doṣa duṣṭāḥ no moha mūḍhāḥ aśaṭha bhavanti nityam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca buddhā daśabala satkaronti no cāpi svargaṃ matidhara prārthayanti // SRS_35.76 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca buddhāḥ daśabala satkaronti no ca api svargam matidhara prārthayanti

original: teṣāṃ śrutvā parata viśiṣṭadharmaṃ no bhuya tasmin bhavati kadāci kāṅkṣā /
analyzed: teṣām śrutvā viśiṣṭa dharmam tasmin bhavati kadācid kāṅkṣā

original: tailasya pātraṃ yathariva accha śuddhaṃ chedācchedaṃ paramata tebhi jñātam // SRS_35.77 //
analyzed: tailasya pātram accha śuddham cheda ācchedam tebhiḥ jñātam

original: snehaṃ kurvatu jāyate anunayaḥ so 'pī kileśo mahān
analyzed: sneham kurvatu jāyate anunayaḥ saḥ kila īśaḥ mahān

original: doṣaṃ kurvatu jāyate 'sya pratigho vairaṃ bhayaṃ pāpakam /
analyzed: doṣam kurvatu jāyate asya pratighaḥ vairam bhayam pāpakam

original: dvāvetau vijahitvanā matigharā bodhāya ye prasthitāḥ
analyzed: dvau etau mati gharāḥ bodhāya ye prasthitāḥ

original: te bhontīha nararṣabhā daśabalā loke samabhyudgatāḥ // SRS_35.78 //
analyzed: te bhonti iha nara ṛṣabhāḥ daśa balāḥ loke samabhyudgatāḥ

original: adhyātmaṃ prajahitva bāhyamapi co dharmasvabhāve sthitāḥ
analyzed: adhyātmam prajahitvā bāhyam api caḥ dharma svabhāve sthitāḥ

original: śīlaskandhu viśodhito aśabalo akhaṇḍa acchidritaḥ /
analyzed: śīla skandhu viśodhitaḥ a śabalaḥ akhaṇḍaḥ a chidritaḥ

original: (Vaidya 247)
analyzed: vaidya

original: no vā teṣu kadāci śīla śabalaṃ no cāpi kalmāṣatā
analyzed: na u vā teṣu śabalam na u ca api kalmāṣa tā

original: dvāvetau parivarjiyā matidharā budhyanti bodhiṃ śivām // SRS_35.79 //
analyzed: dvau etau mati dharāḥ budhyanti bodhim śivām

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: ahaṃ sa pūrve caramāṇu cārikāṃ rājā abhūvaṃ tada śūradattaḥ /
analyzed: aham sa pūrve cārikām rājā abhūvam śūradattaḥ

original: ratanāvatī nāma sa rājadhānī udyānabhūmiryatu niṣkramāmi // SRS_35.80 //
analyzed: ratanāvatī nāma sa rājadhānī udyāna bhūmiḥ yatu niṣkramāmi

original: rathābhirūḍhastada dṛṣṭva bhikṣuṃ samantaprāsādiku darśanīyam /
analyzed: ratha abhirūḍhaḥ tada dṛṣṭvā bhikṣum darśanīyam

original: dvātriṃśatā kavacitu lakṣaṇebhirobhāsayantaṃ daśa diśatā samantāt // SRS_35.81 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśatā kavacitu lakṣaṇebhiḥ obhāsayantam daśa diśatā samantāt

original: supuṣpacandro diśatā suviśruto hitānukampī karuṇāvihārī /
analyzed: su puṣpa candraḥ diśatā su viśrutaḥ hita anukampī karuṇā vihārī

original: sattvānukampī nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ śirīya tejena ca śobhamānaḥ // SRS_35.82 //
analyzed: sattva anukampī nagaram praviṣṭaḥ tejena ca śobhamānaḥ

original: ahaṃ ca rūpeṇa tādṛśo 'bhavaṃ mātsaryamutpannu subhairavaṃ me /
analyzed: aham ca rūpeṇa tādṛśaḥ abhavam mātsaryam utpannu su bhairavam me

original: kāmeṣu gṛddho grathitaśca rājye mā eṣa rājyānmama cyāvayeta // SRS_35.83 //
analyzed: kāmeṣu gṛddhaḥ grathitaḥ ca rājye mā eṣa rājyāt mama cyāvayeta

original: putrāṇa saṃpūrṇa sahasra mahyaṃ rathānurūḍhā anuyānti pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: saṃpūrṇa sahasra mahyam ratha anurūḍhāḥ anuyānti pṛṣṭhatas

original: vicitramukuṭābharaṇā vibhūṣitā yatha devaputrāstridaśendra yānti // SRS_35.84 //
analyzed: vicitra mukuṭa ābharaṇāḥ vibhūṣitāḥ devaputrāḥ tridaśa indra yānti

original: duhitṝṇa tasmin śata pañca mahyaṃ maṇipādukārūḍha sudarśanīyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmin pañca mahyam maṇi pādukā ārūḍha su darśanīyāḥ

original: ābaddhamukuṭābharaṇā vibhūṣitāste hemajālai rathu te vahanti // SRS_35.85 //
analyzed: ābaddha mukuṭa ābharaṇāḥ vibhūṣitāḥ te hema jālaiḥ te vahanti

original: strīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi aśīti mahyaṃ prāsādikāḥ sarva sudarśanīyāḥ /
analyzed: strīṇām sahasrāṇi aśīti mahyam prāsādikāḥ sarva su darśanīyāḥ

original: (Vaidya 248)
analyzed: vaidya

original: rathādhirūḍhāḥ samudīkṣya bhikṣuṃ prāsādikaṃ merumivodgataśriyam // SRS_35.86 //
analyzed: ratha adhirūḍhāḥ samudīkṣya bhikṣum prāsādikam merum iva udgata śriyam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tāsāṃ pitṛsaṃjña jātā utpāditaṃ citta varāgrabodhaye /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tāsām pitṛ saṃjña jātāḥ utpāditam citta vara agra bodhaye

original: samādayitvā tada brahmacaryaṃ kṣipiṃsu tānābharaṇān manoramān // SRS_35.87 //
analyzed: brahmacaryam kṣipiṃsu tān ābharaṇān manoramān

original: īrṣyā mamotpanna abhūṣi tatkṣaṇaṃ vyāpādadoṣaśca khilaṃ cā dāruṇam /
analyzed: īrṣyā tad kṣaṇam vyāpāda doṣaḥ ca khilam dāruṇam

original: aiśvaryamattaśca vadāmi putrān ghāteya bhikṣuṃ sthitu yaḥ purastāt // SRS_35.88 //
analyzed: aiśvarya mattaḥ ca vadāmi putrān bhikṣum yaḥ purastāt

original: śrutvātha te mahya kumāra vākyaṃ suduḥkhitā durmanaso abhūvan /
analyzed: śrutvā atha te kumāra vākyam su duḥkhitāḥ durmanasaḥ abhūvan

original: mā eva pravyāhara tāta vācaṃ na ghātayāmo vaya bhikṣumīdṛśam // SRS_35.89 //
analyzed: mā eva pravyāhara tāta vācam na ghātayāmaḥ bhikṣum īdṛśam

original: yadyaṅgamaṅgātu śarīra chidyet kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /
analyzed: chidyet gaṅga vālukāḥ

original: na tveva bhikṣuṃ vaya hiṃsayema tathāhi bodhāya utpannu cittam // SRS_35.90 //

analyzed: yāsye ghora maham hi avīci nirayam trāṇam na me vidyate

analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

analyzed: vaidya

original: eṣo varo anupama puṇyaskandho jñānasya kośa aparimitākaropama /
analyzed: eṣaḥ varaḥ anupama puṇya skandhaḥ jñānasya kośa aparimita akara upama

original: śrāddho naro yo imu ānulomikaṃ dhāreyya agraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_36.7 //
analyzed: śrāddhaḥ naraḥ yaḥ imu ānulomikam agram imu virajam samādhim

analyzed: mahādhanaḥ bhavati sa bodhisattvaḥ

original: mahāsamudro bahuvidharatanasya ākaro na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇamasti // SRS_36.8 //
analyzed: mahā samudraḥ bahuvidha ratanasya ākaraḥ na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇam asti

analyzed: varehi dharmehi acintiyehi saṃbṛhitaḥ vuccati bodhisattvaḥ

original: na tasya bodhāya kadāci saṃśayo ya uddiśeyāti imaḥ samādhim // SRS_36.9 //
analyzed: na tasya bodhāya kadācid saṃśayaḥ yaḥ uddiśeyāti imaḥ samādhim

analyzed: saṃsthāpya vināyakam buddham mahā kāruṇikam svayaṃbhuvam

original: yaḥ puṇyaskandhena vareṇupeto acintiyo yasya pramāṇu nāsti // SRS_36.10 //
analyzed: yaḥ puṇya skandhena acintiyaḥ yasya pramāṇu na asti

analyzed: na uttaraḥ tasya ca sattva kaścid mahāsahasrāya kadāci vidyate

original: yaḥ puṇyaskandhena samo bhaveta jñānena vāsādṛśācintiyena // SRS_36.11 //
analyzed: yaḥ puṇya skandhena samaḥ bhaveta jñānena vā a sādṛśa acintiyena

analyzed: anyatra yaḥ samādhim etam

original: paryeṣamāṇo 'tula budhabodhiṃ na tasya jñānena samo bhaveta // SRS_36.12 //
analyzed: paryeṣamāṇaḥ atula budha bodhim na tasya jñānena samaḥ bhaveta

original: sacet kumārā siya ayu dharmarūpa yaḥ puṇyaskandho upacitu tena bhoti /
analyzed: saced kumārā siya tena

analyzed: dhāratu vācetu imam samādhim na saḥ viceyyāḥ iha pṛthu lokadhātuṣu

analyzed: tasmāt kumāra iha ya bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣate sarva buddhān

original: (Vaidya 256)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: asaṅga nirdeśa padārtha kovidaḥ tathāgatān ca dhāretu vācetu imam samādhim

analyzed: eṣā hi sā bodhi tathāgatānām śraddhehi mahyam vacanam kumārāḥ

original: na bhāṣate vācamṛṣāṃ tathāgato na hīdṛśāḥ sattva mṛṣāṃ vadanti // SRS_36.15 //
analyzed: na bhāṣate vācam ṛṣām tathāgataḥ na hi īdṛśāḥ sattva mṛṣām vadanti

analyzed: yasmin mayā itas pure

analyzed: carantena bodhicārikām paryeṣamāṇena imām samādhim

analyzed: tasmāt imam atha dharmagañjam yaḥ āgamaḥ

original: yaḥ puṇyaskandho vipulo acintiyo yeno laghuṃ budhyati buddhajñānam // SRS_36.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ puṇya skandhaḥ vipulaḥ acintiyaḥ yena u laghum budhyati buddha jñānam

analyzed: kuśalasya

original: paryantu dharmāṇa na teṣa labhyate yāṃ so sadā nirdiśate viśāradaḥ // SRS_36.18 //
analyzed: na teṣa labhyate yām saḥ sadā nirdiśate viśāradaḥ

original: chinditva bhinditva mahāsahasraṃ śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ /
analyzed: chinditvā bhinditvā mahā sahasram śakyam gaṇetum paramāṇu saṃcayaḥ

original: na tveva te sūtraśatā acintiyān pramātu yaṃ bhāṣati so aviṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_36.19 //
analyzed: na tu eva te sūtra śatā acintiyān yam bhāṣati saḥ a viṣṭhitaḥ

original: āśvāsa praśvāsa gaṇetu śakyaṃ sarveṣa sattvāniha buddhakṣetre /
analyzed: āśvāsa praśvāsa śakyam sarveṣa sattvān iha buddhakṣetre

analyzed: na śakyam yān bhāṣate saḥ atra samādhiye sthitaḥ

analyzed: ye teṣa sattvāḥ teṣu upapannāḥ

original: gaṇetu te śakyamathāpi cintituṃ na teṣa sūtrāṇa ya nityu bhāṣate // SRS_36.21 //
analyzed: te śakyam atha api cintitum na yaḥ nityu bhāṣate

original: (Vaidya 257)
analyzed: vaidya

original: gaṇetu śakyamita kalpakoṭibhiḥ mahāsamudreṣviha yātti vālikāḥ /
analyzed: kalpa koṭibhiḥ mahā samudreṣu iha vālikāḥ

original: nadīṣu kuṇḍeṣu hradeṣu tadvad ananta sūtrānta sa yat prabhāṣate // SRS_36.22 //
analyzed: nadīṣu kuṇḍeṣu hradeṣu tadvat ananta sūtrānta sa yat prabhāṣate

original: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭiṣu ya āpaskandhaḥ sada tatra tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śakyam gaṇetum bahu kalpa koṭiṣu yaḥ āpaskandhaḥ tatra tiṣṭhati

original: śatāya bhinnāya vālāgrakoṭiyo svarāṅga teṣāṃ na tu śakyu sarvaśaḥ // SRS_36.23 //
analyzed: śatāya bhinnāya teṣām na tu sarvaśas

original: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭibhirye sattva āsan purimeṇa tatra /
analyzed: śakyam gaṇetum bahu kalpa koṭibhiḥ ye sattvaḥ āsan purimeṇa tatra

original: ya ātmabhāve vinibaddhasārā na teṣa sūtrāntanirhāra jānitum // SRS_36.24 //
analyzed: ye ātma bhāve vinibaddha sārāḥ na teṣa sūtrānta nirhāra jānitum

original: gaṇetu śakyaṃ ruta sarvaprāṇināṃ ye santi sattvā daśasu diśāsu /
analyzed: śakyam sarva prāṇinām ye santi sattvāḥ daśasu diśāsu

original: na śakyu sūtrānta gaṇetu tasya yad bhāṣate 'sau satatamaviṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_36.25 //
analyzed: na tasya yat bhāṣate asau satatam aviṣṭhitaḥ

analyzed: jānati nirukti nirdeśa padārtha kovidaḥ

analyzed: viniścaye bhūta nayeṣu śikṣitaḥ viśāla buddhiḥ harṣa prajñaḥ

analyzed: abhinna buddhiḥ vipula artha cintī acintya cintā iti sadā prajānati

analyzed: ghoṣa svabhāvam pṛthu jānatī śabdān ca tān nirdiśataḥ na sajjati

analyzed: saḥ vuccati dharma bhāṇakaḥ na sajjate sarva jagasya bhāṣataḥ

analyzed: kovidaḥ kovidaḥ

analyzed: ekasya niordiśataḥ na sajjati

original: (Vaidya 258)
analyzed: vaidya

original: asaṅganirdeśapadārthakovido bhāṣantu so parṣagato na sajjate // SRS_36.29 //
analyzed: asaṅga nirdeśa padārtha kovidaḥ bhāṣantu saḥ parṣa gataḥ na sajjate

analyzed: yaḥ susthitaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ

analyzed: dharme bala ādhāna viśeṣa prāptaḥ karoti saḥ artham bahu prāṇa koṭinām

analyzed: yathā eva meruḥ acalaḥ a kampiyaḥ sarvehi vātehi na śakya kampitum

analyzed: tathā eva dharma bhāṇakam kampetu śakyam na parapravādibhiḥ

analyzed: mahā sahasreṣu iha lokadhātuṣu ye parvatāḥ akampanīyāḥ

analyzed: prajānatī niścitu dharma śūnyām sa sarva vādībhi na śakyu kṣobhitum

analyzed: a kampiyaḥ para pravādibhiḥ sava pravādehi

analyzed: an abhibhūtaḥ ca aninditaḥ ca samādhi śāntam

analyzed: ananta jñāne sada su pratiṣṭhitaḥ samādhi śāntam

original: (Vaidya 259)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: sarveṣa co teṣa jināna antike sa śroṣyate etu samādhi śāntam

analyzed: vareṇa jñānena upetu bheṣyatī pratisaṃvidāsu vaśa pāramim gataḥ

analyzed: saced pūrṇā lokadhātuḥ

analyzed: buddhāna dadyuḥ satatam a viṣṭhihantaḥ dāna skandham

analyzed: yaḥ ca eva bhikṣuḥ abhiratu śūnyatāyām buddhān namasye daśa nakha prāñjalīyaḥ

analyzed: na sa dāna skandhaḥ yāti saṃkhyām yaḥ śūnyatāyām abhiratu bodhisattvaḥ

original: (Vaidya 260)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: na tāva śīghram buddha jñānam dānam dadet saḥ hita karu bodhisattvaḥ

analyzed: labhitvā imu vara śānta bhūmim śrutasya gotram imu virajam samādhim

analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ sa śīghram etam buddha jñānam

analyzed: nidhānam evarūpam kṣetrān anantān gaṅgavālikāḥ

analyzed: te ca pūrṇāḥ divyāna ca ca mānuṣāṇām

analyzed: saḥ bhoti prebhūta kośaḥ mahādhanaḥ dhana ratanena upetaḥ

analyzed: rājyam labhitvā parama samṛddha sphītam na tena tuṣṭaḥ bhavati kadācid vijñaḥ

analyzed: yathā samādhim tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ bhavati sa bodhisattvaḥ

analyzed: te te dharma dharāḥ bhavanti satatam buddhāna sarvajñinām

analyzed: dharma kośa dharāḥ mahāmati dharāḥ sarvajña gañjaṃdharāḥ

analyzed: te te sattva sahasra koṭi niyutān toṣanti dharma svaraiḥ

original: te te śīladhanenupeta matimān śikṣādhanāḍhyā narāḥ
analyzed: te te matimān śikṣā dhana āḍhyāḥ narāḥ

original: te te raktakaṣāyacīvaradharā naiṣkramyatuṣṭāḥ sadā
analyzed: te te rakta kaṣāya cīvara dharāḥ naiṣkramya tuṣṭāḥ sadā

original: te te sattvahitāya apratisamāḥ sarvajñatāṃ prasthitāḥ // SRS_36.51 //
analyzed: te te sattva hitāya apratisamāḥ sarvajña tām prasthitāḥ

original: te te dānta sudānta sattvadamakā damathenupetāḥ sadā
analyzed: te te dānta su dānta sattva damakāḥ damathena upetāḥ sadā

original: te te śānta suśāntatāmanugatāḥ śāntapraśāntendriyāḥ /
analyzed: te te śānta su śānta tām anugatāḥ śānta praśānta indriyāḥ

original: te te supta prasupta sattva satataṃ dharmasvanairbodhayī
analyzed: te te supta prasupta sattva satatam dharma svanaiḥ

original: bodhitvā varaśreṣṭha dharmaratanaiḥ sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayī // SRS_36.52 //
analyzed: bodhitvā vara śreṣṭha dharma ratanaiḥ sattvān

original: (Vaidya 261)
analyzed: vaidya

original: te te dānapatī bhavanti satataṃ sada muktatyāgī vidu
analyzed: te te dānapatī bhavanti satatam mukta tyāgī

original: te te matsariyairna saṃvasi mahātyāge ramante sadā /
analyzed: te te matsariyaiḥ na mahā tyāge ramante sadā

original: te te sattva daridra dṛṣṭva dukhitān bhogehi saṃtarpayī
analyzed: te te sattva daridra dṛṣṭvā dukhitān bhogehi saṃtarpayī

original: te te sattvahite sukhāya satataṃ sarvajñatāṃ prasthitāḥ // SRS_36.53 //
analyzed: te te sattva hite sukhāya satatam sarvajña tām prasthitāḥ

original: te te āhani dharmabheri vipulāṃ jñāne sadā śikṣitāḥ
analyzed: te te āhani dharma bheri vipulām jñāne sadā śikṣitāḥ

original: chindantī jana sarva saṃśayalatāṃ jñāne sadā prasthitāḥ /
analyzed: chindantī saṃśaya latām jñāne sadā prasthitāḥ

original: te te suśruta dharmadhāri virajā sūtrāntakoṭīśatān
analyzed: te te suśruta dharma dhāri sūtrānta koṭī śatān

dṛṣṭvā sattva gilāna nekavividhai rogaiḥ samabhyāhatān

original: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: udapādi vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato jñānaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ṣaṣṭivarṣakoṭyaḥ āyuṣpramāṇamabhūt
analyzed: tena khalu punar kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavataḥ jñānaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ṣaṣṭi varṣa koṭyaḥ āyuṣpramāṇam abhūt

original: ṣaṣṭirarhatkoṭyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho 'bhūt /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ arhat koṭyaḥ śrāvaka saṃghaḥ abhūt

original: aprameyāśca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saddharmaparigrāhakā abhūvan //
analyzed: aprameyāḥ ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ saddharma parigrāhakāḥ abhūvan

original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūdviśeṣacintī nāma /
analyzed: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt viśeṣacintī nāma

original: atha khalu rājā viśeṣacintī aśītyā prāṇikoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha khalu rājā viśeṣacintī aśītyā prāṇi koṭibhiḥ sārdham tathāgatam upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: upsaṃkramya tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
analyzed: upsaṃkramya tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat

original: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaśca rājā viśeṣacintī taṃ tathāgataṃ paryupāste /
analyzed: ekānta niṣaṇṇaḥ ca rājā viśeṣa cintī tam tathāgatam paryupāste

original: atha khalu kumāra jñānaprabhāsastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño viśeṣacintinaḥ
analyzed: atha khalu kumāra jñānaprabhāsaḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ rājñaḥ viśeṣa cintinaḥ

original: saparivārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā ito dharmaparyāyādimaṃ kāyasaṃvarasamādhimukhapraveśaṃ
analyzed: sa parivārasya adhyāśayam viditvā itas dharmaparyāyāt imam kāya saṃvara samādhi mukha praveśam

original: gāthābhigītena deśayati -
analyzed: gāthā abhigītena deśayati

original: yathāntarīkṣaṃ gaganaṃ viśuddhamatyantaśuddhaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaram /
analyzed: yathā āntarīkṣam gaganam viśuddham atyanta śuddham prakṛti prabhāsvaram

original: emeva śuddho ayu kāyasaṃvaro na śakyu ghoṣeṇa kadāci deśitum // SRS_38.1 //
analyzed: śuddhaḥ kāya saṃvaraḥ na śakyu ghoṣeṇa kadācid deśitum

original: viviktu śūnyo ayu kāyasaṃvaro etādṛśe te ubhi kāyalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: etādṛśe te ubhi kāya lakṣaṇe

original: alakṣaṇāste yatha antarīkṣaṃ tallakṣaṇo deśitu kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.2 //
analyzed: alakṣaṇāḥ te antarīkṣam tad lakṣaṇaḥ kāya saṃvaraḥ

original: yo jānatī saṃvaramevalakṣaṇaṃ na tasya jātu bhavatī nasaṃvaraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ jānatī saṃvaram eva lakṣaṇam na tasya jātu bhavatī na saṃvaraḥ

original: ye cāpravṛttāḥ kṛtu teṣa gocaro anāsravasyo upapatti nāsti // SRS_38.3 //
analyzed: ye ca apravṛttāḥ gocaraḥ na asti

original: na śakyu kāmān pratisevamānai rūpeṣu bhogeṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām /
analyzed: na śakyu kāmān pratisevamānaiḥ rūpeṣu bhogeṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām

original: bhaveṣu doṣānavijānamānairna śakyu jñātumayu kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.4 //
analyzed: bhaveṣu doṣān a vijānamānaiḥ na śakyu kāya saṃvaraḥ

original: anāsravaṃ saṃvaru yaḥ prajānate na tasya bhotī upapatti jātu /
analyzed: anāsravam yaḥ prajānate na tasya jātu

original: arhantadharmā ima evarūpāḥ na sukaraṃ jānitu tīrthikebhiḥ // SRS_38.5 //
analyzed: arhanta dharmāḥ ime eva rūpāḥ na sukaram jānitu tīrthikebhiḥ

original: (Vaidya 281)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ye sarvatraidhātuki trastamānasā na kāmabhogeṣu spṛhāṃ janenti /
analyzed: ye sarva traidhātuki trasta mānasāḥ na kāma bhogeṣu spṛhām janenti

original: rājyena bhogaiśca na jātu arthikā jñāsyanti te īdṛśa kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.6 //
analyzed: rājyena bhogaiḥ ca na jātu arthikāḥ jñāsyanti te īdṛśa kāya saṃvaraḥ

original: artho ayaṃ vuccati kāyasaṃvaro arthaśca śabdena na śakyu deśitum /
analyzed: arthaḥ ayam kāya saṃvaraḥ arthaḥ ca śabdena na śakyu deśitum

original: yo jānatī īdṛśu dharmanetrīṃ sa saṃvare 'smin bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_38.7 //
analyzed: yaḥ jānatī dharma netrīm sa saṃvare asmin bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: arthe prayuktāna mayārthu deśito ye arthanetrīparatā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: arthe deśitaḥ ye artha netrī paratāḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: anarthu varjenti ya arthayuktā te saṃvare 'smin satataṃ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_38.8 //
analyzed: ye artha yuktā te saṃvare asmin satatam pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: artho ya ukto hi jināna śāsane kathaṃ sa artho bhavatī vijānato /
analyzed: arthaḥ yaḥ uktaḥ hi śāsane katham saḥ arthaḥ bhavatī vijānataḥ

original: yo arthanetrīya svabhāvu jānati pratiṣṭhitaḥ socyati kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.9 //
analyzed: yaḥ jānati pratiṣṭhitaḥ saḥ ucyati kāya saṃvare

original: yenānimittaṃ bhavatī vijānitaṃ nairātmyataḥ śūnyatu tucchato vā /
analyzed: yena animittam bhavatī vijānitam nairātmyataḥ tucchataḥ vā

original: na tasya jātū bhavati nasaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.10 //
analyzed: na tasya jātu bhavati na saṃvaraḥ tathā hi saḥ śikṣitu bhūta niścaye

original: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
analyzed: bhāvān abhāvān iti yaḥ prajānati sa sarva bhāveṣu na jātu sajjate

original: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
analyzed: yaḥ sarva bhāveṣu na jātu sajjate

original: sa ānimittaṃ spṛśatī samādhim // SRS_38.11 //
analyzed: saḥ ā nimittam spṛśatī samādhim

original: vijñāta yeneha nirātmadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvarāḥ /
analyzed: vijñāta yena iha nirātma dharmāḥ svabhāva śūnyāḥ prakṛti prabhāsvarāḥ

original: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.12 //
analyzed: na tasya jātu a saṃvaraḥ tathā hi saḥ śikṣitu bhūta niścaye

original: yo jānatī śūnyata pañcaskandhān viditva nairātmasvabhāvaśūnyān /
analyzed: yaḥ pañca skandhān

original: (Vaidya 282)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvaro yat karma kāyena samācareta // SRS_38.13 //
analyzed: na tasya jātu bhavatī a saṃvaraḥ yat karma kāyena samācareta

original: nimittagrāhisya asaṃvṛtasya ya ātmasaṃjñāya sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: nimitta grāhisya asaṃvṛtasya yaḥ ātma saṃjñāya sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: rūpeṣu āsvādagatasya jantunaḥ prakupyate rāga asaṃvṛtasya // SRS_38.14 //
analyzed: rūpeṣu āsvāda gatasya jantunaḥ prakupyate rāgaḥ asaṃvṛtasya

original: ye bhūtakoṭīya bhavanti śikṣitā gatiṃgatāḥ sūrata śūnyatāyām /
analyzed: ye bhūtakoṭīya bhavanti śikṣitāḥ gatiṃgatāḥ śūnyatāyām

original: na teṣa rāgaḥ puna jātu kupyate asaṃvaro yena vrajeta durgatim // SRS_38.15 //
analyzed: na teṣa rāgaḥ punar jātu kupyate a saṃvaraḥ yena vrajeta durgatim

original: na śakyu kampetu yathā sumeru acāliyaḥ sarvapipīlikairmahān /
analyzed: na kampetu yathā sumeru acāliyaḥ sarva pipīlikaiḥ mahān

original: tathā vidū bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito rūpehi divyairapi so na kampate // SRS_38.16 //
analyzed: tathā bhūta nayeṣu śikṣitaḥ rūpehi divyaiḥ api saḥ na kampate

original: śakyeta raṅgairgaganaṃ vicitrituṃ śakyeta cākāśa gṛhītu pāṇinā /
analyzed: śakyeta raṅgaiḥ gaganam vicitritum śakyeta ca ākāśa pāṇinā

original: na tveva śakyaṃ sa vicālanāya rāgeṇa doṣeṇa na ca mārakoṭibhiḥ // SRS_38.17 //
analyzed: na tu eva śakyam sa vicālanāya rāgeṇa doṣeṇa na ca māra koṭibhiḥ

original: pratiśrukā śakyu gṛhītu kenacicchilā plavedapyudakasya madhye /
analyzed: pratiśrukā śakyu gṛhītu kenacid śilā plavet api udakasya madhye

original: draṣṭuṃ na śakyaṃ tviha tasya āśayā yaḥ śikṣito īdṛśi kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.18 //
analyzed: draṣṭum na śakyam tu iha tasya āśayā yaḥ śikṣitaḥ īdṛśi kāya saṃvare

original: yāvanta śabdāḥ pṛthu sarvaloke gṛhṇitva peḍāgata śakya kartum /
analyzed: yāvanta śabdāḥ pṛthu sarva loke gṛhṇitva peḍāgata śakya kartum

original: na tasya śakyaṃ sthitirasthitirvā vijānituṃ yaḥ sthitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.19 //
analyzed: na tasya śakyam sthitiḥ asthitiḥ vā vijānitum yaḥ sthitu kāya saṃvare

original: śakyaṃ prabhā gṛhṇitu sūryamaṇḍalāt pragarjato meghatu vidyuto vā /
analyzed: śakyam prabhā gṛhṇitu sūrya maṇḍalāt pragarjataḥ meghatu vidyutaḥ vā

original: na tasya kāyasya svabhāva jñātuṃ yaḥ śikṣitaḥ syādiha kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.20 //
analyzed: na tasya kāyasya svabhāva jñātum yaḥ śikṣitaḥ syāt iha kāya saṃvare

original: jālena pāśena ca śakyu bandhituṃ caturdiśaṃ vāyati vātamaṇḍalī /
analyzed: jālena pāśena ca śakyu bandhitum caturdiśam vāyati vātamaṇḍalī

original: (Vaidya 283)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na śakyamājānitu tasya kāyaḥ pratiṣṭhito yo iha kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.21 //
analyzed: na śakyam ājānitu tasya kāyaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ yaḥ iha kāya saṃvare

original: agocaro 'sāviha sarvaprāṇināṃ yatra sthito yo vidu cittasaṃyame /
analyzed: agocaraḥ asau iha sarva prāṇinām yatra sthitaḥ yaḥ citta saṃyame

original: yatra sthito gocari kāyasaṃvare na lipyate khamiva sa lokadharmaiḥ // SRS_38.22 //
analyzed: yatra sthitaḥ gocari kāya saṃvare na lipyate kham iva sa loka dharmaiḥ

original: śakyaṃ padaṃ paśyitu sarvaprāṇināṃ name carantāna pṛthak caturdiśam /
analyzed: śakyam padam sarva prāṇinām name pṛthak caturdiśam

original: na tasya kāyasya na cittagocaro pramāṇu jñātumiha śakya kenacit // SRS_38.23 //
analyzed: na tasya kāyasya na citta gocaraḥ jñātum iha kenacid

original: evaṃ sthitasyo iha kāyasaṃvare sarve na bhonti vividhāḥ kileśāḥ /
analyzed: evam sthitasya u iha kāya saṃvare sarve na bhonti vividhāḥ kileśāḥ

original: prahīṇa tasyeha upakileśāstathā hyasau śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.24 //
analyzed: tasya iha kāya saṃvare

original: na tasya agniḥ kramate na śastraṃ tathāpi agrāhyu sa tasya kāyaḥ /
analyzed: na tasya agniḥ kramate na śastram tathā api sa tasya kāyaḥ

original: śantapraśānte sthitu so samādhau tathā hyasau śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.25 //
analyzed: sthitu saḥ samādhau tathā hi asau śikṣitu kāya saṃvare

original: evaṃ sthitasyo na bhayaṃ na trāso na kṣobhu cittasyu na cerṣyu jāyate /
analyzed: evam na bhayam na trāsaḥ na kṣobhu cittasyu na ca īrṣyu jāyate

original: muktaḥ sa sarvebhirupadravebhiryaḥ śikṣito tādṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.26 //
analyzed: muktaḥ sa sarvebhiḥ upadravebhiḥ yaḥ kāya saṃvare

original: viṣasya śastrasya na jātu bhāyati na cāgnimadhye na jalasya madhye /
analyzed: viṣasya śastrasya na jātu bhāyati na ca agni madhye na jalasya madhye

original: sarvehi muktaḥ sa upadravehi ya śikṣito īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.27 //
analyzed: muktaḥ saḥ upadravehi ya śikṣitaḥ kāya saṃvare

original: caurāṇa dhūrtāna ca pāpakāriṇāmāśīviṣāmadhyagato na bhāyate /
analyzed: caurāṇa ca pāpa kāriṇām āśīviṣām adhya gataḥ na bhāyate

original: tathā hi tasyo vigatātmasaṃjñā saṃjñāvimuktasya bhayaṃ na bhoti // SRS_38.28 //
analyzed: tathā hi vigata ātma saṃjñā saṃjñā vimuktasya bhayam

original: bhayairvimuktasya na trāsu jāyate asaṃtrasantasya na bhoti iñjanā /
analyzed: bhayaiḥ vimuktasya na trāsu jāyate a saṃtrasantasya na iñjanā

original: (Vaidya 284)
analyzed: vaidya

original: aniñjamānasya kuto 'sti trāso na mārakoṭībhi sa śakyu kampitum // SRS_38.29 //
analyzed: an iñjamānasya kutas asti trāsaḥ na māra koṭībhiḥ sa kampitum

original: ācakṣito deśitu saṃprakāśito yo bodhisattvasya hitāya saṃvaraḥ /
analyzed: ācakṣitaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ yaḥ bodhisattvasya hitāya saṃvaraḥ

original: yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare so bhoti no kampiyu mārakoṭibhiḥ // SRS_38.30 //
analyzed: yaḥ śikṣate kāya saṃvare saḥ māra koṭibhiḥ

original: sarveṣu dharmeṣu asaṃjñajñānaṃ pūrṇā aśītiranuvyañjanāni /
analyzed: sarveṣu dharmeṣu asaṃjña jñānam pūrṇā aśītiḥ anuvyañjanāni

original: dvātriṃśa co lakṣaṇa cittaśuddhā na durlabhā bhonti sthitasya saṃvare // SRS_38.31 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśa ca lakṣaṇa citta śuddhāḥ na durlabhāḥ bhonti sthitasya saṃvare

original: ya icchate budhyitu buddhadharmān acintiyān yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
analyzed: yaḥ icchate buddha dharmān acintiyān na asti

original: sa śikṣitu īdṛśuḥ kāyasaṃvare bhaviṣyate cetiyu sarvaloke // SRS_38.32 //
analyzed: sa kāyasaṃvare bhaviṣyate sarva loke

original: ya icchate dharmamimaṃ maharṣiṇāṃ daśo balān buddhabalānacintiyān /
analyzed: yaḥ icchate dharmam imam mahā ṛṣiṇām daśa balān buddha balān acintiyān

original: sa śikṣitu īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare yaḥ śikṣitastasya balā na durlabhāḥ // SRS_38.33 //
analyzed: kāya saṃvare yaḥ śikṣitaḥ tasya balāḥ na durlabhāḥ

original: ye cāpi aṣṭādaśa buddhadharmā āveṇikā yeṣu jinā pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca api aṣṭādaśa buddha dharmāḥ āveṇikāḥ yeṣu jinā pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: te cāpi tasyo na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.34 //
analyzed: te na bhavanti durlabhāḥ yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāya saṃvare

original: ye sapta bodhyaṅga mahāmaharṣiṇāṃ pratisaṃvidaśco tatha ṛddhipādāḥ /
analyzed: ye sapta bodhyaṅga mahā mahā ṛṣiṇām ṛddhipādāḥ

original: te cāpi tasyo na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.35 //
analyzed: te na bhavanti durlabhāḥ yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāya saṃvare

original: brahmāvihārāścaturaśca dhyānā vimokṣadvārāstraya saṃprakāśitāḥ /
analyzed: brahmāvihārāḥ caturaḥ ca dhyānāḥ vimokṣa dvārāḥ traya saṃprakāśitāḥ

original: kṣemā vitarkā atha prāvivekyā na durlabhā bhonti sthitasya saṃvare // SRS_38.36 //
analyzed: kṣemāḥ vitarkāḥ atha prāvivekyāḥ na durlabhāḥ bhonti sthitasya saṃvare

original: karuṇāvihārī tathupekṣalābhī tatha īryacaryāmiha maitrivarām /
analyzed: karuṇā vihārī īrya caryām iha maitri varām

original: (Vaidya 285)
analyzed: vaidya

original: hitacittu bhoti ca sa sarvajage yaḥ kāyasaṃvari sthito bhavati // SRS_38.37 //
analyzed: ca sa sarvajage yaḥ sthitaḥ bhavati

original: smṛtī upasthāna prahāṇa samyak pañcendriyāḥ pañca balā maharṣiṇām /
analyzed: smṛtī upasthāna prahāṇa samyak pañca indriyāḥ pañca balāḥ mahā ṛṣiṇām

original: āścarya aṣṭāṅgiku mārgaśreṣṭho na durlabho śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.38 //
analyzed: āścarya mārga śreṣṭhaḥ na durlabhaḥ kāya saṃvare

original: ye cāpi anye vara buddhadharmā acintiyā yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
analyzed: ye ca api anye buddha dharmāḥ acintiyāḥ

original: te tasya sarve na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.39 //
analyzed: te tasya sarve na bhavanti durlabhāḥ yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare

original: śrutvā iho īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare viśeṣaprāpto abhu rājaputraḥ /
analyzed: kāya saṃvare viśeṣa prāptaḥ rāja putraḥ

original: tuṣṭo udagro atulāya prītiyā sa pravrajī tasya jinasya śāsane // SRS_38.40 //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ sa pravrajī tasya jinasya śāsane

original: sa pravrajitvā daśa varṣakoṭīracārṣi śuddhaṃ vara brahmacaryam /
analyzed: sa pravrajitvā daśa varṣa koṭīḥ acārṣi śuddham vara brahmacaryam

original: bhāvetva brāhmān caturo vihārānarthāya lokasya sadevakasya // SRS_38.41 //
analyzed: bhāvetva brāhmān caturaḥ vihārān arthāya lokasya sa devakasya

original: subhāvitā brahmavihāra kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna aśītikoṭiyaḥ /
analyzed: su bhāvitāḥ brahmavihāra kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna aśīti koṭiyaḥ

original: tatottare yāttika gaṅgavālikā idaṃ caraṃ so vara brahmacaryam // SRS_38.42 //
analyzed: tatas uttare idam caram brahmacaryam

original: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā acārṣi śuddhaṃ vara brahmacaryam /
analyzed: sarveṣa ca u śāsani pravrajitvā acārṣi śuddham vara brahmacaryam

original: bhikṣu abhūṣī vara dharmabhāṇako bahuśrutaśco pratibhānavāṃśca // SRS_38.43 //
analyzed: bhikṣu abhūṣī vara dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: akhaṇḍaśīlaśca acchidraśīlo viśuddhaśīlo akalmāṣaśīlaḥ /
analyzed: akhaṇḍa śīlaḥ ca acchidra śīlaḥ viśuddha śīlaḥ akalmāṣa śīlaḥ

original: ārye ca śīle sa anāsrave sthitaḥ /
analyzed: ārye ca śīle sa anāsrave sthitaḥ

original: prajānamāno imu kāyasaṃvaram // SRS_38.44 //
analyzed: prajānamānaḥ imu kāya saṃvaram

original: (Vaidya 286)
analyzed: vaidya

original: siyā kumārā tava anya sāsīd viśeṣacintī tada rājakuñjaraḥ /
analyzed: siyā kumārā tava sa āsīt viśeṣa cintī rāja kuñjaraḥ

original: na eva draṣṭavyamihānyu so 'bhūttadāhamāsaṃ caramāṇu cārikām // SRS_38.45 //
analyzed: na eva draṣṭavyam iha anyu saḥ abhūt tadā aham āsam carama aṇu cārikām

original: tasmāt kumārā mama śikṣamāṇā pratiṣṭhihesī iha kāyasaṃvare /
analyzed: tasmāt kumārāḥ mama śikṣamāṇā iha kāya saṃvare

original: anyeṣa co deśaya prāṇakoṭināṃ nacireṇa tvaṃ bheṣyasi yādṛśo 'ham // SRS_38.46 //
analyzed: deśaya prāṇa koṭinām nacireṇa tvam yādṛśaḥ aham

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra pariśuddha kāya samācāraḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pariśuddhakāyasamācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayebhyo bibheti /
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samācāraḥ hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na nirayebhyaḥ bibheti

analyzed: na tiryagyoneḥ na yama lokāt na sarva durgatibhyaḥ bibheti

original: nodakād bibheti /
analyzed: na udakāt bibheti

original: na śastrato na siṃhebhyo na vyāghrebhyo na ṛkṣebhyo na hastibhyo narṣabhebhyo na manuṣyebhyo bibheti /
analyzed: na śastrataḥ na siṃhebhyaḥ na vyāghrebhyaḥ na ṛkṣebhyaḥ na hastibhyaḥ na ṛṣabhebhyaḥ na manuṣyebhyaḥ bibheti

original: pariśuddhakāyasamācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imamapi trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam api tri sāhasram mahā sāhasram

analyzed: lokadhātum kara tale kṛtvā tāla mātram dvi tāla mātram tri tāla mātram catur tāla mātram

analyzed: yāvantam vā punar ākāṅkṣet tāvantam eva utkṣipet

original: punaraparaṃ pariśuddhakāyasamācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ṛddhiprātihārye paramapāramiprāpto bhavati /
analyzed: punar aparam pariśuddha kāya samācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ṛddhi prātihārye parama pārami prāptaḥ bhavati

original: sa ṛddhipādavipākaviśuddhaḥ puṇyaparigṛhīto vivekaviviktaḥ sarvatrānugata etatsamādhipratilabdhaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ṛddhipāda vipāka viśuddhaḥ puṇya parigṛhītaḥ viveka viviktaḥ sarvatra anugataḥ etad samādhi pratilabdhaḥ

original: anāsravapuṇyapariniṣpannaḥ sarvalokadhātāvapratihatacakṣuḥ evaṃrūpaiḥ ṛddhipratihāryaiḥ
analyzed: anāsrava puṇya pariniṣpannaḥ sarva lokadhātau apratihata cakṣuḥ evaṃrūpaiḥ ṛddhi pratihāryaiḥ

original: samanvāgato bhavati /
analyzed: samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: tatra katamā ṛddhiḥ?
analyzed: tatra katamā ṛddhiḥ

analyzed: yayā ṛddhayā prārthanā samṛddhi pariniṣpattiḥ

analyzed: iyam ucyate ṛddhiḥ iti

analyzed: tatra katamat ṛddhi prātihāryam

analyzed: yayā ṛddhayā samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattva anekavidhān ṛddhi viṣayān pratyunubhavati

original: eko 'pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati,
analyzed: ekaḥ api bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati

original: bahudhāpi bhūtvaiko bhavati /
analyzed: bahudhā api bhūtvā ekaḥ bhavati

original: avirbhāvaṃ tirobhāvamapi pratyanubhavati /
analyzed: avirbhāvam tirobhāvam api pratyanubhavati

original: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraḥ tiraḥparvatamapyasajjamāno gacchati /
analyzed: tiras kuḍyam tiras prākāraḥ tiras parvatam api a sajjamānaḥ gacchati

original: ākāśe 'pi kramate tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ /
analyzed: ākāśe api kramate tat yathā api nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ

original: pṛthivyāmapyunmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti tadyathāpi nāmodake /
analyzed: pṛthivyām api unmajjana nimajjanam karoti tat yathā api nāma udake

original: udake 'pyabhidyamāno gacchati tadyathāpi nāma pṛthivyām /
analyzed: udake api a bhidyamānaḥ gacchati tat yathā api nāma pṛthivyām

original: dhūmāyatyapi prajvalatyapi tadyathāpi nāma mahānagniskandhaḥ /
analyzed: dhūmāyati api prajvalati api tat yathā api nāma mahān agni skandhaḥ

original: imāvapi candrasūryāvevaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmahaujaskau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārjati /
analyzed: imau api candra sūryau evam maharddhikau evam mahā anubhāvau evam mahā ojaskau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārjati

original: ākāṅkṣamāṇo yāvad brahmalokādapi sattvān kāyena vaśe vartayati //
analyzed: ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ yāvat brahma lokāt api sattvān kāyena vaśe vartayati

original: (Vaidya 287)
analyzed: vaidya

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: pṛthivīya unmajja nimajja gacchatī abhidyamāno udake 'pi gacchati /
analyzed: pṛthivīyaḥ unmajja nimajja gacchatī a bhidyamānaḥ udake api gacchati

original: pakṣī yathā gaganatalena gacchatī dhūmāyate prajvalate ca ṛddhiyā // SRS_38.47 //
analyzed: pakṣī yathā gagana talena gacchatī dhūmāyate prajvalate ca

original: yathāntarīkṣasmi na vāyu sajjate gacchanti cāsmiṃ bahavo 'bhrakūṭāḥ /
analyzed: na vāyu sajjate gacchanti ca asmin bahavaḥ abhra kūṭāḥ

original: tathaiva yogī gaganena gacchatī asajjamāno yatha vātameghaḥ // SRS_38.48 //
analyzed: tathā eva yogī gaganena asajjamānaḥ vāta meghaḥ

original: yathā niṣaṇṇo vidu yogi bhotī parimārjate pāṇina candrasūryau /
analyzed: yathā niṣaṇṇaḥ parimārjate candra sūryau

original: āsanna so jānati brahmalokaṃ brahmāṇa koṭīna sa dharma deśayī // SRS_38.49 //
analyzed: brahma lokam

original: yadā ca ākāṅkṣati dharma bhāṣituṃ mahātrisāhasra sa vijñapeti /
analyzed: yadā ca ākāṅkṣati dharma bhāṣitum mahā tri sāhasra sa vijñapayati

analyzed: ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ bahu kṣetra koṭiṣu deśeti dharma bahu sattva koṭinām

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā atikrāntamānuṣakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakāṃśca /
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ divyena śrotradhātunā atikrānta mānuṣakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakān ca

original: nairayikānāmapi tiryagyonigatānāmapi yāmalaukikānāmapi /
analyzed: nairayikānām api tiryagyoni gatānām api yāmalaukikānām api

original: ye dūre antike vā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vā dūrāvacarāṇāṃ vā antikāvacarāṇāṃ vā //
analyzed: ye dūre antike vā devānām manuṣyāṇām vā dūrāvacarāṇām vā antika avacarāṇām vā

original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kumāra pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti evam tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkacaritāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ hi kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ para sattvānām para pudgalānām cetasā eva cetaḥ parivitarka caritāni yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
analyzed: sa rāgam cittam sa rāgam cittam iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ vītarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
analyzed: vīta rāgam cittam vīta rāgam cittam iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: peyālaṃ /
analyzed: peyālam

original: sadoṣaṃ (Vaidya 288)
analyzed: sa doṣam vaidya

original: vītadoṣaṃ samohaṃ vītamohaṃ sopādānamanupādānaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ viparītamaviparītaṃ
analyzed: vīta doṣam sa moham vīta moham sa upādānam anupādānam saṃkṣiptam vikṣiptam viparītam aviparītam

analyzed: sa kleśam niṣkleśam mahadgatam amahadgatam prabhāsvaram aprabhāsvaram sa pramāṇam apramāṇam

analyzed: sa uttaram anuttaram samāhitam a samāhitam vimuktam a vimuktam sa aṅgaṇam cittam sa aṅgaṇam

analyzed: cittam iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: anaṅgaṇaṃ cittamanaṅgaṇaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
analyzed: anaṅgaṇam cittam anaṅgaṇam cittam iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: iti hi sarvasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
analyzed: iti hi sarva sattvānām para pudgalānām cetasā eva cetaḥ parivitarkam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sākāraṃ soddeśamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati /
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa ākāram sa uddeśam anekavidham pūrvenivāsam anusmarati

original: ekāmapi jātimanusmarati /
analyzed: ekām api jātim anusmarati

original: dve tisraḥ pañca daśa viṃśatiḥ triṃśat catvāriṃśat pañcāśat jātiaśatamapyanusmarati /
analyzed: dve tisraḥ pañca daśa viṃśatiḥ triṃśat catvāriṃśat pañcāśat jāti aśatam api anusmarati

original: jātisahasrapyanusmarati /
analyzed: jāti sahasra api anusmarati

original: jātiśatasahasramapi yāvadanekānyapi kalpakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇyanusmarati /
analyzed: jāti śata sahasram api yāvat anekāni api kalpa koṭi nayuta śata sahasrāṇi anusmarati

original: saṃvartakalpamapyanusmarati vivartakalpamapi /
analyzed: saṃvarta kalpam api anusmarati vivarta kalpam api

original: yāvadanekānapi saṃvartavivartakalpānanusmarati /
analyzed: yāvat anekān api saṃvarta vivarta kalpān anusmarati

original: kalpamapyanusmarati kalpaśatamapi kalpasahasramapi kalpaśatasahasramapi,
analyzed: kalpam api anusmarati kalpa śatam api kalpa sahasram api kalpa śata sahasram api

original: yāvadanekānyapi kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanusmarati /
analyzed: yāvat anekāni api kalpa koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi anusmarati

original: yāvat pūrvāntakoṭīmapyanusmarati /
analyzed: yāvat pūrva anta koṭīm api anusmarati

original: amutrāhamāsamevaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātya evaṃvarṇa evamāhāra evamājīva evamāyuṣpramāṇa evaṃcirasthitika evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī /
analyzed: amutra aham āsam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotraḥ evaṃjātyaḥ evaṃvarṇaḥ evamāhāraḥ evamājīvaḥ evamāyuṣpramāṇaḥ evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evaṃsukha duḥkha pratisaṃvedī

original: tataścyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ /
analyzed: tatas cyutaḥ amutra upapannaḥ

original: so 'haṃ tataścyuta ihāsmyupapanna iti /
analyzed: saḥ aham tatas cyutaḥ iha asmi upapannaḥ iti

original: sākāraṃ sanimittaṃ soddeśamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati //
analyzed: sa ākāram sa nimittam sa uddeśam anekavidham pūrvenivāsam anusmarati

original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣakeṇa
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣakeṇa

original: sarvān paśyati cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān
analyzed: sarvān paśyati cyavamānān upapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān

original: praṇītān sugatimapi gacchato durgatimapi gacchato yathākarmopagān sattvān yathābhūtaṃ
analyzed: praṇītān sugatim api gacchataḥ durgatim api gacchataḥ yathā karma upagān sattvān yathābhūtam

original: prajānāti ime bata sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāgaduścaritena samanvāgatā
analyzed: prajānāti ime bata sattvāḥ kāya duścaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāc a duścaritena samanvāgatā

original: manoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇāmapavādakā mithyādṛṣṭikā mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ
analyzed: manaḥ duścaritena samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ mithyādṛṣṭi karma samādāna hetoḥ

original: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇādapāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayeṣu upapannāḥ /
analyzed: kāyasya bhedāt param maraṇāt apāyam durgatim vinipātam nirayeṣu upapannāḥ

original: ime punarbata sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vākasucaritena samanvāgatā manaḥsucaritena
analyzed: ime punar bata sattvāḥ kāya su caritena samanvāgatāḥ vāka su caritena samanvāgatāḥ manaḥ su caritena

original: samanvāgatā āryāṇāmanapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭirmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ
analyzed: samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ ma samādāna hetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt param

original: maraṇāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapannāḥ /
analyzed: maraṇāt sugatau svarga loke deveṣu upapannāḥ

original: iti hi devyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānānupapadyamānān
analyzed: iti hi devyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānān upapadyamānān

original: suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatimapi gacchato durgatimapi gacchato yathākarmopagān
analyzed: suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchataḥ durgatim api gacchataḥ yathā karma upagān

original: sattvān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
analyzed: sattvān yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā
analyzed: pariśuddha kāya samudācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ eka kṣaṇa samāyuktayā prajñayā

original: yat kiṃcijjñātavyamadhimoktavyaṃ vikurvitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti śṛṇoti paśyate budhyate //
analyzed: yat kiṃcid jñātavyam adhimoktavyam vikurvitavyam tat sarvam yathābhūtam prajānāti śṛṇoti paśyate budhyate

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: abhijñākramanirdiṣṭo bodhisattvāna tāyinām /
analyzed: abhijñā krama nirdiṣṭaḥ tāyinām

original: samādhīya sthihitvāna bodhisattvo 'dhigacchati // SRS_38.51 //
analyzed: samādhīya bodhisattvaḥ adhigacchati

original: (Vaidya 289)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śrotraṃ ca te viśodhenti divyaṃ śrotramacintiyam /
analyzed: śrotram ca te viśodhenti divyam śrotram acintiyam

original: yena śṛṇvanti te dharmān sarvabuddhehi bhāṣitān // SRS_38.52 //
analyzed: yena śṛṇvanti te dharmān sarva buddhehi bhāṣitān

original: sarāgamasarāgaṃ vā sadoṣaṃ vītadoṣakam /
analyzed: sa rāgam a sa rāgam vā sa doṣam vīta doṣakam

original: samohaṃ vītamohaṃ vā cittaṃ jānanti prāṇinām // SRS_38.53 //

analyzed: abhūmiḥ tīrthikānām vaidya

analyzed: yat idam mithyā mānaḥ yoginām

analyzed: daśa balaiḥ anubaddham

original: yadidaṃ sarvasukhāhārakamupādāya //

original: .... nāgairnamasyanīyam?

original: ....yakṣairanumodanīyam?
analyzed: yakṣaiḥ anumodanīyam

original: ....kinnaraiḥ stavanīyam?

original: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ pratyekabodhau ciattamutpannam /
