original: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāmarhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyāṃ cittānyutpannāni /
analyzed: aprameyāṇām ca sattvānām arhat tva phala sākṣātkriyāyām cittāni utpannāni

original: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍavikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātuḥ ṣaṣ avikāram kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ

original: calitaḥ pracalitaḥ saṃpracalitaḥ /
analyzed: calitaḥ pracalitaḥ saṃpracalitaḥ

original: vedhitaḥ pravedhitaḥ /
analyzed: vedhitaḥ pravedhitaḥ

original: saṃpravedhitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃpravedhitaḥ

original: kṣumitaḥ prakṣubhitaḥ saṃprakṣubhitaḥ /
analyzed: kṣumitaḥ prakṣubhitaḥ saṃprakṣubhitaḥ

original: raṇitaḥ praraṇitaḥ saṃpraraṇitaḥ /
analyzed: raṇitaḥ praraṇitaḥ saṃpraraṇitaḥ

original: garjitaḥ pragarjitaḥ saṃpragarjitaḥ /
analyzed: garjitaḥ pragarjitaḥ saṃpragarjitaḥ

original: pūrvā digavanamati paścimā digunnamati /
analyzed: pūrvā diś avanamati paścimā diś unnamati

original: paścimā digavanamati pūrvā digunnamati/
analyzed: paścimā diś avanamati pūrvā diś unnamati

original: uttarā digunnamati dakṣiṇā digavanamati /
analyzed: uttarā diś unnamati dakṣiṇā diś avanamati

original: uttarā digavanamati dakṣiṇā digunnamati /
analyzed: uttarā diś avanamati dakṣiṇā diś unnamati

original: antādavanamati madhyādunnamati /
analyzed: antāt avanamati madhyāt unnamati

original: madhyādavanamati antādunnamati /
analyzed: madhyāt avanamati antāt unnamati

original: aprameyasya cāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
analyzed: aprameyasya ca avabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvaḥ abhūt

original: mahacca divyagandhavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
analyzed: mahat ca divya gandha varṣam abhiprāvarṣat

original: devatāśca mahāntaṃ divyaṃ puṣpavarṣamutsṛjanti sma /
analyzed: devatāḥ ca mahāntam divyam puṣpa varṣam utsṛjanti sma

original: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe bhrāmayanti /
analyzed: divyāni ca tūrya śata sahasrāṇi upari antarīkṣe bhrāmayanti

original: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta -
analyzed: evam ca vācam abhāṣanta

original: sulabdhā lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ya imaṃ mahākaruṇāvatāradharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
analyzed: su labdhāḥ lābhāḥ teṣām sattvānām ye imam mahā karuṇā avatāra dharmaparyāyam śroṣyanti

original: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhiṃ punaḥ punaḥ śroṣyanti,
analyzed: bahu buddha paryupāsitāḥ te sattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti ye imam sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcita samādhim punar punar śroṣyanti

original: śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayiṣyanti,
analyzed: śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇā bhāvanayā bhāvayiṣyanti

original: bahulīkariṣyanti,
analyzed: bahulīkariṣyanti

original: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti /
analyzed: parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti

original: sarvasatvānāṃ te dakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti //
analyzed: sarva satvānām te dakṣiṇīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhvīṣva tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate smaḥ udgṛhvīṣva tvam ānanda imam dharmaparyāyam dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi

original: pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
analyzed: pareṣām ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya

original: atha khalvāyuṣmānānado bhagavantametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān nānadaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat  kaḥ nāma ayam bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ

original: kathaṃ caina dhārayāmi?
analyzed: katham ca ena dhārayāmi

original: bhagavānāha - mahākaruṇāvatāro nāmānanda idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraya /
analyzed: bhagavān āha mahākaruṇāvatāraḥ nāma ānandaḥ idam sūtram dhāraya

original: sarvadharmasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiriti dhāraya /
analyzed: sarvadharmasamatāvipañcitaḥ nāma samādhiḥ iti dhāraya

original: ānanda āha - udgṛhīto me bhagavannayaṃ dharmaparyāya iti //
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha udgṛhītaḥ me bhagavan ayam dharmaparyāyaḥ iti

original: (Vaidya 304) idamavocad bhagavān /
analyzed: vaidyaḥ idam avocat bhagavān

original: āttamanāścandraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ
analyzed: ātta manāḥ candraprabhaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ āyuṣmān ca ānandaḥ tāḥ catasraḥ parṣadaḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ

original: aneke ca śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato
analyzed: aneke ca śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ

original: bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
analyzed: bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti

original: ityāryasarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādheryathālabdhaṃ samādhirājaṃ nāma mahāyānasūtraṃ parivarto nāma catvāriṃśatitamaṃ samāptam
analyzed: iti ārya sarva dharma svabhāva samatā vipañcitāt samādheḥ yathālabdham samādhirājam nāma mahāyāna sūtram parivartaḥ nāma catvāriṃśatitamam samāptam

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetuḥ teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evam vādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
